1b1(khri brgyad): rgya gar skad du/AR+tha ASh+Tad shes hA swok+Sha prad+d+hA/
1b2(khri brgyad): pA ra mi tA nA ma~M ma hA yA ni smr-i tA/bod skyed du/'phags pa
1b3(khri brgyad): hU~M pr-I zla mi zhes bya ga
1b4(khri brgyad): chen po'i mdo//bam po dang pi/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
2a1(khri brgyad): //dpa' thums cad lA phyug 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das
2a2(khri brgyad): rgyal po'i khab na/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig
2a3(khri brgyad): tu bzhugs te/thams cad kyang dag bcom pa zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa sems
2a4(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba cang shes pa glang po chen po bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa
2a5(khri brgyad): khur bor ba/bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas
2b1(khri brgyad): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/gang zag gcig ma
2b2(khri brgyad): gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o//grags 'dzin dang /skye dgu'i bdag mo chen ma la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga
2b3(khri brgyad): brgya tsam dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rab tu mang po thams cad kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa/mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba ma
2b5(khri brgyad): brtags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa thob pa/chags pa med pa'i gzungs thob pa/mngon
2b6(khri brgyad): par shes pa mi nyams pa/gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa/tshul 'chos pa med pa/kha gsag med pa/shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa'i sems
3a1(khri brgyad): /med pa/zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa/chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu son pa/mi 'jugs pa thob
3a2(khri brgyad): pa/bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/chos rab tu rnam par 'byed cing rnam par dbye ba ston pa
3a3(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa/bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/gsong por smra ba bzhin khro gnyer med
3a4(khri brgyad): pa/pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis brjod pa la mkhas pa/sems zhum pa med pa spobs pa mi chod pa/'khor mtha' yas pa zil
3a5(khri brgyad): gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas pas nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa/chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu
3a6(khri brgyad): dang druR+Ya dang rmi lam dang brag cha dang mig yor dang gzugs brnyan dang sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
3b1(khri brgyad): pa dang /mos pa dang phra ba mkhyen pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/sems thogs pa med pa bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug
3b2(khri brgyad): pa la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa thams cad rnam par bkod pa'i smon lam gyi 'jug pas yongs su zin pa/'jig rten gyi khams grangab med pa na
3b3(khri brgyad): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/lta ba dang
3b4(khri brgyad): bag la nyal dang /kun nas dkris pa dang /nyon mongs pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba 'bum mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas
3b5(khri brgyad): pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzung skyong dang /dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /rin chen snying po dang /rin po chos byin dang /
3b6(khri brgyad): ded dngon bzang po dang /chu lha'i lha dang /phug spus dang /dbang pos byin dang /blo gros dam pa dang /blo gros khyad par can dang /blo gros 'phel dang /blo gros
3b7(khri brgyad): mtha' yas dang /mthong ba don yod dang /blo gros sgrib med dang /shin tu yang dag zhugs dang /rab kyi rtsol gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /brtson 'grus
4a1(khri brgyad): mtha' yas dang rtag tu brtson dang /rtag tu sbyor dang /brtson pa mi gtod dang /nyi ma'i snying po dang /blo gros dpe med dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
4a2(khri brgyad): dang /mthu chen thob dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'dzem pa dang /rdo rje blo gros dang /lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /rtag tu phyag brgyang dang /
4a3(khri brgyad): snying rje cher sems dang /bkod pa chen po dang /bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /lhun po'i rtse mo drang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa de dag dang /gzhan
4a4(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dang 'bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig go//de nas de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis glad na seng ge'i khri ba shams nas/skyil mo krung
4a5(khri brgyad): bcas te/sku drang por bskyod nus dran pa mngon du bzhag ste bzhugs so//der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud pa drang 'dus pa dang 'ubo cing yang
4a6(khri brgyad): dag par gzhol dri ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/
4a7(khri brgyad): lha'i spyan gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs so//rnam par gzigs nas sku thams cad kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//de'i zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang /
4b1(khri brgyad): ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo //zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo //de bzhin du nangs
4b2(khri brgyad): kyi long bu gnyis dang /byin po gnyis dang /pus mo gnyis dang /bAR+Ya gnyis dang /sta zur dang /lte ba khrud dang /rtsibs ldogs gnyis dang /skyes bu chen po'i mche ni thugs kha'i dbul ba'u
4b3(khri brgyad): las kyang 'od zer bye bo khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo //phyag gi ser mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo //de bzhin du phyag gnyis dang /
4b4(khri brgyad): sku phrag pa gnyis dang /mgur dang /tshoms mchi ba bani dang /tshems bzhi bcu dang /spyan gnyis dang /snyan go sa dang /shungs kyi bu ga gnyis dang /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang steng
4b5(khri brgyad): go gtsug tor dang zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrug khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ste/'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis thams cad
4b6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po
4b7(khri brgyad): des khyab par snang bar byas so//de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs
5a1(khri brgyad): su thugs ra der yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma nyid dag 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po dus byu par snang ba byas so//sems can gang dag gis 'di du mdzang /
5a2(khri brgyad): ba dang /gang dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung
5a3(khri brgyad): bu thams cad nas 'od zer bkye ste/spu'i khung bu ra re nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung nas/'od zer de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
5a4(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/de dag gis shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen pos khyab par snang bar byas so//de
5a5(khri brgyad): bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang /steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gad+d+hi/
5a6(khri brgyad): klung gi bye ma skyed dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des khyab par snang bar byas so//sems can gang dag gis 'od de mthong ba dang /gang dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa
5a7(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od gang yin pa'i 'od des stong gsum gyi
5b1(khri brgyad): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//shur phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen po des khyab par mdzad do//de bzhin
5b2(khri brgyad): du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang /steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
5b3(khri brgyad): snyed dag snang ba chen po des khyab por mdzad do//sems can glang dag gos 'od de mthong ba dang gang dag 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
5b4(khri brgyad): memo ldog par gyur to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas/thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khoms 'di lhags
5b5(khri brgyad): kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzod nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer
5b6(khri brgyad): kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/'od zer de dag thams cad la rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa sna tshogs su
5b7(khri brgyad): 'dug pa/blta na sdug pa/yid du 'ong ba/kha dog bzang ba/dri zhim pa/'jam pa ka tsa li di ka ltar rig na bde ba sha stag kun tu gnas par gyur te/pad+ma de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs
6a1(khri brgyad): pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'dri lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/de dag shAr phyogs su 'jig rten rgya
6a2(khri brgyad): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi cho sgo ston to//de bzhin du lho
6a3(khri brgyad): dung nub dang byeng phyogs dang byang shwar dang shwar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang /steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re ra yang 'jig rten gyi khams gAd+hA'i klung gi byim
6a4(khri brgyad): snyed dag tu gshegs shing /de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//sems can gang dag gis chos bston/
6a5(khri brgyad): padri thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs
6a6(khri brgyad): bzhin du seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/rdzu 'phrul de mngon par mdzad
6a7(khri brgyad): pas sti gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnas pa drug tu g.yas te g.yas rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so//'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul to//
6b1(khri brgyad): ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg go/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//'u ra 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro//chem chem rab tu tsham chem kun tu
6b2(khri brgyad): rab tu tsham chem mo//mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/'jam pa dang /sdum pa dang /sems can thams cad la phan pa drang bde ba bskyed par gyur to//
6b3(khri brgyad): de nas skad cig zang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad
6b4(khri brgyad): rgyun chad par gyur mi khom pa thams cad kyang med par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to//de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang sum
6b5(khri brgyad): cu rtsa gsum pa dang 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to//de nas mi de dag dang /lha de dag dga' ba
6b6(khri brgyad): dang /mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
6b7(khri brgyad): 'tshal te/thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dang /lho dang nub dang byang dang phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng
7a1(khri brgyad): dang phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang /'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams
7a2(khri brgyad): cad dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par gyur/mi khom pa thams cad kyang med par gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad lha dang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par
7a3(khri brgyad): skyes par gyur to//de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /mchog tu
7a4(khri brgyad): dga' ba de nyid kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong ste phyin nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
7a5(khri brgyad): thams cad thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can long ba gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis ni//
7a6(khri brgyad): gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to//sems can 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur to//smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed par gyur to//sems rnam par g.yeng ba rnams ni sems rtse
7a7(khri brgyad): gcig par gyur to//gcer bu rnams ni gos rnyed par gyur te//dbul po rnams ni nor rnyed par gyur to//bkres pa rnams ni zas rnyed par gyur te//skom pa rnams ni btung ba rnyed par
7b1(khri brgyad): gyur to//nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad med par gyur to//dbang po nyams shing mtshang ba rnams ni dbang po yongs su tshang bar gyur to//lus ngal ba rnams ni lus ngal ba med par gyur to//lus
7b2(khri brgyad): drang ngag dang 'idakyilas kyi mtha' dang 'tshe ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams ni/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi lus kyi mtha' dang /'tshe mi dge ba dang dral bar gyur to//sems can thams cad kyang
7b3(khri brgyad): sems can+da thams cad la 'di lta ste/pha ma dang mtshungs dra'i sems dang phunu dang sring mo dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang mdza' ba shes dang nye du dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams dang mtshungs
7b4(khri brgyad): pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam par gyur to//dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod la/gtsang zhing nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang
7b5(khri brgyad): bral bar gyur to//de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad 'byor par gyur te/dper ni dge slong bsdam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang
7b6(khri brgyad): ldan par gyur te//de'i tshe sems can thams cad 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/'di ltar sbyin pa ni legs pa'o//dul ba ni legs pa'o//legs par sdom pa ni legs
7b7(khri brgyad): pa'o//tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ni legs pa'o//srog chags 'byung po rnams la rnam par mi 'chi ba ni legs pa'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to//de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na
8a1(khri brgyad): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/kye ma sems can 'di dag 'di ltar sbyin pa ni legs pa'o//dul ba ni legs pa'o//ljags par
8a2(khri brgyad): sdom pa ni legs pa'o//tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ni legs pa'o//srog chags 'byung po rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni legs pa'o zhes bya bar shes pa'i shes
8a3(khri brgyad): rab de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du 'di lta ste dper na
8a4(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa'i nam mkha' la nyi ma stobs dang ldan pa dang /zla ba nye ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis stong gsum gyi stong
8a5(khri brgyad): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/khor yug dang bcas pa/lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/dbang po dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dbang byed dang bcas pa
8a6(khri brgyad): gnas gtsang ma dang bcas pa/lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te/mdzes shing lham me lhan na lhang nger bzhugs so//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis
8a7(khri brgyad): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od dang /sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis zil gyis mnan to//lho dang /nub dang byang dang phyogs mtshams
8b1(khri brgyad): dang /'og dang steng dang phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od dang /sku mdog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis zil gyis mnan te/mdzes shing /lham
8b2(khri brgyad): me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so//'di lta ste dper na/ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni do las gzhan pa'i ri thams cad zil gyis mnan te/mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go//'di lta
8b3(khri brgyad): ste dper na/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis mnan te/mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni de/
8b4(khri brgyad): las gzhan pa'i snang ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te/mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'od dang /sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang
8b5(khri brgyad): dpal gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha dang bcas pa/dbang po dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa/gnas gtsang ma dang bcas pa lha dang lham yin dang bcas pa thams
8b6(khri brgyad): cad zil gyis mnan te/mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
8b7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi lus ci 'dra ba de dang mthun par sku tha mal pa bstan to//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'don gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams nas/tshangs
9a1(khri brgyad): ris dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang 'phrul dga' dang dga' ldan dang /'thab bral dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris kyi bar ji snyed yod
9a2(khri brgyad): pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/de dag tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/rab tu dga' nas/dga' ba dang yid bde ba
9a3(khri brgyad): skyes te/lha'i me tog dag khyer zhing lha'i me tog phreng dang /lha'i spros dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma
9a4(khri brgyad): dkar po dang /na lin dang /dri mchog dang /lha'i me tog klu shing gi me tog dang /ta ma la'i lo ma dang /lha'i gos dang /lha'i rgyan dang /lha'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang
9a5(khri brgyad): ba dan drag khyer te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang /snod du gyur pa'i mi gang dag 'khod pa de
9a6(khri brgyad): dag gis kyang /dri bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas thang las skyes pa dang /chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnams khyer te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
9a7(khri brgyad): sku blta bas chog mi shes pa ga la ba der dong ngo //de nas lha de dag dang mi de dag gis lha'i me tog dang /spos dang /bdug pa dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma
9b1(khri brgyad): dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan de dag dang /chu las skyes pa dang /thad las skyes pa'i me tog de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gtor/mngon par
9b2(khri brgyad): gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor to//de nas me tog dang /spos dang /bdug po dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba
9b3(khri brgyad): dan gyi char dang /thung las skyes pa dang /chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang dag bcom ldan 'das la gtor ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/bcom
9b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi nam mkha' lo khang pa brtsegs pa/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam gcig tu red de gnas par gyur to//khang
9b5(khri brgyad): pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha'i me tog dang /dar b+hi ldu ldi dag 'phyang /rab tu 'phyang /mngon par rab tu 'phyang ste/me tog gi lda ldi dang /dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis kyang //
9b6(khri brgyad): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lte bu phyogs bcur 'phros pa des kyang phyogs
9b7(khri brgyad): re rer 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /khyab par snang bar gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/dzam+bu'i gling gi 'jig rten gyi
10a1(khri brgyad): khams thams cad kyi lha dang mi de dag so so nas 'di snyam du sems te/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
10a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du nub kyi ba glang spyod dang /shar gyi lus 'phags dang /byang gi sgra mi spyan dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang /de bzhin
10a3(khri brgyad): du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang /mi de dag thams cad 'dri snyam du
10a4(khri brgyad): sems te/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du rang
10a5(khri brgyad): 'dzum pa mdzad de/'dzum pa'i snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gsal bar gyur te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'don/
10a6(khri brgyad): sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
10a7(khri brgyad): dang bcas de dag mthong bar gyur te//shar phyogs kyi 'jog rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni/sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /'jig rten gyi khams
10b1(khri brgyad): mi mjed 'dri dang /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong ngo //de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gtogs pa'i sems
10b2(khri brgyad): can rnams kyis lho dang nub dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og drang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
10b3(khri brgyad): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo //'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
10b4(khri brgyad): po de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
10b5(khri brgyad): pa mthong ngo //de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams rin chen can zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin
10b6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//de byang chub sems dpa' rnams
10b7(khri brgyad): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston to//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer zhes bya ba 'dug pas snang ba chen
11a1(khri brgyad): po de dang /sa tshor g.yos pa de dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon
11a2(khri brgyad): mchog 'byung gnas ga la ba deng song ste phyin nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten
11a3(khri brgyad): du byung ba 'di dang /dog sa cher g.yos pa 'di dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen gang lags/de skad ces gsol
11a4(khri brgyad): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
11a5(khri brgyad): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho
11a6(khri brgyad): zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas la byang chub
11a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /phyag
11b1(khri brgyad): bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang phal tshor gzhon nur gyur pa/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu thob
11b2(khri brgyad): pA/ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
11b3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song zhig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis/byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer la pad+ma rin
11b4(khri brgyad): po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dri bzhin goshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la pad+ma 'di dag gtor
11b5(khri brgyad): cig/rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsnyen par
11b6(khri brgyad): dka' ba'i phyir ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer gyis/de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas lngas/rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma gser gyi
11b7(khri brgyad): mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang /bu mo bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mas yongs
12a1(khri brgyad): su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed
12a2(khri brgyad): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug po dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang rgyal
12a3(khri brgyad): mtshan dang /ba dran dag gis ngasti stang du byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas nas/byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
12a4(khri brgyad): mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ga la ba der phyin te/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas/phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
12a5(khri brgyad): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer gyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
12a6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas/bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol
12a7(khri brgyad): te/gnod pa chung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/'tsho 'am/stobs dang ldan nam/bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo//bcom ldan 'das
12b1(khri brgyad): dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis pad+ma 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das la bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+ma de dag bzhes nas/shar
12b2(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag ga la ba de logs su gtor to//pad+ma de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag khyab par gyur te/pad+ma
12b3(khri brgyad): de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sku dag bzhugs shing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//sems can gang
12b4(khri brgyad): ngag gis chos de thos pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang /rab tu byung ba de dag dang //
12b5(khri brgyad): khye'u dang /bu mo de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la bsti stang du byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod
12b6(khri brgyad): po byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad
12b7(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//
13a1(khri brgyad): de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par
13a2(khri brgyad): sbyar ro//de bzhin du nub phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/do na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
13a3(khri brgyad): 'odi 'phro zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes so//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/phyogs
13a4(khri brgyad): gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro//byang phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dang //
13a5(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba
13a6(khri brgyad): 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro//de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin/
13a7(khri brgyad): gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po che dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar
13b1(khri brgyad): bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes so//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
13b2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro//shwar lho'i phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyun shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs
13b3(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma mchog gi dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes so//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
13b4(khri brgyad): pad+ma zhes bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro//lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na/'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs
13b5(khri brgyad): dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgron ma mchog gi dpal zhes bya ba da ltar
13b6(khri brgyad): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i
13b7(khri brgyad): bar du rgyas par sbyar ro//nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na/'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur po zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
14a1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen
14a2(khri brgyad): mchog ces bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro//'og gi phyogs na/'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod
14a3(khri brgyad): de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//de na byang chub sems dpa'
14a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po pad+ma mchog ces bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro//de nas steng gi phyogs su 'jig
14a5(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
14a6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin zhes bya ba
14a7(khri brgyad): 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /sa cher g.yos pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
14b1(khri brgyad): padaga' ba'i dpal gral ba der song sa phyin nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das spang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di dang /dag
14b2(khri brgyad): sa cher g.yos pa 'di dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
14b3(khri brgyad): dga' ba'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dang 'daga' bas byin pA la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus pan/
14b4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
14b5(khri brgyad): gzhes la/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston te/'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal la/byang chub sems dpa' dga'
14b6(khri brgyad): bas byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dri la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems
14b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang phal cher gzhin nur gyur pa/gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang po//
15a1(khri brgyad): pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod
15a2(khri brgyad): song zhig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la pad+ma rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'das
15a3(khri brgyad): ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la pad+ma 'di dag gis gtor cig/rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes
15a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro//de nas byang chub sems
15a5(khri brgyad): dpa' dga' bas byin gyis/de bzhin gshags pa dga' ba'i dpal los rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs
15a6(khri brgyad): te/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /khye'u dang /bu mo bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/lhan cig
15a7(khri brgyad): tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/steng gi phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad la me tog dang /
15b1(khri brgyad): bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byas/bla mar byas/ri mor
15b2(khri brgyad): byas/mchod par byas nas/byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ga la~M ba drir phyin te/de bzhin gshegs
15b3(khri brgyad): po shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/byang chub
15b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' dga' bas byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal/bcom ldan
15b5(khri brgyad): 'das la snyun gsol te/gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/'tsho 'am/stobs dang ldan nam/bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun
15b6(khri brgyad): gsol lo//bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i dpal gyis pad+ma 'di dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das la bskur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
15b7(khri brgyad): pad+ma de dag bzhes nas/steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ga la ba de logs su gtor to//pad+ma de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi
16a1(khri brgyad): khams de dag khyab par gyur te/pad+ma de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sku dag bzhugs shing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
16a2(khri brgyad): pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//sems can gang dag gis chos de thos pa de dag kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//de nas byang
16a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang /rab tu byung ba de dag dang /khye'u dang /bu me de dag gis kyang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bsti/
16a4(khri brgyad): stang du byas/bla mar byas/rI mor byas/mchod pa byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
16a5(khri brgyad): gyi khams 'dri rin po che'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur to/me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis gang ba dang /drar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres pa dang /pog phor nas bdug pa dang /dpag
16a6(khri brgyad): bsam gyi shing ljon pa rgyan dang /'bras bu sna tshogs kyi yal ga'i rtse mo g.yur za ba drag dang /me tog gi shing ljon pa dag dang /'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag dang /spos kyi shing
16a7(khri brgyad): ljon pa dag dang /me tog phreng gi shing ljon pa dag dang /phye ma'i shing ljon pa dag gis mdzes par byas par gyur te/'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas me
16b1(khri brgyad): tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa dang /lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid che ba/
16b2(khri brgyad): gzi brjid che ba gzhan dag kyang gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can bzhin du gyur to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya
16b3(khri brgyad): ste dang po'o////de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa/dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa//
16b4(khri brgyad): lha dang mir bcas pa 'dus pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
16b5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs
16b6(khri brgyad): par byang chub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad
16b7(khri brgyad): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'tshal bas/ji ltar
17a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
17a2(khri brgyad): to//shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa med pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sbyin par bya ba dang /sbyin pa po
17a3(khri brgyad): dang /len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/yongs su btang ba med pa'i tshul gyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang /lhag par
17a4(khri brgyad): ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o///
17a5(khri brgyad): lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus ma gtang ba'i phyir/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//ro myang ba med pa'i phyir/bsam gtan gyi pha rol
17a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
17a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//yang
17b1(khri brgyad): dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lhag brgyad pa yongs su rtogs
17b2(khri brgyad): par bya'o//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o//bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /
17b3(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /'du shes dgu bsgom par bya'o//dgu
17b4(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /phyed du chad pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par dmyur ba'i 'du shes dang /rnam par
17b5(khri brgyad): bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /rus gong gi 'du shes dang /rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes te/de dag ni 'du
17b6(khri brgyad): shes dgu'o//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes
17b7(khri brgyad): su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//dbugs rngub pa dang /'byung ba rjes su dran pa dang /skye ba rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa bsgom
18a1(khri brgyad): par bya'o//mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang /'chi ba'i 'du
18a2(khri brgyad): shes dang /'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /'jig rten thams cad la yid mi rten pa'i 'du shes dang /sdug bsngal shes pa dang /kun
18a3(khri brgyad): 'byung ba shes pa dang /'gog pa shes pa dang /lam shes pa dang /zad pa shes pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa dang /chos shes pa dang /rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /
18a4(khri brgyad): kun rdzob shes pa dang /yongs su 'dris pa shes pa dang /sgra ji bzhin shes pa dang /rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i
18a5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa'ang med dpyod pa'ang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes
18a6(khri brgyad): pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /zad par gyi skye mched dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /rnam par dgod pa bzhi dang /sa bcu dang /spyod
18a7(khri brgyad): pa bcu dang /bzod pa bcu dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa nyi shu dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong shes pa dang /rig pa gsum dang //
18b1(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /yang dag par bsdud par 'gyur ba'i chos
18b2(khri brgyad): drug dang /nor bdun dang /skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad dang /sems can gyi gnas dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
18b3(khri brgyad): pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam
18b4(khri brgyad): pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa dang /thams cad shes
18b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha
18b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la brngon par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms
18b7(khri brgyad): par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ste/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
19a1(khri brgyad): bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'dod pa dang /nyan thos
19a2(khri brgyad): dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'dod pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang rnam par g.yo ba
19a3(khri brgyad): shes par 'dod pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo thob par 'dod pa dang /nyan thos dang //
19a4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa sbyin pa na/rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
19a5(khri brgyad): pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
19a6(khri brgyad): pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang
19a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
19b1(khri brgyad): gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams
19b2(khri brgyad): cad kyi bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas
19b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ched du sbyin pa chung ngu byin yang thabs mkhas pas
19b4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas/tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub
19b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims chung ngu srung /bzod pa chung ngu sgom/brtson 'grus chung ngu rtsom/bsam gtan chung ngu la snyoms
19b6(khri brgyad): par 'jug/shes rab chung ngu sgom yang /thabs mkhas pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas/de dag grangs med/tshad med par 'gyur bar byed 'dod
19b7(khri brgyad): pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/shes
20a1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bzod
20a2(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bas m-i gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
20a3(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//skyes
20a4(khri brgyad): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bsgrub par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
20a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20a6(khri brgyad): chen po gzhon nu'i sa gnon par 'dod pa dang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA
20a7(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
20b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /ri mo bya ba dang /mchod pa bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bdag la 'byor par 'dod pa des/shes rab kyi pha rol
20b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /me tog dang /spos dang /gos dang /me tog
20b3(khri brgyad): phreng dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /byug pa dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /khang khyim dang /nor dang /'bru dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /rgyan dang /rin po che dang /nor
20b4(khri brgyad): bu dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /skyed mos tshal dang /rgyal srid la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi re ba yongs
20b5(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pa des/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten chos kyi
20b6(khri brgyad): dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
20b7(khri brgyad): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pas/
21a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig kyang byang
21a2(khri brgyad): chub kyi snying po la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi zad par byed par 'dod pa des/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
21a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu dag na/sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag bdag gi bsngags pa brjod par 'dod pa des/shes rab kyi pha
21a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
21a5(khri brgyad): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed
21a6(khri brgyad): pa gcig gis lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
21a7(khri brgyad): krung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar
21b1(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag sgra gcig gis go bar byed par 'dod pa dang /de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /phyogs mtshams rnams dang /'og
21b2(khri brgyad): dang /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag sgra gcig gis go bar byed par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu
21b3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir gnas par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o///
21b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du phyi
21b5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
21b6(khri brgyad): dang /mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang
21b7(khri brgyad): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod
22a1(khri brgyad): pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
22a2(khri brgyad): dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu
22a3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed yod pa de dag shes par 'dod pa dang /
22a4(khri brgyad): rgya mtsho chen po dang /'bab chu dang /mtsho dang /mtshe'u dang /khron pa dang /'bab chu'i dngo'i chu'i rdul phra rab rnams shes par 'dod pa dang /me'i rdul phra rab rnams shes par
22a5(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rlung gi rdul phra rab rnams shes par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
22a6(khri brgyad): bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/bsreg pa'i bskal pa'i mo 'bar ba kha'i dbugs
22a7(khri brgyad): gcig gis zhi bar bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'khrug
22b1(khri brgyad): pa chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor byung ste/rlung gis 'jig pa na/gang ri rab dang ri rab chen po dang /khor yug dang /khor yug chen po nas bzung ste/ri thams cad dang /sa chen
22b2(khri brgyad): po thams cad g.yo bar byed pa dang /rnam par 'bor bar byed pa dang /rmeg med par byed pa'i rnam par 'khrug par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de sor mo gcig gi rtse mos gzhi la
22b3(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
22b4(khri brgyad): khams na/ri rab dang /ri rab chen po dang /khor yug dang /khor yug chen po la sogs pari gang dag yod pa de dag skra nyag ma gcig gis sdams te/'jig rten gyi khams
22b5(khri brgyad): grangs med dpag tu med par 'phang ngo snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum
22b6(khri brgyad): b+hi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de thams cad skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par dgang bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
22b7(khri brgyad): shI ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyon thos kyi dge 'dun dang
23a1(khri brgyad): bcas pa rnams bsod snyoms gcig gis khyad par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du me tog dang /bdug pa/
23a2(khri brgyad): dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang ba don gyi sprin rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
23a3(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang /bla mar bya bar 'dod pa dang /ri mor bya bar 'dod pa dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha
23a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /
23a5(khri brgyad): 'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams bsod snyoms
23a6(khri brgyad): gcig gis khyad par bya bar 'dod pa dang /de bzhin du me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
23a7(khri brgyad): mtshan dang /ba dan gyi sprin rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang /bla mar bya bar
23b1(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dang /ri mor bya bar 'dod pa dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub par bya'o///'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
23b2(khri brgyad): khri brgyad stong pa//bam po gnyis pa//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems
23b3(khri brgyad): can gang dag 'khod pa de dag tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par
23b4(khri brgyad): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
23b5(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar la dgod par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
23b6(khri brgyad): pa la bslab par bya'o//shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs
23b7(khri brgyad): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
24a1(khri brgyad): pa la spyod cing sbyin pa byin pa'i tshe/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/'bras bu chen por 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams
24a2(khri brgyad): su skye bar 'gyur/de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar
24a3(khri brgyad): byin na ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab brel dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi
24a4(khri brgyad): nang du skye bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/bsam gtan dang po thob par
24a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur/de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa thob par 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/bsam gtan bzhi pa thob par 'gyur/sbyin pa
24a6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar byin na ni/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/de bzhin du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /ci'ang med pa'i skye mchod kyi
24a7(khri brgyad): snyoms por 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/sbyin po 'di ltar
24b1(khri brgyad): b+hibyin na nI/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob par 'gyur/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir myi
24b2(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur bar shes so//shA ri'i bu gzhen yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod
24b3(khri brgyad): pa thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol
24b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya bar shes
24b5(khri brgyad): par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24b6(khri brgyad): chen pos sbyin pa ji ltar stsal na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa ji ltar stsal na/tshul
24b7(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
25a1(khri brgyad): pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu sbyin par bya ba dang /gtong ba po dang /len pa po mi dmigs
25a2(khri brgyad): te/'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang /lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir/tshul
25a3(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogaso par byas pa yin/'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/lus dang sems
25a4(khri brgyad): kyi brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/rnam par g.yeng ba dang /kun tu rtog pa med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi
25a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/chos thams cad rab tu shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas
25a6(khri brgyad): pa yin te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa de ltar byin na/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no//de bzhin du tshul
25a7(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no//de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
25b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no//shA ri'i bu gzhan
25b2(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thob par 'dod pas
25b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par ba'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar
25b4(khri brgyad): 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da
25b5(khri brgyad): ltar byung ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings skye ba med pa'i mthar phyin par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
25b6(khri brgyad): par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sngon du 'gro bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
25b7(khri brgyad): bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
26a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bsgrub par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nang gi 'khor du 'gyur/
26a2(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor mang po dang ldan par 'dod
26a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems mi bskyed
26a6(khri brgyad): par 'dod pa dang /granod sems kyi sems mi bskyed par 'dod pa dang /le lo'i sems dor bar 'dod pa dang /rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dor bar 'dod pa dang
26a7(khri brgyad): 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems dor bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
26b1(khri brgyad): chen po sems can thams cad sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dgod par 'dod pa dang /tshul khrims lngas byung ba dang /sgom pa las byung ba dang /zhal te/
26b2(khri brgyad): bya ba dang ldan pa dang /rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dgod par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
26b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga bskyed par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shi'i mig dang /lha'i
26b4(khri brgyad): mig dang /shes rab kyi mig dang /chos kyi mig dang /sangs rgyas kyi mig ste/de dag bskyed par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu
26b5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pas/shes rab
26b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs
26b7(khri brgyad): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom
27a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de dag chos gang ston pa'i chos de lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
27a2(khri brgyad): du sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs
27a3(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na chos ston pa de thams cad thos nas dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa bcad du mi chod pas
27a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par gzung bar 'dod pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du thams cad tshud mi za bar bya bar 'dod
27a5(khri brgyad): pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das
27a6(khri brgyad): pa dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams blta bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs
27a7(khri brgyad): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams blta bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha
27b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdo'i sde dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad
27b2(khri brgyad): pa'i sde dang /lung bstan pa'i sde dang /tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo dang /ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /gleng gzhi'i sde dang /de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /
27b3(khri brgyad): shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde gang ci bstan pa drang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs
27b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyis ma thos pa gang yin pa de thams cad kun chub par byed par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
27b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang ci gsungs pa dang /gsung ba dang gsung par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad gzung bar
27b6(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dang /bcang bar 'dod po dang /klag par 'dod pa dang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'dod pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol
27b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /bying shar dang /shar lho dang /dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs su
28a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang ci gsungs pa dang /gsung ba dang /gsung bar 'gyur ba de thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'dod pa dang /gzung
28a2(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pa dang /bcang bar 'dod pa dang /klag par 'dod pa dang /de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'dod pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang rgya tshur rab tu ston par 'dod pa ste/shes
28a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
28a4(khri brgyad): ma snyed dag na/mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa gang na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od mi 'bab pa de dag thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pa dang /de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang //
28a5(khri brgyad): byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa
28a6(khri brgyad): gong na nyi ma dang /zla ba'i 'o kyang mi 'bab pa de dag thams cad 'od kyis snang bar bya ba ro 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan
28a7(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/gang ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu skyes pa'i
28b1(khri brgyad): sems can de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'dod pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/shes rab tu/
28b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang
28b3(khri brgyad): nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/gang na sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba'i/
28b4(khri brgyad): sna ma grag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /druge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /sems can dag yang dag
28b5(khri brgyad): pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi
28b6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can gang dag long bar gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur bar 'dod pas//
28b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du 'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /smyon pa rnams dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /gcer bu rnams gos
29a1(khri brgyad): dag rnyed pa dang /sems can bkres pa rnams 'grangs pa dang /skom pa rnams sgrom ngoms pa dang /sems can ngan song na gnas pa rnams ngan song
29a2(khri brgyad): thams cad las thA ra tI/mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims kyi phung po lnga dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /mnyam par ma bzhag
29a3(khri brgyad): pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /
29a4(khri brgyad): badren pa ma mthong ba rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'odra ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom
29a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o snyam pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de bzhin
29a6(khri brgyad): du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gri bye ma snyed
29a7(khri brgyad): dag na/sems can gang dag long por gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
29b1(khri brgyad): bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du 'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /smyon pa rnams dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /gcer bu rnams gos dag rnyed pa dang /sems can bkres pa
29b2(khri brgyad): rnams 'grangs pa dang /skom pa rnams sgom ngoms pa dang /sems can ngan song na gnas pa rnams ngan song thams cad lngas thar te/mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /tshul
29b3(khri brgyad): khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam
29b4(khri brgyad): par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /bden pa ma mthong ba rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod
29b5(khri brgyad): par bya'o snyam pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
29b6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o snyam pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin
29b7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i spyod lam la slob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
30a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/nam zhig na bdag gis glang po che'i lta stangs kyis blta bar bya snyam pa dang /ji ltar
30a2(khri brgyad): na bdag sa chen po la rkang pa sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg par 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
30a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum
30a4(khri brgyad): cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs
30a5(khri brgyad): 'khor dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che dang /gnas gtsang ma dang /gya nom
30a6(khri brgyad): snang dang /shin tu mthong dang /mi che dang /mi gdung dang /'og min gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/byang
30a7(khri brgyad): chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
30b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha nas/'og min gyi ris kyi lha'i bar dag byang chub kyi snying po'i shing
30b2(khri brgyad): drung du bdag gri stan 'ding bar 'gyur snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
30b3(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
30b4(khri brgyad): nas/'gro ba dang /'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal ba'i sa phyogs de rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA
30b5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag nyi ma gang la mngon
30b6(khri brgyad): par byung ba'i nyi ma de nyid la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/mngon par rdzogs pararu sangs rgyas nas/nyi ma de nyid
30b7(khri brgyad): la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/'khor lo bskor nas/sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing /dri ma med pa rnam par dag
31a1(khri brgyad): par 'gyur/sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur sems can tshad med grangs
31a2(khri brgyad): med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ri'i
31a3(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ji ltar na bdag gi nyan thos kyi dge/
31a4(khri brgyad): 'dun tshad med grangs med par 'gyur/chos bstan pa gcig gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag stan gcig pa'i dgra bcom par 'gyur/stan gcig pa'i
31a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med/grangs
31a6(khri brgyad): med tshad med par 'gyur/tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par 'gyur/'od dpag tu med pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
31a7(khri brgyad): par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs
31b1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing de na/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi sgra thams cad kyi thams cad du mi grag par 'gyur snyam na'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par/
31b2(khri brgyad): bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ji ltar na bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can thams cad sbyin pa ni legs pa'o//dul ba ni legs pa'o//
31b3(khri brgyad): legs par sdom pa ni legs pa'o//tshangs par spyod pa ni legs pa'o//srog chags 'byung po rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni legs pa'o zhes bya bar shes pa'i shes
31b4(khri brgyad): rab de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur snyam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na bdag yongs su mya dran las 'das nas/dam pa'i chos nub pa'i sgra'ang/
31b5(khri brgyad): mi grag par 'gyur snyam pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na/bdag gi ming thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na//
31b6(khri brgyad): sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur snyam na'ang /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
31b7(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /yon tan 'di dag bskyed par byed pa de'i tshe/stong gsum gyi stong chen
32a1(khri brgyad): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/rgyal po chen po bzhi po gang dag 'khod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/sngon gyi dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
32a2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis lhung bzed dag phul ba ltar bdag cag gis kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
32a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po 'di la lhung bzed bzhi dbul bar bya'o snyam du sems shing yid dga' bar 'gyur ro//sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan
32a4(khri brgyad): dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di snyam du/de lta na lha ma yin gyi ris rnams ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur zhing /lha'i ris rnams
32a5(khri brgyad): ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur bas/bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la rim gro bskyed par bya'o snyam du sems shing yid dga' bar
