32a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa chen po dag dang /tshangs ris kyi lha nas bzung ste/tshangs pa thams cad dang /'og min gyi bar
32a7(khri brgyad): gyi skye dag 'di snyam du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ni/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du bdag cag gis
32b1(khri brgyad): gsol ba gdab par bya'o snyam du sems shring yid dga' bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
32b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang 'di snyam du/bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa'
32b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po 'di'i pha dang /ma dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /mdza' ba shes dang /nye du dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams dag tu 'gyur ro snyam du sems shing
32b4(khri brgyad): yid dga' bar 'gyur ro//rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /'og min gyi ber gyi lha rnams kyang 'di snyam du da ni sems can rnams byang chub
32b5(khri brgyad): la nges par sbyar ba'i phyir/kun tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams kyis kun tu mi sbyor zhing /tshangs par spyod par 'gyur te/de 'di skad du bdag sems dang po bskyed
32b6(khri brgyad): pa nas bzung ste/tshangs par spyad par bya'i/mi tshangs par spyad par ni mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dod pa rnams la bstan pa ni/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba la'ang
32b7(khri brgyad): bar du gcod par 'gyur na/blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/khyim
33a1(khri brgyad): nasna mngon par byung zhing tshangs par snad pa nyid kyis//blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/mtshangs
33a2(khri brgyad): par spyod pas ni ma yin no zhes smon lam 'debs pas na/byang chub sems dpa' 'khrig pa kun tu sbyor ba lo mi 'jug pas/yid dga' bar 'gyur ro//de skad ces
33a3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
33a4(khri brgyad): pha ma dang /mchis bred dang /bu dang /mdza' ba shis dang /nye du dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams dag nges par 'tshal lags sam/de skad ces gsol pa dang /
33a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig la ni pa dang ma dang chung
33a6(khri brgyad): ma dang bu dag dgos so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni sems dang po bskyed pa nyid nas bzung ste/tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par len cing //
33a7(khri brgyad): blan da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rtag tu gzhin nur byung ba nyid kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pa sno
33b1(khri brgyad): byedado//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni thabs la mkhas pas/snyoms can yongs su ston par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyad nas/btsun
33b2(khri brgyad): mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas mngon par byung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar byed do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
33b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po kha cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la gnas pa thob nas/'dod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral yang de dag sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
33b4(khri brgyad): phyir/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar 'dzin par ston la/yongs su spyod par ni mi byed do//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas
33b5(khri brgyad): pa/sgyu ma'i rig sngags dang sbyor ba shes pa/legs par bslabs po zhig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mngon par sprul te/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis bdag nyid kyi
33b6(khri brgyad): zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa bstan na/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob mo des 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dri dag la yongs su spyad pa
33b7(khri brgyad): yod snyam mam/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems
34a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yongs su spyod cing /byang chub
34a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gos pa'ang med do//shA ri'i bu rnam grangs de sngon/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa
34a3(khri brgyad): rnams ni kun tu 'bur ba'o//'dod pa rnams ni smod pa'o//'dod pa rnams ni gsod pa'o//'dod pa rnams ni phyir rgol ba'o zhes 'dod pa rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa
34a4(khri brgyad): brjod do//shA rI'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/'dod pa'i yon tan rnams nye bar 'dzin to//shes
34a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/sems bskyed pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
34a6(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /
34a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
34b1(khri brgyad): la spyod pa ni/byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
34b2(khri brgyad): byang chub kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
34b3(khri brgyad): mi spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //spyod kyang spyod la/mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag por rjes su mi mthong ngo //spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi spyod
34b4(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
34b5(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par shes pa'ang yang drag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ming de ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi/stong pa
34b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ming stong pa ni ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpe'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' stong
34b7(khri brgyad): pa ni ma yin/byang chub kyang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi/stong pa nyid kyis byang chub stong pa ni ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
35a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi/stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ni ma yin/gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi/stong
35a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ni ma yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi/stong pa nyid
35a3(khri brgyad): kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ming gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming
35a4(khri brgyad): ma yin la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub sems dpa'i ming med de/byang chub sems dpa'i ming nyid stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ming
35a5(khri brgyad): yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' ma yin la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub sems dpa' med de/byang
35a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' nyid stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa dang /byang chub kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de byang chub ma yin la/stong pa
35a7(khri brgyad): nyid las gud na'ang byang chub med de/byang chub nyid stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid kyang byang chub yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de shes
35b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid
35b2(khri brgyad): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa dang /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med de/gzugs nyid
35b3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de rnam par
35b4(khri brgyad): shes pa ma yin la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med de/rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir
35b5(khri brgyad): ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba dang /byang
35b6(khri brgyad): chub ces bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tsher ba zhes bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes
35b7(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad/'di lta ste/stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ngo bo nyid med pa
36a1(khri brgyad): la ni skye ba med/'gag pa med/'grib pa med/'phel ba med/kun nas nyon mongs pa med/rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na///
36a2(khri brgyad): gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/tsher ba ni sgyu ma lta bu/'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu/rnam par shes po ni sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro//sgyum 'ang
36a3(khri brgyad): ming tsam du zad de/yul na mi gnas/phyogs na mi gnas pas sgyu ma mthong ba ni log par gyur pa ste/yod pa ma yin zhing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ste/byang chub sems
36a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni chos gang la'ang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'gag par yang dag par rjes
36a5(khri brgyad): su mi mthong ngo //gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'grib par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'phel bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //kun
36a6(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par byang bar yang drag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //tshor ba dang /
36a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gang la byang chub ces bya ba 'am/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de yang
36b1(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ming ni bcos ma yin pa'i phyir/chos so so tha dad pa de dag ni btags pa ste/yang dag pa ma yin pa/glo bur du btags/
36b2(khri brgyad): ba'i ming gis rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/ji lta ji ltar rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa de de lta de ltar mngon par zhen to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
36b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/ming de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro//
36b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes
36b5(khri brgyad): bya ba de ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/byang chub ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/
36b6(khri brgyad): ba de ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod rjes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo//'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo//'di lta s+t+wa~M/tshor ba dang /
36b7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo zhes yongs su rtog go/shA ri'i bu 'di lto ste dper na/bdag bdag ces brjod pang
37a1(khri brgyad): bdag kyang mi dmigs sems can dang /srog dang /gang zag kyang mi dmigs te/'di ltar ming gis tha snyad btags par zad kyi/mi dmigs pa stong
37a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi phyir de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du dmigs su med do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang //
37a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //ming gang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa'i ming de'ang
37a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas ni/mi dmigs pa stong
37a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shos rab zil gyis gnon to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di/
37a6(khri brgyad): ltar gang gis mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de'ang des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni//
37a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/dzam+bu'i gling 'di shA ri'i bu dang /mod+gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis dzam+bu'i
37b1(khri brgyad): tshal lam/'od ma'i tshal lam/bu ram shing gi tshal lam/mnga' rgyu'i tshal lam/'bras kyi zhing ngam/til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /de dag gi shes rab
37b2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /'bum
37b3(khri brgyad): gyi cha dang /grangs dang /cha dang /bgrang ba dang /dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
37b4(khri brgyad): rab gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
37b5(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig yongs su bsgoms pa gang yin pa des kyang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab zil gyis
37b6(khri brgyad): gnon to//shA ri'i bu dzam+be'i gling 'di shA rI'i bu dang /maud+gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong shra stag gis yongs su gang pa lta zhog gi/shA ri'i bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
37b7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams 'ang shA ri'i bu dang /maud+gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /de dag gi shes rab kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems
38a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod
38a2(khri brgyad): do//shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shA ri'i bu dang /maud+gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta'ang zhig gi/shA ri'i bu
38a3(khri brgyad): gal te shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag shA ri'i bu dang maud+gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong shu stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur cing /de bzhin du
38a4(khri brgyad): lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
38a5(khri brgyad): skyed dag shA ri'i bu dang /maud+gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /de dag gi shes rab kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
38a6(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig bsgoms pa gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do///
38a7(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong
38b1(khri brgyad): ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams kyi shes rab gang lags pa dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin
38b2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab gang lags pa'i shes rab de dag thams cad ni tha dad pa ma lags pa/dben pa/ma skyes
38b3(khri brgyad): pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das tha dad pa ma lags shing /dben la ma skyes pa/rang bzhin gyis stong pa la ni tha dad du dbye ba 'am/khyad par mi dmigs
38b4(khri brgyad): lags na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab gdugs gcig bsgoms pa gang lags pa des nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
38b5(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
38b6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/rnam pa thams
38b7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa/sems can thams cad kyi don byed pas bdag gis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byas la/sems
39a1(khri brgyad): can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab gang gi don du nye bar gnas pa ltar nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas/
39a2(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi shes rab nye bar gnas pa yin snyam mam/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra'i
39a3(khri brgyad): bu 'di ji snyam du sems/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
39a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas par byas la sems can thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems snyam mam/shA
39a5(khri brgyad): ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mA lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu rnamo grangs des na/khyod kyis 'di ltar nyan thos dang //
39a6(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab gang yin pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar
39a7(khri brgyad): mi 'gro ba nas/rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod de/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon par rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du
39b1(khri brgyad): sems/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/sangs
39b2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang //
39b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can
39b4(khri brgyad): dpag tu med grangs med ched med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du sems snyam mam/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'dras de ni ma lags so//
39b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de
39b6(khri brgyad): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/mi 'jigs
39b7(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
40a1(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can dpag tu med grangs med chud med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan lngas bzla'o snyam du sems so//shA ri'i//
40a2(khri brgyad): bu 'di lta ste dper na/srog chags kyi rigs srin bu me khyer ni 'di snyam du bdag gi 'od kyis dzam+bu'i gling snang bar bya zhing /bdag gi 'od kyis dzam+bu'i gling khyab par bya'i
40a3(khri brgyad): snyam du mi sems so//shA ri'i bu de bzhin du nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad do/sems can
40a4(khri brgyad): rnams yongs su smin par byas la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/mi 'jigs
40a5(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
40a6(khri brgyad): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so//shA ri'i
40a7(khri brgyad): bu 'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar bas ni dzam+bu'i gling thams cad snang bas khyab par byed cing /dzim+bu'i gling thams cad snang bas gsal bar byed do//
40b1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing
40b2(khri brgyad): yang yongs su dag par byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs
40b3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can dpag
40b4(khri brgyad): tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces
40b5(khri brgyad): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' zhing /phyir mi ldog pa'i
40b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob pa dang /byang chub kyi lam yongs su spyod pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di
40b7(khri brgyad): skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /stong pa
41a1(khri brgyad): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la gnas te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das nas/phyir mi ldog
41a2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob bo//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
41a3(khri brgyad): 'daso byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gang la gnas na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba lags//de skad
41a4(khri brgyad): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu sems dang po bskyed phyin chad byang chub sems
41a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa nas/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bor gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rtag par rgyun du
41a6(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41a7(khri brgyad): chen po la brten nas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'jog rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/'di lta ste dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /yan lag lnga dang ldan
41b1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul khrims dang /yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
41b2(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang
41b3(khri brgyad): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
41b4(khri brgyad): dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'jig
41b5(khri brgyad): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dge ba'i chos de dag 'jig rten du byung bas/rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten na yod pa yin/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen
41b6(khri brgyad): po lta bu dag yod pa yin/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag yod pa yin/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral dang //
41b7(khri brgyad): dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs 'khor dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /
42a1(khri brgyad): 'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che dang /sems can 'du shes med pa dang /gnas gtsang ma gya nom snang dang /
42a2(khri brgyad): shin tu mthong dang /mi tsha dang /mi gdung dang /'og min dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang /'du
42a3(khri brgyad): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin no//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung ba yin/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams
42a4(khri brgyad): dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
42a5(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ba yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs
42a6(khri brgyad): su spong bar bgyid dam/'on te mi bgyid lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam grangs kyis sprin
42a7(khri brgyad): pa yongs su sbyong bar byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro//shA ri'i bu
42b1(khri brgyad): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po yin te/ci zhig gi sbyin pa po yin zhe na/dge ba'i chos rnams kyi sbyin pa po yin no//dge ba'i chos gang dag gi
42b2(khri brgyad): sbyin pa po yin zhe na/'di lta ste dge ba bcu'i las kyi lom rnams dang /bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang /yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
42b3(khri brgyad): bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi sbyin pa po yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
42b4(khri brgyad): pa la brtson par bgyis na/brtson zhes bgyi ba legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs kyi
42b5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang /'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang /'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
42b6(khri brgyad): nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi stong po nyid la brtson ni brtson zhes bya'o//de bzhin du rna ba dang /
42b7(khri brgyad): sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi stong pa nyid la brtson ni brtson zhes bya'o//gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro
43a1(khri brgyad): dang /reg bya dang /chos kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//
43a2(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi
43a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//sdug bsngal gyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /
43a4(khri brgyad): lam gyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang /gzugs
43a5(khri brgyad): dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi'i stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//chos
43a6(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
43a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
43b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag gis brtson na brtson zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' de stong pa nyid bdun po
43b2(khri brgyad): de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/re shig brtson zhe 'am mi brtson zhes mi brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gzugs skye ba'i chos can
43b3(khri brgyad): nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa skye ba'i chos can nam 'gag pa'i
43b4(khri brgyad): chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam/rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshor ba dang /'du
43b5(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam/rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i
43b6(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs ni tshor ba dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du tshor ba ni
43b7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du shes ni 'du byed rnams dang /'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig yang dag paro 'du zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par
44a1(khri brgyad): shes pa ni 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi
44a2(khri brgyad): phyir/chos gang yang chos gang dang yang lhan cig yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA rI'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
44a3(khri brgyad): gzugs ma yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i
44a4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs su yod pa ma yin/tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de tshor bar byed pa ma yin/'du shes
44a5(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de kun tu shes par byed pa ma yin/'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid blang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
44a6(khri brgyad): nyid grang yin pa de rnam par shes par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la/stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
44a7(khri brgyad): ma yin/stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/gzugs nyid stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin/de bzhin du tshor
44b1(khri brgyad): 'ang gzhan ma yin lnga/stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin la/stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/stong pa
44b2(khri brgyad): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par
44b3(khri brgyad): shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing /kun nas nyon mongs pa med/rnam par byang ba med la/'bring pa
44b4(khri brgyad): med cing /'phel ba med pa ste/de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro//'di 'dra ba gang yin pa de la ni gzugs med
44b5(khri brgyad): do//tshor ba med do//'du shes med do//'du byed rnams med do//rnam par shes pa med do//sa'i khams med do//chu'i khams med do//me'i khams med do//rlung gi
44b6(khri brgyad): khams med do//nam mkha'i khams med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//mig gi skye mched med do//gzugs kyi skye mched med do//rna ba'i skye mched med do//
44b7(khri brgyad): sgra'i skye mched med do//sna'i skye mched med do//dri'i skye mched med do//lce'i skye mched med do//ro'i skye mched med do//lus kyi skye mched med do//reg bya'i skye mched
45a1(khri brgyad): med do//yid kyi skye mched myed do//chos kyi skye mched med do//mig gi khams med do//gzugs kyi khams med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
45a2(khri brgyad): khams med do//rna ba'i khams med do//sgra'i khams med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//sna'i khams med do//dri'i khams med do//sna'i rnam
45a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i khams med do//lce'i khams med do//ro'i khams med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//lus kyi khams med do//reg bya'i khams
45a4(khri brgyad): med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//yid kyi khams med do//chos kyi khams med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//ma rig pa med do//
45a5(khri brgyad): ma rig pa 'gag pa med do//'du byed med do//'du byed 'gag pa med do//rnam par shes pa med do//rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med do//ming dang gzugs med do///
45a6(khri brgyad): ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med do//skye mched drug med do//skye mched drug 'gag pa med do//reg pa med do//reg pa 'gag pa med do//tshor ba med do//tshor ba
45a7(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med do//sred pa med do//srid pa 'gag pa med do//len pa med do//len pa 'gag pa med do//srid pa med do//srid pa 'gag pa med do//skye ba med
45b1(khri brgyad): do//skye ba 'gag pa med do//rga shi med do//rga shi 'gag pa med do//sdug bsngal med do//kun 'byung ba med do//'gog pa med do//lam med do//thob pa med do//mngon
45b2(khri brgyad): par rtogs pa med do//rgyun du zhugs pa med do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//phyir mi
45b3(khri brgyad): 'ong ba med do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//dgra bcom pa nyid med do//rang sangs rgyas med do//rang byang chub med do//de la ni sangs rgyas med do//byang chub med/
45b4(khri brgyad): /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bram po gsum pa//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes
45b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par
45b6(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong ngo //tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
45b7(khri brgyad): mig la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rna ba dang /sna dang /lho dang /lus dang /yid la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya
46a1(khri brgyad): bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /
46a2(khri brgyad): reg bya dang /chos rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //mig gi khams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang
46a3(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams kyi bar dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par
46a4(khri brgyad): shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes
46a5(khri brgyad): bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yon lag dang /lam
46a6(khri brgyad): rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //bden pa bzhi la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi
46a7(khri brgyad): mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /sangs rgyas kyi
46b1(khri brgyad): chos mi 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
46b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i bar la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
46b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar brtson pa ni brtson zhes bya bar rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
46b4(khri brgyad): spyod pa ni stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed/mi sbyor bar yong mi byed de/stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no//mtshan ma med pa dang /mtshan ma med par
46b5(khri brgyad): sbyor bar mi byed/mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no//smon pa med pa dang /smon pa med par sbyor bar mi byed/mi sbyor bar yang mi
46b6(khri brgyad): byed de/smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rnal 'byor yang ma yin/rnal 'byor ma yin pa'ang ma yin zhing /de bzhin
46b7(khri brgyad): du mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'ang rnal 'byor yang ma yin/rnal 'byor ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir te/shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
47a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brtson pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
47a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'jug ste/de ltar 'jug pa na gzugaso la sbyor bar mi byed/mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do//tshor
47a3(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do//gzugs dang sngon gyi mthor sbyor bar mi byed de/'di
47a4(khri brgyad): ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dog par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs dong phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi
47a5(khri brgyad): mthong ngo //gzugs dang da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed de/'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes
47a6(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang ston gyi mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes
47a7(khri brgyad): pa dang phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/'di ltar phye ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa dang /da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi
47b1(khri brgyad): byebyud do//'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
47b2(khri brgyad): spyod pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mther sbyor bar mi byed de/phyi ma'i mtha' dang /sngon gyi mthar sbyor bar mi byed do//de ltar byung ba
47b3(khri brgyad): dang /sngon gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/sngon gyi mtha' 'am/phyi ma'i mtha' dang /da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed do//shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang
47b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
47b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di ltar brtson par byed de/de ltar brtson par byed na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'das par sbyor bar mi byed de/'das pa
47b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa dang sbyor bar ji ltar 'gyur/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma 'ongs par sbyor bar mi
47b7(khri brgyad): byed de/ma 'ongs pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 'ongs pa dang sbyor bar ji ltar 'gyur/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang da ltar
48a1(khri brgyad): byung bar sbyor bar mi byed de/da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byung ba dang sbyor bar lta ga la 'gyur
48a2(khri brgyad): te/shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
48a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/gzugs dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/gzugs nyid kyang yang dag
48a4(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/
48a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du mig dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/mig nyid kyang yang dag par rjes
48a6(khri brgyad): su mi mthong ngo //rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/yid nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi
48a7(khri brgyad): mthong ngo //gzugs dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/gzugs nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro//
48b1(khri brgyad): dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/chos nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shA ri'i bu da ltar brtson pa'i byung
48b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
48b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed do/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par
48b4(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
48b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi
48b6(khri brgyad): mthong ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bor mi byed do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
48b7(khri brgyad): ngo //de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbong po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags
49a1(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /mngon
49a2(khri brgyad): par shes pa lnga dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid
49a3(khri brgyad): kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o//
49a4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/sangs rgyas dang /rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
49a5(khri brgyad): sbyor bar mi byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sangs rgyas su sbyor bar mi byed de/sangs rgyas nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub dang /rnam
49a6(khri brgyad): po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /byang chub tu sbyor bar mi byed de/byang chub nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
49a7(khri brgyad): ngo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas yin/byang chub nyid kyang rnam pa
49b1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
49b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs 'byung
49b3(khri brgyad): ngo zhes bya bar mi sbyar ro//gzugs 'jig go zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo zhes bya
49b4(khri brgyad): bar mi sbyar ro//rnam par shes pa 'jig go zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//tshor ba dang /'du
49b5(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs badra zhes bya bor mi sbyor ro//gzugs
49b6(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//rnam par shes pa sdug
49b7(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
50a1(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs
50a2(khri brgyad): ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bya ba
50a3(khri brgyad): sbyor ro//gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am mi stong
50a4(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'amo mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
50a5(khri brgyad): pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
50a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs skye zhes bya ba 'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//de bzhin
50a7(khri brgyad): du ci ro ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba 'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs 'das po zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//
50b1(khri brgyad): gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
50b2(khri brgyad): pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs snying po can zhes
50b3(khri brgyad): bya ba 'am nyam chung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa snying po can zhes bya ba'am nyam chung ba zhes
50b4(khri brgyad): bya bar mi sbyor ro//gzugs yod do zhes bya ba'am med do zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yod do//
50b5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba 'am med do zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//gang de ltar spyod pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/spyod kyang
50b6(khri brgyad): spyod la/mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar khas mi len te/shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems
50b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la brtson pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol
51a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brjod/
51a2(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ched du shes rab kyi pha
51a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched dang /sangs rgyas
51a4(khri brgyad): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i ched dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshang dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ched dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ched dang /
51a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//nang stong pa nyid kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//phyi/
51a6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma
51a7(khri brgyad): byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /
51b1(khri brgyad): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /skye ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med
51b2(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//de bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
51b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la mi spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/chos gang la'ang tha dad par yang dag par
51b4(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o//de lha'i mig
51b5(khri brgyad): gi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//lho'i rna ba dang /pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi tshad du
51b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//dri ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par
51b7(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te/rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes po thams cad lta ga la yod/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
52a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni btsun pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub snrums dpa' sems dpa' rlon
52a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/'di snyam du bdag gis lho'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems
52a3(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shos par bya'o//lnga'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o//de dag gi sems rnams kyang shes par bya'o//de dag gi sngon gyi gnas
52a4(khri brgyad): rnams kyang rjes su dran par byas la/rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste/chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /
52a5(khri brgyad): shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'a
52a6(khri brgyad): 'pho dang /skye ba lha'i mig gis shes par bya'o//lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o//de dag gi sems rnams kyang shes par bya'o//de dag gi sngon gyi gnas
52a7(khri brgyad): rnams kyang rjes su dran par byas la/rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
52b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o//sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/shA ri'i bu byang
52b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa la ni bdud sdig can gyis kyang glags mi rnyed do//'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji
52b3(khri brgyad): snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ro//shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dgra bzhugs
52b4(khri brgyad): paM de dag dang lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs ri ra'i 'jig rten gyi khams
52b5(khri brgyad): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
52b6(khri brgyad): de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung du 'ong ngo zhes srung ba mdzad do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral
52b7(khri brgyad): dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag
53a1(khri brgyad): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chud byed par gyur du 'ong ngo zhes srung ba byed do//de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang
53a2(khri brgyad): yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can
53a3(khri brgyad): thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
53a4(khri brgyad): brtson pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni gzungs kyi sgo dang /ting nge 'dzi
53a5(khri brgyad): gyi sgo dag kyang tshogs chung ngus mngon du 'gyur ro//skye ba'i gnas thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
53a6(khri brgyad): rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur zhing /bla nu med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
53a7(khri brgyad): dang nam yang 'bral por mi 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o//
53b1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du gang chos rnams dang 'du ba 'am/'brel ba 'am/'phrad
53b2(khri brgyad): pA 'am/mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod dmu snyam du mi sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos gang 'du ba 'am/'byol ba 'am/'phrad pa 'am//
53b3(khri brgyad): mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa/
53b4(khri brgyad): ni brtson pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gis myur du chos kyi
53b5(khri brgyad): dbyings mngon por rdzogs par rtogs par 'gyur ram/mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par mi 'gyur snyam du mi sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos kyi dbyings kyis
53b6(khri brgyad): chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa
53b7(khri brgyad): ni brtson po zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i
54a1(khri brgyad): chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //chos kyi dbyings dang chos tha dad du mi byed do//de'ang 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings 'di de ltar khong du chud
54a2(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ram/khong du chud par mi 'gyur snyam du mi sems te/'di ltar chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i chos de yong dag par rjes su mi mthong
54a3(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro//'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor/mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
54a4(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
54a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
54a6(khri brgyad): par shes po drang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor ro//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
54a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams su mi sbyor/gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi
54b1(khri brgyad): sbyor/stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su mi sbyor/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
54b2(khri brgyad): su mi sbyor ro//de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes
54b3(khri brgyad): pa'i khoms dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes
54b4(khri brgyad): pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang /yid kyi khams su mi sbyor/chos kyi khams dang /stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa
54b5(khri brgyad): nyid dang chos kyi khams su mi sbyor/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro//de
54b6(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'od lta ste/stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i
54b7(khri brgyad): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag
55a1(khri brgyad): par byed/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smon par byed ning bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
55a2(khri brgyad): rgya'o//shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor du bya ba gang dag ci'ang rung ste/de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni mchog ces bya'o//thu bo zhes bya'o//phul
55a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya'o//rab ces bya'o//rab mchog ces bya'o//ltag na med pa zhes bya'o//gya nom pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
55a4(khri brgyad): phyin po'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid dang /mtshon ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor te/bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu de ltar
55a5(khri brgyad): brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa 'am/lung bstan pa dang nye bar gyur par gzung bar bya'o//shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang
55a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi don kyang byed la/de 'di snyam du bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
55a7(khri brgyad): 'das rnams lung ston pa mdzad do//bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to//bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya'o//bdag gis sems can
55b1(khri brgyad): rnams yongs su smin par bya'o//bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lho bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi
55b2(khri brgyad): sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing /chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
55b3(khri brgyad): 'am/gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba 'am/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya
55b4(khri brgyad): ba'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
55b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de la sems can gyi 'du shes mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar sems can gtan skye ba med cing 'gog pa med de/chos rnams kyi chos
55b6(khri brgyad): nyid skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro//gang la skye bu dang 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu de ltar
55b7(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin sems can
56a1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/sems can dmigs su med pa dang /sems can dben pa dang /sems can rang
56a2(khri brgyad): bzhin med pa dang /sems can ngo bo nyid med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni byang chub
56a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin no//shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
56a4(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i rnal 'byor te/des de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor gang yin pa rnams zil gyis munan nas gnas so//shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
56a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo//mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sau so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa
56a6(khri brgyad): chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mngon par sgrub bo//shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
56a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni ser sna'i sems mo bskyed do//'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang /gnod sems kyi sems dang /le lo'i sems dang /rnam par
56b1(khri brgyad): g.yeng bya'o sems dang /'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems mi bskyod do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad
56b2(khri brgyad): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dris gnas pa de gang nas shi 'phos te
56b3(khri brgyad): 'dir skyes pa lags/'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu lnga 'di skad
56b4(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
56b5(khri brgyad): dag nas shi 'phros te 'dir skyes pa 'am/dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa 'am/mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/'dir skyes par rig par
56b6(khri brgyad): bya'o//shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhon dag nus shi 'phyos te/'dir skyes pa de ni/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
56b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la myur bar rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug ste/tshe 'di rjes nas kyang chos zab mo 'di mngon du 'gyur zhing /phyis kyang shes rab kyi pha
57a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug go//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang /gang drag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
57a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mnyes par byed par yang 'gyur ro///
57a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas shi 'phos te/'dir skyes pa de ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/de'i
57a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyams pa med pas na gzungs kyi sgo dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der 'dus shing nyams pa med pa yin no//shA ri'i bu de la byang chub
57a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/mi nyid dang skal ba mnyam par skyes pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi
57a6(khri brgyad): ldog pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dbang po rnams rtul ba yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la'ang myur du
57a7(khri brgyad): snyoms par mi 'jug cing /de la gzungs kyi sgo dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang mngon du mi 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems
57b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dris gnas pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skyo bar 'gyur ba lags zhes zer ba ni/shA rI'i bu byang chub
57b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi zhid 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom
57b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur to/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
57b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams drong 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mnyes par byed parwa yang
57b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa gang la la dag bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug cing /pha rol tu phyin pa
57b6(khri brgyad): drug la spyod kyang /de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes nas/gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob pa na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par
57b7(khri brgyad): byed na'ang dag dbang po rnams rtul zhing mi rno ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug
58a1(khri brgyad): cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas/bsam gtan rnams spangs nas/de dag yang 'dod pa'i khams
58a2(khri brgyad): su skye ba'ang yod de/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rnams rtul ba yin te/rno ba ma yin no//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
58a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar
58a4(khri brgyad): bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug
58a5(khri brgyad): kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye/tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang
58a6(khri brgyad): mi skye ste/gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dang der skye zhing /de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma
58a7(khri brgyad): bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu
58b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas de dag thabs la mkhas
58b2(khri brgyad): pos bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad las log ste/'dod pa'i khams rnams su skye zhing /rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su 'am/bram ze'i rigs
58b3(khri brgyad): shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su 'am/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye ba dag kyang yod de/de'ang srid pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/sems
58b4(khri brgyad): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye'o//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/tshad med pa
58b5(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/de dag thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms
58b6(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye/sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral dang /dga'
58b7(khri brgyad): ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye zhing /de dag tu gnas nas/sems can rnams kyang yongs su
59a1(khri brgyad): smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed cing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA
59a2(khri brgyad): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug
59a3(khri brgyad): tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ste de dag
59a4(khri brgyad): der tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen por gyur nas/de dag tshangs pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
59a5(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo
59a6(khri brgyad): bskor bar gsol ba'i don du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig
59a7(khri brgyad): gis thogs pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs la mkhas pas/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
59b1(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi
59b2(khri brgyad): yan lag dang /lam rnams kyang sgom/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug la de dag de rnams kyi dbang gis
59b3(khri brgyad): kyang mi skye zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par byas te/der tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/yang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba
59b4(khri brgyad): mnyam par skye ste/de dag der tshe'i yun ji srid par gnas nas/dbang po ma nyams la dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ljon par lho bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mas yongs su
59b5(khri brgyad): bskor cing /mdun du bdar nas/'dir skye ba bstan nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
59b6(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/gzugs kyi
59b7(khri brgyad): khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye bar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsti stang du byed/
60a1(khri brgyad): bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod pa byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
60a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob po de dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rno zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag ni sangs rgyas kyi
60a3(khri brgyad): theg pa ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra'ang mi grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do//
60a4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag ni/
60a5(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
60a6(khri brgyad): chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /dgra 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa'i
60a7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing /de dag der song nas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog/chos kyi sgra sgrog/dge 'dun gyi sgra
60b1(khri brgyad): sgrog cing /dkon mchog gsum gyi bsgrags pa brjod pa dag kyang yod de/sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems rab
60b2(khri brgyad): tu dang bar gyur nas/de dag nas shi 'phos te/ga na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs pa de dag tu skye'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
60b3(khri brgyad): po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur cing /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
60b4(khri brgyad): dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam sgom la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
60b5(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/
60b6(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams su'ang mi skye/gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skye la/de dag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
60b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par byed pa dag
61a1(khri brgyad): kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyod pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
61a2(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byas nas/phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
61a3(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing /yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /de dag gi dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/bskal pa la sde lhag par
61a4(khri brgyad): gnas par byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor
61a5(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug cing /de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
61a6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i
61a7(khri brgyad): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/bsam gtan bzhi thob pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi thob pa dang /gzugs med
61b1(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam pa du mar rnam par rtse zhing /'di lta ste/de dag
61b2(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la
61b3(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par
61b4(khri brgyad): 'jug go/de las langs nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/de las
61b5(khri brgyad): langs nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas/num mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs
61b6(khri brgyad): nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas//
61b7(khri brgyad): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas/ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/de las langs nas/'gog pa'i
62a1(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go//de las langs nas/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go//de las langs
62a2(khri brgyad): nas/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod
62a3(khri brgyad): pa thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dag bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa dag
62a4(khri brgyad): kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /
62a5(khri brgyad): stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam thob cing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par
62a6(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras du thob par mi byed/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir
62a7(khri brgyad): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub thob par mi byed par/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs la mkhas pas sems
62b1(khri brgyad): can gyi sems kyi rgyud rnams lam la zhugs par byas te/rnam par sbyangs nas/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi
62b2(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub thob por byed pa de dag kyang yod de/shA ri'i bu nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob por byed
62b3(khri brgyad): pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grang dag shes rab kyi
62b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la granas
62b5(khri brgyad): shing /dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/shA ri'i bu de dag ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par rig
62b6(khri brgyad): par bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dgra bsam gtan bzhi thob cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag thob pa de dag ni bden pa
62b7(khri brgyad): bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir spyod kyang /de dag bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/shA ri'i bu de dag ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
