63a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po yin par rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /
63a2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/de dag tu'ang sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par 'dzud cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
63a3(khri brgyad): byed pa dag kyang yod de/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
63a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sems
63a5(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi ched du rtag tu brtson pa dag lan 'ga' yang don med pa dang ldan pa'i tshig mi smra zhing don med pa dang ldan pa'i lus dang yod kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA
63a6(khri brgyad): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /sems can rnams kyi ched du rtag tu brtson pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
63a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum gyi lam gcod par byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
63b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing //
63b2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/skom 'dod pa rnams ni skom/me tog dang /me tog phreng dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /bdug spos dang /mal stan dang /rgyab
63b3(khri brgyad): rten dang /gos dang /rgyan dang /'tsho ba dang /khyim dang /nor dang /'bru dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /gser dang /dngul dang /byu ru dang /'tsho ba'i yo byad
63b4(khri brgyad): gang yang rung ba dag nye bar sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /tshul khrims
63b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas sems can rnams kyi lus dang drag dang yid sdom pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
63b6(khri brgyad): chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang /gnod sems med pa la 'god par
63b7(khri brgyad): byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas
64a1(khri brgyad): nas/sems can rnams dge ba'i chos la mngon par brtson pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
64a2(khri brgyad): po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang /'dod pa las
64a3(khri brgyad): dben pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /shes rab kyi pha
64a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid kyi lus mngon par sprul nas/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams dang /dud 'gro'i/
64a5(khri brgyad): skye gnas pa rnams dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir/chos ston par byed pa dag kyang yod do//
64a6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid kyi lus mngon par sprul nas/shar
64a7(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
64b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /chos kyang nyan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang mthong
64b2(khri brgyad): bar byed cing /de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung nas de bas kyang rgya che ba dang /khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su
64b3(khri brgyad): sgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do//de bzhin du lho dang //
64b4(khri brgyad): nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
64b5(khri brgyad): dag tu song zhing /sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /chos
64b6(khri brgyad): nyan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar byed cing /de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma
64b7(khri brgyad): yongs su bzung nas/de bas kyang rgya che ba dang /khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'
65a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha
65a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa rnams dang ldan par gyur nas/de dag
65a3(khri brgyad): lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po dga' zhing dad pa bskyed par byed de/de dag skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar gyur nas/sems can de dag kyang
65a4(khri brgyad): sems rab tu dad par gyur pa de nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/shA ri'i bu de ltar
65a5(khri brgyad): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o//ngag yongs su dge ba dang /yid
65a6(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o//shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /dbang po gsal ba dag thob par gyur
65a7(khri brgyad): nas de dag dbang po gsal ba de dag gis bdag la bstod par mi byed cing /gzhan la smod par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
65b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/phyir myi ldog pa'i sa thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul
65b2(khri brgyad): por mi 'gyur zhing /ngan song ngan 'gro log par mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/phyir mi
65b3(khri brgyad): ldog pa'i sa thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
65b4(khri brgyad): pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /'khor los skur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'ged
65b5(khri brgyad): cing /sbyin pa dang /snyan par smra bas/sems can rnams sdud pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
65b6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du ma yongs su bzung nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma byed du 'jug cing /de la
65b7(khri brgyad): gnas nas sangs rgyas bye bo khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang /mchod pa thams cad kyis
66a1(khri brgyad): bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed cing mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
66a2(khri brgyad): la gnas nas/sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed cing /bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
66a3(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba de dang mi 'bral bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
66a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'byung ba yin no//shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha
66a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
66a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bzhi pa//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
66a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang ngag gi las kho na me tho ba dang bcas pa dang /yid kyi las kha na ma thob
66b1(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems
66b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/'di snyam du 'di ni lus yin te/des lus kyi rtsom pa byed/'di ni ngag yin te/des ngag gi rtsom pa byed/'di ni yid yin te/des
66b3(khri brgyad): yid kyi rtsom pa byed do snyam du sems na/shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang /ngagra dang yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na mA the ba dang bcas pa
66b4(khri brgyad): yin te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni lus mi dmigs/ngag mi dmigs/yid mi dmigs so//shA
66b5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la gal te lus dmigs pa dang /ngag dmigs pa dang /yid dmigs pa yod par gyur
66b6(khri brgyad): na/de de'i tshe lus dang ngag dang yid des ser sna'i sems skyed par 'gyur zhing /'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang /gnod sems kyi sems dang /le lo'i sems dang /
66b7(khri brgyad): rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dang /'tshal pa'i shes rab kyi sems kyang bskyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/shA ri'i bu de ltar na rig par mi bya ste/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
67a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
67a2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang /ngag gi gnas ngan len spyong
67a3(khri brgyad): ba dang /yid kyi gnas ngan len skyong bar byed pa'i phyir te/shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dong ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba mod
67a4(khri brgyad): pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len spyod bar bgyid pa
67a5(khri brgyad): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar lus mi dmigs pa dang /dgo mi dmigs pa
67a6(khri brgyad): dang /yid mi dmigs pa ste/shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang /drag dang /yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed pa yin no///
67a7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas gnas te/nyan thos kyi
67b1(khri brgyad): sems sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed par du rtag par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar 'jog par byed na/de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'
67b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa yin no zhes nga smra'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
67b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol
67b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i
67b5(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu
67b6(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi lam gang la spyod na/bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lus mi dmigs/ngag mi dmigs/yid mi dmigs/sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
67b7(khri brgyad): mo dmigs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmi gos/bsam gton gyi pha
68a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/nyan thos kyi theg pa mi dmigs/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi dmigs/byang
68a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i theg po mi dmigs/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi dmigs shing /'di lta ste/chos thams cad dmigs su med pa 'di ni/shA
68a3(khri brgyad): ro'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam yin te/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam 'di nas 'gro zhing /pha rol
68a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/sus kyang thul bar mi nus so//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar spyod pa dag
68a5(khri brgyad): sus kyang mi thul po legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa
68a6(khri brgyad): gzugs la rlos sems su mi byed pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /sa'i khams la
68a7(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su
68b1(khri brgyad): mi byed pa dang /mig dang gzugs lA rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /rna ba dang /sgra dang /sna dang /dri dang /lce dang /ro dang /lus dang /reg bya dang /yid dang /chos la
68b2(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /de bzhin du rna ba'i khams
68b3(khri brgyad): dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i
68b4(khri brgyad): khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /yid
68b5(khri brgyad): kyi khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /chos kyi khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /dran pa
68b6(khri brgyad): nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams la rlom sems su mi
68b7(khri brgyad): byed pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi
69a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sa
69a2(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /rgyun du zhugs po'i 'bras bu la rlom sems su mi byed pa
69a3(khri brgyad): dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /rang byang chub la rlom sems su mi
69a4(khri brgyad): byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubo la rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/shA ri'i bu
69a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba ni sus kyang mi thol ba yin no//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
69a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /ye shos de dang ldan pas/ngan
69a7(khri brgyad): song rnams kyi sgo thams cad gcong pa dang /dbul zhing rgud pa'i mir mi 'gyur ba dang /lus gang gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
69b1(khri brgyad): lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub
69b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
69b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ye shes de dang ldan pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
69b4(khri brgyad): drudag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed drug kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing
69b5(khri brgyad): gi yon tan bkod pa rnam par dag pa'ing mthong ngo //de bzhin du lho dang /nud dang /byang dang /byad shaR+Ya dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /
69b6(khri brgyad): steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
69b7(khri brgyad): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo //chos kyang nyan to//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam par dag
70a1(khri brgyad): pa'ang mthong ngo //ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi bskyed do//byang chub sems
70a2(khri brgyad): drapa'i 'du shes mi bskyed do//nyan thos kyi 'du shes dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang /bdag gi 'du shes dang /gzhan gyi 'du shes dang /sangs rgyas kyi
70a3(khri brgyad): zhing gi 'du shes mi bskyed do//ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang //
70a4(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod de/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dog kyang mi dmigs so//ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang
70a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang bsgom la/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
70a6(khri brgyad): pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam yang bsgom la/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs
70a7(khri brgyad): dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam yang mi dmigs so//stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas
70b1(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so//shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin te/ye shes de
70b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rjes
70b3(khri brgyad): su mi mthong ngo //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/mig lnga 'thob pa dang /yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de/
70b4(khri brgyad): lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sha'i mig dang /lha'i mig dang /shes rab kyi mig dang /chos kyi meg dang /sangs rgyas kyi mig go/shA rI'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan
70b5(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
70b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do//byang chub sems dra pa'i shwa'i mig gis dpag tshad nyes brgya mthong ba yod do//byang chub sems dpa'i
70b7(khri brgyad): sha'i mig gis dzam+bu'i gling mthong ba yod do//byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis dzam+bu'i gling gnyis mthong ba yod do//byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis gling bzhi
71a1(khri brgyad): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis sbyong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//byang chub sems dpa'i sha
71a2(khri brgyad): mig gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do//byang chub sems dpa'i shwa'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod
71a3(khri brgyad): de/shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
71a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang
71a5(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul
71a6(khri brgyad): dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs 'khor dang /'od
71a7(khri brgyad): chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dag dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu che dang /sems
71b1(khri brgyad): can 'du shes med pa dang /gnas gtsang ma dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang dang /shin tu mthong dang /'og min gyi lha rnams k+Shi lha'i mig gang yin pa
71b2(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi
71b3(khri brgyad): shes so//gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa'i lho'i mig gang yin pa de ni 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//lha'i mig yongs su dag pa de nyid
71b4(khri brgyad): kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin
71b5(khri brgyad): du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /phyogs mtshams dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgra na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams
71b6(khri brgyad): kyi chi 'pho dang /skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no//shA
71b7(khri brgyad): ri'i bus gsol po/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
72a1(khri brgyad): pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni 'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas sam/dge ba 'am/
72a2(khri brgyad): mi dge ba 'am/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/zag pa med pa 'am/nyon mongs po dang bcas pa 'am/nyon
72a3(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa 'am/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med do//byang chub
72a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig dri dang ldan pa ni chos gang yang ma mthong ba 'am ma thos pa 'am/mi dran pa 'am/rnam par mi shes par gyur pa
72a5(khri brgyad): ci'ang med de/shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
72a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems
72a7(khri brgyad): dpe'i sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o//'di ni ches kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o//'di ni stong pa nyid la gonas pa/'di ni
72b1(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyis gang zag de'i dbang po lnga po dag skye bar 'gyur ro//dbang po lngas par
72b2(khri brgyad): chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro//bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba bskyed par 'gyur ro//rnam par grol ba ye shes
72b3(khri brgyad): mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /the tshom dang /tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum spong bar 'gyur te/gang zag de ni rgyun du
72b4(khri brgyad): zhugs pa zhes bya'o//des sgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /gnod sems srab mor byed par 'gyur te/gang zag de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o//
72b5(khri brgyad): des lam de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /gnod sems spong bar 'gyur te/gang zag de ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o//des lam de nyid shas cher
72b6(khri brgyad): bsgoms pas gzugs la 'dod chags dang /gzugs med pa la 'dod chags dang /ma rig pa dang /nga rgyal dang /rgod pa spong bar 'gyur te/gang zag de ni dgra bcom pa
72b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya'o//gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis dbang po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur zhing /bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg
73a1(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur
73a2(khri brgyad): ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas dbang po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur
73a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba nas/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo
73a4(khri brgyad): smon pa med pas dbang po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur te/bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/rnam par
73a5(khri brgyad): grol ba ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du shes te/shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'
73a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci yod pa de thams cad
73a7(khri brgyad): 'gog pa'i chos yin no zhes bya bar rtogs nas/dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
73b1(khri brgyad): chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dri ni sems
73b2(khri brgyad): dang po bskyed pa ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shwer rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod cing /de de nas dad pa'i dbang po dang //
73b3(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob la/de thabs la mkhas pa dang yang ldan/dge ba'i rtsa bas kyang brtan pas/bsams bzhin du lus yongs su 'dzin te/byang chub sems dpa'
73b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/'di ni bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/'di ni khyim
73b5(khri brgyad): bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su/'di ni
73b6(khri brgyad): 'thab bral du/'di ni dga' ldan du/'di ni 'phrul dgar/'di ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su skye bor 'gyur ro//de dar gnas nas/sems can rnams
73b7(khri brgyad): yongs su smin par byed par yang 'gyur te/bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag la nye bar gnas par yang 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed
74a1(khri brgyad): par yang 'gyur zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyes par byed par 'gyur/bsti stang du byed
74a2(khri brgyad): par 'gyur/bla mar byed par 'gyur/ri mor byed par 'gyur/mchod par byed par 'gyur la/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar ltung bar yang mi 'gyur te//
74a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi byur du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes
74a4(khri brgyad): bya bar rab tu shes te/shA ri'i bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
74a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'
74a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lung mra bstan pa'o//'di drag ni nges pa'o//'di dag ni ma nges pa'o/'di dag ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o//'di dag ni lung bstan
74a7(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ba'o//'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'o//'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa'o//'di'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs so//'di'i mngon
74b1(khri brgyad): par shes pa rnams ni yongs su ma rdzogs so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
74b2(khri brgyad): khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed/bsnyen bkur byed/bsti
74b3(khri brgyad): stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod pa byed do//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /
74b4(khri brgyad): steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas
74b5(khri brgyad): rnams mnyes par byed/bsnyen bkur byed/bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod pa byed do//'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro//'di ni
74b6(khri brgyad): mngon par shes po rnams 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//'di ni bzod pa thob po'o//'di ni bzod pa ma thob pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas
74b7(khri brgyad): kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang
75a1(khri brgyad): ldan pa'o//'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o//'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so//'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas
75a2(khri brgyad): so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dri la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa
75a3(khri brgyad): brjod pa mdzad do//'di la ni bsngags pa brjod par mi mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas
75a4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro//'di'i tshe ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//'di'i 'od
75a5(khri brgyad): dang /dbyangs dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//'di dag ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med
75a6(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro//'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro//'di ni dka'
75a7(khri brgyad): ba spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro//'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro//'di ni srid po tha ma pa'o//'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no//'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'gyur ro//'di
75b1(khri brgyad): ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'di dag la ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te//
75b2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
75b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi
75b4(khri brgyad): sems kyi mjug thogs su rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
75b5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa yin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /
75b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang ldan pa yin no//de ni de'i mig yin te/mig de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad du ma
75b7(khri brgyad): mthong ba 'am/ma thos pa'am/mi dran pa 'am/rnam par mi shes pa ci'ang med de/shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
76a1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
76a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang /thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dge ba'i chos
76a3(khri brgyad): thams cad dang /nyan thos kyi chos thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
76a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus so zhes yang dag par smra bas smra na/yang dag
76a5(khri brgyad): par smra bas smra ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang mig lnga po de dag skyed pa ste/mig lnga po de dag
76a6(khri brgyad): la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i
76a7(khri brgyad): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing /des rdzu 'phrul bya ba rnam pa
76b1(khri brgyad): du ma myong bar 'gyur te/de sa'ang g.yo bar byed do//gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang /mang por gyur nas kyang gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /snang bar 'gyur zhing /mi snang
76b2(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ba'ang myong bar byed do//rtsig po la'ang thad kar 'gro'o//ra ba la'ang thad kar 'gro'o//ri la'ang lus mi thogs par thad kAr 'gro ste/dper na nam mkha' la bya ba
76b3(khri brgyad): bzhin no//nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung bcas nas 'gro ste/dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no//sa la'ang steng du 'byung ba dang /byi'u zul byed de/dper na chu la bya ba bzhin
76b4(khri brgyad): no//chu la'ang mi nub par 'gro ste/dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no//du ba 'thul bar yang byed 'bar bar yang byed de/dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no//zla ba dang nyi ma 'di ltar
76b5(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba/'di ltar gzi brjid che ba 'di dag la'ang lag pas nom zhing kun tu nyug par byed do//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du'ang lus kyis dbang
76b6(khri brgyad): sbyar ro//ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/des gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de'ang mi
76b7(khri brgyad): dmigs/gang rlom sems su byed pa dang /gang gis rlom sems su byed pa de'ang mi dmigs te/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par rdzu
77a1(khri brgyad): 'phrul du sems pa 'am/rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems pa'ang mi skyed do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
77a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga de ltar spyod pa ni/rdzu 'phrul bya ba mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo//des lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i
77a3(khri brgyad): las 'das pa/'di lta ste/lha dang mi'i sgra rnams thos te/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir
77a4(khri brgyad): ro//'di ltar des sgra de mi dmigs pas bdag gis sba thos so snyam du lha'i rna ba des rlom sems su mi byed do//de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa mA gtogs par
77a5(khri brgyad): lha'i rna bar sems pa'ang mi skyed cing mi dmigs so//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni lha'i rna ba mngon
77a6(khri brgyad): sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo//des sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyang sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba
77a7(khri brgyad): bzhin du rab tu shes te/'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'dod chags dang
77b1(khri brgyad): bral ba'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin du zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /gti mug///
77b2(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa dang /gti mug dang bral ba dang /sred pa dang bcas pa dang /sred pa dang bral ba dang /len pa dang bcas pa dang /len pa med pa dang /bsdus pa dang /rnam par
77b3(khri brgyad): g.yengs pa dang /chung ngu dang /chen por gyur pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa dang /mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par ma grol ba dang /zag pa dang
77b4(khri brgyad): bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa dang /bla na yod pa'i sems la'ang bla na yod pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
77b5(khri brgyad): du rab tu shes so//bla na med pa'i sems la'ang bla na med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'di ltar sems de'ang sems ma yin pa ste/bsdam
77b6(khri brgyad): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir des rlom sems su mi byed do//des glang gis rlom sems su mi byed pa'i sems de nyid kyang mi dmigs te/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid
77b7(khri brgyad): kyis dngon pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do//de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs
78a1(khri brgyad): pAr sems la sems pa'ang mi bskyed do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems
78a2(khri brgyad): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo//de sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum
78a3(khri brgyad): du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/des sems gcig gam/sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//zhag gcig dang /zhag brgya'i bar dang /
78a4(khri brgyad): zla ba gcig dang /zla ba brgya'i bar dang /lo gcig dang /lo brgya'i bar dang /bskal pa gcig dang /bskal pa brgya'i bar dang /bskal pa brgya phrag du ma 'am/
78a5(khri brgyad): bskal pa stong phrag du ma 'am/bskul pa 'bum phrag du ma 'am/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma'i bar du rjes su dran zhing /sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i
78a6(khri brgyad): bar du'ang rjes su dran te/bdag ni gra ge mo zhig ni 'dug 'dug ste/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za//
78a7(khri brgyad): 'tsho ba ni 'di 'dra ba zhig/yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsamo zhig tu gyur/de nas shi 'phos nas ni go ge mo zhig tu skyes/de nas shi 'phos
78b1(khri brgyad): nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes de ltar rnam pa dang bcas/yul phyogs dang bcas/gaN+DI tsaM las gyur pa dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no//
78b2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar shes pa de'ang shes pa ma yin pa ste/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do//nges
78b3(khri brgyad): gang giste rlom sems su mi byed pa'i shes pa de nyid kyang mi dmigs te/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir
78b4(khri brgyad): bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do//de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i shes par sems pa'ang mi bskyed do//
78b5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i
78b6(khri brgyad): shes pa mngon par sgrub bo//de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams mthong ste/sems can 'tsho 'pho ba dang /skye ba dang /kha dog sdug pa dang /
78b7(khri brgyad): kha dog mi sdug pa dang /bzang po dang /ngan pa dang /bde 'gro dang /ngan 'gro dang /las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba dag rab tu shes so//sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes
79a1(khri brgyad): par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag bri nyes par spyod pa dang /yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta brnyan yin te
79a2(khri brgyad): log par lta ba'i las kyi gzhi dang rgyus lus zhig nas shi bo'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs
79a3(khri brgyad): par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngagra gi legs par spyod pa dang /yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag pa'i lta ba can te//
79a4(khri brgyad): de dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa'i gzhi drang rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lha'i mig
79a5(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/namo mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs
79a6(khri brgyad): pa dag na/'gro ba drug gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'di ltar mig de ni mig ma yin pa ste/bsam gyis
79a7(khri brgyad): mi khyab pa'i phyir des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do//des gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i mig de nyid mi dmigs te/de ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis
79b1(khri brgyad): dben pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do//de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par
79b2(khri brgyad): mig tu sems pa'ang mi bskyed do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni lha'i mig mngon sum du bya ba'i
79b3(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo//de zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa'ang mngon par sgrub la/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
79b4(khri brgyad): kyi sar yang mi ltung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang la'ang smon pa med do//de mngon
79b5(khri brgyad): par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed do//'di ltar shes pa de ni shes pa ma
79b6(khri brgyad): yin pa ste/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i dge ba des rlom sems su mi byed do//de
79b7(khri brgyad): shes pa de nyid mi dmigs te/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom
80a1(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed do//de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par shes pa de la sems pa'ang mi bskyed do//shA ri'i bu byang chub
80a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sbyang ngo ///
80a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur yongs su
80a4(khri brgyad): dag par 'gyur te/mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob por byed do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
80a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam pa
80a6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/mtha' las
80a7(khri brgyad): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang /lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
80b1(khri brgyad): lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'khrug
80b2(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i phyir/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
80b3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
80b4(khri brgyad): gnas te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
80b5(khri brgyad): spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong po nyid kyis rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam
80b6(khri brgyad): sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis shes rab
80b7(khri brgyad): 'chal pa'i sems mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//shA ri'i bu byang
81a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'gro ba dang /'ong ba med
81a2(khri brgyad): pa dang /'dzin pa med pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po drag la gnas te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong bar byed do//sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa yod
81a3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir gdags so//tshul khrims ni 'tshal pa'i tshul khrims yod pa'i phyir gdags so//bzod pa ni 'khrug pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so//brtson 'grus ni le lo
81a4(khri brgyad): yod pa'i phyir gdags so//ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so//shes rab ni 'chal pa'i shes rab yod pa'i phyir gdags te/de ni rgal
81a5(khri brgyad): to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//sbyin pa dang ser sna zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ma
81a6(khri brgyad): yin pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//bzod pa dang 'khrug pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//brtson 'grus dang le lo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//mnyam par
81a7(khri brgyad): bzhag pa dang /mnyam par ma bzhag pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//shes rab dang /shes rab 'chal pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//bdag la spyos so/
81b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//bdag la phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//bdag la bsti stang byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//bdag la bsti stang ma byas
81b2(khri brgyad): so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni bdag la spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/phyag byas so zhes rlom sems
81b3(khri brgyad): su mi byed/bdag la bsti stang byas so zhes rlom sems su mi byed/bdag la bsti stang ma byas so zhes rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes
81b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlom sems thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
81b5(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i yon tan gang yin pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/de ni yon tan de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /sems can rnams kyang yongs
81b6(khri brgyad): su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
81b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems bskyod par byed de/des sems can thams cad la mnyam pa
82a1(khri brgyad): nyid kyi sems bskyed pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//des chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob pas sems can thams cad chos
82a2(khri brgyad): thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'god par byed do//de tshe 'di nyid la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sdug cing thugs su byon par 'gyur ro///byang chub sems dpa'
82a3(khri brgyad): thams cad dang /nyan thos thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang sdug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der nams kyang mig
82a4(khri brgyad): gis gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//rna bas sgra yid du mi 'ong ba rnams thos par mi 'gyur ro//snas dri yid du mi 'ong ba rnams tshor bar mi
82a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//lces ro yid du mi 'ong ba rnams myong bar mi 'gyur ro//lus kyis reg bya yid du mi 'ong ba rnams reg par mi 'gyur ro//yid kyis chos yid du mi 'ong ba
82a6(khri brgyad): rnams shes par mi 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par
82a7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/dge slong sum brgyas gos ci gyon pa rnams
82b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyang bskyed do//de nas de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//de
82b2(khri brgyad): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gauzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
82b3(khri brgyad): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
82b4(khri brgyad): rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
82b5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
82b6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/de dag bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig na bskal pa skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dag
82b7(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog chen po zhes bya ba dag tu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu drug khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
83a1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'ang mnyes par byed
83a2(khri brgyad): par 'gyur te/de nyid du rab tu byung nas/tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
83a3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po dag gis 'di nas shar phyogs na sangs rgyas khri bzhugs pa nyid du mthong ngo //
83a4(khri brgyad): phyogs bcu khor yug gi bar du'ang sangs rgyas khri khri mthong ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
83a5(khri brgyad): pa gang dag snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na mi snang ngo //de nas 'khor de las srog chags khris bdag
83a6(khri brgyad): cag kyang lus 'di lta bu byas te/las de byas pas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi/
83a7(khri brgyad): bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
83b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
83b2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo srog chags khri po 'di drag khyod kyis mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
83b3(khri brgyad): kun dga' bo srog chags khri po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/nams kyang dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
83b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/phyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar
83b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/nye bar brtag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
83b6(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa mau rdul gyi bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /
83b7(khri brgyad): de dag dang gzhan yang dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
84a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems
84a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
84a3(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa logs so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
84a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa mchog legs so//'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa khyad par du 'phags pa lags so//'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rab dang /rab mchog dang /bya nom pa lags so///
84a5(khri brgyad): 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa lags so//'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa gong na ma mchis pa lags so//'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa lags so//
84a6(khri brgyad): 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so//'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba dang dul ba lags so//'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa lags
84a7(khri brgyad): so//'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa dpe ma mchis pa lags so//'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' lta bu lags so//'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
84b1(khri brgyad): lags so//'di ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
84b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi thub pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
84b3(khri brgyad): spyod pa rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin po stsal lags so//de dag gis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags
84b4(khri brgyad): so//de dag gis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob lags so//de dag gis ni 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
84b5(khri brgyad): pa thob par 'gyur lags so//de bzhin du mi mnyam dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab bsgoms
84b6(khri brgyad): lags so//de dag gis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob lags so//de dag gis ni 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos mi mnyam pa
84b7(khri brgyad): dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyes par
85a1(khri brgyad): gyur lags so//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa
85a2(khri brgyad): brnyes par gyur lags so//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas logs so//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
85a3(khri brgyad): lags so//de bzhin du 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad
85a4(khri brgyad): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur lags so//mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags so//mngon par
85a5(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par
85a6(khri brgyad): 'tshal ba rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
85a7(khri brgyad): pa 'di la spyod pa gang lags pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
85b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/de
85b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin no//rigs kyi bu dag khyed ji skad zer ba bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni lha dang mi
85b3(khri brgyad): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i gnas yin no//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/'jig rten du mi'i 'jig
85b4(khri brgyad): rten 'byung ngo //'jig rten du lha'i 'jig rten 'byung ngo //de bzhin du rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /khyim
85b5(khri brgyad): bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral
85b6(khri brgyad): dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs 'khor dang /'od chung dang /tshad
85b7(khri brgyad): med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che dang /sems can 'du shes med pa dang /gnas gtsang ma mi che ba
86a1(khri brgyad): dang /shin tu mthong dang /gya nom snang dang /mi gdung dang /'og min dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /rnam shes mtha'
86a2(khri brgyad): yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /ci'ang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du
86a3(khri brgyad): 'byung ngo //rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
86a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //shA ri'i bu byang chub
86a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' la brten nas/dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //'jig rten pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad zas dang /skom dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i
86a6(khri brgyad): gsos sman dang /'chog chas dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /dngul dang /gser 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
86a7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu lha rnams dang /mi rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa rnams dang /srid pa'i bde ba rnams dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba de dag thams cad kyang /shA ri'i
86b1(khri brgyad): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten te 'jig rten du 'byung ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
86b2(khri brgyad): pan pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la gnas te/bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa la sbyor bar byed/bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims bsrung lo//gzhan
86b3(khri brgyad): dag kyang tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/bdag nyid kyang bzod pa bsgom la/gzhan dag kyang bzod pa la sbyor bar byed/bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus bcom la/gzhan dag kyang
86b4(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus la sbyor bar byed/bdag nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams bskyed la/gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyor bar byed/bdag nyid kyang shes rab bsgom la//
86b5(khri brgyad): gzhan dag kyang shes rab sgom pa la sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bya
86b6(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o///
86b7(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/bam po lnga ba//de nas de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung
87a1(khri brgyad): nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do//de nas ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs
87a2(khri brgyad): byung ngo //de byung nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang
87a3(khri brgyad): shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur
87a4(khri brgyad): to//de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis 'od
87a5(khri brgyad): kyi bkod pa de mthong nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag
87a6(khri brgyad): snang ba chen pos khyab par gda' ba 'di su'i mthu lags/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa
87a7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub phyogs logs na/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
87b1(khri brgyad): sangs na sgru shes byu ba gas/sa 'du sa/byung chub sems mas rgyan rnams pa shos ba la ston pa bstan pa'i
87b2(khri brgyad): da byung /gas tu ga ma sna bu 'di she sang badz+ra nas byab bar ma da /rkyenan du
87b3(khri brgyad): rgyurgyu dang /bying da/'gyu dang /sbri dang /phyogs bcu kun gyi ba bri 'jig gyi/des mig r+b+he klung gi rgya ma snyid dag nga de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//de nas drung rgyu
87b4(khri brgyad): da'asam so dang chen po de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a sa na 'di mang gyis nas ti//com ldam dzes padag gcing /bcom ldan 'das de pazhin ga shegs
87b5(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shrIkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /phyag brgya bA dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'
87b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag kyang blta ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mnyan po'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der
87b7(khri brgyad): mchi bar 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes ni deng shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa'
88a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
88a2(khri brgyad): lan bdun bskor ba byas te/phyogs bcu na sa gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bdun dang /me tog dang /me tog phreng dang /spos dang /byug po dang /phye ma dang /
88a3(khri brgyad): na badz+ra' dang /gsor gyi me tog dang /dngul gyi me tog rnam pa dum dag khyer nas/sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /rol mo'i sgra dang bcas te/bcom ldan 'das
88a4(khri brgyad): dra bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ngo //de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /'og
88a5(khri brgyad): min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog dang /me tog phreng dang /spros dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma/
88a6(khri brgyad): dkar po dang /man+dA ra bya dang /mun+ta ra ba chen po dang /klu shing gi me tog dang /tA ma la'i lo ma rnams khyer te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra
88a7(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /lha de dag gis
88b1(khri brgyad): me tog dang /me tog phreng dang /spos dang /drug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
88b2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor/mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor to//de nas me tog la sogs pa de
88b3(khri brgyad): dag ni steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/gru bzhi lham pa/ka ba bzhi zug
88b4(khri brgyad): pa/cha mnyam pa/shin tu rnam par phye ba/nyams dga' ba yid du 'ong ba zhig tu red de 'dug par gyur to//de nas 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum snyan
88b5(khri brgyad): las langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
88b6(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos ci lta bu dag brnyes pa'i chos de lta bu dag bdag cag gis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thob par gyur cig/da ltar de bzhin
88b7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lung 'bog cing /'khor 'di lta bu dag la chos ston par yang gyur cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
89a1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de/chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /chos thams cad 'byung ba med
89a2(khri brgyad): par bzod par gyur par mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das lo che dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa
89a3(khri brgyad): mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo 'khor 'di las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis mi
89a4(khri brgyad): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhin/bskal pa me tog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la/de bzhin gshegs
89a5(khri brgyad): po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog ces bya ba dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
89a6(khri brgyad): pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ljags kyi dbang po'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal
89a7(khri brgyad): pa/rab 'byor ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
89b1(khri brgyad): pa las brtsams te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar khyod spobs par gyis shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89b2(khri brgyad): chen po de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lha'i bu de dgu 'di snyam du sems te/ci tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang /spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i go/
89b3(khri brgyad): chas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed dam/'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par byed snyam mo//de nas
89b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi mthus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi
89b5(khri brgyad): yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams smra ba dang /ston pa dang /brjod
89b6(khri brgyad): pa gang ci'ang rung ste/de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no//de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni chos nyid dang mi
89b7(khri brgyad): 'gal lo//rigs kyi bu de dag chos bstan pa de la slob na'ang chos nyid de mngon sum du byed do//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul
90a1(khri brgyad): gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston gyi/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la nyan thos dang /rang
90a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par mi nus te/yul ma yin no//de nas bcom ldan
90a3(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi na/byang
90a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes
90a5(khri brgyad): bgyi ba'i ming gi chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
90a6(khri brgyad): ba de dang byang chub sems dpa'i ming de'ang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha
90a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi/rjes su bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
90b1(khri brgyad): dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming de ni ming tsam du zad de/ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab
90b2(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sems can sems can zhes bya bar ming du brjod kyang /sems can gang yang mi dmigs te/de ni ming du btags pa tsam du zad la/btags pa'i
90b3(khri brgyad): chos gang yin pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad gdogs pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med do//de bzhin du bdag dang /srog dang /skye ba po dang /gso ba dang /
90b4(khri brgyad): skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes pa dang /shed bu dang /byed pa po dang /byed du 'jug pa po dang /slong ba po dang /kun nas slong ba po dang /tshor ba po dang /tshor
90b5(khri brgyad): bopor byed du 'jug pa po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po de dag thams cad kyang btags pa'i chos yin la/btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni skye ba med 'grag pa med de
90b6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags par zad do//ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab
90b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni btags pa'i chos yin la/btags
91a1(khri brgyad): pa'i chos de la ni ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med de/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nang gi lus gang yin pa de la/
91a2(khri brgyad): gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/'gag pa
91a3(khri brgyad): med de/ming de'ang nang na'ang med phyi rol na'ang med gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
91a4(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med de/
91a5(khri brgyad): ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
91a6(khri brgyad): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni btags pa'i chos yin la/btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad
91a7(khri brgyad): du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/'gag pa med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste mig ces bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su btags pa de la ni mang//
91b1(khri brgyad): gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/'gag pa med do//'di lnga ste mig ces bya ba'i ming du'ang nang na'ang med phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med
91b2(khri brgyad): par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ces bya ba de ni/'di lta ste/chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su
91b3(khri brgyad): btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med do//'di lta ste yid ces bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med phyi rol na'ang med
91b4(khri brgyad): gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du
91b5(khri brgyad): gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med de/ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin du sgra
91b6(khri brgyad): dang /dri dang /ro dang /re ga bya dang /chos zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma
91b7(khri brgyad): gtogs par skye ba med/'gog pa med de/chos zhes bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mig gi
92a1(khri brgyad): khams zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba
92a2(khri brgyad): med 'gag pa med de/mig gi khams zhes bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams
92a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med do//
92a4(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mig gi rnamo par shes pa'i khams
92a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/'gag pa med de/
92a6(khri brgyad): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin du rna ba'i khams
92a7(khri brgyad): dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i
92b1(khri brgyad): khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams
92b2(khri brgyad): dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/chos su btags pa de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye
92b3(khri brgyad): ba med/'gag pa med de/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de
92b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de ni 'di ltar btags pa'i chos
92b5(khri brgyad): yin la/btags pa'i chos de la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/'gag pa med de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /
92b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mang zhes bya ba de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
92b7(khri brgyad): 'o'adi lta ste dper na/nang gi lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam gyis tha snyad gdags pa ste/mgo bo dang /mjing pa dang /phrag pa dang /lag pa dang /rgal tshigs dang /rtsib ma
93a1(khri brgyad): dang /dpyi dang /brla dang /rje ngar dang /rkang pa'i rus pa zhes bya bar ming gis tha snyad du 'dogs pa de dag ni chos su btags pa tsam du zud la/chos su btags
93a2(khri brgyad): pa de dag ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du btags pa ma gtogs par skye ba medo 'gag pa med de/ming de'ang nang na'ang med phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi
93a3(khri brgyad): dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya
93a4(khri brgyad): ba de dag thams cad ni btags pa'i chos yin la/btags pa'i chos de dag la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa mi gtogs par skye ba med/'gag pa med do//
93a5(khri brgyad): ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/phyi rol gyi rtswa dang /shing dang /yal ga dang /lo ma dang
93a6(khri brgyad): 'dab ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni ming sna tshogs kyis tha snyad du gdugs par zung lnga/maung de dag kyang ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs
93a7(khri brgyad): bar skye ba med/'gag pa med de/ming de dag kyang nang ni'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes
93b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mido zhes bya ba de dag thams cad ni btags pa'i chos yin la/btags
93b2(khri brgyad): pa'i chos de dag la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa mo gtogs par skye ba med/'gag pa med de/ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med
93b3(khri brgyad): par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs
93b4(khri brgyad): par skye ba med/'gag pa med de/mtshan de dag kyang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rmi lam
93b5(khri brgyad): dang /brag cha dang /mig yor dang /sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni btagos pa tsam du zad la/btags pa
93b6(khri brgyad): de dag la ni ming gi brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/'gag pa med de/ming de'ang nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par
