131b4(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su ma mthong /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha' las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o//rnam grangs 'di la kun tu
131b5(khri brgyad): rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/de 'dir mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyi ste/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
131b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/de de ltar mos nas/des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis par yid la bgyid pa'i slad du chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis
131b7(khri brgyad): lags so//chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa dang /gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du/des gang yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba 'am/gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang
132a1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs te/chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so///
132a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
132a3(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i srad du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi
132a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu mchi bas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//de ni smon lam dag yongs su ma rdzogs shing /sangs
132a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mngan las mi 'da' lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/smon lam de
132a6(khri brgyad): dag smon lam ma lags/stobs de dag stobs ma lags/mi 'jigs pa de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/so so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par
132a7(khri brgyad): rig pa ma lags shing /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/chos ma lags
132b1(khri brgyad): pa'ajam lags pA'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar
132b2(khri brgyad): du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchings/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//
132b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bdun pa//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
132b4(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pas/'di ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/shes rab kyi pha rol
132b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig na zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi'o//de de ltar yongs su rtog cing /de ltar nges par sems pa'i
132b6(khri brgyad): tshe/gal te chos mi mchis shing mi dmigs pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong na/de legs par mthong ba
132b7(khri brgyad): lags te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
133a1(khri brgyad): 'di m+b+had ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang dag med cing mi dmigs pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong //
133a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas skyong
133a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rong bzhin
133a4(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo
133a5(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha
133a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med
133a7(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang
133b1(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
133b2(khri brgyad): bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so///
133b3(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bAr du med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid med cing mi
133b4(khri brgyad): dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs
133b5(khri brgyad): so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /sangs
133b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi bar du'ang med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/thams cad shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs
133b7(khri brgyad): so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
134a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sems mi zhum mi 'gong la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
134a2(khri brgyad): chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mo bral bar rig par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
134a3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma brel par rig par bya/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
134a4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pas de yang
134a5(khri brgyad): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang
134a6(khri brgyad): bzhin dang bral ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu tshul khrims
134a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
134b1(khri brgyad): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
134b2(khri brgyad): rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//shA rI'i bus spros pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin
134b3(khri brgyad): lta bu yin/tshe ra ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yong dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi
134b4(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//tshor ba dong /'du shes dang /'du byed
134b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i rong bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA
134b6(khri brgyad): ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam
134b7(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa
135a1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
135a2(khri brgyad): ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o//de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o//mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi
135a3(khri brgyad): rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
135a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA
135a5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thamaso cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
135a6(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing byung ba med pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab
135a7(khri brgyad): 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par byung ba med pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/de
135b1(khri brgyad): la skye ba dang nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/de la skye ba dang /
135b2(khri brgyad): 'byung ba mi dmigs so//de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mthi'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mthus stong ste/de la skye ba dang /nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byung
135b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no//de ji lta ji ltar bla na med
135b4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de lhor lus yongs su dag pa dang /ngag yongs su dag pa dang /sems yongs su dag pa dang /mtshan yongs su
135b5(khri brgyad): dag pa thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /ngag yongs su dag pa dang /sems yongs su dag pa dang /
135b6(khri brgyad): mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do//zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /gti mug dang ldan pa dang /nga rgyal dang ldan
135b7(khri brgyad): pa dang /rgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna dang ldan pa dang /chags pa dang ldan pa dang /lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems me bskyid do//de 'dod chags kyi
136a1(khri brgyad): sems mi bskyed cing /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nga rgyal dang /sgyu dang /g.yo dang /phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /chags pa dang /lta ba dang ldan pa'i
136a2(khri brgyad): sems mi bskyed pas nu ma yang ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing /rtag par rgyun du rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur ro//sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang
136a3(khri brgyad): ngan song rnams su mi skye'o//de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
136a4(khri brgyad): du 'gro ste/bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur
136a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
136a6(khri brgyad): 'di la brtson pa mi btang bar spyad par bya ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med
136a7(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi lo'u zhes bya ste brgyad po'o///
136b1(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
136b2(khri brgyad): spyod pa gal te thebs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so//tshor ba dang /'du shes
136b3(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la spyod na/mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so//gal te gzugs
136b4(khri brgyad): la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mo lags so//tshor ba dang /'du shes
136b5(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes po la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
136b6(khri brgyad): pa ma lags so//gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa logs/gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
136b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/gal te gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am bdag
137a1(khri brgyad): ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/
137a2(khri brgyad): bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/mtshan ma la spyod pa logs/gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/gal
137a3(khri brgyad): te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am mu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/mtshan ma la spyod pa lagaso//gal te gzugs
137a4(khri brgyad): la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am mi dade na zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/gal te tshe rU ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
137a5(khri brgyad): la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das
137a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la
137a7(khri brgyad): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /mig lnga dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa
137b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so//bcom ldan
137b2(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na///
137b3(khri brgyad): dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
137b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa yin/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no snyam du sems
137b5(khri brgyad): na/de mtshan ma nyid la smod pa lags te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so//shA ri'i bus sbas pa/
137b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
137b7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/tshor ba dang /
138a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/tshor
138a2(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/de ni de'i skye ba dang /rga ba dang /nu ba dang /'chi bo dang /mya ngan
138a3(khri brgyad): dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa byed pa yin no zhes kho bo smra'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
138a4(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa zangs la mi mkhas pas/gal te mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /
138a5(khri brgyad): yid la granas shing kun tu shos te mos/gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos la gnas shing kun tu shes te
138a6(khri brgyad): myos/mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te myos/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus
138a7(khri brgyad): kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/gal
138b1(khri brgyad): terna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba blang ba 'am/
138b2(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal pa'im/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/bde ba'ang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/gal te rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus
138b3(khri brgyad): ti reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/bde ba'ang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te myos/gal te byung
138b4(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/mig lnga dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
138b5(khri brgyad): tshad med pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos//
138b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /sangs rgyas
138b7(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /
139a1(khri brgyad): 'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa dag las yongs su mi 'gyur zhing /sdug bsngal
139a2(khri brgyad): la sogs pa las yongs su mi 'grol lo zhes kha ba ste'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du bya
139a3(khri brgyad): ba'i sprul pa'ang med na/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta phrul 'gyur te/de ni gnas med do//tshe dang ldan
139a4(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bus smras
139a5(khri brgyad): pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/thabs mkhas par rig par bya/rab 'byor
139a6(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/gzugs la mi spyod/tshor ba
139a7(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
139b1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang /bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
139b2(khri brgyad): bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya
139b3(khri brgyad): pa dang /mi rtag ces bya ba dang /bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya bar mi
139b4(khri brgyad): spyod/gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/mi stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med
139b5(khri brgyad): ces bya bar mi spyod/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mo spyod/mi stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma yod ces pa
139b6(khri brgyad): pa dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/tshor
139b7(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
140a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'ong
140a2(khri brgyad): ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med/gzugs los gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/gzugs nyid
140a3(khri brgyad): kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam
140a4(khri brgyad): par shes pa ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa
140a5(khri brgyad): nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par
140a6(khri brgyad): 'byung ba rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
140a7(khri brgyad): stobs rnams dang /mau 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa
140b1(khri brgyad): de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/stong
140b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin la/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
140b3(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
140b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu
140b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te chos 'ga' zhig khas len na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa ma yin no//khas mi len na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
140b6(khri brgyad): mo yin no//ngas len kyang len la/khas mi len kyang mi len na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//khas len pa'ang ma yin/khas mi len pa'ang
140b7(khri brgyad): ma yin na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
141a1(khri brgyad): spyod pas ci'i phyir khas mi len/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmigs
141a2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
141a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/spyod kyang spyod la/mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes
141a4(khri brgyad): bya bar khas mi len/spyod pa'ang ma yon/mi spyod pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar khas mi len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin
141a5(khri brgyad): du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no//rnam pa thams
141a6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid de'angadra chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
141a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/rgya che ba phul du bya ba/tshad med pa/nges pa/mi 'phrogs pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
141b1(khri brgyad): thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
141b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'ching rgya'o//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa
141b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya 'am/'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
141b4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar
141b5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
141b6(khri brgyad): nga'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag grang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe drang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting
141b7(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ting nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
142a1(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba bzang po
142a2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad
142a3(khri brgyad): kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nges pa'i rgyal
142a4(khri brgyad): mtshon tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad lo 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ting nge 'dzin
142a5(khri brgyad): gyi rgyal po la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mnyam
142a6(khri brgyad): par bzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobaso zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yang
142a7(khri brgyad): dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /tshig bla dgas lo 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting
142b1(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang /phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
142b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge
142b3(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
142b4(khri brgyad): seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /skyel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting
142b5(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang /tshul ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinA dang /dri ma med pa'i
142b6(khri brgyad): sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
142b7(khri brgyad): dag pa dam po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dga' bo byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i
143a1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang /zad mI shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
143a2(khri brgyad): dudang /zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ny+tsA ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting
143a3(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang /zla ba dri ma med po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snang ba byed pa zhes bya
143a4(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems gnas pa
143a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /kun tu stong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
143a6(khri brgyad): dang /chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya blo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
143a7(khri brgyad): chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes
143b1(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yi gri mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yi ga dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
143b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ming nges por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gnas med par spyod pa zhes
143b3(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yul
143b4(khri brgyad): los rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dge
143b5(khri brgyad): ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi
143b6(khri brgyad): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nem nur
143b7(khri brgyad): rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes
144a1(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rtogs pas srid pa'i mun
144a2(khri brgyad): pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /brda dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i
144a3(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang /me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ngo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bzod pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa
144a4(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zad mi shes pa'i za
144a5(khri brgyad): ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin deng /yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
144a6(khri brgyad): 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
144a7(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang /snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bkod pa/
144b1(khri brgyad): chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'jig rten thams cad du 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdul med ning rdul
144b2(khri brgyad): dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nyon mongs pa med par
144b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gnas la brten pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i
144b4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang /lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam
144b5(khri brgyad): mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gros pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod de/ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
144b6(khri brgyad): chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
144b7(khri brgyad): po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
145a1(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya ste/gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
145a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
145a3(khri brgyad): yang 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin
145a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing /da ltar phyogs bcu'i
145a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/'che zhing gzhes pa'i
145a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung ston par rig par bya ste/
145a7(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so//bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/bdag
145b1(khri brgyad): ni snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin ngas rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri la rnam par rtog bya de dag
145b2(khri brgyad): thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo //shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de
145b3(khri brgyad): bzhin gshigs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni med do//
145b4(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ting nge 'dzin kyang glan no zhig/bya chub sems dpe' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med
145b5(khri brgyad): kye/byang chub sems dpa'i byed d+hU ting nge 'dzin yin la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byo drugal
145b6(khri brgyad): te chas thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan mo yin/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhin ma yin lo//ting
145b7(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o yini byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/
146a1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzin de dag kun
146a2(khri brgyad): tu shes sam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun tu shes pa med do//shA ri'i dus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar kun tu shes pa
146a3(khri brgyad): mr-ing/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro//shA ri'i dus smras pa/ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/rab 'byor
146a4(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/chos thams cad med pa'i phyir/de ltar ting nge 'dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed de/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/rigs kyi bu dris
146a5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam par mi shes shing /kun tu mi shes so//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ljon pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir ni/ngos rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi
146a6(khri brgyad): shes/rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med pa nyid kyi phyir/rnam par mi shes shing
146a7(khri brgyad): kun tu mi shes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lo legs so zhes bya ba byin te/rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par
146b1(khri brgyad): nas pa rnams kyim ga r+b+ha bstan pa khyad kyis bshad pa ni de oMn+naH/chog de dag lags pang smras pa ni legs so lcags so//rab 'ad+mo byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen
146b2(khri brgyad): pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la de ltar bslab par bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
146b3(khri brgyad): dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum nun bdun po dag la bsla pa
146b4(khri brgyad): bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la'ang de ltar bslab par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
146b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam+b+ha/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
146b6(khri brgyad): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa nI shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/de'adra mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//de bzhin du
146b7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu/
147a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la slob ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la slob ste/de'ang mi dmigs
147a2(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
147a3(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i
147a4(khri brgyad): tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
147a5(khri brgyad): pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i
147a6(khri brgyad): bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so//shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar dag mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/phung po dang /khams
147a7(khri brgyad): dang /skye mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun
147b1(khri brgyad): 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs
147b2(khri brgyad): so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par drag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
147b3(khri brgyad): kyi bar dag mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir la ni tsog phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /
147b4(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub dang /sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs so//
147b5(khri brgyad): ri'i dus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa
147b6(khri brgyad): dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes
147b7(khri brgyad): bya'o//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la slob pa logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis
148a1(khri brgyad): bka' stsa pa/shA ri'i du de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon chos gang la'ang mi skyob bo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu chos 'di
148a2(khri brgyad): dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa ngo lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ji lta bur mchis
148a3(khri brgyad): pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de lta ro yod la/de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bus
148a4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma legs pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos
148a5(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs yod pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/tshor ba dang /'du
148a6(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/khams dang /skye
148a7(khri brgyad): mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir byang
148b1(khri brgyad): rlung kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu na 'dun yod pa ma yin/na stong nyid dang /drangs pa med pa'ang ba nyid stong pa nyid kyibar gyi phy-i/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi byur
148b2(khri brgyad): dang /yod pa ma yin na/de la byis pa gang dag ma rlig pa dang /sred pa dag gis mngon pa nan pa de dag gis yong pa ma yin pa la brtags te/yod pa ma yin pa la mngon
148b3(khri brgyad): par zhen nas/'di lta ste rtog pa dang /chad pa'i mtha' gnyis lnga chags pas na/de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos
148b4(khri brgyad): de dag yongs su brtags pas/ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
148b5(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag la'ang mngon par zhen to//de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas na/yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir te/de dag ni mi shes myi
148b6(khri brgyad): mamyong bya yin no//ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhen/gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo //rko r+yA bya dang /du shes dang /'du byed rnam ste dang /rnam par shes pa mi shes mi
148b7(khri brgyad): mthong ngo //khams dang /skye mtshad dang /rteni cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'as
149a1(khri brgyad): pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no//de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/glang nas
149a2(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i khams
149a3(khri brgyad): nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//de dag ni mi dad pa yin te ci zhig la ma dad ce na//
149a4(khri brgyad): gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar ma dad pa nas/byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar dag la ma dad pa yin no//de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ci zhig
149a5(khri brgyad): la mi gnas zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
149a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas so//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
149a7(khri brgyad): bor dag la mi gnas pa yin te/de'i phyir byis pa rnams zhes bya'o//de dge ni mngon par zhen pa yin to//ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/gzugs la mngon par
149b1(khri brgyad): zhon pa yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no//mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no//rna ba dang /sku
149b2(khri brgyad): dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no//gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams la mngon par zhen
149b3(khri brgyad): pa yin no//phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no//lta
149b4(khri brgyad): bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no//byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no//shA ri'i
149b5(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing /rnam pa thams
149b6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab
149b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub
150a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma
150a2(khri brgyad): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
150a3(khri brgyad): la brtags nas/mngon par zhen par byed/de bzhin du bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phan pa dang
150a4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /thams cadad shes pa
150a5(khri brgyad): nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la brtogs nas mngon par zhen par byed de/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
150a6(khri brgyad): chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom
150a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
150b1(khri brgyad): sa par mi 'byung ba lpags med/bcom ldan 'das kyis bra/ stsal pa/shA ri'-i dro ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon pono shes rab kyi pha rol tu
150b2(khri brgyad): pal skyob pa 'i yin 'di/rnam pa bams cid mkhyen pa nyid du ngos pa m+bu'i thung ba yid no//shrI dzus gsol pa/bcom ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
150b3(khri brgyad): dnga' dzin po ji ltar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la sgrub pa legs shing /dz+haiMm+ba R+Sha bsleb sa rnam pa rnams cad ma khyen pa nges par byung ba lcags/bcom ldan
150b4(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA rI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod po glang gi kyi/shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa mi
150b5(khri brgyad): dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul
150b6(khri brgyad): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo //dri bzhin du bsum gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol
150b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /byang chub
151a1(khri brgyad): kyi bar dag myi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /thams cad shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi blar dag kyang mi dmigs yang dag
151a2(khri brgyad): par rjes su mi mthong na/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/
151a3(khri brgyad): te/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo //shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
151a4(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo //
151a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mtshan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
151a6(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad
151a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob por 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan
151b1(khri brgyad): par bgyi/de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims
151b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
151b3(khri brgyad): nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang /rnam pa
151b4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
151b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de khyod nyid la dris/khyod
151b6(khri brgyad): kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/sgyu mo'ang gzhan la/tshor ba
151b7(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom
152a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rab 'byor 'd-i sgyum du sems//ma'ang gzhan la/mig kyang gzhan zhog yon snyam mam/sgyu ma 'ang gnan la/
152a2(khri brgyad): rna ba dang /sna dang / dang /lus dang /yid kyang gzhon zhig yin snyam mam/che'ang gzhan la/gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mamo/sgyu m+bu'ang gzhan la
152a3(khri brgyad): sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /rig bya dang /chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam ma mo/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan nig yin snyam mam/
152a4(khri brgyad): sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes
152a5(khri brgyad): nga gzhan zhig yin snyim mam+b+ha/sgyu mu'ang gzhan li/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gnan zhig yin snyam mam/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang
152a6(khri brgyad): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi lhas te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol
152a7(khri brgyad): bi/bcom ldan 'das deni mi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/mig go 'dus te reg
152b1(khri brgyad): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/'dra ba'ang ma yin pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/rna ba'i
152b2(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
152b3(khri brgyad): ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'am/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/bde ba'ang ma yin pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam//
152b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcomo ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/byang
152b5(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam me ma/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
152b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsol pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'ang gzhan lnga stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/skye ma'ang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan zhig
152b7(khri brgyad): yin snyam mam/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la smon pa med pa'ong gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan
153a1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam
153a2(khri brgyad): mam/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
153a3(khri brgyad): 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
153a4(khri brgyad): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/gzugs kyang gzhan
153a5(khri brgyad): ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/tshor ba
153a6(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid
153a7(khri brgyad): kyang rnam par shes pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/mig kyang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la//
153b1(khri brgyad): sgyu ma nyid kyang mig lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yod kyang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das
153b2(khri brgyad): yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang yid legs so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das gzugs /
153b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyang skye ma logs la/sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/sgra dang /dri dang ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams kyang gzhan ma
153b4(khri brgyad): lags te/bcom ldan 'das chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang chos rnams legs so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/mig gi
153b5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa lags so//
153b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
153b7(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lags
154a1(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
154a2(khri brgyad): sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa
154a3(khri brgyad): dang /lce'i 'dus te rig pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
154a4(khri brgyad): lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug
154a5(khri brgyad): bsngal ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'di ba
154a6(khri brgyad): 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/bde 'dra ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi lus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
154a7(khri brgyad): bde ba'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma 'gas/dade ba'ang ma lags pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/rna ba'i
154b1(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis rgyor bu dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
154b2(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshur bri bde bo 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lagos/bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom
154b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'am/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/bde ba'ang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la//
154b4(khri brgyad): sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'am/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/bde ba'ang ma lags pa lpags so//bcom ldan
154b5(khri brgyad): drings sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
154b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhon ma lags/stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mo
154b7(khri brgyad): lags te/bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/mtshan ma ma
155a1(khri brgyad): mchis pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so///
155a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/smon pa ma mchis pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das smyon pa mi mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid
155a3(khri brgyad): kyang smon pa ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das
155a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
155a5(khri brgyad): lags/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu
155a6(khri brgyad): ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so//bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma 'dra gzhan ma lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
155a7(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so//bcom
155b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba yod snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom
155b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod snyam mam/rab 'byor
155b3(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/gang la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa
155b4(khri brgyad): med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam mam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges
155b5(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam mo mo/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma logs so///
155b6(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong po/bam po brgyad pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/nye bar len/
155b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags su yod dam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni
156a1(khri brgyad): mu mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems ming gi brdas tha snyad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i
156a2(khri brgyad): phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba 'am/'gag pa'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod dam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
156a3(khri brgyad): de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems gang la ming dang mtshan ma med pa dang /brda med pa dang gdags pa
156a4(khri brgyad): med pa dang tha snyad med pa dang /ming med pa dang /ming du gdags pa med pa dang /lus med pa dang /lus kyi las med pa dang /ngag med pa dang /ngag gi las med pa dang /
156a5(khri brgyad): yid med pa dang /yid kyi las med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa de/shes rab kyi pha
156a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid thob par 'gyur snyam mam//
156a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
156b1(khri brgyad): pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslabs na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad
156b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob cing /
156b3(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab
156b4(khri brgyad): par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po gang dag lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan
156b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bskyabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges
156b6(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thib par 'gyur snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so//
156b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su ma
157a1(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol
157a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags
157a3(khri brgyad): so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su ma
157a4(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/brag cha lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag dang /mig yor lta bu dang /chu zla
157a5(khri brgyad): lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam
157a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
157a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/mig yor yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/chu zla'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhi ni/sgyu
157b1(khri brgyad): ma'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/smig rgyu'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/sprul pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma mchis
157b2(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin lags la/dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta
157b3(khri brgyad): bu/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags te/rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing /de
157b4(khri brgyad): dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su mi mchis shing /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i
157b5(khri brgyad): slad du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
157b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags grang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems
157b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'ang yin la/thabs la'ang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyi lag tu 'ong ma sang na/skrab//
158a1(khri brgyad): cing dngang la/drangang bar yang 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas
158a2(khri brgyad): pa gang dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas po gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
158a3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
158a4(khri brgyad): gos gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de'ang mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /'du shes
158a5(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
158a6(khri brgyad): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
158a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs lo sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i rnam pa
158b1(khri brgyad): dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong pa'i rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog/
158b2(khri brgyad): ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal
158b3(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong pa'i rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med
158b4(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam pa dang /dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
158b5(khri brgyad): la mkhas par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
158b6(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gos gzugs lo mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gos tshor ba dang /
158b7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
159a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
159a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so so rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//tshor ba
159a3(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
159a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste de'ong mi dmigs so//tshor ba
159a5(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
159a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/de 'di mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du
159a7(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam por shes pa la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
159b1(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//
159b2(khri brgyad): tshetshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes po la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/de 'ji ma dmigs so//gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so/
159b3(khri brgyad): sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs
159b4(khri brgyad): so//gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya
159b5(khri brgyad): bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//gzugs la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mo dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
159b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs
159b7(khri brgyad): so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
160a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar so/
160a2(khri brgyad): sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan por bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//
160a3(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//gzugs sdug
160a4(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba
160a5(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
160a6(khri brgyad): shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag mod ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon
160a7(khri brgyad): par 'du bye ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar tshos bstan par bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o snyam du sems so//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
160b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo sgrog mau dang du zhing dngang brla mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan
160b2(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bye ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de//
160b3(khri brgyad): de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshang ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang //
160b4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag
160b5(khri brgyad): gis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/del mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/de'ang
160b6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /gzugs mtshon ma med ces bya ba dang /
160b7(khri brgyad): gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang /gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /gzugs dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do///
161a1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa
161a2(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang //
161a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi
161a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
161a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/chos gang dag la mi rtog pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /
161a6(khri brgyad): zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong pa'i rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /dben pa'i rnam par so
161a7(khri brgyad): sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa de mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag
161b1(khri brgyad): mi dngang zhing drangang bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
161b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /gzugs bdag
161b3(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba dang /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /gzugs smon pa med ces bye ba dang /gzugs mngon par
161b4(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
161b5(khri brgyad): shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces
161b6(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
161b7(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing /brtson pa mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/des na byang chub
