162a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dang pa ning dngang bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
162a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang /de las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi
162a3(khri brgyad): bar du gcod por byed pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems da'i chen+da po'i bsdam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/rab 'byor byang chub
162a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dri ltar spyod pa ni mo skyeg mi dngang zhing dang bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhon yod byang chub
162a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa ni/'di ltar so sor rtog ste/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/gzugs
162a6(khri brgyad): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so//tsaur ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong
162a7(khri brgyad): pam ngon rje/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig sbyong ba ma yin gyi/mig nyid bang sgro
162b1(khri brgyad): nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mig go/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang yid do//
162b2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs snong ba mi yin gyi/gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang gzugs s+ho//sgra dang dri dang /rlo nga rig bya dang /chos kyi spyong
162b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyis chos rnams stong pa mA yin gyi/chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par
162b4(khri brgyad): shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par
162b5(khri brgyad): shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/yid
162b6(khri brgyad): kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa sbyong pa ma
162b7(khri brgyad): yid gyi/mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te rog pa dang /sna'i 'dus te rig pa dang /lce'i 'dus
163a1(khri brgyad): te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa spyod pa ma yin gyi/yid kyi 'dus tu
163a2(khri brgyad): reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
163a3(khri brgyad): gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//rna ba'i
163a4(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
163a5(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
163a6(khri brgyad): gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//dran pa nye bar bzhug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/dran pa nye bar
163a7(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//yang dag par spong ba
163b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang lam gyi stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa ma yin gyi lam
163b2(khri brgyad): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang lam mo//stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar stong pa nyid kyis/sangs rgyas kyi chos
163b3(khri brgyad): rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
163b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/
163b5(khri brgyad): thabs de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'dri thos na/mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
163b6(khri brgyad): 'das dge ba'i bshos gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skragi me dngang zhing dadong bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems
163b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
164a1(khri brgyad): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
164a2(khri brgyad): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rlung sangs rgyas kyi sa rA yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
164a3(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
164a4(khri brgyad): po nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
164a5(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya
164a6(khri brgyad): bar ston/bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
164a7(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar ston te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
164b1(khri brgyad): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
164b2(khri brgyad): ston/bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /steng zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
164b3(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya bar stan te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
164b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshos gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang
164b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi
164b6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /sman pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar ston te/de'ang
164b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi
165a1(khri brgyad): bsngo ba dang /de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lho dang lus dang yid mi rtag ces bya bar ston/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba
165a2(khri brgyad): dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar ston to/de'ang mi dmigs
165a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyon thos kyi sa 'o ma/rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/rab
165a4(khri brgyad): 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i po shes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
165a5(khri brgyad): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag mod ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /
165a6(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar ston te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston
165a7(khri brgyad): cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /de bzhin du sgra
165b1(khri brgyad): dang /dri dang /ro dang reg bya dang /chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /sbyong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma
165b2(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba dang /smon po med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar ston te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa
165b3(khri brgyad): ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
165b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la
165b5(khri brgyad): mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag
165b6(khri brgyad): mad ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes
165b7(khri brgyad): bya bar chos ston te/da'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
166a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis
166a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /de bzhin du sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces
166a3(khri brgyad): bya bar chos ston/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces
166a4(khri brgyad): byo ba dang /mngon parje 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/de'ang mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis skyon cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa
166a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par nyon thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
166a6(khri brgyad): chen po'i dge ba'i bla shes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang drug de la dran pa nye bar
166a7(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
166b1(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
166b2(khri brgyad): dang /lam rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
166b3(khri brgyad): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su mi bso ba dang /de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /sangs rgyas
166b4(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang
166b5(khri brgyad): bang chub sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /dge ba'i rtse ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
166b6(khri brgyad): so 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen rnams te/de dag gis
166b7(khri brgyad): yongs su zin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang ba mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
167a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing /dge ba'i bshes gnyen
167a2(khri brgyad): gyis yongs su spangs nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
167a3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral
167a4(khri brgyad): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
167a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing
167a6(khri brgyad): dmigs te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu
167a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod po/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/gzugs phyi stong pa zhes
167b1(khri brgyad): bya bar yid la byed/gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //
167b2(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa nang spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byud/rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes
167b3(khri brgyad): bya ba ro yid la byed/rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing /nang stong pa nyid de 'ong dmigs/phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs
167b4(khri brgyad): phyi nang stong po nyid de'ang dmigs/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi blor de'ang dmigs to/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang /mig nang skyong
167b5(khri brgyad): po zhes bya bar yid la byed/mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i
167b6(khri brgyad): bar du yod la byed cing /stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dong /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yod nang
167b7(khri brgyad): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i
168a1(khri brgyad): bar du yid la byed cing /stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang /de bzhin du gzugs dang /sgra dang /
168a2(khri brgyad): dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams la'ang bya'o//de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes
168a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pA dang /rna ba dang /sgo dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /rna ba dang /
168a4(khri brgyad): sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho ra ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/phyi nang stong pa zhes bya
168a5(khri brgyad): bir yid la byed/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing /stong po nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom
168a6(khri brgyad): sems su byed pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/ma rig pa dang /rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/phyi nang stong
168a7(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing /stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/dmig so po'i tshul gyis
168b1(khri brgyad): de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/rnam pa thams cad
168b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom zhing /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/dmigs pa'i tshul
168b3(khri brgyad): gyis dri dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang byang
168b4(khri brgyad): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
168b5(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom zhing /de dag kyang dmigs te/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/
168b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di/
168b7(khri brgyad): zos na skrag ste/dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol po/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs
169a1(khri brgyad): de'i sug par mchis te/sdig pa'i grogs po des yongs su zin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste drangang zhing drabyungadra bar 'gyur
169a2(khri brgyad): ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po na gang 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin
169a3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o//'di dag ni snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo
169a4(khri brgyad): yin pas 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o//gzung bar mi bya'o//kun chub par mi bya'o//bcang bar mi bya'o//klag por mi bya'o//bsgom par mi bya'o//tshul bzhin du
169a5(khri brgyad): yid la mi bya'o//gzhan dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin po dang /brtson 'grus
169a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral por byed pa ste/rab 'byor du
169a7(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
169b1(khri brgyad): grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/'di skad du rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol
169b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
169b3(khri brgyad): pas khyod la ci zhig bya/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed de zhes
169b4(khri brgyad): de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing bdud kyi nyes po dag mi brjod pa gang yin pa ste/rab 'byor don byang chub sems dpo'i sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig
169b5(khri brgyad): par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'dri ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /byang chub
169b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /de lta bu byung ngo'i
169b7(khri brgyad): sde dang /skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /gling gi ni'i sde dang /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dge ston par byed/rab tu ston par byed/rnam par 'byed par byed/gsal bar byed/yang
170a1(khri brgyad): dag par rab tu ston par byed cing /bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/rab 'byor dri
170a2(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
170a3(khri brgyad): grogs po ni/bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni
170a4(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med do//khyod ni phyi ma ldog pa'ang ma yin no//khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
170a5(khri brgyad): 'ching rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi lus de lta bu de dag de la mi brjod mi ston pa grang yin pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
170a6(khri brgyad): chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig cani sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
170a7(khri brgyad): po'i drung du 'ongs nas/'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig no bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ni bdag dang bdag gis
170b1(khri brgyad): stong ngo //gzugs na bdag dang bdag gis sbyong ngo //sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag
170b2(khri brgyad): dang bdag gis stong ngo //rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes
170b3(khri brgyad): pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang
170b4(khri brgyad): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus
170b5(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
170b6(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha
170b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //dran pa
171a1(khri brgyad): nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang
171a2(khri brgyad): stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam dang /srungs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na/bla na med pa yang
171a3(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/rab
171a4(khri brgyad): 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing //
171a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shor phyogs ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems
171a6(khri brgyad): dpa' rnams dang /nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/byang chub sems dpa' yang med/nyan thos kyang med do//de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun
171a7(khri brgyad): kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/byang chub sems dpa
171b1(khri brgyad): yang meng /nyan thos kyang med do zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
171b2(khri brgyad): grogs por rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/rnam pa

178b2(khri brgyad): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
178b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nyi ma drang zla ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gzhi med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
178b4(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gza' dang /skor ma dang /nor bu rin po che
178b5(khri brgyad): dang /glog gi 'od la gzhi med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
178b6(khri brgyad): gzhi'i don med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /'thob bralI g+h+r-i lha rnams dang /dga'
178b7(khri brgyad): ldan gyi lha rnams dang /'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od
179a1(khri brgyad): la gzhi med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bur gyi 'od la gzhi med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/
179a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems
179a3(khri brgyad): dpa' gang yin po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan po'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa//
179a4(khri brgyad): bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
179a5(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o//rab 'byor gyis
179a6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mtshos pa nyid la ni ji ltar
179a7(khri brgyad): bslab par bgyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
179b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /lung bstan du yod pa dang /lung du ma bstan pa dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa
179b2(khri brgyad): dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /kha na me tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /thun mong dang //
179b3(khri brgyad): thun mong ma yin pa dag go//rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o///
179b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'ang dri dgra yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
179b5(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa//bam po dgu pa//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
179b6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phar 'dzin pa dang /mer 'dzin pa dang /dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /bram zer 'dzin pa dang /rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro
179b7(khri brgyad): byed pa dang /sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /tshul khrims las byung ba dang /bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /zhal
180a1(khri brgyad): ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam
180a2(khri brgyad): par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par zos
180a3(khri brgyad): pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /rus gong gi 'du shes dang /rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang /'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad
180a4(khri brgyad): med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran
180a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes su
180a6(khri brgyad): dran pa dang /lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang /skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gyis
180a7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba
180b1(khri brgyad): nisrog gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pa la log par g.yom pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma dang /ngag rtsub po dang /tshig bkyal pa dang //
180b2(khri brgyad): brnab sems dang /gnod sems dang /log pa rwa lta ba dang /khro ba drang /khon du 'dzin pa dang /'chab pa dang /'tshig pa dang /rnam par 'tshe ba dang /
180b3(khri brgyad): phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /nga rgyal te/rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams zhes pa'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lung du ma
180b4(khri brgyad): bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lus kyi lus ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//yid kyi las
180b5(khri brgyad): ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//ske mched drag na lung du ma bstan pa'o//gzugs med
180b6(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//phung po dang /khams dang /skye mtshad rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste//
180b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
181a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang /skye mchod bcu gnyis dang /khams bco brgyad dang /dge ba bcu'i las
181a2(khri brgyad): kyi lam rnams dang /bsam gton bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /'jig rten
181a3(khri brgyad): las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
181a4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar bzhug
181a5(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i
181a6(khri brgyad): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgro smon pa med pa dang /mi shes
181a7(khri brgyad): pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge
181b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rig pa dang /rnam par grol ba dang /dran pa dang /shes bzhin dang /
181b2(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad de/brgyud gang zhe na/gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o//nang gzugs
181b3(khri brgyad): med par 'du shes pos phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o//sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//de rnam pa
181b4(khri brgyad): thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed
181b5(khri brgyad): pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du na mo
181b6(khri brgyad): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
181b7(khri brgyad): par thar pa lnga pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci'ang med do snyam nas/ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs
182a1(khri brgyad): te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thur pa drug pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mchod las yang dag par 'das nas/'du shes med 'du shes
182a2(khri brgyad): med min skye mched nga sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das
182a3(khri brgyad): nas/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms/
182a4(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa dgu ste/dgu gang zhe na/'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa drang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben
182a5(khri brgyad): pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud
182a6(khri brgyad): gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang badre ba can bsom gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de dga'
182a7(khri brgyad): ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing /dran po dang shes bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de
182b1(khri brgyad): dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs to gnas pa dang /de bde ba 'dra spangs/snga nas sgrug
182b2(khri brgyad): bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa datung snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dge pa bsgom
182b3(khri brgyad): gnyen bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'dus te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing
182b4(khri brgyad): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/na mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams
182b5(khri brgyad): cing du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam na so rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas
182b6(khri brgyad): pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ci'ang med do snyam nas/ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas
182b7(khri brgyad): pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam
183a1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/de dag ni
183a2(khri brgyad): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o//nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /de bzhini gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
183a3(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams te/de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
183a4(khri brgyad): rnams zhes bya'o//de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phung po lnga dang /skye mched bcu gnyis dang /khams bco brgyad dang /bsam
183a5(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/de dag ni thog pa drang bcas pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//de la zag pa med
183a6(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /
183a7(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
183b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/'dod pa'i khams dang //
183b2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams dang /de ma yin pa gzhan gang drug 'dus byas su gtogs de'i tshes byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /sangs
183b3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o//de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/chos gang dag la
183b4(khri brgyad): skye ba dang /'jig pa dang /gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang ba dag ste/'dod chagos zad pa dang /zhe sdang zod pa dang /gti mug zod pa dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin
183b5(khri brgyad): snod dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/de dag
183b6(khri brgyad): ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o//de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
183b7(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga ste/de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams zhes bya'o//de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum/
184a1(khri brgyad): cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa'o sgo gsum dang /sangs rgyas
184a2(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
184a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang /dpyod pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa dang /
184a4(khri brgyad): yod pa ma yin par bslab par bya'o//chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du khong du chud par ba'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
184a5(khri brgyad): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184a6(khri brgyad): po zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /sems can gyi ris yol po che'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/de'i
184a7(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul
184b1(khri brgyad): bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/sems can gyi ris phal po che ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems
184b2(khri brgyad): can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom
184b3(khri brgyad): pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar
184b4(khri brgyad): dag go//rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /sems can gyi ris phal po che zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul byed par
184b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul
184b6(khri brgyad): du 'gyur bar bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la
184b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o//bdag
185a1(khri brgyad): gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o//bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o//bdag gis
185a2(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o//sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan lus 'das kyang /sems can gang
185a3(khri brgyad): yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/chos thams cad skye ba med po dang /'gag pa med pa bdag gis rtogaso par bya'o//bdag gis rnam pa thams cad
185a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o//bdag gis thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab
185a5(khri brgyad): par bya'o//chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa bdag gis rtogs por bya'o//bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab
185a6(khri brgyad): par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/de lha granas nos byang chub sems
185a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i'o tshul gyis byed
185b1(khri brgyad): do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i
185b2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems
185b3(khri brgyad): bskyed do//dro la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/bdag gis sems can de drug phung po'i lhag mo med pa'i mya ngan
185b4(khri brgyad): laso 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gi don du'ang bskul pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang por sems
185b5(khri brgyad): can dmyal ba'i sdugo bsngal de bdag gso nyams su myor bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
185b6(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myong bar bya'o//phyis
185b7(khri brgyad): gdod pa dag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsagos la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
186a1(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
186a2(khri brgyad): bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed
186a3(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po
186a4(khri brgyad): che rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/'dod chags
186a5(khri brgyad): kyi sems mi bskyed/zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi
186a6(khri brgyad): bskyed pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/des sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cing /
186a7(khri brgyad): des rlom sems su 'ong mi byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems su bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
186b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni 'dri yin te/gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub
186b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phon pa dang ba
186b3(khri brgyad): byar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang /bde bar bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/gang sems can thams cad
186b4(khri brgyad): skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde
186b5(khri brgyad): bor bya ba'i sems so//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin
186b6(khri brgyad): par byed par 'gyur te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o//
186b7(khri brgyad): chos la dga' bar bya'o//chos la kun tu dga' bar bya'o//chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o//de la chos gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad
187a1(khri brgyad): dbyer med pa ste/de ni chos zhes bya'o//de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/gang chos la 'dod cing mos pa ste/de ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o//de la chos la dga'
187a2(khri brgyad): ba gang zhe na/gang tshos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o//de la chos la kun tu dga' ba gang zhe na/gang chos la yon tan
187a3(khri brgyad): dang /phan yon du lta ba ste/de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba zhes bya'o//de la chos la kun tu dgo' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed/
187a4(khri brgyad): pa ste/de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
187a5(khri brgyad): spyod pas/sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /sems can gyi ros phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan
187a6(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/nang stong pa nyid la gnas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la
187a7(khri brgyad): gnaso nas/sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan
187b1(khri brgyad): yong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/stobs dang /mI 'jigs pa dang //
187b2(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nos/sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /sems can gyi ris phal po che'i
187b3(khri brgyad): phul du phyin par bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong
187b4(khri brgyad): pas/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas/nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rlom par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/sems can
187b5(khri brgyad): gyi tshogs chen po dang /sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
187b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /sems can gyi ris phol po che'i phul du phyin
187b7(khri brgyad): par byed par 'gyur te/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/khrel yod pa'i 'i/
188a1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o////de na sra bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
188a2(khri brgyad): 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu don
188a3(khri brgyad): gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis shig/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i
188a4(khri brgyad): slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang /srog tu lta ba dang /gang zag tu lta ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /shed
188a5(khri brgyad): las skyes dang /shed bu dang /byed pa po dang /byed du 'jug pa po dang /slong ba po dang /kun nas slong ba po dang /tshor ba po dang /tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang /
188a6(khri brgyad): shes po po dang /mthong ba por lta ba dang /chad por lta ba dang /rtag par lta ba dang /yod par lta ba dang /med par lta ba dang /phung por lta ba dang /khams su lta
188a7(khri brgyad): ba dang /skye mched du lta ba dang /bden par lta ba dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang /pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su
188b1(khri brgyad): lta ba dang /stobs dang mi 'jigs par lta ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar lta ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
188b2(khri brgyad): su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang /byang chub tu lta ba dang /sangs rgyas su lta ba dang /chos su lta ba dang /dge 'dun du lci ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba dang /
188b3(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad du/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
188b4(khri brgyad): chen po zhes bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa'
188b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yon/sangs rgyas kyi
188b6(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
188b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
189a1(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs//
189a2(khri brgyad): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/sangs
189a3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas
189a4(khri brgyad): pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
189a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das dron gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod
189a6(khri brgyad): spongs par gyis shig/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams
189a7(khri brgyad): cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas/don des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
189b1(khri brgyad): bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/thams cad mkhyen
189b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
189b3(khri brgyad): chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
189b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyin thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/rab 'byor gyis
189b5(khri brgyad): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang la'ang skye ba 'am 'grag par yang dag par rjes
189b6(khri brgyad): su mi mthong /'grib pa dang /'phel ba dang /'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/tshe dang ldan
189b7(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /'grib pa med pa dang /'phel ba med pa dang /'ong ba med pa dang /'gro ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs
190a1(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/yang dag
190a2(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/nyan thos
190a3(khri brgyad): drang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
190a4(khri brgyad): kyi sems zug pa med pa/khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems dela'ang chags pa med ces smras nu/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags
190a5(khri brgyad): pa med pa yin nam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med pa yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan
190a6(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/gzugs kyang chags pa mod de//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do//
190a7(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar
190b1(khri brgyad): du'ang chags pa med do//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems grang yin pa de'ang zag pa med cing /khongs su
190b2(khri brgyad): gtogs pa ma yin no zhes smras na/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/zag pa med cing khongs su
190b3(khri brgyad): gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir//
190b4(khri brgyad): zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab
190b5(khri brgyad): 'byor gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zug pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
190b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'ang rarlung bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khrongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
190b7(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so
191a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/zag pa med cing khongs
191a2(khri brgyad): su gotogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang
191a3(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang /sangs rgyas
191a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong po nyid kyi phyir/zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no//gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa
191a5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma
191a6(khri brgyad): yin no//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag por rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
191a7(khri brgyad): 'dres pa btso brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
191b1(khri brgyad): khyod kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir/sems de la'ang chags pa med ces smras na/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med dam/
191b2(khri brgyad): tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med dam/'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa med dme/'du byed rnams med pa'ang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/
191b3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la tshugs pa med dam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin na//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshwa dang
191b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa'ang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam/sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa'i bar dag med
191b5(khri brgyad): pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa bzhin te/gzugs
191b6(khri brgyad): med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do//
191b7(khri brgyad): khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /
192a1(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do//
192a2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan
192a3(khri brgyad): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems nges kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/mngon
192a4(khri brgyad): par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/lta ba spang ba'i
192a5(khri brgyad): le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
192a6(khri brgyad): 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang stobs legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po khyod spobs
192a7(khri brgyad): par gyis shig/gang pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags/sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
192b1(khri brgyad): lags/sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o//de nas tshe
192b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192b3(khri brgyad): go cha chen po dgos pa zhes bya/gleng pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i blo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du/byang
192b4(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
192b5(khri brgyad): sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi
192b6(khri brgyad): tsho du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo //nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi tshad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/bzod pa bsgom
192b7(khri brgyad): pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa bsgom par byed do//nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi cheng du brtson 'grus
193a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/brtson 'grus rlom pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi cheng du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing durtson 'grus/
193a2(khri brgyad): rtsom mo//nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/bsam gtan bsgom pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi ched du
193a3(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams bskyed do//nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/shes
193a4(khri brgyad): rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab bsgom par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems
193a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o//sems can 'di snyed cig
193a6(khri brgyad): ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o//sems can 'di skad cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o/
193a7(khri brgyad): zhes sems tson yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi tshang du go cha gyen no//de 'di snyam du
193b1(khri brgyad): sems te/bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin du bdag/
193b2(khri brgyad): gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gau tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab
193b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o snyam mo//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
193b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams
193b5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par
193b6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bo de ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha
193b7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin po'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/rnam pa thams cad
194a1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /nyan thos dang rlung sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/byang chub sems
194a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sbyin po sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
194a3(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa smyon pa rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang /
194a4(khri brgyad): mos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//
194a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu grozha na yung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba dag gis brtson//
194a6(khri brgyad): 'grus ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
194a7(khri brgyad): pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu ga zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
194b1(khri brgyad): yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed do/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
194b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
194b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing /dri gci gro pu la dmagras pa'i phyir/chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing /de sbyin pa po'ang mi
194b4(khri brgyad): dmigs/sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs len pa po'ang mi dramigs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes
194b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grang gi tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
194b6(khri brgyad): ba dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
194b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la de ltar spyod po go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhi na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol
195a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing de'adra sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
195a2(khri brgyad): byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin
195a3(khri brgyad): po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang /ring
195a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang 'dod pa med na so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
195a5(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
195a6(khri brgyad): po/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o
195a7(khri brgyad): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
195b1(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus mi nyams mi 'grong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub
195b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
195b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang /rang
195b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing /sems bskyed pa de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
195b5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang
195b6(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po lnga spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
195b7(khri brgyad): bya ba dag gise chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims des rlom sems su'ang mi byed la mi
196a1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa de ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi phyi
196a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
196a3(khri brgyad): thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/de'i phyir go tsho chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
196a4(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
196a5(khri brgyad): bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
196a6(khri brgyad): dI sngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
196a7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang /desam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no//tshe dang ljon pa shI ro'i
196b1(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin
196b2(khri brgyad): gyi/shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /sems can thams
196b3(khri brgyad): cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/dge ba'i rtse ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs bu'i byang chub tu yongs
196b4(khri brgyad): su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
196b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/rnam
196b6(khri brgyad): pabya thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par
196b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brtson
197a1(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de
197a2(khri brgyad): bzhin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
197a3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing /dge
197a4(khri brgyad): ba'i rtse ba de'ang semaso can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na mod pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
197a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems da' sems dpa'
197a6(khri brgyad): chen po dusam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po la gnas te/nyan thos dang /rang sang so rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba dge gas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
197a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad deng thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
197b1(khri brgyad): tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
197b2(khri brgyad): la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhon yang
197b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing /chos thams cad la snyoms byas
197b4(khri brgyad): po'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste/de'ang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid
197b5(khri brgyad): la bya ba dag gis byed cing /dge ba'i rgyu ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/byang
197b6(khri brgyad): chu bo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam+b+ha gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yung byang chub
197b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo gnas te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/rnam pa
198a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams
198a2(khri brgyad): cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
198a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
198a4(khri brgyad): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
198a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing /de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang chos thams cad la sgyu ma
198a6(khri brgyad): dang /rmi las dang /mig yor dang /brag che dang /gzugs brnyan dang /sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnos pa yin te/de nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
198a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems
198b1(khri brgyad): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
198b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/
198b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams
198b4(khri brgyad): la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing /de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/tshad med pa dang /
198b5(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug la ro myong bar yang mi byed cing /de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/de dag gi dbong gis kyang mi skye ste/
198b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thobs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan
198b7(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug po dag la dben par
199a1(khri brgyad): mthong nas gnas/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang /yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed do//
199a2(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na
199a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos
199a4(khri brgyad): po la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams go gre mo zhig ces bya ba zhig na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
199a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched du brjod pa ched du
199a6(khri brgyad): brjod cing bstsags pa'ang gsung la ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing /byang chub sems dpo 'di'i sgra brjod pa'ang mdzad la/dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa'ang mdzad do//shA ri'i
199a7(khri brgyad): bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/byang chub sems
199b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/gang pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
199b2(khri brgyad): la spyod cing /de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa/sdig pa me dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod po dang bcas
