199b3(khri brgyad): pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' bo dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang /de bzhin du bas ma gtan gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /
199b4(khri brgyad): bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang /byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs po/rgya chen por gyur pa/tshad med pa/mi gnyis pa/kho na med pa/'gran zla med pa
199b5(khri brgyad): gnod pa med pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa
199b6(khri brgyad): dang /de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang /dga' ba dang ldan po dang /bting snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/tshad mod pa/mi gnyis pa/kho na
199b7(khri brgyad): med pa/'gran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa/shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
200a1(khri brgyad): khyab par byas te gnas pa dang /de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /ci'ang med pa'i skye mched
200a2(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te/gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang
200a3(khri brgyad): tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang
200a4(khri brgyad): gi tshe/nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /rtags dang /mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang /tshad med pa de dag dang /gzugs med po de dag la snyoms
200a5(khri brgyad): par 'jug cing lhung ba na/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
200a6(khri brgyad): su bsngo bar byed do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi
200a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyor bar bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
200b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/gang gi tshe byang
200b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang /tshad med pa de dag dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing /de bsam gtan dang /tshad
200b3(khri brgyad): med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na/nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /rtags dang /mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/
200b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can
200b5(khri brgyad): thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'
200b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg po chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa
200b7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/rgya chen por gyur pa/tshad med pa/mi gnyis pa/kho na med
201a1(khri brgyad): pa/'gran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa/shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs
201a2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te granas shing /phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang /snying rje dang ldan pa dang /dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang de
201a3(khri brgyad): bzhin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/rgya chen por gyur pa/tshad med
201a4(khri brgyad): pa mi gnyis pa/khon med pa/'gran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa/shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas
201a5(khri brgyad): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re khyab par byas nas gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//yang byang chub sems
201a6(khri brgyad): dnga' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid drang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i
201a7(khri brgyad): phyir bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la'ang brjod cing ston te rab tu 'tshad la/rnam par 'byed
201b1(khri brgyad): de gsal bar byed cing /de dag gau ro myang ba dang /nyes dmigs dang /nges par 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i
201b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag glanon cing bsgom
201b3(khri brgyad): ste/bsom gtan dang po dang /bsam gton bzhi pa'i bar de la'ang gnaso la 'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi sems sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
201b4(khri brgyad): pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems/
201b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya
201b6(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam nas yod la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang /bzod pa dang /yongs su rtog pa dang /khong du chud par byed pa dang /nye bar nges par sems pa
201b7(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202a1(khri brgyad): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rna ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mod du byas nas
202a2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing /brtsonu 'grus kyang mo gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
202a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar
202a4(khri brgyad): pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cong ldang yang nyan thos kyis 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi slar yang mi ltung zhing dge
202a5(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba de'ang /sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'
202a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
202a7(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang po'o yan lag rnams dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa'i yan lago rnams la mi rtag
202b1(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong pa'i rnam pa dang /mtshan mA med pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i/
202b2(khri brgyad): rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
202b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag por zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan
202b4(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang /rnam
202b5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang /rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang //
202b6(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202b7(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
203a1(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin
203a2(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug cing /bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo zhes mngon por gzhol bar byed pA dang /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
203a3(khri brgyad): 'jug cing /sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang /dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga'adri snyoms par 'jug cing /bdag
203a4(khri brgyad): nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol bu dang /btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par
203a5(khri brgyad): 'jug cing /sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams
203a6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang /
203a7(khri brgyad): rtags dang /mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi
203b1(khri brgyad): sar yongs su mi bsngo ba da ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nAg nog med pa'o//byang chub
203b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug po de dag gis ma 'dres par gnos shing
203b3(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/sa gnyis po de dag tu 'dod par mi byed kyi/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing /'dod pa de ni/byang
203b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam
203b5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang /dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi
203b6(khri brgyad): gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
203b7(khri brgyad): chen po gang gi tshe/bsam gtan de dag dang /tshad med pa de dag dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug po de dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste/bsam
204a1(khri brgyad): gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la/de dag gi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing /de dag gis
204a2(khri brgyad): kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsamo gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//byang chub sems
204a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang /tshod med pa dang /gzugs med
204a4(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed la/de'ang mo rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i
204a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med
204a6(khri brgyad): pa dradang /rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa
204a7(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
204b1(khri brgyad): dag par zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
204b2(khri brgyad): shes pa gang yin pa dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems
204b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang
204b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par
204b5(khri brgyad): bzhag par shes pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
204b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
204b7(khri brgyad): ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/mi rtag ces bya ba dang /bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang /bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba
205a1(khri brgyad): dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mi stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces
205a2(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug ste/tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub
205a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//
205a4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes
205a5(khri brgyad): pa mi 'jug/da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa'ang mi 'jug la/de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i
205a6(khri brgyad): tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag
205a7(khri brgyad): par zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug/
205b1(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/dri 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang
205b2(khri brgyad): ma yin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems
205b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
205b4(khri brgyad): chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /zag pa med pa rnams dang /'dus
205b5(khri brgyad): byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la'ang shes pa mi 'jug la/de 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes pa'ang ma yin/zug pa drang
205b6(khri brgyad): bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu da'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
205b7(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no///
206a1(khri brgyad): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems
206a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya/gang pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
206a3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/byang chub
206a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' yang mi dmigaso/len pa po'ang mi dmigs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmogos pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
206a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
206a6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa'ang de bzhin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
206a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/byang chub sems dpa'
206b1(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs/yid la byed pa'ang mi dmigs te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes ra rgya/
206b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
206b3(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par ga zhig pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid bsgom ste/ngo'ong mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
206b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
206b5(khri brgyad): sgom mo//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shI rI'i bu
206b6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir
206b7(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres
207a1(khri brgyad): pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom ste/de'ang mi dmigs
207a2(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
207a3(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo//
207a4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
207a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dri ni tha skad de tsam du zad par
207a6(khri brgyad): shes so//gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba de'ang ming tsam du zad do//rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
207a7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do//mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'di lta ste
207b1(khri brgyad): mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do//yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'di lta ste/yid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam du zad do//khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams
207b2(khri brgyad): dang /rtun cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs
207b3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin no//nong stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/dngos po
207b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ni ming tsam du zad do//sangs rgyas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir
207b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba de ni mang tsam du zad do//yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/'di lta ste/de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings
207b6(khri brgyad): dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do//sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/byang chub dang /sangs rgyas
207b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de ni mo de tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas
208a1(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sems dang
208a2(khri brgyad): po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi snying po le 'dug gi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o//sangs
208a3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gang la gang 'os pa'i mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du byed do//bla mar byed
208a4(khri brgyad): ngongo//ri mor byed do//mchod pa byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 'di lta ste/theg pa chen po 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to//de theg pa chen po de la zhon te/sangs
208a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing nos sangs rgyas kyi zhozhing du 'gro zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/de la sangs rgyas
208a6(khri brgyad): kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo //de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te/lus ci lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed
208a7(khri brgyad): nus pa de lta bu'i lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to//de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par gyur gyi bar du nam yang theg pa de dang bral bar
208b1(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro//des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin
208b2(khri brgyad): dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro//
208b3(khri brgyad): de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i
208b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byoms ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
208b5(khri brgyad): chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po la zhon nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes
208b6(khri brgyad): sman pa sgrogs shod dbyangs brjod pa mdzad do//de bzhin du lho dang /nub drung /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng
208b7(khri brgyad): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/'jig rten gyi khams
209a1(khri brgyad): gA ge mAM zhes bya ba zhi ban byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen//
209a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
209a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi le'u zhes bya ste/
209a4(khri brgyad): bcu gsum pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong bya//bam po bcu pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
209a5(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos/go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/byang chub sems
209a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgros zhes bgyi ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
209a7(khri brgyad): chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
209b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glo chang dgos/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha
209b2(khri brgyad): phyogos/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam gyi go cha dgos/nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos
209b3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/stobs kyi go cha brags/mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgrogos/sangs rgyas
209b4(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
209b5(khri brgyad): gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed cing g.yo bar yang byed de/sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/sems can dumyal ba pa'i
209b6(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing /byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces
209b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal li zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyangs sgrog go/de nas sems can dmyal ba
210a1(khri brgyad): pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/bde ba dang /yid bde ba thob ste/bde ba dang /yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal pad+mo dag nas byung /
210a2(khri brgyad): nas/gung dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te mthong zhing mnyes par byar yod pa dang /lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jog rten gyi khams ngo
210a3(khri brgyad): dang der skye'o//de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas sems can rnams byung nas/gang deng gang ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
210a4(khri brgyad): bzhugs pa de dang der skye'o//de bzhin du shar dang /lho dang /nub dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi
210a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams gaung+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed cing /rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar yang byed nga /sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams
210a6(khri brgyad): su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems tshon rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/sems con de dag la sdug bsngal rnams
210a7(khri brgyad): zhi bar rig par byed cing /byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo
210b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyangs sgrog go/de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang /yid bde ba thob ste/bde ba dang /yid bde ba
210b2(khri brgyad): de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/gang dang gong na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/mthong zhing /bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang /lha dang
210b3(khri brgyad): mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o//mir skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mnyes par byed do//de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas
210b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang /ga shin rje'i 'jig rten rnams nas sems can de dag shi 'phos te/gang dang gang ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
210b5(khri brgyad): de dang der skye'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu
210b6(khri brgyad): ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sems can dmyal ba dag dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i
210b7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten mngon par sprul la/des mngon par sprul nas/sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra bsgrags te/de nas sprul pa de dag
211a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba de dag dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten
211a2(khri brgyad): nas byung bar gyur na/rab 'byor 'dri ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slong ma des sems can 'ga' yang sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /dud
211a3(khri brgyad): 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag nas phyung ba yod snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
211a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsol pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can rnams
211a5(khri brgyad): ngan 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su bkrol yang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su bkrol bar gyur pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye
211a6(khri brgyad): bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab
211a7(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/go cha chen po bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
211b1(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas/'khor los sgyur/
211b2(khri brgyad): ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul pa byed do//des 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed do//de bzhin du btung
211b3(khri brgyad): ba dang /gos dang /bzhon pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /yo byad dang /gnas dang /mul cha dang
211b4(khri brgyad): bgo ba dang /'tsho ba'i yo byad dang /rtsi sman dang /gser dang /dngul dang /nor bu dang /rin po che dang /byu ru dang /dung dang /man shel dang /mu tig dang /
211b5(khri brgyad): rgyan drag dang /yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed do//des zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas sems can de dag
211b6(khri brgyad): la 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to//sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag
211b7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na//
212a1(khri brgyad): sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob mu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po chu'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon
212a2(khri brgyad): par sprul te/zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing /mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/rab 'byor 'dri ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma mkhan nama?/sgyu ma
212a3(khri brgyad): mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa yod snyom mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
212a4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin
212a5(khri brgyad): zhing /mi'i yo byad grang yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang /sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos
212a6(khri brgyad): rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go tsho chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang
212a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/bsems bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing 'khor los sgyur ba'i
212b1(khri brgyad): rigs su skye ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam+bu la 'god par byed/bsam gtan bzhi dang
212b2(khri brgyad): tshad med po bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god par byed/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag la 'god par
212b3(khri brgyad): byed/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed cing /sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon/
212b4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chos bstan pa de dang 'brel por mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma mkhan nama?/sgyu ma mkhan
212b5(khri brgyad): gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs tshon po zhig mngon par sprul nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
212b6(khri brgyad): la bkod cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi
212b7(khri brgyad): slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa yod
213a1(khri brgyad): snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/rab 'byor de
213a2(khri brgyad): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos
213a3(khri brgyad): ma 'dres po bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang /sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
213a4(khri brgyad): bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/rab
213a5(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
213a6(khri brgyad): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'grod par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar na
213a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god
213b1(khri brgyad): ts+tshin/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos te/gral te sems can thams cad
213b2(khri brgyad): kyis byadag lnga dbyig po dang /bong ba dang /khu tshu r+ya dang /lag cha dang /mtshon gyi so 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' yang bskyed par
213b3(khri brgyad): mi bya'o snyam zhing /semasu can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bu la 'grod do//rang 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slo bo ma
213b4(khri brgyad): mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshigs tshon po zhig mngon par sprul nas/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar
213b5(khri brgyad): zhing bkod na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sem so/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkrod
213b6(khri brgyad): pa yod snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin
213b7(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang bzod
214a1(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i
214a2(khri brgyad): phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byer gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
214a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing
214a4(khri brgyad): 'dzud de 'god par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
214a5(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du 'jug cod 'dzud de 'god ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo gnas shing /
214a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba dag gos sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud
214a7(khri brgyad): de 'god par byed do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gos lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye ba phal po
214b1(khri brgyad): che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de bkod na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam
214b2(khri brgyad): du sems/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang lus dang /sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod
214b3(khri brgyad): pa yod snyam mim/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
214b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad lus dang /sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang /sems
214b5(khri brgyad): can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na//
214b6(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'dri yin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos po zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan
214b7(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas mo gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po yang dag
215a1(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'grod par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/
215a2(khri brgyad): te/sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de/'god ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
215a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing /chos gang la'ang rnam par g.yeng ba'am/rnam par g.yeng ba med pa r-i yang dag par rjes su mi
215a4(khri brgyad): mthong ngo //rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/des de bzhin du sems can
215a5(khri brgyad): thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jud de 'god par byed do//yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag kyang bla na med
215a6(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bsam gautan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rab
215a7(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/skyo ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye ba'i tshogs chen
215b1(khri brgyad): zhog mngon par sprul nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang drug par 'dzin du bcug cing brjod de bklad na/rab 'byor 'di dzi snyam+b+ha du som+b+has/sgyu ma mkhan nam/
215b2(khri brgyad): sgyum mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pos ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam mam/rab 'byor
215b3(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
215b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam+ba gratAn gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang drug par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud do bkod kyang semos can 'ga' yang bsam gtan
215b5(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor
215b6(khri brgyad): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bogos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po roshes
215b7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do//
216a1(khri brgyad): 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha
216a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
216a3(khri brgyad): la spyod pas/chos gang la'ang skye ba 'am/'gag pa'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba 'am/tshu rol lam/pha rol mi dmigs so//
216a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang //
216a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob
216a6(khri brgyad): ma mkhas pa zhig gis lum po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
216a7(khri brgyad): dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'go' yang
216b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
216b2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /soms can+da
216b3(khri brgyad): 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i
216b4(khri brgyad): phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
216b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po go tsho chen po bgros pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
216b6(khri brgyad): pa bzhin du/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de
216b7(khri brgyad): 'god par byed do//de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
217a1(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can du drug kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar
217a2(khri brgyad): dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed la/'di lto ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to//sems can de dag
217a3(khri brgyad): kyang chos de thos nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs por sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar
217a4(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar drang /shar lho drang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer
217a5(khri brgyad): yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dog tu slong zhing /de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na
217a6(khri brgyad): sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do//de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul
217a7(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha
217b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god la 'di lta ste/pha rol
217b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to//sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
217b3(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/sgyu mi mkhan+da na mo/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma
217b4(khri brgyad): mkhas pa zhog gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin
217b5(khri brgyad): du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang
217b6(khri brgyad): dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
217b7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs dang /phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
218a1(khri brgyad): snyed po de dag gi sems can de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do//
218a2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
218a3(khri brgyad): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgros pa ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
218a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gro nas shing /sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed de/bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
218a5(khri brgyad): pa la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
218a6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par
218a7(khri brgyad): mi bya'o//sems can 'di snyed cig ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//sems can 'di snyed cig ni
218b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//sems can 'di skad cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
218b2(khri brgyad): dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//sems can 'di snyed cig ni lhan cig phyir 'ong bo'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa
218b3(khri brgyad): nyid la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod porwa mi bya'o//sems can 'di skad cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//sems
218b4(khri brgyad): can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi gzhan du na de 'di snyamo du sems te//
218b5(khri brgyad): bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o//de
218b6(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi drang /so so yang dag pa ri rog pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o///
218b7(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la
219a1(khri brgyad): dgod par bya'o//bdag gis sems can chad med grangs med ba dag rnam pa tham+b+has nAd mkhyen pa nyid kyi byar drug la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems so//rab 'byor/
219a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/dper na/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi sleb ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshigs chen po zhig mngon par
219a3(khri brgyad): sprul nas/'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o//
219a4(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o//dgra
219a5(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub kyi bar la dgod par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems//
219a6(khri brgyad): sgra ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slong ma nges sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa yod
219a7(khri brgyad): snyim mam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
219b1(khri brgyad): sems dang 'chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bar la dgod par
219b2(khri brgyad): sems bskyed kyang sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang sems bskyed pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu mo'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir
219b3(khri brgyad): te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
219b4(khri brgyad): kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshol ba ltar na/chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
219b5(khri brgyad): go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi ba lags pa snyam bgyid do//de ni'i slad du zhe ni/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /tshor ba dang /'du
219b6(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /mig ni mgro gis stong /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ni yod kyis stong /gzugs
219b7(khri brgyad): ni gzugs kyis stong /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos ni chos kyis stong /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce
220a1(khri brgyad): dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yod kyi rnam par shes pas sbyong /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong /rna ba dang /sna
220a2(khri brgyad): dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas sbyong /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshi
220a3(khri brgyad): bAbyas stong /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas skyong /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
220a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyis stong /nang stong pa nyid ni ning stong pa nyid kyis stong
220a5(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sbyong /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis
220a6(khri brgyad): stong /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyis stong la/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byung
220a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpas stong /go cha chen po'ang go cha chen pos stong pa'i slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go
220b1(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig pa nga 'o//du skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di nad ces pa//'astsal to//rab 'byor de bzhin no//deng /
220b2(khri brgyad): bzhin te/ji skad smras pa bzhin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas/ma bshig/mngon par 'dus ma byas la/byang chub sems dpa'
220b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha che nu po bgos po'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/me ba shig/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
220b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/mA bshig/mngon par 'dus ma bgyis shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi
220b5(khri brgyad): don du go rgya chen po 'tshal ba'i sems can de dag kyang ma bgyis/mtho shig/mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byed
220b6(khri brgyad): pa po mi dmigs pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/ma ba shig/mngon par 'dus ma byas shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go
220b7(khri brgyad): cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang mo byas/me bo shig/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin no//de ci'i phyir na na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni mi byed/mi 'jig
221a1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du mi byed/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed/mig ni mi byed/mi 'jig/
221a2(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du mi byed/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed/gzugs ni mi byed/mau 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed/
221a3(khri brgyad): sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'ang mi byed/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi
221a4(khri brgyad): byed/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/mi 'dzeg/mngon par 'du mi byed/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mi byed/mi 'jig/
221a5(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du mi byed/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te rig pa ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed/mig gi 'dus te rog pa'i rkyen gyis
221a6(khri brgyad): tshor ba ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par
221a7(khri brgyad): 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor bdag ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed/sems can dang /srog dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar ni mi byed/mi
221b1(khri brgyad): 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor rmi lam ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed do//
221b2(khri brgyad): sgyu mA dang /brag cha dang /mr-ig yor dang /gzugs brnyan+da dang /smig rgyu dang /sprul pa ni mi byed/mI 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dog gtan
221b3(khri brgyad): myemyod cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/mI 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de gtan med cing myi dmigs pa'i phyir
221b4(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs po'i
221b5(khri brgyad): phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i
221b6(khri brgyad): phyir ro//stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag por rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po bco brgyad kyi bar dag ni mi byed mi 'jig/mngon par
221b7(khri brgyad): 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du ma byed do//de ci'i phyir ne
222a1(khri brgyad): na/'di ltar de gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos
222a2(khri brgyad): kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de gtan
222a3(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub ni mi byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed do//thams cad shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi
222a4(khri brgyad): byed/mi 'jig/mngon par 'du mi byed do//dri ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/khyod kyis rnam pa
222a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas/ma bshig/mngon par 'dus ma byas la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha tshon po bgos pa'i
222a6(khri brgyad): sems can de dog kyang ma byas/mi ba shig/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
222a7(khri brgyad): bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni
222b1(khri brgyad): ma bcings ma grol ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so//byams ma'i bu gang
222b2(khri brgyad): pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs na mi bcings ma grol ba zhes sla 'am/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
222b3(khri brgyad): shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba zhes smra 'am/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin te/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma
222b4(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//gang pos smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma
222b5(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba gang yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
222b6(khri brgyad): gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par shes
222b7(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du brag cha lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /sprul pa lta
223a1(khri brgyad): bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma
223a2(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
223a3(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa glang po de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa glang po ma 'ongs pa'i tsher
223a4(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dra ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol
223a5(khri brgyad): ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
223a6(khri brgyad): tshedang ldan pa gang po gzugs nyid med pa'i phyir/gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshorare ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams med pa dang /rnam par shes pa nyid ming
223a7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /zhi ba
223b1(khri brgyad): dang /stong pa dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dge ba dang /
223b2(khri brgyad): mi dge ba dang /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa dang /kho na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kho na ma tho ba med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /
223b3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs nyid med pa'i phyir gzugs de
223b4(khri brgyad): ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dge ba'am mi dge ba nas rnam par byang ba'i bar yang
223b5(khri brgyad): ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings
223b6(khri brgyad): ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin
223b7(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma btsangs ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
224a1(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa la sogs
224a2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po rlung stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'ang ma
224a3(khri brgyad): bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
224a4(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/med pa'i phyi ma bcings ma grol
224a5(khri brgyad): ba'o//dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcing snga ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyang ma bcings ma grol ba/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyang ma bci dris
224a6(khri brgyad): ma grol ba/byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/med pa'i phyir mo bcings ma grol ba'o//dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//skye ba med pa'i
224a7(khri brgyad): phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de
224b1(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/med pa dang dben
224b2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dong ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ma bcings ma grol
224b3(khri brgyad): ba'o//de ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar dgo kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//sems can gang dag yongs su
224b4(khri brgyad): mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag dag par bya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//bsnyen bkur bya bar
224b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//thos par 'gyur ba'i chos kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam
224b6(khri brgyad): yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//mngon par shes pa rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /mig lnga dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
224b7(khri brgyad): bral bar mi 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed par 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par
225a1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//theg pa gsum po dag gis sems can rnams
225a2(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa dang /dben pa dang /skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
225a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis chos thams cad mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong
225a4(khri brgyad): pa las ma bcings ma grol ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'od skad ces gsol to//
225a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
225a6(khri brgyad): reg pa chen po la yong dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi/theg pa de ni gang la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/theg pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags/theg pa des ni
225a7(khri brgyad): su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor
225b1(khri brgyad): khyod gang 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems
225b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
225b3(khri brgyad): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di
225b4(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis 'di lta ste/phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams sbyin pa sbyin par
225b5(khri brgyad): byed cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar
225b6(khri brgyad): byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
225b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
226a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing
226a2(khri brgyad): gnas la sems can gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
226a3(khri brgyad): chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha
226a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
226a5(khri brgyad): sems bskyed pa dag gis/bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la/gzhan dag kyang bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
226a6(khri brgyad): gyis byed po de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
226a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
226b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la brtson pa mi 'dor zhing /gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin
226b2(khri brgyad): pa lnga yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
226b3(khri brgyad): yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
226b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis thabs la mkhas pas bdag kyang bsam gtan
226b5(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug cing /de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye la/gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa
226b6(khri brgyad): de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
226b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
227a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la mngon par zhon pa meng pa dang /chos thams cad kyir/
227a2(khri brgyad): bzhin la so sor rtog par byed cing /gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog pa yang dag par 'dzin du
227a3(khri brgyad): 'jug pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
227a4(khri brgyad): bo yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bcu gcig pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
227a5(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni dadi lta ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong po nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa
227a6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa
227a7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa
227b1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin no//de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/nang gi chos rnams te/mig drung /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /
227b2(khri brgyad): lus dang /yid de/de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/mig ni mig gis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//ther zug
227b3(khri brgyad): tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/rna ba rna bas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa mi
227b4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/sna ni snas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/lce ni lces stong ngo //de ci'i
227b5(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/de'i ring bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/lus ni lus kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i
227b6(khri brgyad): phyir ro//zer zug tu granas pa med pa dang /'jog pa med pa'i phyir/yid ni yid kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni nang stong pa nyid ces
227b7(khri brgyad): bya'o//de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/phyi rol gyi chos rnams te/'di lta ste/gzugs dang /sgra dang /dr-i dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams so//ther zug tu gnas pa
228a1(khri brgyad): med pa dang /'jog pa med pa'i phyir/gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med
228a2(khri brgyad): pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /rig bya dang /chos ni chos kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o//
228a3(khri brgyad): de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/nang gi skye mched drug dang /phyi'i skye mched drug po de dag ni phyi dang nang gi chos rnams zhes bya'o//de la nang gi chos rnams phyi'i chos rnams kyis
228a4(khri brgyad): stong pa gang zhe na/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/nang gi mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lho dang /lus dang /yid rnams ni phyi'i gzugs dang /sgra
228a5(khri brgyad): dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/
228a6(khri brgyad): phyi rol gyi chos gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams ni nang gi chos mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang yid rnams kyis stong ngo //
228a7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med
228b1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des stong pa nyid stong pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la
228b2(khri brgyad): chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/shar phyogs ni/shar phyogs kyis stong /lho phyogs ni lho phyogs kyis stong /nub phyogs ni nub
228b3(khri brgyad): phyogs kyis stong /byang phyogs ni byang phyogs kyis stong /'og gi phyogs ni 'og gi phyogs kyis stong /steng gi phyogs ni steng gi phyogs kyis stong /de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams ni
228b4(khri brgyad): phyogs mtshams rnams kyis stong pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/don dam pa zhes bya
228b5(khri brgyad): ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/mya ngan las 'das pa de'ang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin
228b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir te/de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i
228b7(khri brgyad): khams te/de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong /gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs kyi khams kyis stong /gzugs
229a1(khri brgyad): med pa'i khams ni gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la 'dus ma byas stong
229a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid gang zhe na/de la 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa dang /gnas pa med pa dang /gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa de ni 'dus ma byas
229a3(khri brgyad): paste/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/'dus ma byas de'ang 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/da ni 'dus ma byas stong
229a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid ces bya'o//de la mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid gong zhe na/gang lo mtha' mi dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir//
229a5(khri brgyad): mtha' ni mthos sbyong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/gang la
229a6(khri brgyad): thog ma dang tha ma mi dmigs pa de la dbus med cing /gang la thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus med pa de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa skye/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/
229a7(khri brgyad): thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma rnams ni/thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma rnams kyis stong ste/de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/chos
229b1(khri brgyad): gang la'ang dor du med pa ste/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/dor ba med pa ni dor ba med pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni dor
229b2(khri brgyad): ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang zhe na/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/rang sangs sa
229b3(khri brgyad): rnams kyis ma byas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas/de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma mdzad pa ste/ther zug tu gnas pa
229b4(khri brgyad): med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la chos
229b5(khri brgyad): thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/chos thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce
229b6(khri brgyad): dang /lus dang /yid dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams dang /mig gau rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes
229b7(khri brgyad): pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi
230a1(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yod kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /gzugs
230a2(khri brgyad): can gyi chos rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i chos rnams dang /'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/de la ther zug tu gnas pa
230a3(khri brgyad): med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o///
230a4(khri brgyad): de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba/tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni myong ba/'du shes kyi mtshan nyid ni 'dzin par byed pa/'du byed
230a5(khri brgyad): rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa/rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par shes par byed pa ste/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/'dus byas
