247b1(khri brgyad): g+hata ma dang /lhung ba dang /gcin dang /phyi sa dang /mchi ma dang /rdul dang /tshil dang /snabs dang /ngar snabs dang /rnag dang /mkhris pa dang /bad kan dang /zhag dang /chu ser dang /
247b2(khri brgyad): dri ma dang /mgo bo dang /klad pa dang /mig rngu dang /rna spabs dag yod do snyam du rtog go/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
247b3(khri brgyad): spyod pa/rtun pa shes bzhin can/dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/de'ang
247b4(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/dur khrod na gnas pa na/dur khrod du bor ba'i gzugs sna tshogs
247b5(khri brgyad): shi des zhag gcig lon pa'am/sha nis zhag gnyis lon pa'am/shi nas zhag gsum lon pa 'am/shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa 'am/shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am/rnam par bam
247b6(khri brgyad): pa'am/rnam par sngos pa 'am/rnam par rul ba 'am/rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dag mthong ba na/de lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang /'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te//
247b7(khri brgyad): chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can/dran pa dang /
248a1(khri brgyad): ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
248a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/dur khrod du mi ro bor ba/shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am/shi nas zhag bdun lon pa'am/bya rog rnams za zhing 'dug pa'am/go bo dang /chun lag
248a3(khri brgyad): dang /bya rgod dang /skyugs pa dang /spyang ki dang /wA dang /khyi dag gam/srog chags kyi rigs gang yang rung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag za zhing 'dug pa dag mthong ba na de lus 'di'ang
248a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta bu'i chos can dang /'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/chos nyid de dang ma bral ba'o zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
248a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten la brnab sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam pararo bsal nas/phyi rol gyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing
248a6(khri brgyad): gnas so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/dur khrod du mi ro bor ba rnam par zos pa dang /mi gtsang ba dang /rul ba dang /mnam pa dag
248a7(khri brgyad): mthong ba na/de lus 'di'ang 'di lto bu'i chos can dang /'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/chos nyid 'di dang ma bral bas yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do//
248b1(khri brgyad): rang byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten la brnab snyoms dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/lus
248b2(khri brgyad): la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/dur khrod du keng rus sha dang /khrag ra ri chags shing rgyus pas
248b3(khri brgyad): byabrang breng du 'brel ba dag mthong ba na/de la lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang /'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul
248b4(khri brgyad): de dang sbyor bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten la brnab sems dang /yid mi bde ba
248b5(khri brgyad): rnam par bsal nas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/dur khrod du keng rus sha dang khrag
248b6(khri brgyad): meng cing rgyus pas ma 'brel ba/dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa dag mthong ba na/de lus 'di'i nga 'di lta bu'i chos can dang /'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/chos nyid de dang ma bral ba
248b7(khri brgyad): yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten la
249a1(khri brgyad): brnab sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
249a2(khri brgyad): gang gi tshe/dur khrod du keng rus zungs med cing gyes te/dung sa la gtor ba lta bu dag mthong ba na/de lus 'di dang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang /'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/chos nyid
249a3(khri brgyad): de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rten pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan
249a4(khri brgyad): pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam por bsal nas/lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
249a5(khri brgyad): chen po gang gi tshe/dur khrod du rus pa rnams sa la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor te/rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/rje ngar gyi rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/
249a6(khri brgyad): brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/rgal tshigs rnams kyang gzhan na/rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/dpung pa'i rus pa rnams kyang granan
249a7(khri brgyad): na//mjing pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/mgo bo'i thob pa rnams kyang gzhan na 'dug pa dag mthong ba na/de lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can nam/'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin
249b1(khri brgyad): te/chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa
249b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
249b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/dur khrod du rus pa lo du ma lon pa/rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa dag mthong ba na/lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang /'di lta bu'i
249b4(khri brgyad): rang bzhin can yin te/chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes
249b5(khri brgyad): bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
249b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe dur khrod du rus pa lo du ma lon pa/sngo ba thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/zags shing bral ba sa'i rdul dang 'dra brjo gyur pa dag mthong ba na/de lus
249b7(khri brgyad): 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang /'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
250a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nus/nang gi lus la
250a2(khri brgyad): lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//de bzhin du rtun pa shes
250a3(khri brgyad): bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsalo nas/tshor ba rnams dang /sems dang /chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta
250a4(khri brgyad): zhing gnas so//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
250a5(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o//bzhi gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
250a6(khri brgyad): mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i
250a7(khri brgyad): phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol lo brtson 'grus rtsom ste/sems rab tu 'dzin cing /yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/'dun
250b1(khri brgyad): pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /phyir zhing 'byung ba dang /mi brjed pa
250b2(khri brgyad): dang /nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa'o//
250b3(khri brgyad): de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jog ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
250b4(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o//bzhi gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po 'dun po'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed
250b5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas po/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur bsgom pa dang /brtson 'grus
250b6(khri brgyad): dang /sems dang /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/
250b7(khri brgyad): rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom zhing /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab
251a1(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/dbang po lnga'o//lnga gang zhe na/dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /
251a2(khri brgyad): dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor
251a3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/stobs lnga'o//lnga gang zhe na dad pa'i stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i stobs
251a4(khri brgyad): dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /shes rab kyi stobs so//de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin
251a5(khri brgyad): no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/bdun gang zhe na/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi/
251a6(khri brgyad): yan lagadong /chos rnam por 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
251a7(khri brgyad): shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan log dben pa la gnas pa 'dod
251b1(khri brgyad): chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom zhing de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
251b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
251b3(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i drug dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'
251b4(khri brgyad): dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis te/rab 'byor de ni byang
251b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/rnam par thar
251b6(khri brgyad): pa'i sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/gsum gang zhe na/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la
251b7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/de ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo
252a1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/chos thams cad mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang
252a2(khri brgyad): yin pa ste/de na mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/chos thams cad mngon par
252a3(khri brgyad): 'du byed pa med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa ste/de ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//rnam par thar pa'i
252a4(khri brgyad): sgo gsum po de dag gi ting nge 'dzin ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la bslab par bya'o//rab
252a5(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/shes pa bcu gcig go/bcu gcig gang zhe na/sdug bsngal shes pa dang /kun 'byung
252a6(khri brgyad): bshes pa dang /'gog pa shes pa dang /lam shes pa dang /zad pa shes pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa dang /chos shes pa dang /rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /kun rdzob shes
252a7(khri brgyad): pa dang /yongs su 'dris pa shes pa dang /sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o//de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni sdug bsngal
252b1(khri brgyad): shes pa zhes bya'o//de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/kun 'byung ba spang ba shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o//de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/sdug bsngal
252b2(khri brgyad): 'gog pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o//de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni lam shes pa
252b3(khri brgyad): zhes bya'o//de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug zad par shes pa gang yin pa'o//de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/srid par 'gro ba mi skye ba
252b4(khri brgyad): shes pa gang yin pa'o//de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/phung po lnga po rnams bcos mar yongs su gcod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o//de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zho na/mig
252b5(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid mi rtag par shes pa ste/de bzhin du phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched dang /chos thams cad kyi bar du sbyar bar
252b6(khri brgyad): bya'o//de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan dag gi sems sems kyis shes po gang yin pa'o//de la yongs su 'dris pa shes
252b7(khri brgyad): po gang zhe na/lam shes pa dang /yongs su zad pa shes pa gang yin pa'o//de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pas sgra thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa'o///
253a1(khri brgyad): de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
253a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/dbang po gsum ste/gsum gang zhe na/mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /
253a3(khri brgyad): kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'o//de la mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po
253a4(khri brgyad): dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po snang ba med pa/dregs pa 'dul ba gang yin pa ste/nga ni mi
253a5(khri brgyad): shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o//de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/slob pa'i gang zag kun shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson
253a6(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o//de la kun shes pa
253a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/mi slob pa'i gang zag dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
253b1(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa
253b2(khri brgyad): ste/de ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
253b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ting nge 'dzin gsum mo//gsum gang zhe na/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam
253b4(khri brgyad): gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
253b5(khri brgyad): chen po 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
253b6(khri brgyad): gtan dang po bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/de ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/bsam
253b7(khri brgyad): gtan dang po dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/de ni rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/bsam
254a1(khri brgyad): gtan gnyis pa nas/'du shes med 'du shes meng min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dag ste/de ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces
254a2(khri brgyad): bya ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
254a3(khri brgyad): po na 'di lta ste/rjes su dran pa bcu'o//bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran
254a4(khri brgyad): pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs rngub pa
254a5(khri brgyad): dang 'byung ba rjes su dran pa'o//de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su dran par byed de/rab 'byor rjes su dran pa bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
254a6(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/tshad med pa bzhi'o//bzhi gang zhe na/byams pa dang
254a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/rgya chen por gyur po/tshad med pa/mi gnyis pa/khon med pa/'gran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa/shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi
254b1(khri brgyad): dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang /de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang /dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /btang snyoms dang
254b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/rgya chen por gyur pa/tshad med pa mi gnyis pa/khon med pa/'gran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa/shin tu bsgoms pas/'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
254b3(khri brgyad): pa/nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas nas gnas pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor
254b4(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/bsam gtan bzhi'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams
254b5(khri brgyad): las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rtog pa dang dpyod
254b6(khri brgyad): pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis
254b7(khri brgyad): pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas/btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang /shes bzhino can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa
255a1(khri brgyad): rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la gnas pa/btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de bde
255a2(khri brgyad): ba'ang spangs te/snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas/bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/btang snyoms dang /dran pa
255a3(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
255a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o//bzhi gang zhe na/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes
255a5(khri brgyad): rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha'
255a6(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag por 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas
255a7(khri brgyad): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ci'ang med do snyam nas/ci'ang med
255b1(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang meng pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/
255b2(khri brgyad): 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg po chen po ni 'di lta ste/rnam par thar pa
255b3(khri brgyad): brgyad do//brgyad gang zhe na/gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar
255b4(khri brgyad): pa gnyis pa'o//drug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub
255b5(khri brgyad): par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi
255b6(khri brgyad): pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te
255b7(khri brgyad): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci'ang med snyam nas/ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te
256a1(khri brgyad): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
256a2(khri brgyad): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'dri ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa
256a3(khri brgyad): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
256a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o//dgu gang zhe na/'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams
256a5(khri brgyad): las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang
256a6(khri brgyad): bral zhing /nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs
256a7(khri brgyad): te gnas pa dang /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing /dran pa dang shes bzhin can yon te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis gang
256b1(khri brgyad): de dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la gnas pa/btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang de bde ba'ang spangs/snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs
256b2(khri brgyad): shing /yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas/bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa
256b3(khri brgyad): dang /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/
256b4(khri brgyad): nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam
256b5(khri brgyad): par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yos skye mched las yang dag par 'das te//
256b6(khri brgyad): ci'ang med do snyam nas/ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mtsho de las yang dag par 'ongs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min
256b7(khri brgyad): skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas
257a1(khri brgyad): pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
257a2(khri brgyad): chen po ni 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin
257a3(khri brgyad): par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang /las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi gnas dang /rnam
257a4(khri brgyad): par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs dang /khams du sa pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /sems can
257a5(khri brgyad): gzhan dag dang /gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs dang /mos pa du ma pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /sems can gzhan dag dang /gang zag gzhan
257a6(khri brgyad): rnams kyi dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /
257a7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
257b1(khri brgyad): tu shes pa dang /sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang /lha'i mig gis 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med
257b2(khri brgyad): pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang /shes rab rnam par grol ba tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing bdag gi skye ba ni zad do//tshangs
257b3(khri brgyad): par spyod pa ni spyad do//bya ba ni byas so//phyin chad 'di lta bu med do snyam du rab tu shes shing de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu de shes pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
257b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/nga yang dag
257b5(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang
257b6(khri brgyad): bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/'dir rgyu de yang
257b7(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/bde ba thob cing /ngago tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra
258a1(khri brgyad): yang dag par sgrog go/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du
258a2(khri brgyad): bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /nga zog pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/kye ma de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud
258a3(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang
258a4(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/bde ba thob cing /bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs
258a5(khri brgyad): po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/
258a6(khri brgyad): su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang ngas gang dag bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag bsten
258a7(khri brgyad): na/bar du gcod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs
258b1(khri brgyad): pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/'dir rgyu de yang
258b2(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/bde ba thob cing bag tsho ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra
258b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par bsgrag go/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/bram bre'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa
258b4(khri brgyad): bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /ngas 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam gang dag bstan te/de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par nges par 'byung ba de dag bsgrubs na/sdug
258b5(khri brgyad): bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la de dag bsgrubs kyang zag pa zad par mi 'gyur ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa
258b6(khri brgyad): dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes /
258b7(khri brgyad): su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing /bgo tsha ba med pa thob la/mi 'jigs pa thob ste/gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang
259a1(khri brgyad): dag par bsgrag go//tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong dam bram ze 'am/lU'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus
259a2(khri brgyad): pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o//de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor
259a3(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /chos
259a4(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa dang /nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o//de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rig pa ste/rab 'byor de
259a5(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas
259a6(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/bco brgyad gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi rub mo blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas
259a7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams
259b1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyi rjes su bstan nas/gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/de bzhin
259b2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang /ca co med pa dang /bsnyel ba med pa dang /tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /sems mnyam par ma bzhog pa med pa dang /so sor ma brtags pa'i
259b3(khri brgyad): btang snyoms med pa dang /'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang /brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang /dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /shes rab nyams pa med pa
259b4(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang /lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
259b5(khri brgyad): ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /'das pa'i dus la
259b6(khri brgyad): ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye
259b7(khri brgyad): shes mthong ba 'jug pa'o//de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
260a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang zhe na/'di lta ste yi ge'i tshul mnyam pa nyid
260a2(khri brgyad): dang /yi ge'i sgo dang /yi ges 'jug pa'o//de la yi ge'i sgo dang /yi ges 'jug pa gang zhe na/a zhes bya ba ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//ra
260a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//pa zhes bya ba ni don dam par khyad par med pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang
260a4(khri brgyad): skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//na zhes bya ba ni ming mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming med pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//la zhes bya ba
260a5(khri brgyad): no 'jig rten las 'das shing sred pa'i 'khri shing gi rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang /dul bar gnas pa yongs
260a6(khri brgyad): su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//Da zhes bya ba ni khrag khrug dang bral ba'i phyir
260a7(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//bla zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam gyi sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams
260b1(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no//ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//ya zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//
260b2(khri brgyad): sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cod kyi sgo yin no//sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid
260b3(khri brgyad): las mi 'da' zhing mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//ma zhes bya ba ni nga yir 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//gA zhes
260b4(khri brgyad): bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//tha zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir
260b5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//
260b6(khri brgyad): sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgro yin no//k+Sha zhes
260b7(khri brgyad): bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//dz+dza zhes bya ba ni ye shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i
261a1(khri brgyad): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//tshe zhes bya ba ni mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad
261a2(khri brgyad): kyi sgo yin no//spro zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//hA zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//tas zhes bya ba ni
261a3(khri brgyad): chos thams cad la spro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//tha zhes bya ba ni rnam par bsgrub
261a4(khri brgyad): pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgro yin no//pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams
261a5(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no//ska zhes bya ba ni phung po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//dza zhes bya ba ni rga ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//tsa zhes bya ba
261a6(khri brgyad): ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//Ta zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//ha zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i
261a7(khri brgyad): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//de yan chad ni yi ger brjod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gang la'ang gang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /gang gis brjod pa dang /gang gis
261b1(khri brgyad): bstan pa dang /gang gis rtogs par byed pa dang /gang gis mthong ba'i ming ci'ang med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar khong du chud par bya'o//rab 'byor
261b2(khri brgyad): a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
261b3(khri brgyad): yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di shes pa de ni sgra gang la'ang thogs par mi 'gyur zhing chos thams cad mnyam po nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub par gyur te/sgra shes pa la mkhas pa'ang 'thob
261b4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di
261b5(khri brgyad): dag thos la thos nas kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyan gyis 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher
261b6(khri brgyad): ston pa de la ni phan yon nyi shu yod pa shes par bya'o//nyi shu gang zhe na/dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /blo dang
261b7(khri brgyad): ldan par 'gyur ba dang /brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
262a1(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo 'di'ang tshogs chung ngus 'thob cing /so ma nyi med la/yid gnyis za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /gzhan dag las tshig 'jam po thos na'ang rjes su chags par ma
262a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur la/tshig rtsub po thos na'ang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur te/mtho bar mi 'gyur/dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing /tha mal par gnas par 'gyur ba dang /ska la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /
262a3(khri brgyad): phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /rgyu
262a4(khri brgyad): la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba
262a5(khri brgyad): dang /pha rol gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa dang /rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang /lha'i rna ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la

262b1(khri brgyad): sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u
262b2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ste/bcu drug pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bcu gsum pa//rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du ji ltar byang chub sems
262b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po la spyod pa
262b4(khri brgyad): ni/sa nas sar 'phyar te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa/sa nas sar ji ltar 'phar zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad 'opho ba
262b5(khri brgyad): med pas so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos gang yang 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba 'am 'pho ba 'am/nye bar 'phro ba med pa'i phyir ro//'on kyang chos thams cad kyis gang yin pa de la'ang rlom sems su

262b7(khri brgyad): zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la gnas pas/sa yongs su sbyang ba bcu bya'o//bcu gang zhe na/lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su
263a1(khri brgyad): sbyang bar byas te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya ba dang mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/phan pa bya ba'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba dang /sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
263a2(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /sbyin par bya ba dang /sbyin pa po dang /len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /de dag gis rlom
263a3(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed pa'i phyir/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /khyim mi dmigs
263a4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /chos

263a6(khri brgyad): dang /tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongs su sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag
263a7(khri brgyad): bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas rtag tu chos brgyad yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan bya'o//brgyad gang zhe na/'di
263b1(khri brgyad): lta ste/tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba dang /bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa dang /mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba dang /sems can thams
263b2(khri brgyad): cad yongs su mi btang ba dang /snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang /bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing ston pa'i 'du shes kyis spyi zhu che ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas yongs su
263b3(khri brgyad): 'tshol ba ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po de dag rtag tu yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang
263b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya'o//lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mang du thos pas chog mi shes shing /de la'ang yi
263b5(khri brgyad): ga la mngon par zhen par mi bya ba dang /zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel par byed la/des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
263b6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing /yongs su bsngo la des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo zhing des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /ngo tsha shes
263b7(khri brgyad): pa dang /khrel yod pa la gnas shing /des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas/chos lnga po de dag
264a1(khri brgyad): la gnas par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas chos bcu yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya zhing de
264a2(khri brgyad): yongs su spang bar mi bya'o//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba dang /'dod pa chung ba dang /cho ga shes pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad
264a3(khri brgyad): bsnyungs pa mi btang ba dang /bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba dang /'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /bdog pa thams cad
264a4(khri brgyad): yongs su btang ba dang /sems mi 'dre ba dang /dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas chos bcu po de

264a6(khri brgyad): su spang bar bya'o//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing /dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /

264b1(khri brgyad): bar bya zhing /gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya
264b2(khri brgyad): pa dang /phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /the tshom yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya ba ste/rab

264b5(khri brgyad): bar bya ste/drug gang zhe na/nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /yongs su yi chad pa'i sems yongs su spang bar

265a1(khri brgyad): bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu mai d+ha'o//nyi shu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ba dang /sems can du 'dzin pa dang /srog tu 'dzin pa dang /gang

265a7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang /mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du bya ba dang /smon pa med pa shes pa dang /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /sems can thams
265b1(khri brgyad): cad la snying brno zhing snying rje ba dang /sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba dang /chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta zhing de la'ang mngon par zhen par mi bya ba dang /yang dag pa'i tshub
265b2(khri brgyad): rtogs shing des rlom sems su'ang mi bya ba dang /mi skye bar bzod pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa dang /tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang /chos thams cad la rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa

265b5(khri brgyad): shu po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas/chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/bzhi gang
265b6(khri brgyad): zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa dang /mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong
265b7(khri brgyad): ba de dag kyang yongs su bsgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya zhing /sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag yongs
266a1(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas tshos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/bzhi
266a2(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rgyun mi chad par snyoms par 'jug
266a3(khri brgyad): pa dang /ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub cing /bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len pa ste/rab
266a4(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
266a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/bcu gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su bzung ba ste/de smon lam ji
266a6(khri brgyad): lta ji lta bu 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen
266a7(khri brgyad): po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa dang /spongs pa'i klung khong du chud pa dang /mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /cho rigs phun sum tshogs
266b1(khri brgyad): padang /rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /

266b3(khri brgyad): bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa lo gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab
266b4(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba gang lags/bcom
266b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa pa//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
266b6(khri brgyad): dpe' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bam pa yongs su srung ba yin no//de la sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
266b7(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa ste/de ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam
267a1(khri brgyad): pa yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med
267a2(khri brgyad): par sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/de ni gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/de la
267a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par 'dzud cing 'jog la rab tu 'god par byed pa'i
267a4(khri brgyad): dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bsten pa dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /sri zhu byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten po yongs
267a5(khri brgyad): su sbyang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos tshol bar byed la
267a6(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ba gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems
267a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/tshor bas thams cad du 'dre ba med par mngon par 'byung zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
267b1(khri brgyad): bstan pa la'ang rab tu 'byung la/su'ang de'i bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mo chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba
267b2(khri brgyad): yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bor du
267b3(khri brgyad): nams kyang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba
267b4(khri brgyad): yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum
267b5(khri brgyad): du bzhugs kyang rung /mya ngan las 'das kyang rung sems can rnams la chos ston te/tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang po/ma
267b6(khri brgyad): 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/yongs su dag pa/yongs su byang ba 'di lta ste/mdo'i sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyed pa'i sde dang /lung bstan pa'i sde dang /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /ched du brjod pa'i
267b7(khri brgyad): sde dang /gleng gzhi'i sde dang /de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /gtan la dbab par bstan
268a1(khri brgyad): pa'i sde yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems
268a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyi khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/nga rgyal gyis khengs pa gzhom pa gang gis namos kyang rigs dma' ba rnams su skye
268a3(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongs su spang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
268a4(khri brgyad): chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su
268a5(khri brgyad): sbyang ba yin no//rab 'byor bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongs su sbyang bar bya ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
268a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /gzhon yang 'tshal pa'i tshul khrims su byed pa/byang chub
268a7(khri brgyad): la bar chad byed pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag yid la mi byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin no//de la byang chub sems
268b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byis pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/chung ngu zhig byas na'ang 'khor ba'i
268b2(khri brgyad): mtha'i bar du chud mi gzon na/chen po lta ci smos te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
268b3(khri brgyad): po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa gang zhe na/gang sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems med pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
268b4(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/theg pa gsum po dag
268b5(khri brgyad): la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba yin no//de la byang chub sems
268b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
268b7(khri brgyad): chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269a1(khri brgyad): chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/'di snyam du sems te/sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang bdag bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can
269a2(khri brgyad): dmyal ba dag tu 'dug la/sems can de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bzhag gi bar du der gcad pa dang /bshag pa dang /brdung ba dang /btso ba dang /bgog pa dag kyang nyams su
269a3(khri brgyad): myong bar bya'o snyam ste/de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi phyir mngon par spro zhing yongs su mi skyo ba'i bar du ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du
269a4(khri brgyad): byo ba zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing sri zhu tshe ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes 'jog pa ste//
269a5(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la dad pas gus shing sri zhu che ba zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas
269a6(khri brgyad): tshol ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan mi byed par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su tshol ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'
269a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
269b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/phyogs bcu khor yug gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag tu gang ci gsungs pa de thams cad gzung bar bya'o snyam
269b2(khri brgyad): du chog mi shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing
269b3(khri brgyad): med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel par byed pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston kyang chos kyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tha na byang chub la'ang re ba med pa ste/de
269b4(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
269b5(khri brgyad): yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa bdag dang gzhan gyi sangs
269b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i
269b7(khri brgyad): rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge ba'i rtsa bas
270a1(khri brgyad): nye bar brtan pa ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis nye bar brtan na/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par
270a2(khri brgyad): byed la/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur gyi bar du nams kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'
270a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang
270a4(khri brgyad): zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod pa la gnas pa yin no//de la
270a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' ba gang yin pa ste/de ni byang
270a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/byang chub
270a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyang mi 'dod pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa'
270b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa gang zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes
270b2(khri brgyad): pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa mi btang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos zab mo dag la nges par sems pa'i
270b3(khri brgyad): bzod pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa mi btang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
270b4(khri brgyad): chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/gang la bsgrub pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba yin no//
270b5(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/'dod pa la sems mi bskyed pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
270b6(khri brgyad): po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gang chos thams cad
270b7(khri brgyad): la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
271a1(khri brgyad): chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba gang zhe na/nang dang phyi rol gyi chos rnams 'dzin par mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems
271a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba gang zhe na/gang rnam
271a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa gnas pa rnams la de'i sems mi sbyor ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
271a4(khri brgyad): chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba gang zhe na/dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad
271a5(khri brgyad): la me lta ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
271a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te skye ba dang /mgo bregs shing ngur smrig gyon pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su
271a7(khri brgyad): spang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/dge slong dang /dge
271b1(khri brgyad): slong ma rnams dang se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang lhan cig mi gnas shing de dag med na'ang yongs su yi chad par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
271b2(khri brgyad): chen po'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang
271b3(khri brgyad): zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad sbyar bar bya na/sems
271b4(khri brgyad): can 'di dag ni rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur pa yin gyis/'di la bdag gis sor sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
271b5(khri brgyad): pos khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'
271b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am/de dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi gleng ldang bar 'gyur ba 'am/de dang ldan pa'i sems
271b7(khri brgyad): bskyed pa bskyed par 'byung ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par mi bya ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang
272a1(khri brgyad): ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/gang gnod sems dang /rnam
272a2(khri brgyad): par 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang /'thab pa'i sems dang /rtsod pa'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod
272a3(khri brgyad): sems yongs su spang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/gang nang gi chos rnams yang dag par
272a4(khri brgyad): rjes su mi mthong ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la bstod pa yongs su spang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
272a5(khri brgyad): gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/'di lta sde pha rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/de ni bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la
272a6(khri brgyad): smod pa yongs su spang ba yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/'di ltar 'di
272a7(khri brgyad): dag ni bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod par byed na/'phags pa'i lam la lta ci smos shing /byang chub la lta ci smos pa ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
272b1(khri brgyad): mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/'di ltar
272b2(khri brgyad): des chos ci'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthang na/ga gis lhag par rlom sems su byed pa'i lhag pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar lhag pa'i nga rgyal spang bar bya'o//de la byang chub
272b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar khengs pa yongs su sbyang bar bya zhe na/'di ltar gang la de'i khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/
272b4(khri brgyad): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya ba ji
272b5(khri brgyad): lta bu zho na/dngos po rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongs su sbyang bar bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
272b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang /zhe sdong dang /gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lto bu zhe na/'di ltar 'dod chags dang /zhe sdong dang /gti mug rnams
272b7(khri brgyad): kyi dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar
273a1(khri brgyad): bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa drug pa la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste//
273a2(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
273a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang /
273a4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas nas/shes bya'i rgya mtsho rnam pa lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to//phyin to/phyin par 'gyur ro//lnga
273a5(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba dang /brjod du med pa dang /'dus ma byas pa ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
273a6(khri brgyad): pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/
273a7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma
273b1(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro//yongs su yi chad pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro//slong ba mthong na sems zhum
273b2(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro//dngos po thams cad yongs su btang nas/yid mi bde bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
273b3(khri brgyad): ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro//sems dang po bskyed phyin chad rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin par bya zhing /sems gsog tu mi bya ste/chos drug po de dag yongs su spang bar
273b4(khri brgyad): bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang bdag tu 'dzin por mi bya ste/'di ltar yang bdag gtan med pa'i phyir ro//sems can du 'dzin pa dang /
273b5(khri brgyad): srog tu 'dzin pa dang /gang zag tu 'dzin pa la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag gtan med pa'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
273b6(khri brgyad): pos ji ltar yang chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad gtan ma skyes pas/chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems
273b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rtag par 'dzin par mi bya ste/'di ltar chos gang mi skye bo de rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems dpa'
274a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang mtshan ma'i 'du shes mi bya ste 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gtan med pa'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems dpa'
274a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rgyur blta bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nges lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems
274a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dngos po de mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/de ltar
274a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//de bzhin du phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams la mngon par
274a5(khri brgyad): zhon par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos de dag rang bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir to/de ltar phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched la mngon par zhen par mi
274a6(khri brgyad): bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zho na/'di ltar de rang bzhin med pa'i
274a7(khri brgyad): phyir te/de ltar khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la lhag par zhen par mi
274b1(khri brgyad): bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dngos po de med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la lhag par zhen par
274b2(khri brgyad): mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la chags par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/de ltar
274b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la chags par mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang sangs rgyas su lta ba lo brten par
274b4(khri brgyad): mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas
274b5(khri brgyad): su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos su lta ba
274b6(khri brgyad): la brten pas chos mthong bar mi 'gyur te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o//de lo byang chub sems dpa' sems
274b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur te/de ltar byang
275a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang tshul
275a2(khri brgyad): khrims su lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas tshul khrims yongs su dag par mi 'gyur te/de ltar
275a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims su lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos rnams
275a4(khri brgyad): stong ngo zhes bya bas skyed lug par mi bya ste/'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong gi/stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
275a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa'o chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya ste//
275a6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pos stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'ogal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa
275a7(khri brgyad): nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong gi/stong
275b1(khri brgyad): pa nyid la stong pa nyid rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid rtogs par bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
275b2(khri brgyad): po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa
275b3(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/'di
275b4(khri brgyad): lta ste/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba yongs su rdzogs
275b5(khri brgyad): pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/snying rje chen po thob pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/'di lta ste/sems
275b6(khri brgyad): can gyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad
275b7(khri brgyad): la bsnan pa med pa dang /dbri bo med pa'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs pa gang zhe na/gang chos thams cad rab tu rtogs
276a1(khri brgyad): pa med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na/gang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa
276a2(khri brgyad): drad /mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste/de ni mi skye bar bzod pa'o//de lo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye bo shes pa gang zhe na/gang ming dang gzugs
276a3(khri brgyad): mi skye ba shes pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe
276a4(khri brgyad): na/gang chos gnyis su kun tu spyod pa med pa nyid de/de ni tshul gcig tu bston pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa gang zhe
276a5(khri brgyad): na/gang chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na/gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lta ba thams
276a6(khri brgyad): cad bzlog pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa bzlog pa gang zhe na/gang bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongasra pA
276a7(khri brgyad): thams cad 'dor ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyiye
276b1(khri brgyad): shes so//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dul ba gang zhe na/gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
276b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sems zhi ba gang zhe na/gang dbang po drug po dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa thogs pa med pa gang zhe na/gang
276b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/skye mched drug la btang snyoms su 'jog
276b4(khri brgyad): pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba gang zhe na/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang der lus ston pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
276b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems drang sems las byung ba rnams shes pa'o//
276b6(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir/mngon par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse zhing //sangs
276b7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na/
277a1(khri brgyad): gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nus kyang ma g.yos la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na'ang snang zhing de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o///
277a2(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su sgrib pa gang zhe na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
277a3(khri brgyad): gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su gtong zhing /
277a4(khri brgyad): des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang zhe na sems can thams cad la phan
277a5(khri brgyad): gdags pa'i phyir gang chos la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa
277a6(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa gang zhe
277a7(khri brgyad): na/stobs bcu la gnas nas/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas
277b1(khri brgyad): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba gang zhe na/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par byed pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
277b2(khri brgyad): chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas/bya ba thams cod byed la de'i sems chos gang la'ang
277b3(khri brgyad): mi 'jug pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun mi chad par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na/gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par
