277b4(khri brgyad): smin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/
277b5(khri brgyad): ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub ce na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dri lnga ji lta bur sems can yongs su smin par 'a gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i
277b6(khri brgyad): lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len ce na/'di lta ste/sems
277b7(khri brgyad): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'di bas pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba ji
278a1(khri brgyad): lta bu zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pas smon lam ji lta ji lta
278a2(khri brgyad): bur 'debs pa de lha de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ro//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin
278a3(khri brgyad): dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i skud shes pa khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/'di lta ste/dris pa'i tshig so sa yang dag par rig pa'o//de
278a4(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spobs pa'i klung khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/'di lta ste/spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o//de la byang chub sems
278a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba
278a6(khri brgyad): ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs
278a7(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs chen po dag tu skye ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs
278b1(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs
278b2(khri brgyad): shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin//
278b3(khri brgyad): no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/rigs gang las sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byung bar
278b4(khri brgyad): gyur pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum
278b5(khri brgyad): tshogs pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can rnams byang chub tu bkod nas/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor nyid dang ldan pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
278b6(khri brgyad): po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams
278b7(khri brgyad): cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur zhing /de dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no//
279a1(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
279a2(khri brgyad): bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang /khyim nas rab tu 'byung zhing mngon par 'byung la/sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la nges par 'gyur ba ste/de ni byang
279a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa
279a4(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba ni/gser las grub pa/sdong po ni bai DUr+ya las grub pa/yal ga dang /lo ma dang 'dab ma rnams ni rin po che sna
279a5(khri brgyad): bdun las grub pa yin la/yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bar dag tu snang bas khyab par byed pa ste/de ni
279a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod po phun sum tshogs pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams
279a7(khri brgyad): cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par byas pas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing
279b1(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
279b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag yongs
279b3(khri brgyad): su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /bag chags
279b4(khri brgyad): dang mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
279b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu po dag gang zhe na/rab
279b6(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad la spyod pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag
279b7(khri brgyad): la bslabs pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pa ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da' zhing /rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad
280a1(khri brgyad): pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang
280a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i sa ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sa dgu po 'di dag las 'das nas/sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/rab
280a3(khri brgyad): 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu yin no//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag
280a4(khri brgyad): par zhugs pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/sa yongs su sbyang ba bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o////rab 'byor gang
280a5(khri brgyad): khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gol ba
280a6(khri brgyad): der gnas par 'gyur te/de'ang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
280a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di
280b1(khri brgyad): ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la ni nges par 'byung ba'am/nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/nges
280b2(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod/
280b3(khri brgyad): du zad do//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
280b4(khri brgyad): dbyings dang /spong ba'i dbyings dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang /'gog pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de
280b5(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//'gog
280b6(khri brgyad): pa'i dbyings kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par
280b7(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
281a1(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi
281a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang /'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang /rnam par
281a3(khri brgyad): shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di
281a4(khri brgyad): ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i
281a5(khri brgyad): chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar
281a6(khri brgyad): 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la
281a7(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos kyi stong pa nyid dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
281b1(khri brgyad): dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lho dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang /rna ba dang /sku dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus
281b2(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong
281b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
281b4(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sbyar to/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam
281b5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi 'dus te reg
281b6(khri brgyad): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar dag kyang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod
281b7(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa de ni rmi lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma dang /smig
282a1(khri brgyad): rgyu dang /brag cha dang /mig yor dang /de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rmi lam gyi rang bzhin
282a2(khri brgyad): ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang rab 'byor de bzhin du sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang /smig rgyu
282a3(khri brgyad): dang /brag cha dang /mig yor dang /de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
282a4(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
282a5(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa dang /smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /brag cha'i rang bzhin ni brag cha'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /mig yor gyi rang bzhin ni mig yor
282a6(khri brgyad): gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med
282a7(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med
282b1(khri brgyad): nga'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
282b2(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni khams
282b3(khri brgyad): gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
282b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi
282b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni sbyin pa'i pha
282b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
282b7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor mtshan
283a1(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'o//
283a2(khri brgyad): chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la/nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ra
283a3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi byar gyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam
283a4(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
283a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med
283a6(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar/
283a7(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
283b1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid
283b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang
283b3(khri brgyad): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar lam gyi bar gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par
283b4(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor lam ni lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin
283b5(khri brgyad): du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi
283b6(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas
283b7(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sangs
284a1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa la nges
284a2(khri brgyad): papar 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
284a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
284a4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
284a5(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
284a6(khri brgyad): gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong /rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin
284a7(khri brgyad): ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong /byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis stong /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin
284b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par
284b2(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong
284b3(khri brgyad): pa'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges por 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i
284b4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
284b5(khri brgyad): nyid la granas par mi 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /lam gyi rnam pa
284b6(khri brgyad): shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang po ni ni gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas
284b7(khri brgyad): ngapar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong pa dang /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong
285a1(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
285a2(khri brgyad): nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis skyong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni ming la nges par
285a3(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshon nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma dang brda dang /tha snyad dang /
285a4(khri brgyad): gdags pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam
285a5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gdags pa ni gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab
285a6(khri brgyad): 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni skye bo med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
285a7(khri brgyad): rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa
285b1(khri brgyad): med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par
285b2(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni/mngon
285b3(khri brgyad): par 'du byed pa med pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
285b4(khri brgyad): gnas par mi 'gyur te/theg pa de ni bskyed du med pa yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bcu bzhi pa//rab 'byor gang khyod 'di
285b5(khri brgyad): skad du theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni theg pa de gang du'adu gnas par 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad gnas po med pa'i phyir ro//
285b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'on kyang theg pa de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab
285b7(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
286a1(khri brgyad): ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i
286a2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin zhing /yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang /bsam gyis ni khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang
286a3(khri brgyad): bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /de bzhin
286a4(khri brgyad): du yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
286a5(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam naM kha'i khams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du
286a6(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mo gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na spong ba'i dbyings dang /'dod chags dang bral po'i dbyings dang //
286a7(khri brgyad): 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin
286b1(khri brgyad): no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings
286b2(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin dang /'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni nam mkho'i
286b3(khri brgyad): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni 'dod
286b4(khri brgyad): chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste
286b5(khri brgyad): dper na/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas po'ang ma yin no//
286b6(khri brgyad): rang 'byor 'di lta ste dang dran/tshor ri'i sbyong ba nyid dang /'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang /'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma
286b7(khri brgyad): yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni
287a1(khri brgyad): gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di/
287a2(khri brgyad): ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig gi stong pa nyid ni
287a3(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//yid kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po derang
287a4(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /yid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar
287a5(khri brgyad): du gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa dang /yid kyi bar du yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di
287a6(khri brgyad): lta ste dper na/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yi ni mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//
287a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa
287b1(khri brgyad): ma yin pa dang /chos kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa dang /chos
287b2(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar ni chos rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//bar 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//yid
287b3(khri brgyad): kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ango ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang
287b4(khri brgyad): ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas
287b5(khri brgyad): pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yid
287b6(khri brgyad): kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te
287b7(khri brgyad): reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de
288a1(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du
288a2(khri brgyad): gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
288a3(khri brgyad): bar du yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas
288a4(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po
288a5(khri brgyad): de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa
288a6(khri brgyad): ma yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mig gi 'dus
288a7(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
288b1(khri brgyad): rjes tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rmi lam ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du thog pa chen po de'ang gnas pa 'ong ma
288b2(khri brgyad): yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /brag cha dang /mig yor dang /de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi
288b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni
288b4(khri brgyad): gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /brag cha dang /mig yor
288b5(khri brgyad): dang /de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang //
288b6(khri brgyad): smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /brag cha'i rang bzhin ni brag cha'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /mig yor gyi rang bzhin ni mig yor gyi rang bzhin gyis stong
288b7(khri brgyad): pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
289a1(khri brgyad): byin pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor
289a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po dang /
289a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa'ang mo yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma
289a4(khri brgyad): yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
289a5(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsamya gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi
289a6(khri brgyad): gnas pa ma yon pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin po'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /shes
289a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'od lta ste dper na/nang stong pa nyid ni gnas
289b1(khri brgyad): bya'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/dngos
289b2(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi granas
289b3(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang
289b4(khri brgyad): bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'amo mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /
289b5(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/dran
289b6(khri brgyad): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//
289b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag
290a1(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
290a2(khri brgyad): bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du thog pa chen po de'ong gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//do ci'i phyir
290a3(khri brgyad): zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
290a4(khri brgyad): ltar lam ni lom gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//
290a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/
290a6(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /sangs rgyas
290a7(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni
290b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
290b2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dperA na/dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rang sangs rgyas ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gonas pa'ang ma yin no//
290b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas
290b4(khri brgyad): pa ma yin pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni dgra bcom pa'i
290b5(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/byang chub sems dpa'
290b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gnas pa'ang ma yin
290b7(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du thag pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems
291a1(khri brgyad): dpa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'im mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de
291a2(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs
291a3(khri brgyad): pa'i ring bzhin gyis stong po'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//dgra bcom pa
291a4(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar du gnas pa'ang mo yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rang byang chub ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen
291a5(khri brgyad): po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma
291a6(khri brgyad): yin pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i
291a7(khri brgyad): phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /ngagra bcom pa nyid kyi rang
291b1(khri brgyad): bzhin gyi bar du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
291b2(khri brgyad): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa'ango ma yin/mi gnos pa'ang mi yin no//rab
291b3(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa
291b4(khri brgyad): 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'amo mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar lam
291b5(khri brgyad): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
291b6(khri brgyad): nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ming ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'
291b7(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mtshan ma dang /brda dang /tha snyad dang /gdags pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas
292a1(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin+da mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byorar+ya ming gau rang //
292a2(khri brgyad): bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /mtshan ma'i rang bzhin dang /brda'i rang bzhin dang /tha snyad kyi rang bzhin dang /gaudwags pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas
292a3(khri brgyad): pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ming gi rang bzhin ni ming gri rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /mtshan ma'i rang bzhin ni mtshan ma'i rang
292a4(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa dang /brda'i rang bzhin ni brda'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /tha snyad kyi rang bzhin ni tha snyad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni
292a5(khri brgyad): gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du
292a6(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
292a7(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du thog pa chen po de'ang gnas
292b1(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /'grag pa med pa dang /kun
292b2(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir
292b3(khri brgyad): zhe na/'di ltar skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang po med/
292b4(khri brgyad): pa dang /mngon por 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa de ni mi gnas par gnas
292b5(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul dang bskyod du med pa'i tshul gyis gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do//rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du thog pa des su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni
292b6(khri brgyad): theg pa des su'ang nges par 'byung ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar theg pa gang yin pa de dang /gang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /gang gis nges
292b7(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa la
293a1(khri brgyad): chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/bdag mi dmigs//
293a2(khri brgyad): pa dang /sems can dang /srog dang /gang zag dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po mi dmigs/shin tu rnam por dag pa'i phyir de bzhin
293a3(khri brgyad): nyid mi dmigs/yang dge ba'i mtha' mi dmigs/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po
293a4(khri brgyad): dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams mi dmigs/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag po'i phyir/
293a5(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi
293a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
293a7(khri brgyad): bar du mi dmigs/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs
293b1(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmyigs/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa ma
293b2(khri brgyad): dmigs/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin
293b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig
293b4(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /lam gyi rnam po shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
293b5(khri brgyad): nyid mi dmigs/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba med pa mi dmigs/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med
293b6(khri brgyad): pa dang /rnam par byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa mi dmigs/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par
293b7(khri brgyad): dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dang /da ltar byung ba mi dmigs/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /gnas pa dang /'chi 'pho dang skye
294a1(khri brgyad): da rlog /de na du nas nga drug / ts+tsha la myong gas ts+tsha //gang dumags su med pas sa
294a2(khri brgyad): /gag pa skyed pa dang/kunanas rgyun ngas pa myed pa da//u par byung rlu pa nga //na par 'du byed pa med pa rdzogs su
294a3(khri brgyad): di da nga gyis ste//de ga dang dregs su srid bskyed byin nying mi migs //rang dge ba'i marje'i dri migs su med pas yang
294a4(khri brgyad): mi yinas so//sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin zing migs su med pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med rdzogs so//rgyal khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa
294a5(khri brgyad): da pa ni smras pa so byed dang /des mag ni ni rol tu hU~M da/shes rol tu byin bya dmigs su snad dus/
294a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pas nang stong pa nyid mo dmigs so//dngos po med po'i jo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su
294b1(khri brgyad): med pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pas/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so//de bzhin du
294b2(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dmigs su med pas/lam mi dmigs so//de bzhin
294b3(khri brgyad): du stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pas/sangs rgyas kyi chos
294b4(khri brgyad): rnams mi dmigs so//rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pas rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dmigs
294b5(khri brgyad): su med pas dgra bcom pa myi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med pas rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du dmigs su med pas/de bzhin
294b6(khri brgyad): shegs pa mi dmigs so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs
294b7(khri brgyad): rgyas nyid dang /sangs rgyas nyid dmigs su med pas/sangs rgyas nyid mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sa dmigs su med pas rab tu dga' ba'i sa mi dmigs so//shin tu
295a1(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dmigs su med pas/dri ma med pa dang /'od byed pa dang /'od 'phro can dang /shin tu sbyang dka' dang /mngon du gyur dang /
295a2(khri brgyad): ring du song dang /mi g.yo ba dang /legs pa'i blo gros dang /chos kyi sprin gyis mi dmigs so//gzhan yang sa dmigs sgra med pas/sa bcu mi dmigs te/bcug
295a3(khri brgyad): zhe na/s+ya dang po dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sku dang /'dod chags dang bral bya'i sa dang /
295a4(khri brgyad): byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/nang stong pa nyid kyis sa dang po mi dmigs so//dngos
295a5(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sa dang po mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
295a6(khri brgyad): bar gyis sa bcu'i bar du mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sems can yongs
295a7(khri brgyad): sa smin par byed pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nong stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
295b1(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mig lha mi dmigs so//rab 'byor
295b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad
295b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/theg pa chen po'i sa nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/
295b4(khri brgyad): btso brgyad pa'i////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po
295b5(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan
295b6(khri brgyad): 'das theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyin nam mkha' ni sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis/tshad me
295b7(khri brgyad): mchis pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang sems can dpag tu ma mchis/grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa rnams
296a1(khri brgyad): kyi go 'byed pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po lags so//bcom ldan
296a2(khri brgyad): 'das theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba 'am/gnas pa mi dmigaso/sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/dbus kyang mi
296a3(khri brgyad): dmigs lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/nam mkha' la ni 'ong ba mi dmigs/'gro ba mi dmigs/gnas pa mi dmigs lags
296a4(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la'ang 'ong ba mi dmigs/'gro ba mi dmigs/gnas pa mi dmigs lags so//bcom ldan 'das
296a5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs legs so///
296a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigaso/dbus mi dmigs lags pas/bcom ldan 'das
296a7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/theg pa chen po do ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te/de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
296b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/sbyin
296b2(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
296b3(khri brgyad): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
296b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thog pa chen po ni 'di lnga ste/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha'
296b5(khri brgyad): ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//rab
296b6(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dog ste/de
296b7(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta
297a1(khri brgyad): ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stongs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan
297a2(khri brgyad): lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
297a3(khri brgyad): bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gang
297a4(khri brgyad): yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lha drang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smos pa la//
297a5(khri brgyad): lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams so///
297a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de la gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin du gyur te/ma nor ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /phyin ci ma log pa dang /de kho na dang /yang dag pa dang /
297a7(khri brgyad): bden po dang /ji lta ba bzhin dang /rtag pa dang /brten pa dang /ther zug dang /mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po
297b1(khri brgyad): 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir/'dod pa'i khams ni brtags
297b2(khri brgyad): pa rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig gis bstan pa ste/de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing /ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin
297b3(khri brgyad): pas de'i phyir/theg pa chen pos lce dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi
297b4(khri brgyad): khams de bzhin du gyur te/ma nor ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /phyin ci ma log pa dang /de kho na dang /yang dag pa dang /bden pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin dang /rtag
297b5(khri brgyad): pa dang /brtan pa dang /ther zug dang /mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
297b6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs kyi khams ni brtags pa/rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig gis
297b7(khri brgyad): bstan pa ste/de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing /ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg
298a1(khri brgyad): pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcasdu pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i
298a2(khri brgyad): khams de bzhin du gyur te/ma nor ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /phyin ci ma log pa dang /de kho na dang yang dag pa dang /byedon pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin dang
298a3(khri brgyad): rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang /ther zug dang /mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la dngos po med pa ma yin nA nI/theg pa chen po 'dris lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du
298a4(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs med pa'i khams ni brtags pa rnam par
298a5(khri brgyad): bsgrubs pa tshig gis bstan pa ste/de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la/'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin
298a6(khri brgyad): pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te/gzugs
298a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du gyur te/ma nor ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /phyin ci ma log pa dang /de kho na dang /yang dag pa dang /bden pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin dang /rtag pa dang

298b2(khri brgyad): gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs ni brtags pa/rnam par bsgrubs pa/tshig gis bstan pa ste/de thams cad
298b3(khri brgyad): mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la/'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
298b4(khri brgyad): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
298b5(khri brgyad): par shes pa de bzhin du gyur te/ma nor ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /phyin ci ma log pa dang /de kho na dang /yang dag pa dang /bden pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin dang /

298b7(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa ni brtags pa/rnam par bsgrubs pa/tshig gis
299a1(khri brgyad): bstan pa ste/de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir
299a2(khri brgyad): theg pa chen pos lha dang ma dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/gal te
299a3(khri brgyad): mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams dang /mig gi
299a4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba dang sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus
299a5(khri brgyad): dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /rna ba dang sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i

299b1(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor grang gi phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni brtags pa/rnam par
299b2(khri brgyad): bsgrubs pa/tshig gis bstan pa ste/de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir

299b4(khri brgyad): dang /rlung dang /nam mkha' dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /ma rig pa dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug
299b5(khri brgyad): dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi de bzhin du gyur te/ma nor ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /phyin ci ma log
299b6(khri brgyad): pa dang /de kho na dang /yang dag pa dang /bden pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin dang /rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang /ther zug dang /mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/de dngos
299b7(khri brgyad): po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig ni//
300a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gang gi phyir rga shi ni brtags pa rnam par bsgrubs pa/tshig gis bstan pa ste/mi rtag mi brtan zhing /ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos
300a2(khri brgyad): can te/dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges
300a3(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin nyid dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
300a4(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnon nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma

300a6(khri brgyad): te ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang
300a7(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
300b1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid/
300b2(khri brgyad): dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po med cing /dngos
300b3(khri brgyad): po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal
300b4(khri brgyad): te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan

300b6(khri brgyad): lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnon nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
300b7(khri brgyad): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin
301a1(khri brgyad): te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi
301a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha

301a4(khri brgyad): ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir nang stong
301a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung
301a6(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis lha
301a7(khri brgyad): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
301b1(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar du dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung
301b2(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i

301b5(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po yin te/dngos
301b6(khri brgyad): po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab
301b7(khri brgyad): 'byor gang gi phyir lam dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas
302a1(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te tshad med pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
302a2(khri brgyad): rnams dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung
302a3(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir tshad med pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med cing
302a4(khri brgyad): dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir thog pa chen pos lnga dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab
302a5(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te stongs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yin te/dngos
302a6(khri brgyad): po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na//
302a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma
302b1(khri brgyad): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin
302b2(khri brgyad): nA ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mI dang /lha ma yin du bcus pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir
302b3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
302b4(khri brgyad): mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i sa'i chos rnams dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi

302b6(khri brgyad): po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lnga dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du rgyun
302b7(khri brgyad): du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
303a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni
303a2(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na rab 'byor gang gi phyir sangs rgyas
303a3(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges
303a4(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te rigs kyis dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
303a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir rigs kyis dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i
303a6(khri brgyad): phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i sa
303a7(khri brgyad): dang /rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rab
303b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te sangs rgyas dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges
303b2(khri brgyad): por 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir sangs rgyas dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma
303b3(khri brgyad): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnon nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yin te/
303b4(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab
303b5(khri brgyad): 'byor gang gi phyir lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha
303b6(khri brgyad): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te sems dang po bskyod pa nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi snying po la
303b7(khri brgyad): thug gi bar du bar der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa
304a1(khri brgyad): chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnanu nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor glang gi phyir/
304a2(khri brgyad): sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du bar der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa gong yin pa do
304a3(khri brgyad): dag dngos po med cing /dngos po yod po ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil glos mnan nus dris
304a4(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/
304a5(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lho ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir byang chub
304a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
304a7(khri brgyad): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i
304b1(khri brgyad): ye shes dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na no/thog pa chen po 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyan
304b2(khri brgyad): mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thob nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
304b3(khri brgyad): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i
304b4(khri brgyad): shes dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang nyon mongs pa
304b5(khri brgyad): thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thob ste/lha dang mI dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
304b6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen
304b7(khri brgyad): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang sku mdog
305a1(khri brgyad): dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal gyis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/mdzes shing /lham me/lhan ne/lhang
305a2(khri brgyad): der mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor glang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
305a3(khri brgyad): dngos po med cing dngos po yod po ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang sku mdog dang /gzi brjid
305a4(khri brgyad): dang /dpal gyis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/mdzes shing lham me/lhan ne/lhang nge'o//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin
305a5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
305a6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dge snang bas khyab par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs
305a7(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po medo cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
305b1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
305b2(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
305b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu go bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir de
305b4(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i
305b5(khri brgyad): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu glo bar
305b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na
305b7(khri brgyad): ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/sus kyang 'jig
306a1(khri brgyad): rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
306a2(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
306a3(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor
306a4(khri brgyad): bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro//rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/gang dag gi ched du de bzhin
306a5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
306a6(khri brgyad): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba zhig ni/rab 'byor gang gi phyir sems can rnams dngos po med cing /dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/de'i phyir
306a7(khri brgyad): gong dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan
306b1(khri brgyad): las 'da'o//yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bco lnga
306b2(khri brgyad): pa//rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa lags so zhes smras pa ni/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor
306b3(khri brgyad): theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' la ni/shar phyogs mngon pa med do//lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /'og
306b4(khri brgyad): dang steng dang /phyogs mtshams mngon pa med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang shar phyogs mngon pa med do//lho dang /nub dang /byung dang /'og dang /
306b5(khri brgyad): steng dang /phyogs mtshams mngon pa med de/de'i phyir thog pa de ni namra mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni ring po ma yin/thung
306b6(khri brgyad): du ma yin/lham pa ma yin/zlum po ma yin/mnyam pa ma yin/mi mnyam pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang ring po ma yin/thung ngu ma yin//
306b7(khri brgyad): lham pa ma yin/zlum po ma yin/mnyam pa ma yin/mi mnyam pa ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
307a1(khri brgyad): na/nam mkha' ni sngon po ma yin/ser po ma yin/dmar po ma yin/dkar po ma yin/btsod ka ma yin/shol dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ma
307a2(khri brgyad): yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang sngon po ma yin/ser po ma yin/dmar po ma yin/dkar po ma yin/btsod ka ma yin/shel dang /dngul
307a3(khri brgyad): gyi kha dog lta bu mo yin te/dri'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs
307a4(khri brgyad): pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ong 'das pa ma yin/ma 'ongs pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba ma yin te/de'i phyir
307a5(khri brgyad): theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' la ni 'grib pa med/'phel ba med/'bri ba med do//rab 'byor
307a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du zag pa chen po de la'ang 'grib po med/'phelo ba med/'bri ba med de/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'od
307a7(khri brgyad): lta ste dper na/nam mkha' la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med/rnam par byang ba med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa
307b1(khri brgyad): med rnam par byang ba med de/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' la ni skye ba med/'gag pa med/gnas pa/
307b2(khri brgyad): med/gnas pa dang bral ba med/gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang skye ba med/'gag pa med/gnas pa med//
307b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang bral ba med/gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/de'i phyir theg po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'
307b4(khri brgyad): ni dge ba ma yin/mi dge ba ma yin/lung bstan du yod pa ma yin/lung du ma bstan pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang dge ba ma yin/mi dge/
307b5(khri brgyad): ba ma yin/lung bstan du yod pa ma yin/lung du ma bstan pa ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam
307b6(khri brgyad): mkha' ni mthong ba ma yin thos pa ma yin/dran pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang mthong ba ma yin/thos pa ma yin//
307b7(khri brgyad): dran pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni shes par bya ba ma
308a1(khri brgyad): yin/shes par mi bya ba'ang ma yin/yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/spang bar bya ba ma yin/mngon sum du bya ba ma yin/ngasgom par bya ba ma
308a2(khri brgyad): yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de 'du shes par bya ba ma yin/shes par mi bya ba ma yin/yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/spang bar bya ba ma yin
308a3(khri brgyad): mngon sum du bya ba ma yin bsgom par bya ba ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni
308a4(khri brgyad): rnam par smin pa ma yin/rnam par smin pa'i chos can ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de 'ong rnam par smin pa ma yin/rnam par smin pa'i chos
308a5(khri brgyad): can ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nim mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin//
308a6(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang 'dod pa'i khams
308a7(khri brgyad): du gtogs pa ma yin gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang
308b1(khri brgyad): mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa ma yin/'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin/zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin/zhe
308b2(khri brgyad): sdang dang bral po ma yin/gautA mug dang bcas pa ma yin/gti mug dang bral ba ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang 'dod chags dang bcas pa ma yin//
308b3(khri brgyad): 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin/zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin/zhe sdang dang bral ba ma yin/gti mug dang bcas pa ma yin/gti mug dang bral ba ma yin te/de'i phyir theg
308b4(khri brgyad): pa de ni nam mkha'i dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' la ni sems dang po bskyed pa med/gnyis pa med/gsum pa med/bzhi po med//
308b5(khri brgyad): lnga pa med/drug pa med/bdun pa med/brgyad pa med/dgu pa med cing /sems bskyed pa bcu pa med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang sems dang po
308b6(khri brgyad): bskyed pa med/gnyis pa med/gsum pa med/bzhi pa med/lnga pa med/drug pa med/bdun pa med/brgyad pa med/dgu pa med cing /sems bskyed pa bcu pa
308b7(khri brgyad): medo de/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' la ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med/rigs kyis
309a1(khri brgyad): med/brgyad pa'i sa med/mthong ba'i sa med/bsrabs pa'i sa med/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med/byas pa rtogs pa can gyis med do//rab
309a2(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med/rigs kyi sa med/brgyad pa'i sa me ba/mthong ba'i sa med/bsrabs pa'i sa med/'dod
309a3(khri brgyad): chags dang bral ba'i sa med/byas pa rtogs pa can gyis med de/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam
309a4(khri brgyad): mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med/dgra bcom po nyid med/rang byang chub med
