309a5(khri brgyad): do//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med/dgra
309a6(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid med/rang byang chub med de/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' la ni nyan thos
309a7(khri brgyad): kyis med/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med/byang chub sems dpa'i sa med/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen
309b1(khri brgyad): po de la'ang nyan thos kyi sa med/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med/byang chub sems dpa'i sa med/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa med de/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha'
309b2(khri brgyad): dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni gzugs can ma yin/gzugs med pa ma yin/bstan du yod pa ma yin/bstan du med pa ma
309b3(khri brgyad): yin/thogs pa dang bcas pa ma yin/thogs pa med pa ma yin/ldan pa ma yin/mi ldan pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gzugs can ma
309b4(khri brgyad): yin/gzugs med pa ma yin/bstan du yod pa ma yin/bstan du med pa ma yin/thogs pa dang bcas pa ma yin/thogs pa med pa ma yin/ldan pa ma yin/mi
309b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni rtag pa ma yin/mi rtag pa ma yin/bde ba
309b6(khri brgyad): ma yin/sdug bsngal ba mau yin/bdag ma yin/bdag med pa ma yin/zhi ba ma yin/ma zhi ba ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de 'ang rtag pa ma
309b7(khri brgyad): yin/mi rtag pa ma yin/bde ba ma yin/sdug bsngal ba ma yin/bdag ma yin/bdag med pa ma yin/zhi ba ma yin/ma zhi ba ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni
310a1(khri brgyad): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dperar+ya na/nam mkha' ni stong pa ma yin/mi stong pa m+b+ha yin+da/mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/mtshan
310a2(khri brgyad): ma med pa ma yin/smon pa yod pa ma yin smon pa med pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang stong pa ma yin/mi stong pa ma yin/mtshan ma yod
310a3(khri brgyad): pa ma yin/mtshan ma med pa ma yin/smon pa yod pa ma yin/smon pa med pa ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor
310a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni dben pa ma yin/mi dben pa ma yin/snang ba ma yin/mun pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang dben pa ma
310a5(khri brgyad): yin/mi dben pa ma yin/snang ba ma yin mun pa ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'
310a6(khri brgyad): ni 'thob pa ma yin/dmigs su yod pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang 'thob pa ma yin/dmigs su yod pa ma yin te/de'i phyir theg pa
310a7(khri brgyad): de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni brjod du yod pa ma yin/brjod du med pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin
310b1(khri brgyad): ga can de 'dra brjod du yod bu ma yin/brjod du myed pas son te/de'i phyir zlog pa de ni nam ma dang mnyam pa zlos bya'o// byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di ska/
310b2(khri brgyad): du bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dbyer bzhin/nam mabe'i ni sems can dpag tu mo mchis/grangs ma mchis/tshad ma mchis po rnams kyi go'i/ lags so//bcom ldan
310b3(khri brgyad): 'dus de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang sems can dpag tu ma mchis/grangs ma mchis/tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyi go 'byed lags te/de'o slad du theg pa chen po
310b4(khri brgyad): bkri'o zhes smras pa ni/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//rab 'byor ji ltar nam mkha' sems can dpag tu myed/grangs med/tshad med pa rnams kyi glo 'byed
310b5(khri brgyad): pa de bzhin du theg brgyan po de'ang sems can dpag tu med/blangs med/nad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sems can med du'i phyir/
310b6(khri brgyad): nam mkha' med par rig par bya zhing /num mkha' med pa'i phyir/theg pu chen po med par rig par bya ba'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni se mos
310b7(khri brgyad): can dpag tu med/grangs mod/tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang /dpag tu med
311a1(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang /nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang
311a2(khri brgyad): sems can dpag tu med pa'i phyir/nam mkha' dpag tu med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir/theg pa chen po dpag tu med par rig par bya ste//
311a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can
311a4(khri brgyad): rnams gang yin pa dang /dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang /nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab
311a5(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang sems can grangs med pa'i phyir nam mkha' grangs med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' grangs med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po grangs med par rig par bya
311a6(khri brgyad): ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar
311a7(khri brgyad): sems can rnams gang yin pa dang /grangs med pa gang yin pa dang /nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /theg pa chen po gang yin po de dag thams cad dmigs su med/
311b1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can chad med pa'i phyir nam mkha' tshad med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir thog pa chen po tshad med par rigs
311b2(khri brgyad): par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpog tu med/grangs med/tshad mod pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'dra
311b3(khri brgyad): ltar sems can rnams gang yin pa dang /ched med pa gang yin pa dang /nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /theg pa chen po gong yin pa de dag thams cod dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
311b4(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir/chos kyi dbyings med par rig par bya'o//chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o//namo
311b5(khri brgyad): mkha' med po'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//dpag tu med po yod pa ma
311b6(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir gdos med pa yod pa ma yin par rig por bya'o//grangs med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir/tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar
311b7(khri brgyad): na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can rnams gang yin/
312a1(khri brgyad): pa dang /chos kyi dbyings glang yin pa dang /nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang /grangs med
312a2(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa dang /tshad med po gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid med par
312a3(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o//de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//theg pa chen po
312a4(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//dpag tu med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir/grangs med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o///
312a5(khri brgyad): grangs med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chad med pa yod pa mo yin par rig par bya'o//tshad med pa yod po ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig por bya/
312a6(khri brgyad): ste/rab 'byor de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med/tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di
312a7(khri brgyad): ltar sems can rnams gang yin pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /dpag tu med pa gang
312b1(khri brgyad): yin pa dang /grangs myed pa gang yin pa dang /tshad med pa gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad gang yin pa de dgra thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan/
312b2(khri brgyad): yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med par rig par bya'o//sems can med pa'i phyir srog dang /skyeb po dang /gas pa dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang shod las
312b3(khri brgyad): skyes dang /shed du dong /byed pa po dang /tshor bu po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o//shes pa po dang /mthong ba po med pa'i phyir yang dag
312b4(khri brgyad): mtha' med par dag par bya'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//
312b5(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /grangs myed pa drong /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin por reg par bya'o//tshad med po yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thamos kyang
312b6(khri brgyad): med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med po rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
312b7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar gang yin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /theg pa
313a1(khri brgyad): chen po gang yin pa dang /dpag tu med pa gang yin pa dang /grangs med pa glang yin pa dang /tshad med pa gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin/
313a2(khri brgyad): pa de dag thams cad dmigs su myed pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du med
313a3(khri brgyad): par rig par bya'o//shes pa po dang /mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/bsam gyis mi khyab po'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
313a4(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir nom mkha' med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//thog pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa
313a5(khri brgyad): dang /grangs med pa dang /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/rab
313a6(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi gro 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag
313a7(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir/sems
313b1(khri brgyad): can med pa dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o//shes pa po dang /mthong ba po med pa'i phyir gzugs med par rig par bya'o//gzugs
313b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa med par rig par bya'o//rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig
313b3(khri brgyad): par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /tshad med pa yod
313b4(khri brgyad): pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//tshod med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir/chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can
313b5(khri brgyad): dpag tu med/grangs med/tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang
313b6(khri brgyad): yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang po dag med pa'i phyir/sems can med pa dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar
313b7(khri brgyad): du med par rig par bya'o//shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir mig med par rig par bya'o//mig med pa'i phyir/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /
314a1(khri brgyad): yid myed par rig par bya'o//yid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par
314a2(khri brgyad): bya'o//theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /grongs med pa dang /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//tshad med pa yod pa ma yin
314a3(khri brgyad): po'i phyir/chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med/tshad med pa rnams kyi
314a4(khri brgyad): gro 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med
314a5(khri brgyad): pi'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhon yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o//shes
314a6(khri brgyad): pa po dang /mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med par rig par bya'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol
314a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
314b1(khri brgyad): pa med par rig par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' mod par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//
314b2(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos
314b3(khri brgyad): thams cad med par rlig par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir
314b4(khri brgyad): zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar bong gi gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag
314b5(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o//shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid med
314b6(khri brgyad): par rig par bya'o//nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med par rig par bya'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
314b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa
315a1(khri brgyad): dang /grangs med pa dang /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig
315a2(khri brgyad): par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
315a3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med
315a4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o//shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/dran pa nye bar bzhag
315a5(khri brgyad): pa med par rig par bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'i phyir/yang dag par spong ba med par rig par bya'o//yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir/rdzu
315a6(khri brgyad): 'phrul gyi rkang pa med par rig par bya'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po med pa'i phyir dbang po med par rig par bya'o//dbang po med pa'i phyir stobs med por rig par
315a7(khri brgyad): bya'o//stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag med par rig par bya'o//byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'i phyir lam med par rig par bya'o//lam med
315b1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir stobs bcu med par rig par bya'o//stobs bcu med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa med par rig par bya'o//mi 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa med par
315b2(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o//so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med par rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir/nam mkha'
315b3(khri brgyad): med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir/dpag tu med pa dang /grangs me pa dang /tshad
315b4(khri brgyad): med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems
315b5(khri brgyad): can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin
315b6(khri brgyad): pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdog med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du med par
315b7(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o//shes pa po dang /mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams med par rig par bya'o//rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams med pa'i phyir brgyad pa'i
316a1(khri brgyad): sa'i chos rnams dang /mthong ba'i sa'i chos rnams dang /bsrabs pa'i sa'i chos rnams dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa'i chos rnams dang /byas
316a2(khri brgyad): pa rtogs pa can gyi sa'i chos rnams med par rig par bya'o//byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa'i chos rnams med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o//nom
316a3(khri brgyad): mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang grongs med pa dang chud med pa yod pa ma yin par
316a4(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o//tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med//
316a5(khri brgyad): blabrangs med/tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag
316a6(khri brgyad): thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du med par
316a7(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o//shes pa po dang /mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa me par rig par bya'o//rgyun du zhugs pa med pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba
316b1(khri brgyad): med par rig par bya'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba med pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o//phyir mi 'ong ba med pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa med par rig par bya'o//dgra bcom/
316b2(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang /theg pa chen po dang /dpag tu med pa dang grangs med pa dang /tshad med pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar du med par rig par bya ste/rab
316b3(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar ni theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med/tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na//rab 'byor 'di ltar bdog gang
316b4(khri brgyad): yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdog med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang /
316b5(khri brgyad): shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o//shes pa po dang /mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas med par rig por bya'o//rang sangs rgyas med
316b6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' med par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir nam mkho' med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa
316b7(khri brgyad): chen po med por rig par bya'o//theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med pa dang /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//tshad med pa
317a1(khri brgyad): yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir/chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med grangs med
317a2(khri brgyad): tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs
317a3(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir/sems can med pa dang /shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o//shes pa po
317a4(khri brgyad): dang /mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o//nyan thos kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o//rang
317a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med par rig par
317a6(khri brgyad): bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o//nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o//theg
317a7(khri brgyad): po chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang /brang so med pa dang /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o//tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams
317b1(khri brgyad): cad med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byeng ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
317b2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/mya ngan las 'dus
317b3(khri brgyad): pa'i dbyings ni sems can dpag tu med/grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed do//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang sems can dpag tu med/grangs med
317b4(khri brgyad): tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed de/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ji ltar nam mkha' sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa de bzhin du//
317b5(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po de'ang sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no//rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das theg pa
317b6(khri brgyad): chen po de la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mi dmigs shing /gnas pa mi dmigs zhes smras pa ni/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba dang
317b7(khri brgyad): 'gro ba mi dmigs shing gnas pa mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni g.yo ba med pa ste/de dag ni gang du'ang 'dong ba med/gang nas
318a1(khri brgyad): nga 'ong ba mad/gdun 'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir nan/rab 'byor gzugs nga bzhin no gang nas cad 'ong ba med/gang du nga
318a2(khri brgyad): bamed/gang na 'du gnas pa med/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dong /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong bu med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/
318a3(khri brgyad): gang na 'ang gnas pa med/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'odra ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'dra
318a4(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang
318a5(khri brgyad): 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang
318a6(khri brgyad): 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med/gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med/
318a7(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir
318b1(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du mig gi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med/rna ba dang sna dang lho dang lus dang /yid kyi rang bzhin
318b2(khri brgyad): ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du mig gi de bzhin nyid dang /ngo bo nyid dang /mtshan nyid
318b3(khri brgyad): ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med la/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ngo bo nyid dang /mtshan nyid ni
318b4(khri brgyad): gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang /de bzhin nyid dang ngo bo nyid dang mtshan
318b5(khri brgyad): nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med la/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang //
318b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ngo bo nyid dang /mtshan nyid kyang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med gang na'ang gnas pa med
318b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med cing /chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid
319a1(khri brgyad): dang /ngo bo nyid dang /mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi
319a2(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med cing /de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang /de bzhin
319a3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang
319a4(khri brgyad): 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med cing /rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtho'i de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid dang /yang
319a5(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi
319a6(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med cing /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang /bsam gyis
319a7(khri brgyad): mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa
319b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni grang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med la/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
319b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang
319b3(khri brgyad): no'ang gnas pa med cing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
319b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni grang nas kyang 'ong ba med/glang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
319b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro
319b6(khri brgyad): bo med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang
319b7(khri brgyad): gnas pa med la/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan
320a1(khri brgyad): nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med cing /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
320a2(khri brgyad): dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
320a3(khri brgyad): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po drag gi rang
320a4(khri brgyad): bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med gang na'ang gnas pa med la/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
320a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba
320a6(khri brgyad): med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med gang na'ang gnas pa med la/byung
320a7(khri brgyad): chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang /byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid dang /byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir
320b1(khri brgyad): ro//rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med gang na'ang gnas pa med la/sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi
320b2(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi rang
320b3(khri brgyad): bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang durang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med la/'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang /'du sa byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /'dus byas kyi mtshan
320b4(khri brgyad): nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang
320b5(khri brgyad): 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med la/'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang /'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba
320b6(khri brgyad): med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med/gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba mi dmigs 'gro ba mi dmigs/gnas pa'ang
320b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das theg pa de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs//
321a1(khri brgyad): dbus kyang mi dmigs lags pas/de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te/de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o zhes smras
321a2(khri brgyad): pa ni rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/theg pa chen po de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/dbus kyang mi dmigs pas//
321a3(khri brgyad): de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te/de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//do ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das
321a4(khri brgyad): pa'i dus kyis stong /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs po'i dus kyis stong /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang
321a5(khri brgyad): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong /theg pa chen po'ang theg pa chen pos stong /byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong la/rab 'byor stong pa nyid
321a6(khri brgyad): la ni gcig ces bya ba med cing /gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhi 'am/lnga 'amau/drug gam/bdun nam/brgyad dam/dgu 'am/bcu zhes bya ba 'am/tha dad du
321a7(khri brgyad): dbye ba med pa'i phyir te/de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te/theg pa chen po de la ni
321b1(khri brgyad): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//de la ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so//zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa'ang mi dmigs so//gti
321b2(khri brgyad): mug dang gti mug med pa'ang mi dmigs so//ming dang ming med pa'ang mi dmigs so//de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba'ang mi dmigs so//zag pa dang bcas pa dang //
321b3(khri brgyad): zag pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so//kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na mtho ba med pa'ang mi dmigs so//nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa'ang
321b4(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so//'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'dras pa'ang mi dmigs so//kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'ang mi dmigs so//'khor ba dang mya ngan
321b5(khri brgyad): las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so//de la ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so//bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'ang mi dmigs so//bdag dang bdag med pa'ang mi
321b6(khri brgyad): dmigs so//zhi ba dang ma zhi ba'ang mi dmigs so//'dod pa'i khams dang /'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so//gzugs kyi khams
321b7(khri brgyad): dang /gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang
322a1(khri brgyad): gsas/rgyu sbya na// nas rdzogs na dupa gyung/rang khyor 'as 'og zhan 'das pa
322a2(khri brgyad): kyis stong ngo //de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshe ro ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
322a3(khri brgyad): 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /mi 'ongs pa'i
322a4(khri brgyad): nom par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo //de bzhin du du lhur
322a5(khri brgyad): byung ba'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/de ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir
322a6(khri brgyad): zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong po nyid
322a7(khri brgyad): la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/stong pa nyid las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dmigs su
322b1(khri brgyad): med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dmigs
322b2(khri brgyad): par lta ga la 'gyur/de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la
322b3(khri brgyad): ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dmigs su med
322b4(khri brgyad): de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
322b5(khri brgyad): dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la
322b6(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/stong pa nyid la de ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dmigs su
322b7(khri brgyad): med de/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
323a1(khri brgyad): shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi
323a2(khri brgyad): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs so//rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa
323a3(khri brgyad): nyid la mi dmigs te/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so//mnyam pa nyid la ni mi 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs so//mnyam pa nyid la ni
323a4(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol
323a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
323a6(khri brgyad): dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
323a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams na mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
323b1(khri brgyad): la mi dmigs te/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mnyam
323b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rab 'byor gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
323b3(khri brgyad): ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus rnams na mi dmigs so//dran po nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam po nyid la mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mnyam
323b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang ma
323b5(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rab 'byor de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
323b6(khri brgyad): dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
323b7(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni dus
324a1(khri brgyad): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so//rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/da ltar byung ba'i dus
324a2(khri brgyad): mi dmigs te/mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
324a3(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar
324a4(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe no/rab 'byor
324a5(khri brgyad): sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon
324a6(khri brgyad): gyi mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa ni
324a7(khri brgyad): da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab
324b1(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas te/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de ltar bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad
324b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te/de la gnas
324b3(khri brgyad): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
324b4(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
324b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa chen po 'di legs par bka' stsal pa ni/legs so//legs so//bcom ldan 'das
324b6(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob lags so//bcom ldan
324b7(khri brgyad): 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la slob cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags so//
325a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa dag na mchis pa'i byang chub
325a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu ma mchis/grangs ma mchis/tshad ma mchis pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
325a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid thob par bgyid lags te/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags te/'di ltar dus
325a4(khri brgyad): gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa legs so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
325a5(khri brgyad): to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
325a6(khri brgyad): rgyas rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so//brnyes par 'gyur ro//brnyes par mdzad do//shes rab kyi
325a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las zil gyis gnon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/bcu dgu pa'o////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad
325b1(khri brgyad): stong pa//bam po bcu drug pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni
325b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bskul ba mdzad pas 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan par
325b3(khri brgyad): sems lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
325b4(khri brgyad): dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan pa 'am gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa med de/rab 'byor khyod ni
325b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi
325b6(khri brgyad): chos rnams sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/dge ba'i chos gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
325b7(khri brgyad): byin pa'i nang du 'dus shing /yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /
326a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub bya
326a2(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos de dag gang lcags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong
326a3(khri brgyad): bo bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yon lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam
326a4(khri brgyad): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
326a5(khri brgyad): 'jug pa bzhi dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
326a6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
326a7(khri brgyad): par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang rtag
326b1(khri brgyad): tu btang snyoms su gnas pa ste/rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos kyi chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi
326b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing /yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos rnams yin no//rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /shes
326b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
326b4(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /gzugs gang yin pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes
326b5(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /mig gang yin pa dang /gzugs gang yin pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi
326b6(khri brgyad): 'dus te rigr-I pa gang yin pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid gang yin pa dang /chos
326b7(khri brgyad): rnams gang yin pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
327a1(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang
327a2(khri brgyad): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /stong pa
327a3(khri brgyad): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang /sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba dang /
327a4(khri brgyad): 'gog pa dang /lam dang /'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i
327a5(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
327a6(khri brgyad): kyi bar dag gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang yin pa dang /chos kyi dbyings gang
327a7(khri brgyad): yin pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa gang
327b1(khri brgyad): yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan
327b2(khri brgyad): nyid gcig pa yin pas/rab 'byor rnam blangs des na/khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
327b3(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
327b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/theg pa chen po'ang gzhan/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhing /theg
327b5(khri brgyad): pa chen po'ang gzhan pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//theg pa chen po'ang
327b6(khri brgyad): gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis
327b7(khri brgyad): su dbyer med do//rab 'byor de'i phyir theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen
328a1(khri brgyad): po bstan par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub
328a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar khas me len lags so//byang chub sems dpe' ni phyi mi'i mthar khas mi len lags so//byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su khas mi
328a3(khri brgyad): len lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzugs mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
328a4(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzugs byang chub
328a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis shing /mi dmigs legs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa byang chub
328a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams
328a7(khri brgyad): cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /ma dmigs lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes
328b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so//bcom//
328b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/bdag bdag ces bgyi ba'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
328b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang /byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa
328b4(khri brgyad): logs na/gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam
328b5(khri brgyad): par shes pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so//gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
328b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su ma mchis
328b7(khri brgyad): na/ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan por bgyi logs sam/bcom ldan 'das de ltar
329a1(khri brgyad): bstan par che/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing /yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/me skrag mi dngang zhing dngang
329a2(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
329a3(khri brgyad): bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len pa yin/byang chub
329a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len pa yin/byang chub sems dpa' dbus su khas mi len pa yin/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/gzugs mu med pa'i
329a5(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' mu
329a6(khri brgyad): med par rig par bya/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
329a7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes po byang chubo sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du
329b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad/rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong //
329b2(khri brgyad): mi dmigs lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/
329b3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas logs so zhes bya ba'i bar du smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di
329b4(khri brgyad): skad du/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/bdag bdag ces bgyi'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems
329b5(khri brgyad): dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so zhes smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/bcom
329b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang /'du
329b7(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so//gang mngon par ma grub
330a1(khri brgyad): pa de ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ci
330a2(khri brgyad): mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab
330a3(khri brgyad): 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs
330a4(khri brgyad): su ma mchis pa lags so zhes smra/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems
330a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum/mi 'gong zhing yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/mi skrag mi dngang zhing /dngang bar mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
330a6(khri brgyad): po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/
330a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can stong pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//tshe dang
330b1(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dngos po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
330b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//gzugs stong pa dang /gzugs
330b3(khri brgyad): dben pa dang /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
330b4(khri brgyad): par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//rnam par shes pa stong pa dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /rnam par shes pa ngo
330b5(khri brgyad): bo nyid med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
330b6(khri brgyad): sngon gyi mthar khas mi ljon te//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
330b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khos mi len to//de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
331a1(khri brgyad): dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//shes rab
331a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
331a3(khri brgyad): khas mi len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar stong pa nyid la sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams kyang mi dmigs te/stong pa
331a4(khri brgyad): nyid kyang gzhan la/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhing /sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
331a5(khri brgyad): bu de ltar na stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis
331a6(khri brgyad): su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams
331a7(khri brgyad): su khas mi len to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa'ang gzhan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan dben pa'ang gzhan/ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan/byang chub sems dpa' yang
331b1(khri brgyad): gzhan/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
331b2(khri brgyad): gzhan/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhing /sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams kyang gzhan
331b3(khri brgyad): pa ma yin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang /stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dben pa gang yin po dang /ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
331b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni
331b5(khri brgyad): gnyis su med cing gnyis su dper med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su
331b6(khri brgyad): khas mi len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khaso mi len to//dngos po med pa'i ngo
331b7(khri brgyad): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang
332a1(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /nang stong pa nyid stong pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
332a2(khri brgyad): dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
332a3(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha'
332a4(khri brgyad): dang /dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /stong pa dang /dben pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan la/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
332a5(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /stong pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan zhing /byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang //
332a6(khri brgyad): dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /stong pa dang /dben pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin/
332a7(khri brgyad): pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /stong pa dang /dben pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang
332b1(khri brgyad): yin pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam
332b2(khri brgyad): grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar
332b3(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa dang /
332b4(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dben pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus
332b5(khri brgyad): rnams su khas mi len to//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam
332b6(khri brgyad): dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha'
332b7(khri brgyad): dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dben pa dang /sangs
333a1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//de ci'i phyir
333a2(khri brgyad): zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar med pa dang /stong pa dang /dben pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams mi
333a3(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir ro//med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/stong pa'ang gzhan ma yin/dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin zhing /dran pa nye bar
333a4(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang gzhan ma yin zhing /sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams kyang gzhan
333a5(khri brgyad): ma yin pa'i phyir te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med pa dang /stong pa dang /dben pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /sangs
333a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dang /sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer
333a7(khri brgyad): med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//tshe dang ldan
333b1(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad med pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad med pa dang /chos kyi dbyings med pa dang /de bzhin nyid med pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'
333b2(khri brgyad): med pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha'
333b3(khri brgyad): dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ting nge 'dzin med pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtho'i bar du med pa dang /yang dge ba'i mtha'i
333b4(khri brgyad): bar du ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa'ang gzhan/stong pa'ang gla zhan//
333b5(khri brgyad): dben pa'ang gzhan/ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du'ang gzhan zhing /sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i
333b6(khri brgyad): mtha' dang /dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar gang yin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin
333b7(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag ni thams cad kyi
334a1(khri brgyad): thams cad/rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems
334a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas me len to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
334a3(khri brgyad): gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//nyan thos stong pa dang /nyan thos dben pa dang /nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
334a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//rang sangs rgyas med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' med pa dang /rnam po thams cad
334a5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid med pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med
334a6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /phye ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khos mi len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu med pa dang /
334a7(khri brgyad): stong pa dang dben pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//med pa dang /stong pa dang /dben pa dang /
334b1(khri brgyad): da nyid mo dra pa'ang gzhan zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas mang gzhan la sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma
334b2(khri brgyad): yin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa dang /stong pa dang /dben pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
334b3(khri brgyad): dpa' dang /sangs rgyas de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /
334b4(khri brgyad): phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus rnams su khas mi len to//tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang 'di skad du/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/gzugs mu med pa'i phyi
334b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/tshe rang dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma myong
334b6(khri brgyad): par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
334b7(khri brgyad): pa ni nam mkho' dang mnyam pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni mtha' dang /dbus dong /mtha' mi dmigs
335a1(khri brgyad): kyang /nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
335a2(khri brgyad): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am/dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba
335a3(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i
335a4(khri brgyad): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am/dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa
335a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' su med par rig par bya'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
335a6(khri brgyad): par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams dang /skye mched rnams dang /dran pa nye bar
335a7(khri brgyad): bzhag pa dang /yang dag por spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
335b1(khri brgyad): pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na//
335b2(khri brgyad): mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la mtha' 'am/dbus mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos
335b3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar du stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mtha' 'am/dbus mi dmigs te/stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
335b4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs desau na/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod
335b5(khri brgyad): 'di skad du/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
335b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong
335b7(khri brgyad): ngo //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA
336a1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs/stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs la/de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ni tshor
336a2(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs/stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/
336a3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
336a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
336a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
336a6(khri brgyad): dong /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du spyong
336a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing /stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid
336b1(khri brgyad): kyikyis stong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo //dran pa nyo bar bzhag pa rnams ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag
336b2(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyis stong ngo //yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /skyobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam
336b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
336b4(khri brgyad): rnams kyis stong ngo //chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo //de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ngo //yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ngo //bsam
336b5(khri brgyad): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bas mo gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ngo //ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyis spong ngo //gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis snang ngo //
336b6(khri brgyad): thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis skyong ngo //laMm g+hi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam
336b7(khri brgyad): thathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ngo //rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni ring sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo //sangs rgyas
337a1(khri brgyad): kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo //nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ngo //rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' ni byang
337a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpas stong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi
337a3(khri brgyad): dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA
337a4(khri brgyad): ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
337a5(khri brgyad): par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
337a6(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang
337a7(khri brgyad): dag por rjes su mi mthong /ma dmigs lags na/byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi
337b1(khri brgyad): sa sgra zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs su med do//gzugs ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do//tshor ba ni tshor bya la dmigs su med do//
337b2(khri brgyad): tshor ba ni gzugs la dmigs su med do//gzugs dang /tshor ba dag ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do//'du shes ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do//'du shes ni gzugs
337b3(khri brgyad): dang /tshor ba dag la dmigs su med do//'du byed rnams ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so//'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'du shes
337b4(khri brgyad): ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs/
337b5(khri brgyad): so//gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs
337b6(khri brgyad): dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
337b7(khri brgyad): byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so//mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba ni mig la med
338a1(khri brgyad): tsang mi dmigs so//rna ba ni rno ba la med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba ni sA la med cing mi dmigs so//sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so//sna ni mig dang na
338a2(khri brgyad): ba la med cing mi dmigs so//sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so//lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so//lce ni mig dang rna ba dang /sna dag la med cing mi dmigs
338a3(khri brgyad): so//lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so//lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so//lus ni mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce rnams la med cing mi dmigs
338a4(khri brgyad): so//lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so//yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so//yid ni mig dang rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus rnams la med cing mi
338a5(khri brgyad): dmigs so//gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so//gzugs ni sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//sgra ni
338a6(khri brgyad): sgra la med cing mi dmigs so//sgra ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin du dI ni dri dang /gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so//ro ni ro
338a7(khri brgyad): dang gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so//reg bya ni reg bya dang gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so//chos ni chos rnams dang gzhan dag la'ang med cing
338b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so//de dag la'ang de med cing mau/
338b2(khri brgyad): dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni de bzhin
338b3(khri brgyad): te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so//gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so//de'ang gzhan dag la med cing mi
338b4(khri brgyad): dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa lnga med cing mi dmigs so//de ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so//de la gzhan dag kyang med/
338b5(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang de
338b6(khri brgyad): bzhin te/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang rig pa gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so//mig/
338b7(khri brgyad): gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//de la'ang gzhan dag dang gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag
339a1(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so//rna ba dang /sna dang /lho dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba/
339a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so//de la'ang gzhan dag dang /gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar
339a3(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang //
339a4(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
339a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par
339a6(khri brgyad): rig pa rnams la med cing ma dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa
339a7(khri brgyad): rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//chos thams cad ni chos thams cad la med cing mi dmigs so//chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi
339b1(khri brgyad): chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la
339b2(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
339b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs rnams la med cing mi dmigs
339b4(khri brgyad): so//gzungs ni gzungs la med cing mi dmigs so//gzungs ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so//so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs
339b5(khri brgyad): so//rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang /byas pa rtogs po can gyi sa dang /rang sangs
339b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sa dang /byang chub sems dpe'i sa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la med cing mi
339b7(khri brgyad): dmigs so//de bshin du rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang
340a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/yang dag par
340a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol
340a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so//gdams pa dang /rjes su bstan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs
340a4(khri brgyad): so//gdams pa dang /rjes su bston pa ni/gdams pa dang /rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa'i ni gdams pa dang /rjes
340a5(khri brgyad): su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas/byang chub sems dpa' yang med cing mi
340a6(khri brgyad): dmigs te bstan du med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes
