340a7(khri brgyad): bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags
340b1(khri brgyad): pa ste/de'i phyir 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi ming de ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang /
340b2(khri brgyad): mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro'o//di/ 'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tsher ba zhes
340b3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin no//ming gang yin pa
340b4(khri brgyad): de'ang gzugs ma yin/tsho ba ma yin/'du shes ma yin/'du byed rnams ma yin/rnam por shes pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ming ni ming gi ngo bo
340b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyis stong la/stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin pa'i phyir to/de'i phyir 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa
340b6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam ste/ming la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med la/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
340b7(khri brgyad): la'ang ming med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs
341a1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir te/de'i phyir 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
341a2(khri brgyad): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni/
341a3(khri brgyad): ming tsam ste/ming la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
341a4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/de'i phyir 'di lta ste/byang chub sems
341a5(khri brgyad): dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin pas/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di
341a6(khri brgyad): lta ste/nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam ste/nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ming med la//
341a7(khri brgyad): ming la'ang nang stong pa nyid med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar los gud na'ang ming med la/ming la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
341b1(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar dag med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi gu'ang
341b2(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
341b3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las bud na'ang ming med la/ming la'ang dran pa nye
341b4(khri brgyad): bar bzhag pa rnams med do//de ci'i phyir zhe no/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing
341b5(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan
341b6(khri brgyad): lcag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi
341b7(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na'ang ming med la/ming la'ang sangs rgyas kyi
342a1(khri brgyad): chos rnams med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyu dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga 'ang
342a2(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba dang /gzungs kyi sgro rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam pa thams
342a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid las gud na'ang med med la/ming la'ang rnam pa thams
342a4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin po dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de ga
342a5(khri brgyad): ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/'di lta ste/dper
342a6(khri brgyad): bgyin/bdag bdug ces bgyi bo'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so zhes sgra zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu bdag gtan med cing mi
342a7(khri brgyad): dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dang /srog dang /skye ba po dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu
342b1(khri brgyad): dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes dang /shod bu dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par
342b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
342b3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gtan med cing mi
342b4(khri brgyad): dmagos na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag mngon par
342b5(khri brgyad): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/de bzhin du sgra
342b6(khri brgyad): dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ge la yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi rnam par
342b7(khri brgyad): shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi
343a1(khri brgyad): dmigs na/de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par
343a2(khri brgyad): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag mngon par 'grub
343a3(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga
343a4(khri brgyad): la yod/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba
343a5(khri brgyad): lta ga yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshul khrims kyi pha
343a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
343a7(khri brgyad): pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong po nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de
343b1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la
343b2(khri brgyad): yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gtan mod cing mi dmigs na/de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/yang dag par spong ba
343b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
343b4(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag mngon
343b5(khri brgyad): par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag mngon par 'grub par
343b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/rang sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon
343b7(khri brgyad): par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/byang chub sems dpa' gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/de bzhin gshegs pa
344a1(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtan mod cing mi dmigs na/de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/tshe dang ldan pa shwA/
344a2(khri brgyad): ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/bdag bdag ces bye nga'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan med pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du/
344a3(khri brgyad): 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags nu zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ljon
344a4(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid
344a5(khri brgyad): med/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do//tsher ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
344a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do//de bzhin du rmya bo dang /
344a7(khri brgyad): dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus pa las drung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /
344b1(khri brgyad): rog bya dang /chos rnams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /rna ba dang //
344b2(khri brgyad): sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi
344b3(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid
344b4(khri brgyad): med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes
344b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa los byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no//
344b6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
344b7(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa ste/gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/gang dang yang bral bas ma
345a1(khri brgyad): yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/gang dang yang bral bas ma yin
345a2(khri brgyad): no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de na zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o//de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang /
345a3(khri brgyad): bdag med pa dang /zhi ba dang /stong pa dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ste/gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
345a4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /zag pa
345a5(khri brgyad): med pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /'dus ma byas pa ste/gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no//de ci'i phyir
345a6(khri brgyad): zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad
345a7(khri brgyad): ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/'jigs pa ma yin//
345b1(khri brgyad): no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/'jig pa ma yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
345b2(khri brgyad): bu gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/'jig pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //
345b3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/'jig pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe ni/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du dge ba
345b4(khri brgyad): dang /mi dge ba dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas po dang /zag pa med pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /nyon
345b5(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i chos
345b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/'jig pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/tshe dang ldan
345b7(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gong yang khyod 'di skad du/ci'i phyir gong mngon par grub
346a1(khri brgyad): pa'i gzugs de gang lags/gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de/
346a2(khri brgyad): gang lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang //
346a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa
346a4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu mig ni mngon par 'dus mi byas pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba
346a5(khri brgyad): dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan
346a6(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mngon par
346a7(khri brgyad): 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//chos thams cad kyi bar du'ong mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi
346b1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu rnam grangs des na/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnams ni
346b2(khri brgyad): mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ci'i phyir gang mngon par ma grub pa de/gzugs ma lags/gang mngon par
346b3(khri brgyad): ma grub pa de tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma lagasau zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/de de bzhin
346b4(khri brgyad): no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do//gang la skye
346b5(khri brgyad): ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rong
346b6(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong ste/rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing /'jig pa med do//gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do///
346b7(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jog pa med do//gang dag la skye ba med cing 'jog pa med pa
347a1(khri brgyad): de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/rnam grangs des na/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no//gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang /
347a2(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par
347a3(khri brgyad): ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sa mo zhes smra zhes zer po ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar
347a4(khri brgyad): mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/de ltar na mngon
347a5(khri brgyad): par ma grub pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/kho bos 'di skad
347a6(khri brgyad): du/ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gaudams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smras so//
347a7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa las gud da' ga byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
347b1(khri brgyad): bo dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
347b2(khri brgyad): spyod pas/mngon par ma grub pa'ang gzhan la/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/de ltar na mngon par mi grub pa dang //
347b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//mngon por ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /mngon
347b4(khri brgyad): par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa
347b5(khri brgyad): dang /gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
347b6(khri brgyad): shes pa don gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/de ltar
347b7(khri brgyad): na mngon par ma grub pa dang /chos thams cod kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/mngon par ma grub
348a1(khri brgyad): pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong
348a2(khri brgyad): pa/bam po bcu bdun po//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
348a3(khri brgyad): sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing /yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/mi skrag mi dngang zhing /dngang por mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes
348a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
348a5(khri brgyad): pos ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos thams cad rmi lame lta bu dang /sgyu ma lto bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /brag cha lta
348a6(khri brgyad): bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub
348a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /bstan pa 'di thos na mi sgeg mi dngang zhing dang bar mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan
348b1(khri brgyad): 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
348b2(khri brgyad): la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /'di ni
348b3(khri brgyad): gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//de'i tshe tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa khas mi len cing /mi 'dzin
348b4(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//de bzhin du de'i tshe/mig khas
348b5(khri brgyad): mi len cing /mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//de bzhin du de'i tshe rna
348b6(khri brgyad): ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid khwas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par
348b7(khri brgyad): mi bgyid legs so//de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /'di ni sbyin pa'i
349a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lugs so//de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
349a2(khri brgyad): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khos mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi
349a3(khri brgyad): bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi
349a4(khri brgyad): len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//dri bzhin du de'i
349a5(khri brgyad): tshe/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing /mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /'di ni dngos
349a6(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
349a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing /mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni dran
349b1(khri brgyad): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
349b2(khri brgyad): dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams
349b3(khri brgyad): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khas mi len cing /mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par zhen par mi
349b4(khri brgyad): bgyid cing /'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
349b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing /mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/mngon par
349b6(khri brgyad): zhen par mi bgyid cing /'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
349b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /de bzhin du phung po dang /khams dang /
350a1(khri brgyad): skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /pha rol tu phyin pa
350a2(khri brgyad): rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi
350a3(khri brgyad): mthong ba'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/gzugs kyi skyo ba ma mchis pa gang 'gas pa de gzugs ma
350a4(khri brgyad): lags pa'i slad du'o//de ltar na gzugs dang /skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer mo mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/
350a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
350a6(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so//mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig mo legs so//rna ba dang /
350a7(khri brgyad): sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags
350b1(khri brgyad): pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
350b2(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o//de ltar
350b3(khri brgyad): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma ma ches pa gang
350b4(khri brgyad): lags pa de ni nang stong po nyid ma lagos so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skyo ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
350b5(khri brgyad): ma lags te/de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//bcom
350b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags te/de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
350b7(khri brgyad): dang skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mtshos shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis legs so//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang
351a1(khri brgyad): po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /so so yang dag par rig
351a2(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
351a3(khri brgyad): dang /skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang
351a4(khri brgyad): lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste/de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de
351a5(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid ma lags te/de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang /skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das
351a6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/de'i slad du de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so//ma nor
351a7(khri brgyad): ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam
351b1(khri brgyad): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /skye ba ma
351b2(khri brgyad): mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de
351b3(khri brgyad): ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//
351b4(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/mang po ma logs pa'i slad du ste/de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /skye ba ma mchis
351b5(khri brgyad): pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so//
351b6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/de ltar na phung po rnams dang /'grib pa de ni gnyis su
351b7(khri brgyad): ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o//khams dang /skye mched
352a1(khri brgyad): rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang /skye mched rnams ma lags te/de ltar na khams dang /skye mched rnams dang /'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis
352a2(khri brgyad): shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/de ltar na sbyin
352a3(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
352a4(khri brgyad): pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
352a5(khri brgyad): pa ma lags te/de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan
352a6(khri brgyad): 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/mang po mi lags pa'i slad du ste/de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
352a7(khri brgyad): lags so//bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis
352b1(khri brgyad): su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de ci'i snod du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grub pa ni gcig ma lags/mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang
352b2(khri brgyad): lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so//de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/
352b3(khri brgyad): de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib
352b4(khri brgyad): pa ni gcig ma lags/mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'gri ba po gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so//bcom
352b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags te/de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /'grib pa de ni gnyis
352b6(khri brgyad): su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/de'i slad du
352b7(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags so//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang /
353a1(khri brgyad): bo rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags
353a2(khri brgyad): de ltar na lam dang /'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchi so shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slang du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcigs
353a3(khri brgyad): lags/mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags so//de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so
353a4(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/de ltar na sangs
353a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
353a6(khri brgyad): lags/mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so//bcom
353a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so//de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
353b1(khri brgyad): shes pa zhes bgro ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so//gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa
353b2(khri brgyad): lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o///de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe bang ldan
353b3(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog/
353b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod
353b5(khri brgyad): 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//byang chub
353b6(khri brgyad): des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do//chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she na/gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/de la'ang mngon par zhen
353b7(khri brgyad): pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams
354a1(khri brgyad): /dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do//stobs rnams dang /
354a2(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do//shA
354a3(khri brgyad): ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang /rtags gang dag
354a4(khri brgyad): dang /mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/'di lta ste rnam pa gang dag dang /rtags gang dag dang /mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos
354a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /gzugs rnams sam/sgra rnams sam/dri rnams sam/ro rnams sam/reg bya rnams sam/chos rnams sam/nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa ste/de
354a6(khri brgyad): ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
354a7(khri brgyad): gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//gang las ring du song zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung
354b1(khri brgyad): po rnams dang /khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las ring du song /nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song /'gro ba
354b2(khri brgyad): drug las ring du song ste/de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
354b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song ste/de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
354b4(khri brgyad): las ring du song ste/de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /
354b5(khri brgyad): stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las rang du song ste/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o//
354b6(khri brgyad): stospobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag las rnying du song ste/de'i phyir shes rab
354b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o//
355a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/
355a2(khri brgyad): nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/gzugs rtag ces bya
355a3(khri brgyad): ba dang /mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go//gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya bar nye bar
355a4(khri brgyad): mi rtog go/gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /
355a5(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar
355a6(khri brgyad): mi rtog go/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa bde
355a7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /
355b1(khri brgyad): ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang /mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mo rtog go/rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi
355b2(khri brgyad): rtog go//rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/de bzhin du/sbyin
355b3(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab
355b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/de bzhin du sbyar te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag ces
355b5(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mi stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
355b6(khri brgyad): smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go//de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi
355b7(khri brgyad): rtog go//de bzhin du sbyar te/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba
356a1(khri brgyad): dang /mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba
356a2(khri brgyad): dang /mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/de bzhin du sbyar te/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi
356a3(khri brgyad): yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
356a4(khri brgyad): bco brgyad dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/bde zhes bya
356a5(khri brgyad): ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mi stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshon
356a6(khri brgyad): ma yod ces bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya ba dang /dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste/tshe dang
356a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe
356b1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
356b2(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i ma skyes po gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so//de bzhin du khams dang /skye mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid
356b3(khri brgyad): thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
356b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so zhes smra/rab 'byor gyis smras
356b5(khri brgyad): pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam
356b6(khri brgyad): grangs des na/gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas
356b7(khri brgyad): stong ngo //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/rnam par shes pa'i skye ba
357a1(khri brgyad): med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong
357a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
357a3(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid
357a4(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/shes
357a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/skye ba
357a6(khri brgyad): med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/dngos
357a7(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/dngos po
357b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin
357b2(khri brgyad): pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi
357b3(khri brgyad): yan lag dang /lam dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /rnam pa thams cad
357b4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do//tshe dang
357b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
357b6(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/'di ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa grang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa
357b7(khri brgyad): gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so//de bzhin du khams dang /skye mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /stong pa nyid dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
358a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad
358a2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags zhes zer/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa
358a3(khri brgyad): dang /gzugs gang yin pa dang /gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang /'grib pa gang yin pa dang /tshoro ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gang
358a4(khri brgyad): yin pa dang /gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing /gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/
358a5(khri brgyad): 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//khams dang /skye mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
358a6(khri brgyad): dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /skyobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa
358a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin to/de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag
358b1(khri brgyad): thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing /gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
358b2(khri brgyad): bu rnam grangs des na/gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni
358b3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ma yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang
358b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/khyod 'di skad du gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
358b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so//gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis
358b6(khri brgyad): pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so zhes smra/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin lo/gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/skye ba med pa nyid
358b7(khri brgyad): kyang gzugs so//gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o//skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhon ma yin te/
359a1(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang yang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis
359a2(khri brgyad): su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no//gang yang tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no//khams dang
359a3(khri brgyad): skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /stobs bcu dang /mi
359a4(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
359a5(khri brgyad): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/tshe dang
359a6(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa
359a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar
359b1(khri brgyad): rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
359b2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sems can dang /
359b3(khri brgyad): srog dang /gsob dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes dang /shed bu dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags
359b4(khri brgyad): so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/khams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
359b5(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
359b6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/nang
359b7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mtshos pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par
360a1(khri brgyad): dag pa'i slad du/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
360a2(khri brgyad): dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /gzungs dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /sangs
360a3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/so so'i skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong
360a4(khri brgyad): lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi sgo ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /rgyun tu zhugs
360a5(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /dgra bcom pa dang /dgra bcom pa'i chos
360a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong
360a7(khri brgyad): lags so//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/gzugs
360b1(khri brgyad): ni skye ba med pa yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med pa yin/khams rnams skye ba med pa yin/skye mched rnams skye ba med pa yin/rten
360b2(khri brgyad): cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin/stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin//
360b3(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bca
360b4(khri brgyad): brgyad skye ba med pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin/so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med pa yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba med pa yin/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /rgyun
360b5(khri brgyad): du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /dgra bcom pa dang /dgra bcom
360b6(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin
360b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal to gzugs kyang skye ba med la/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa yin ni no/tshe dang ldan
361a1(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyis kyang /nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/de bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /de bzhin du byang
361a2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/'gro ba rnam pa lnga'ang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
361a3(khri brgyad): byang chub rnam pa lnga'ang thob zin par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na/ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir
361a4(khri brgyad): lam bsgom par bya/lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug bslab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i tshe dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba
361a5(khri brgyad): lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis ni rang
361a6(khri brgyad): byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing sdug bsngal gang yin
361a7(khri brgyad): po de dag nyams su myong bar byed/ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
361b1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang /mngon/
361b2(khri brgyad): par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do//kho bo ni ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par mi 'dod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do//lon cig phyir 'ong ba dang /lan
361b3(khri brgyad): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang /skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang /rang
361b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni/byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba sprad pa spyod par mi 'dod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba'i
361b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes kyis mi spyod do//da ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas pas ni/sems can dpag tu med/grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi
361b6(khri brgyad): nus pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'on kyang par 'du shes bskyed pa dang /mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang /bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang /bdag tu 'du shes bskyed ni sems can dpag
361b7(khri brgyad): tu med/grangs med pa rnams kyi doni byed par nus so//tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ji ltar bdag bdag
362a1(khri brgyad): ces bya ba'ang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad dam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la'ang de ltar sems bskyed par
362a2(khri brgyad): bya'o//gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur na/dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams
362a3(khri brgyad): cad kyi thams cad/rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skye ba med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod
362a4(khri brgyad): par mi 'dod do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yod par mi 'dod do//chos ma skyes pas kyang 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod
362a5(khri brgyad): do//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob bam/'on te skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob/rab 'byor gyis smras
362a6(khri brgyad): pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob por yang mi 'dod la/ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes po 'thob par yang mi 'dod do//shA ri'i
362a7(khri brgyad): bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci 'thob pa'ang med la/mngon par rtogs pa'ang med dam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa'ang yod/mngon par
362b1(khri brgyad): rtogs pa'ang yod de gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'am/lan
362b2(khri brgyad): cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/dgra bcom pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas sam/byang chub sems dpa' 'am/sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa yin te/don dam
362b3(khri brgyad): par ni 'thob pa'ang med/mngon par rtogs pa'ang med/rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang med/phyir mi 'ong ba'ang med/dgra bcom pa'ang med/rang sangs rgyas kyang
362b4(khri brgyad): med/byang chub sems dpa' yang med/sangs rgyas kyang med do//shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi bsnyad du gzugs
362b5(khri brgyad): med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid me par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du/skye ba med pa'ang de lta yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa
362b6(khri brgyad): bu de de bzhin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/skye ba'ang mi skyel skye ba med pa'ang mi skye'o//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos mi skyes so chos ma skyes so/
362b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar brjod par spobs sam/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cho so ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang brjod par spobs sam/rab 'byor gyis smras po/tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu chos ma
363a1(khri brgyad): skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod skyobs sam zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho
363a2(khri brgyad): bo la med do//chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med par brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo la med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang //
363a3(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang /spobs pa gang yin pa dang /brjod pa gang yin pa dang /mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing
363a4(khri brgyad): gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod
363a5(khri brgyad): pa'ang skye ba med/spobs pa'ang skye ba med/chos kyang skye ba med/gang dag las brtsams te/brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe
363a6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o//spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o//chos ni skye ba med pa'o//gang dag las brtsams te/brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag
363a7(khri brgyad): kyang skye ba med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs skye ba med pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang /de bzhin du khams rnams
363b1(khri brgyad): dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /ting nge
363b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang skye
363b3(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de bzhin te/brjod pa skye ba med do//spobs pa skye ba med do//chos skyo
363b4(khri brgyad): ba med do//gang dag las brtsams te/brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do//phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
363b5(khri brgyad): dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang
363b6(khri brgyad): drag par rlig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du skye ba med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do//de ltar na 'jig rten
363b7(khri brgyad): gyi tha snyad kyis 'gro ba lnga po dag tha dad pa yin gyi/don dam par ni ma yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar
364a1(khri brgyad): 'thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du/'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha dad kyi/don dam par ni ma yin no//de ci
364a2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don dam par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med/skye ba'ang med/'gag pa'ang med/kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med/rnam par byang ba'ang
364a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci chos ma skyes pa skye 'am/'on te chos skyes pa skye/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos
364a4(khri brgyad): ma skyes po skye bar yang mi 'dod la/chos skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod do//sh+lo ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/rab 'byor gyis
364a5(khri brgyad): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do//kho bo ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye ba ri mi 'dod
364a6(khri brgyad): de//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stong pa nyid
364a7(khri brgyad): thams cad dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /byang chub ma skyes pa 'thob pa
364b1(khri brgyad): mi 'dod/mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs
364b2(khri brgyad): skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar
364b3(khri brgyad): mi 'dod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma
364b4(khri brgyad): skyes pa'i chos skye 'am/skyes pa'i chos skye/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ma skyes pa'ang mi skyo la/skyes pa'ang mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di
364b5(khri brgyad): ltor skyes pa gang yin pa dang /ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/sko ba med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
364b6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang /de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing
364b7(khri brgyad): 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cod dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams
365a1(khri brgyad): cad dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/lus
365a2(khri brgyad): kyi 'du byed rnams dang /ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang /yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam
365a3(khri brgyad): grangs des na/brjod pa skye ba med/spobs pa skye ba med/chos skye ba med/gang dag las brtsams te/brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skyo ba med do//shA ri'i bus smras pa/
365a4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bzhag pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de nyid las nges par
365a5(khri brgyad): 'byung ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/'od ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/chos thams
365a6(khri brgyad): cad la mi gnas pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis
365a7(khri brgyad): ka med par yang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi
365b1(khri brgyad): gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ku med par yang mi dmigs s+ho//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni rang bzhin gyis sbyong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol nA'ang mi gnas/
365b2(khri brgyad): gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol
365b3(khri brgyad): na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/da ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ka/
365b4(khri brgyad): med par yang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas//
365b5(khri brgyad): gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ka
365b6(khri brgyad): med par yang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
365b7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ka med par yang mi
366a1(khri brgyad): dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs
366a2(khri brgyad): so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mo gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ka med par yang mi
366a3(khri brgyad): dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ka med par yang mi
366a4(khri brgyad): dmigs so//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam
366a5(khri brgyad): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de dag ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so
366a6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de dag ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis ka med par
366a7(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi b.ri ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/gnyis
366b1(khri brgyad): ka med par yang mi dmigs te//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/byang
366b2(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs
366b3(khri brgyad): su sbyang bar bya'o//khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
366b4(khri brgyad): chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas
366b5(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su sbyang bar bya'o//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub
366b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin po drug la spyod pa/ji ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin po'i pha rol
366b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do//de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha
367a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do//shA ri'i bus
367a2(khri brgyad): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu//
367a3(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po dang /sbyin bdag tu gyur cing /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /sdug phongs pa dang /'dron pa dang
367a4(khri brgyad): slongs mau pa zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni mi
367a5(khri brgyad): tog/me tog phreng 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog phreng /spos 'dod pa rnams ni spos/byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/mal cha dang stan 'dod pa
367a6(khri brgyad): rnams la ni mal cha dang stan/'chog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni 'chog chas/sman 'dod pa rnams la ni sman/mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed cing /bu 'dod pa rnams
367a7(khri brgyad): la ni bu sbyin par byed/bu mo 'dod pa rnams la ni bu mo sbyin par byed/chung ma 'dod pa rnams la ni chung ma sbyin par byed/rgyal srad 'dod pa rnams la ni rgyal srid sbyin par byed//
367b1(khri brgyad): mgo 'dod pa rnams la ni mgo sbyin par byed/mig 'dod pa rnams la ni mig sbyin par byed/yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la ni yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par byed/shwa dang /khrag
367b2(khri brgyad): dang /rkang 'dod pa rnams la ni sha dang khrag dang rkang sbyin par byed la de'ang gnas shing yongs su gtong bar byed de/de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o//'di ni len pa'o//'di ni sbyin pa'o//
367b3(khri brgyad): bdag ni ser sa med pa'o//bdag ni sbyin bdag go/bdag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o//bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o//bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
367b4(khri brgyad): spyod pa'o snyam du sems shing sbyin pa de'ang byin nas/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe
367b5(khri brgyad): 'di la'ang bde bar 'gyur zhing /len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do//de ni chags pa
367b6(khri brgyad): gsum la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /gzhan du 'du shes pa dang /sbyin par 'du shes pa ste/chags pa gsum po de
367b7(khri brgyad): dag la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/de ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//ci'i phyir/'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/'di ltar 'jig
368a1(khri brgyad): rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags shing mi 'da' ste/de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
368a2(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o//de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa
368a3(khri brgyad): sbyin pa na/bdag tu mi dmigs/len par mi dmigs/sbyin par mi dmigs shing /de'i rnam par smin pa la'ang mngon pa ri dga' ba med pa ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub snyoms
368a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/sbyin pa de sems
368a5(khri brgyad): can thams cad la stobs par byed kyang sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs/bdag kyang mi dmigs/sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs la/sbyin pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
368a6(khri brgyad): chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed cing /byang chub kyang mi dmigs pa de ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//ci'i phyir 'jig rten las
368a7(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' ste/de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i
368b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyupha rol tu byon pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinapa'ang de bzhin no//
368b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po bco brgyad pa//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten pa'i yang yod/'jig rten las 'das pa
368b3(khri brgyad): s+yAng yod de/de la 'jog rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag gis ser sI'i sems char bcang
368b4(khri brgyad): do zhes dmigs pa la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/de'ang bdag dang /sems can dang /sbyin po'i 'du shes la gnas shing /de bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ste/dmigs
368b5(khri brgyad): pa la gnas nas/phyi dang nang gi dngos po 'am/zin pa'am/ma zin pa'am/ci bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /de sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas shing /lus dang /
368b6(khri brgyad): ngag dang /sems kyi dmigs pa la gnas te/bdag tu lte ba la gnas/sems can du lta ba dang /dge bar lta ba la gnos shing /tshul khrims dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi
368b7(khri brgyad): lam de dag la bsten pa tshul khrims dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing byang chub dmigs nas/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /de bdag
369a1(khri brgyad): la bstod cing gzhan la smod la/bdag dang sems can dang /bzod par lta ba la gnas shing /sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa bzod par byed la/dag
369a2(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /de lus dmigs shing //
