369a3(khri brgyad): bsod nams kyi tshogs dmigs la/ye shes kyi tshogs dmigs shing /bdag dmigs la sems can rnams dmigs te/byang chub dmigs shing /brtson 'grus brtsom ste/
369a4(khri brgyad): de brtson 'grus brtsom pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /de byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms bsgom par byed cing /bsam gtan rnams dang /mngon
369a5(khri brgyad): par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ldang bar yang byed cing /de dag gi ro myang bar yang byed la/de dag gis
369a6(khri brgyad): rlom sems su'ang byed cing /dmigs pa'i lta ba can du gyur nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni 'jig
369a7(khri brgyad): rten pa'i'o//de gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs shing /de bzhin du
369b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du dmigs nas/stong pa nyid bsgom ste/de dmigs pa la spyod cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/de'ang dmigs pa'i
369b2(khri brgyad): tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang /bdag dang gzhan gyi bsod nams
369b3(khri brgyad): thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang /bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir dmigs nas/thabs ma yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang /phung po gsum pa'i bsod
369b4(khri brgyad): nams thabs ma yin pas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//de la
369b5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/bdag dang /sems can dang /sbyin par bya ba mi dmigs pa'i shes rab 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi
369b6(khri brgyad): phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /bdag dang /sems can dang /tshul khrims dang /byang chub mi dmigs te/'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/byang chub kyi
369b7(khri brgyad): phyir tshul khrims yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /bdag dang /bzod pa dang /byang chub mi dmigs te/'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/byang chub kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
370a1(khri brgyad): yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /bdag dang /lus dang /sems dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsod nams dang /ye shes mi dmigs te/'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang
370a2(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyir/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /bdag dang /sems can dang /bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi
370a3(khri brgyad): dmigs te/'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /sems can thams cad mi dmigs pas byang chub kyi
370a4(khri brgyad): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa dang /yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa dang /yongs su bsngo ba
370a5(khri brgyad): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /yongs su bsngo ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /yongs su bsngo ba mtshungs pa med pa dang /yongs su bsngo ba dpag tu med pas/bla na med pa yang
370a6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ste/de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//ci'i phyir na/'jig rten pa zhes bya/ci'i
370a7(khri brgyad): phyir na/'jig rten los 'das pa zhes bya zhe na/de la 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba ni/gang dag gis 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang /gang dag 'jig rten 'grub par byed pa dang /gang dag 'jig
370b1(khri brgyad): rten dang mnyam pa dang /gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi phyir sbyin pa dang /gang dag gis 'jig rten las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /gang dag 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /gang dag 'jig
370b2(khri brgyad): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/de dag ni 'jig rten po zhes bya'o//de la 'jig rten las 'das pa gang zhe na/gang dag gis 'jig rten sgrol ba dang /gang dag 'jig rten sel bar byed pa dang /
370b3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gang dag gis sgrol bar byed pa dang /gang dag 'jig rten ma yin par 'gyur ba dang /gang dag gis 'jig rten las 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /gang dag 'jig rten las sgrol ba
370b4(khri brgyad): dang /gang dag 'jig rten du sgrol bar byed pa ste/de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
370b5(khri brgyad): la spyod pa ni de ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed do//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin/
370b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis spros pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin no//yang dag par spong ba bzhi
370b7(khri brgyad): dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
371a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs//
371a2(khri brgyad): kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams
371a3(khri brgyad): pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
371a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi skyes bu'i rtsel yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyes bu'i rjel yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
371a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas
371a6(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad bskyed par byed pa yin te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
371a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa yin no//tshe dang
371b1(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu snron gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
371b2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang
371b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de
371b4(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin
371b5(khri brgyad): pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa
371b6(khri brgyad): na gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur med cing rmongs pa med par gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/sems can thams cad
371b7(khri brgyad): bskyab pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'i phyir/'di ltar gnas pa 'dis gnas pa yin par rig par bya ste/de'ang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing /byang
372a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
372a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/snying rje chen po yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar gnas pa des gnas pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par 'dod na/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de
372a3(khri brgyad): ltar na sems can thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can thams cad ni yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i
372a4(khri brgyad): phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu legs so legs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang dag pa'i tshig brjod pas don de nyid yongs su bzung ba ni/tshe dang
372a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu dmigs su phebs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la
372a6(khri brgyad): byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/sems can dben pa'i phyir yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya/sems can ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med pa reg par bya/
372a7(khri brgyad): zhing sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs
372b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir/yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/gzugs dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya/
372b2(khri brgyad): gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya/gzugs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par
372b3(khri brgyad): rig par bya'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o//rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed
372b4(khri brgyad): pastong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par
372b5(khri brgyad): bya'o//rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams
372b6(khri brgyad): dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /bden pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /pha rol tu phyin pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams
372b7(khri brgyad): cad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
373a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid dben pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo ba nyid med pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab med pa'i phyir/yid la byed pa mdzon/
373a2(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa 'di dang /yid la byed pa 'di dang mo bral lo/
373a3(khri brgyad): zhes kho bo smra'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/rab 'byor legs so legs so//'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ji ltar khyod
373a4(khri brgyad): kyis bstan pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang ji ltar khyod kyis
373a5(khri brgyad): bstan pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
373a6(khri brgyad): khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/g.yos rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos so//'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul to//ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/
373a7(khri brgyad): 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//'ur 'ur/rab tu 'ur 'ur/kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro//chem chem/rab tu chem chem/kun tu rab tu chematsham mo//shar phyogs
373b1(khri brgyad): dma' na nub phyogs mtho/nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/mtha' dma' na dbus mtho
373b2(khri brgyad): bar gyur to//de nas de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang
373b3(khri brgyad): lags/rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/shar phyogs kyi 'jig
373b4(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams dpag tu med/grangs med pa dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi
373b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do//de bzhin du phyogs bcu khor yug kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
373b6(khri brgyad): nga'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
373b7(khri brgyad): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags 'bum nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom
374a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de dag gis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad na'ang sems can dpag tu med/grangs med pa
374a2(khri brgyad): rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
374a3(khri brgyad): pa khri brgyad stong pa las/gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste/nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal
374a4(khri brgyad): po chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to//de bzhin du lha'i dbang po brgya byin rnams dang /rab
374a5(khri brgyad): 'thab bral rnams dang /yongs su dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyang /tshangs pa'i bar dag dang
374a6(khri brgyad): lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i'i'ajig rten gyi khams 'di na tshangs pa dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag ji snyed 'khod pa rnams kyang lha'i
374a7(khri brgyad): bu bye khrag khrig drag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur to//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /sum
374b1(khri brgyad): cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs pa dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa
374b2(khri brgyad): las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /'bum gyi cha dang /bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /grangs dang /
374b3(khri brgyad): cha dang /bablang ba dang /dpe dang /rgyur yang mi bzod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gnan/lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de dag thams cad ni
374b4(khri brgyad): lham me ma yin/lhan ne ma yin/lhang nge ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog tu snang ngo //phul du snang ngo //khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo //rab dang /rab
374b5(khri brgyad): mchog dang /gya nom pa dang /bla na med pa dang /gong na med par snang ngo //'di lta ste dper na/dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi gan na lcags nag po ni ka ba tshig pa bzhin du lham me ma yin/lhan ne ma yin/lhang
374b6(khri brgyad): de ma yin no//de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gan na lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de dag thams cad kyang lham me ma yin/lhan ne ma yin//
374b7(khri brgyad): lhang nge ma yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog tu snang ngo //phul du snang ngo //khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo //rab dang /rab mchog dang /gya nom pa dang /bla na med pa dang /
375a1(khri brgyad): gong na med par snang ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na
375a2(khri brgyad): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /gnas
375a3(khri brgyad): gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad btsun pa rab 'byor la chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dus te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/btsun pa rab 'byor
375a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/byang
375a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar bslab par bya/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//
375a6(khri brgyad): kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la/yid la zung shig dang /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha
375a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar
375b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ba dag bstan par byas/lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par
375b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyis shig/gang dag yang dag pa skyon med pa la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mthu med do//de ci'i phyir
375b3(khri brgyad): zhe na/de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi mtshams bcad pa'i phyir ro//'on kyang gal te de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/kho bo ni dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad mi byed
375b4(khri brgyad): pas de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang ste/khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o//kau shi ka de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
375b5(khri brgyad): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod pas gzugs mi rtag par yid
375b6(khri brgyad): la bya'o//sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /stong pa dang /nad dang /'bras dang /zug rngu dang /sdig pa dang /gzhan la rag las pa dang /'jig pa'i chos can dang /mi brtan pa dang /ra
375b7(khri brgyad): tu 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can dang /'jigs pa dang /'tshe ba dang /'gro ba'i nad lta bur yid la bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
376a1(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /de bzhin du mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /de bzhin du sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me
376a2(khri brgyad): khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag par yid la byed do//sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /stong pa dang /nad dang /'bras
376a3(khri brgyad): dang /zug rngu dang /sdig pa dang /gzhan la rag las pa dang /'jig pa'i chos can dang /mi brtan pa dang /rab tu 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can dang /'jigs pa dang /'tshe ba dang /'go ba'i
376a4(khri brgyad): nad lta bur yid la bya ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya bar
376a5(khri brgyad): yid la bya ste/de'ang mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /zhi ba dang /dben pa dang /stong par yid la byed do//'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes

376b1(khri brgyad): rnams 'byung ste/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur te/de'ang mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /zhi ba dang /dben pa dang /sbyar
376b2(khri brgyad): par yid la byed de/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ste/de rang

376b7(khri brgyad): chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/de rang bdag med pa dang /zhi ba dang /dben pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med par
377a1(khri brgyad): yid la byed de/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
377a2(khri brgyad): pa'i sems bskyed pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
377a3(khri brgyad): dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so
377a4(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
377a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod do//de bzhin du rnam
377a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
377a7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod do//kau shi ka gzhan yang gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa'
377b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar chos dang /chos rnams sbyor bar byed cing /rtog sbyor du byed la/yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /yongs su khyab par byed
377b2(khri brgyad): de/chos 'di dag thams cad ni bdag med cing /bdog dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o zhes so sor rtog par byed do//de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa
377b3(khri brgyad): ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin la/yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/kau shi ka dge
377b4(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs/byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs/byang chub kyi sems gang
377b5(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs/yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs la/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin
377b6(khri brgyad): pa de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la med/byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi sems la med/yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de'ang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med
377b7(khri brgyad): de/kau shi ka gang de ltar chos thams cad la so sor rtog kyang /chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med cing mi dmigs pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
378a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yin no//de skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba'i
378a2(khri brgyad): sems byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'grogs pa yin/ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngo ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs pa yin/ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba'i sems byang chub kyi sems la
378a3(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ji ltar na byang chub kyi snyems yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin
378a4(khri brgyad): pa de ni sems ma yin la/byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang sems ma yin te/de ltar na sems ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin la/bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang
378a5(khri brgyad): yin pa de'ang sems ma yin pas sems ma yin pas ni/sems ma yin par yongs su bsngo bar mi byed la/bsam gyis mi khyab pas ni/bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su bsngo bar mi byed
378a6(khri brgyad): de/de ltar na sems ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin la/bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de'ang sems ma yin te/kau shi ka de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
378a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor logs so legs so//rab
378b1(khri brgyad): 'byor grang khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing /spo ba bskyed pa ni'ang khyod legs so//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
378b2(khri brgyad): bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ste/byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyi lags so//'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa spyad pa mdzad pa na/
378b3(khri brgyad): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thad na de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gdams shing rjes su bstan te/yang
378b4(khri brgyad): dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyis shing gzhug pa bgyis te bzhag nas/bcom ldan 'das byang chub

378b6(khri brgyad): bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug lo gdams par bgyi rjes su bstan par bgyi/yang dag par bstan par bgyi
378b7(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi/yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi/yang dag por rab tu dga' bar bgyi/gzud par bgyi zhing bzhag par bgyi lags so//bdag cag
379a1(khri brgyad): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gdams shing rjes su bstan te/yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du stsal/yang dag
379a2(khri brgyad): par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyis shing bcud de bzhag pa rnams ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags
379a3(khri brgyad): so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /byang chub sems dpa'
379a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba dang /ji ltar gnas par mi bya ba dag bshad par bya'o//kau shi ka gzugs ni gzugs kyis sbyong /tshor ba dang /
379a5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/kau shi ka de ltar na gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang
379a6(khri brgyad): yin pa dang /tshor bya da //'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis
379a7(khri brgyad): su dbyer med de/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang mig ni mig gis stong /rna ba dang /
379b1(khri brgyad): sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ni yid kyis stong /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/de ltar na mig go stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus
379b2(khri brgyad): dang /yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos de
379b3(khri brgyad): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis sbyong /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i
379b4(khri brgyad): khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas skyong ste/de ltar na sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
379b5(khri brgyad): chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa
379b6(khri brgyad): dri ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang ma rig pa
379b7(khri brgyad): ni ma rig pas stong /de bzhin du 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye
380a1(khri brgyad): ba dang /rga shi ni rga shis stong /ma rig pa 'gag pa ni ma rig pa 'grag pas stong /de bzhin du 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang //
380a2(khri brgyad): reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi 'gag pa ni rga shi 'gag pas stong /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas sbyong ste/de ltar nam
380a3(khri brgyad): rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /ma rig pa 'grag pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rga shi 'gag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub
380a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par
380a5(khri brgyad): bya'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
380a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/
380a7(khri brgyad): de ltar na sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan
380b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//kau shi ka gzhan
380b2(khri brgyad): yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis sbyong /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong /byang chub sems dpa'i ni byang chub sems
380b3(khri brgyad): dpas sbyong ste/de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis
380b4(khri brgyad): su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//kau shi ka gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po
380b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
380b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis skyong /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/de ltar na dran pa nye bar
380b7(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing
381a1(khri brgyad): gnyis srung na spyod //kau shig gzhan nga tid de 'dzin rnams na tod dzin nam kyis //rdzun kyi skyon mas dag na sa sgornams byas s+ho/
381a2(khri brgyad): sems dnga'an byang chub sems dpas stong ste/de ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /gzus kyi sgornams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems da'i sgo
381a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//kau shi ka gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong/
381a4(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni theg pa chen pos spyong /nyan pas ni nyon thos nyid kyis stong /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis stong /sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis rkyong /byang chub sems
381a5(khri brgyad): dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas sbyong ste/de ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /nyan thos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /theg pa chen po'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yinapa
381a6(khri brgyad): dang /sangs rgyas kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//kau shi ka gzhan rang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
381a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid
381b1(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
381b2(khri brgyad): gnas par bya'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
381b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//tshor ba
381b4(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//mig la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//gzugs la dmigs
381b5(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//mig gi
381b6(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//
381b7(khri brgyad): chos rnams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//sa'i khams la
382a1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams la
382a2(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
382a3(khri brgyad): dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam dang /skyobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
382a4(khri brgyad): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i
382a5(khri brgyad): tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas
382a6(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o//sangs chos nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//kau shi ka de ltar na gzugs zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//rnam pa
382a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de ltar na rgyun du zhugs po'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par
382b1(khri brgyad): mi bya'o//sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba'i bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//gzugs rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de bzhin du mi rtag ces bya ba dang /
382b2(khri brgyad): bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes
382b3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /mi stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//
382b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya ba dang /bde zhes bya ba dang /sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag ces bya
382b5(khri brgyad): ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /dben zhes bya ba dang /mi dpon zhes bya ba dang /stong zhes bya ba dang /mi stong zhes bya ba dang /mtshan ma yod
382b6(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang /mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon pa med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched
382b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams
383a1(khri brgyad): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag ces bya ba dang /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /smon
383a2(khri brgyad): pa med ces bya ba'i bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul
383a3(khri brgyad): gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye
383a4(khri brgyad): ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par
383a5(khri brgyad): mi bya'o//rgyun du zhugs pa ni sbyin gnas so zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /
383a6(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sbyin gnas so zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//kau shi ka
383a7(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa dang po la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de bzhin du sa bcu pa'i bar la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas
383b1(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gnas pa yod na g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//kau shrI ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas te/sbyin pa'i pha
383b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
383b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag
383b4(khri brgyad): pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub
383b5(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa
383b6(khri brgyad): la 'jug par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa
383b7(khri brgyad): la gnas par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du dmigs
384a1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa lnga ga gnas te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
384a2(khri brgyad): rnams la phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams su 'gro bar bya zhing /chos thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub cing //
384a3(khri brgyad): gzhan dag la'ong bstan par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas
384a4(khri brgyad): kyi zhing ci 'dra ba de lta bu dag bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/
384a5(khri brgyad): sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
384a6(khri brgyad): pos 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/grangs med pa dag tu song zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang /spros dang /
384a7(khri brgyad): bdug pa dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bkur stir bya/bla mar bya/brjed par bya/mchod par bya zhing /ras
384b1(khri brgyad): bcos bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag dum dgu gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi sku la gsol bar bya'o snyam du'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
384b2(khri brgyad): gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can dpag tu med/grangs med/tshad med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o/
384b3(khri brgyad): snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mig lnga sgrub par bya ste/sha'i mig dang /lha'i mig dang /shes rab kyi mig dang /chos kyi
384b4(khri brgyad): mig dang /sangs rgyas kyi mig bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi
384b5(khri brgyad): bya'o//ting nge 'dzin gang drang gang gis rnam por rtse bar 'dod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dang des rnam par rtse bar bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
384b6(khri brgyad): bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs
384b7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs por bya'o snyam du dmigs
385a1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po bslab par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//skyes bya chen po'i mtshan
385a2(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa gnyis lus la bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu lus la bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas
385a3(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o//dad pas rjes su 'byung po dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni brgyad pa'o zhes bya ba dang /de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun po ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i
385a4(khri brgyad): tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//rigs nas rigs su skye ba dang /bar chad gcig pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//cha zad pa dang /nyon mongs pa zad pa ni
385a5(khri brgyad): glagang zag mgo mnyam pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//rgyun du zhugs pa ni bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul
385a6(khri brgyad): gyis gnas par mi bya'o//lon cig phyir 'ong ba ni 'jig rten 'dir lan cig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o///
385a7(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bros bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//phyir mi 'ong ba ni der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes
385b1(khri brgyad): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//dgra bcom pa ni 'di nyid
385b2(khri brgyad): la phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//rang sangs rgyas zhes bya bar dmigs
385b3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dmigs
385b4(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs
385b5(khri brgyad): rgyas nas bag chags dang /mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad zad do zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa da gra bcom pa yang dag par
385b6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par
385b7(khri brgyad): mi bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas nas sems can dpag tu med/grangs med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du de lta bur yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//
386a1(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas twe/ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pas/bskal pa gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
386a2(khri brgyad): par 'jug par bya'o snyam du'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//bdag gi tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//
386a3(khri brgyad): bdag gi mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan re re'ang bsod nams brgyas yongs su grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//bdag gi sangs
386a4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhang gcig gi khyon yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dang /de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
386a5(khri brgyad): ma snyed dag gi khyon ci tsam pa de tsam du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dmigs po'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//bdag gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje las grub par
386a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//bdag gi byang chub kyi shing las sems can gang dag gis dri bsnams pa de dag 'dod chags kyi gnod pa med pa dang /
386a7(khri brgyad): zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi gnod pa med cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems 'ga' yang bskyed par mi 'gyur bar sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
386b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang /sems can gang dag dri de la snom par 'gyur ba de dag la lus dang /sems kyi nad 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dri dag 'byung
386b2(khri brgyad): bar gyur cig ces bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzugs kyi sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byung
386b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /tshul
386b4(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra 'byung
386b5(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyi so gnas par mi bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
386b6(khri brgyad): pab rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yon lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang
386b7(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams kyi sgo 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba dang /rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa
387a1(khri brgyad): dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o//de ci'i//
387a2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
387a3(khri brgyad): nas chos thams cad ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi
387a4(khri brgyad): bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya snyam mo//de nas
387a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di
387a6(khri brgyad): ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa ci la gnas snyam/shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci la'ang mi gnas pa yin la/tshe dang ldan pa rab
387a7(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang ci la'ang gnas pa ma yin te/de ni gzugs la'ang mi gnas/tshor ba dang /'du shes
387b1(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la'ang mi gnas/'dus byas kyi khams la'ang mi gnas/'dus ma byas kyi khams la'ang mi gnas shing /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos mu 'dres/
387b2(khri brgyad): pa bco brgyad kyi bar la'ang mi gnas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang mi gnas pa yin no//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
387b3(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs la gnas po'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ing ma
387b4(khri brgyad): yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang
387b5(khri brgyad): gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ste/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub
387b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o////'phagos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
387b7(khri brgyad): khri brgyad stong pa/bam po bcu dgu pa//de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu khi cag 'di snyam du sems te/gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi skad dang /gnod sbyin gyis smras pa dang /
388a1(khri brgyad): gnod sbyin gyis brjod pa dang /gnod sbyin gyi tshig glang dag yod pa de dag ni brjod na shes par yang rung gi/'di lta ste/gnas brtan rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa
388a2(khri brgyad): ba dang /brjod pa dang /'chad pa dang /ston pa 'di ni shes par mi rung ngo snyam mo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes
388a3(khri brgyad): nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/lha'i bu dag gang smras pa shes par mi rung ngam/lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa rab 'byor shes par mi rung ngo //rab 'byor gyis smras pa/lha'i
388a4(khri brgyad): bu dag 'di ltar yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod de/gang ma brjod pa de ni thos par mi rung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge med pa ste/de lo ni nyen pa 'am ston
388a5(khri brgyad): pa'ang med la/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la'ang mi gri med de'i phyir ro//lha'i
388a6(khri brgyad): budag 'di lta ste/dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul pa mdzad de/'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /dge
388a7(khri brgyad): slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag kyang mngon par sprul la/sprul pa des sprul pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la chos bstan par gyur na lha'i bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/de
388b1(khri brgyad): la sus kyang ci'ang bstan pa 'am/mnyan pa yod snyam mam/lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de na med do//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/lha'i bu dag de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang
388b2(khri brgyad): sprul pa lta bu ste/de la sus kyang bshad pa med cing /sus kyang mnyan pa med la/sus kyang shes pa med do//lha'i bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/mo gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/de bzhin
388b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston pa zhig mthong bar gyur na lha'i bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/de la sus kyang bshad pa'am/mnyan pa 'am/shes
388b4(khri brgyad): pa yod snyam mam/lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/lha'i bu dag de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rmi lam lta bu ste/de la sus kyang
388b5(khri brgyad): bshad pa med cing /sus kyang mnyan pa med la/sus kyang shes pa med do//lha'i bu dag 'di lta ste/dper na/mi gnyis shig ri khrod gcig tu 'khod de/sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa
388b6(khri brgyad): brjod/chos kyi bsngags pa brjod/dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod nas de gnyis kyi skad kyi brag cha byung bar gyur na/lha'i bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/de la gcig gi brag chas/gcig
388b7(khri brgyad): shos kyi brag tsha'i sgra shes par gyur dam mam/lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/lha'i bu dag de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang
389a1(khri brgyad): brag cha lta bu ste/de la sus kyang bshad pa med cing /sus kyang mnyan pa mod la/sus kyang shes pa med do//lha'i bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma
389a2(khri brgyad): mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis/lam po che'i bzhi mdor/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig mngon par sprul nas/des sprul pa'i
389a3(khri brgyad): 'khor bzhi po dag la chos bstan par gyur na/lha'i bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/de la sus kyang bshad pa'am/mnyan pa'am/shes pa yod snyam mam/lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/
389a4(khri brgyad): btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/lha'i bu dag de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/de la sus kyang bshad pa med cing /sus kyang nyan pa med la/sus
389a5(khri brgyad): kyang shes pa med do//de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni zab pa bas kyang ches zab pa ston/phra ba bas kyang ches phra ba la 'jug pas/kye
389a6(khri brgyad): ma 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsal bar byed pa'o//kye ma 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsal bar byed pa'o snyam mo//de nas
389a7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu dag gzugs ni zab pa ma yin/phra
389b1(khri brgyad): ba ma yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu dag 'di ltar gzugs
389b2(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin nu zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin no//mig ni zab pa
389b3(khri brgyad): ma yin/phra ba ma yin/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid ni zab pa mo yin/phra ba ma yin no//gzugs ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin no//sgra dang /dI dang /ro dang /reg
389b4(khri brgyad): bya dang /chos rnams ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin/sa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /
389b5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
389b6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin/nang stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin//
389b7(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni zab pa ma yin/phro ba ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams
390a1(khri brgyad): dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs
390a2(khri brgyad): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin/ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs
390a3(khri brgyad): kyi sgo thams cad ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni zab pa ma yin/phra ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
390a4(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/'o na chos bsnyen pa 'di la gzugs su btags pa'ang med dam/tshor
390a5(khri brgyad): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes par btags pa'ang med dam/khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags
390a6(khri brgyad): pa'ang med dam/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams su btags pa'ang med dam/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs
390a7(khri brgyad): kyi sgo thams cad dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du btags pa'ang med dam/
390b1(khri brgyad): chos bstan pa 'di la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur btags pa'ang med dam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas
390b2(khri brgyad): nyid du btags pa'ang med dam/byang chub sems dpar btags pa'ang med dam/sangs rgyas nyid du btags pa'ang med dam/byang chub tu btags pa'ang med dam/yi ge rnams su btags
390b3(khri brgyad): pa'ang med dam snyam mo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/lci'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu dag
390b4(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni brjod du med cing /bsnyad du med pa ste/da ni sus kyang mnyan du med cing shes par byar med do//lha'i bu dag de ltar
390b5(khri brgyad): na gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa de dag gis kyang bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo //gang dag
390b6(khri brgyad): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /gang drug phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /gang dag dgra bcom pa nyid dang /gang dag rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /gang dag sangs rgyas nyid mngon sum
390b7(khri brgyad): du bya bar 'dod pa de dag gis kyang bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ste/lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin chad bsnyad du med pa dang /mnyan
391a1(khri brgyad): dam pa smra sbyi la sa / sa nga sa rgyun rgyu spyad /
391a2(khri brgyad): pa'o//de nas lha'i bu de dag 'dis ma du sems te/gnas brtan dpa 'byor la chos nyin pa rdo lta bu dag tu 'dod par bya snyam mo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
391a3(khri brgyad): rgyu'i bu de dag gi sems kyi sangs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/lha'i bu de dga' 'disad ces smras so//lha'i bu dag bdag la chos nyand ni sma na'i skyes thum ze 'arjod par bya'o//
391a4(khri brgyad): bdag la chos nyan pa ni sbrul pa lta bur 'dod ra bya ste/dadag ni cung zladakyang nyan pa med cing /kun chub par byed pa med pa/mngon sum du byed pa rnying //dri nas lha'i bung dag gis
391a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor sems can de dag kyang sgyu ma lte ba yin la/chos nyan pa de dag kyang sgyu mo lta bu yin nam/sems can de dag kya
391a6(khri brgyad): sprul pa lta bu yin lo/chos nyan pa de dag kyang sprul pa lta bu yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/sems can dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu yin la/
391a7(khri brgyad): chos nyan pa de dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu yin no//sems can de dag kyang sprul pa lto bu yin la/chos nyan pa de dag kyang sprul pa lta bu yin no//lha'i bu dag sems can rnams ni thalam lta
391b1(khri brgyad): bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin te/lha'i bu dag gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//lha'i bu dag tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam
391b2(khri brgyad): lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//lha'i bu dag mig kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu
391b3(khri brgyad): yin no//lha'i bu dag gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//lho'i bu
391b4(khri brgyad): dag mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /
391b5(khri brgyad): lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol
391b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan
391b7(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//nang stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
392a1(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhug pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//yang dag par spong ba
392a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu
392a3(khri brgyad): dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//rgyun du zhugs pa'i
392a4(khri brgyad): 'bras bu'ang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//rgyun du zhugs pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba
392a5(khri brgyad): dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras buphyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /dgra bcom pa'ong rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu mo lta bu yin no//rang byang chub kyang rmi la mo lta bu dang /
392a6(khri brgyad): sgyu ma lta bu yin no//rang sangs rgyas kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//
392a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin no//de nas lha'i bu de dag gis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid
392b1(khri brgyad): ngami ldum lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu yin ma/tsa mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes sgra'am/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/lha'i bu dag kho bo ni mya ngan las 'das
392b2(khri brgyad): pa'ang rmi lam lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes smra ste/lha'i bu dag glal te/mya ngan las 'das pa bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos 'ga' zhig yod na'ang de'ang rmi lam lta bu dang
392b3(khri brgyad): sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes khro ba smra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i blo dag 'di ltar rmi lam gang yin pa dang /sgyu ma gang yin pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis
392b4(khri brgyad): su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /
392b5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag du ma dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
392b6(khri brgyad): ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa/'di ltar mthong bar dka' ba/'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba/'di ltar zhi ba/'di ltar gya nom
392b7(khri brgyad): pa/'di ltar phra ba/'di ltar gzhan ma yin pa/'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/'di ltar mkhas pa/'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa/'di ltar mkhas pa dang /'dzangs
393a1(khri brgyad): pas rig par bya ba 'di len par byed par 'gyur ba su dag yod/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang /byang chub sems//
393a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar
393a3(khri brgyad): zab pa/'di ltar mthong bar dka' ba/'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba/'di ltar zhi ba/'di ltar gya nom pa/'di ltar phra ba/'di ltar gzhan ma yin pa/'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul
393a4(khri brgyad): ma yin pa/'di ltar mkhas pa/'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa/'di ltar mkhas pa dang 'dzangs pas rig par bya ba 'di len par byed par 'gyur ro//bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag
393a5(khri brgyad): gam/dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa 'am/brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa 'am/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
393a6(khri brgyad): pa'am/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa/'di ltar mthong bar dka' ba//
393a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba/'di ltar zhi ba/'di ltar gya nom pa/'di ltar phra ba/'di ltar gzhan ma yin pa/'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/'di ltar mkhas pa/'di
393b1(khri brgyad): ltar shin tu 'phags pa/'di ltar mkhas pa dang /'dzangs pas rig par bya ba 'di len par byed par 'gyur te/de dag ni gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid
393b2(khri brgyad): gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//stong pa
393b3(khri brgyad): nyid rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//mtshan ma med pa gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par
393b4(khri brgyad): rtog par mi 'gyur ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//mtshan ma med pa rnam
393b5(khri brgyad): par shes pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs smon pa med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//smon pa med pa gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog
393b6(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs skye ba med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//skye ba med pa gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs 'gag pa med
393b7(khri brgyad): do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//'gag pa med pa gzugs so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du zhi zhes bya ba dang /ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /dben zhes
394a1(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /mi dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bya bar rnam
394a2(khri brgyad): par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//smon pa med pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du skye ba med ces bya ba dang /'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba
394a3(khri brgyad): dang /dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /nang
394a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang
394a5(khri brgyad): po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par
394a6(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan
394a7(khri brgyad): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang de bzhin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar rnam
394b1(khri brgyad): par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mabyon pa nyid do gas bya bar rnam par rtog par mo 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa
394b2(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro//mtshan ma med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa med do zhes bya bar rlom par rtog par mi
394b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//smon pa med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med ces bya ba dang /'gag pa med ces bya ba dang /
394b4(khri brgyad): ni zhes bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid 'dus byas kyi khams so zhes bya bar
394b5(khri brgyad): rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//'dus byas kyi khams mtshan ma med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//mtshan ma med pa 'dus byas kyi khams so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog por mi
394b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//'dus byas kyi khams smon pa med do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//smon pa med pa 'dus byas kyi khams so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du 'dus
394b7(khri brgyad): byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya ba dang /'gag pa mod ces bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par
395a1(khri brgyad): rtog par mi 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas kyi khams mtshan ma med do zhes bya bar rnam par
395a2(khri brgyad): rtog par mi 'gyur ro//mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khamos so zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas kyi khams smon pa med do zhes bya bar rnam por rtog par
395a3(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro//smon pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du 'dus ma byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya ba dang /'gag pa med ces
395a4(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /zhi zhes bya ba dang /dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//lha'i bu dag rnam grangs ngas na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lhor zab pa/'di ltar shin tu
395a5(khri brgyad): 'phags pa/'di ltar mkhas pa dang /'dzangs pas rig par bya ba'i bar 'di la lon par byed pa ni su'ang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'dir chos 'ga' yang ma bshad ma
395a6(khri brgyad): brjod/ma bstun pa'i phyir te/ji ltar 'dir chos 'ga' yang mo bshad/ma brjod/ma bstan pa de ltar ji ltar 'dri len par byed pa'i sems can su'ang med do//de nas tshe dang
395a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i dus tshe dong ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi theg
395b1(khri brgyad): pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rgya cher bstan cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir sems dang
395b2(khri brgyad): po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar dag kyang bstan la/byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
395b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag
395b4(khri brgyad): po rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan
395b5(khri brgyad): lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang bstan cing /byang chub
395b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams rdzus te skyo ba
395b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du mngon par shes pa yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis 'dod na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro
396a1(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsti sbyang du bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /brjod par bya ba dang /mchod par byed par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta
396a2(khri brgyad): bu dag 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
396a3(khri brgyad): bar du nam yang brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang /rnam par g.yeng ba med cing /mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ba dang /thogs pa med pa'i spobs
396a4(khri brgyad): pa dang /rgyun mi chad pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten
396a5(khri brgyad): thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur ba dag kyang bstan pa ma yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//
396a6(khri brgyad): ji skad smras pa bzhin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs
396a7(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang rgya cher bstan to//de bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
396b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang bstan to/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan to//ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul
396b2(khri brgyad): gyis she na/bdag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /tsher ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
396b3(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sa'i khams
396b4(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sbyin pa'i pha
396b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha
396b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs
396b7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs
397a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lamA yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
397a2(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan to///
397a3(khri brgyad): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lnga 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum
397a4(khri brgyad): po dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher bstan/ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
397a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
397a6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/theg pa gsum po dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher bstan to//phyi stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
397a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/theg pa gsum po dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher bstan to//nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su
