397b1(khri brgyad): bzung ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spongs pa can du 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang bstan to//phyi stong pa nyid dang /
397b2(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig/
397b3(khri brgyad): rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang bstan to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya
397b4(khri brgyad): pa'i le'u ste/nyi shu gsum pa'o////de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char phab cing bstan pa 'di la mchod
397b5(khri brgyad): pa bya ba'i phyir bdag gis me tog dag cig mngon par sprul la/me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /dge
397b6(khri brgyad): skyong gi dge 'dun dang /gnas brtan rab 'byor dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gtor bar bya'o//mngon par gtor bar bya'o//mngon par rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo//
397b7(khri brgyad): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lho'i bu dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di snyam du sems te/
398a1(khri brgyad): gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char phab cing /bstan pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/bdag cag gis me tog dag cig mngon par sprul la/me tog de dag gis
398a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /gnas brtan rab 'byor dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
398a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gtor bar bya'o//mngon par gtor bar bya'o//mngon par rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
398a4(khri brgyad): khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dag mngon par sprul nas/me tog de dag gis bcom
398a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /gnas brtan rab 'byor dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
398a6(khri brgyad): gtor/mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor to//lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag gis me tog de dag mngon par gtor ma thag tu/de
398a7(khri brgyad): nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog chal par bkram par gyur cing /steng gi bar snang la'ang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa nyams dga' ba/
398b1(khri brgyad): yid du 'ong ba zhig tu'ang kun nas gnas par gyur to//de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/gang dag lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gis
398b2(khri brgyad): stosngon ched lha'i gnas thams cad na'ang spyod par ma mthong ngo //gang dag lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni yal ga 'grel pa las skyes pa'ang ma yin/chu las skyes
398b3(khri brgyad): pa'ang ma yin/zang las skyes pa'ang ma yin te/me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa yin no//gang dag lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba yin te/yol
398b4(khri brgyad): ga 'grel pa las skyes pa ni ma yin no snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung
398b5(khri brgyad): ba'ang ma yin/yal ga 'gel pa las skyes pa'ang ma yin te/me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ke 'di skad du/me tog 'di dag ni yid lus
398b6(khri brgyad): byung ba'ang ma yin la/yal ga 'grel po las skyes pa'ang ma yin te/me tog 'di dag ni nges par ma skyes pa yin no zhes zer ba ni/kau shi ka gang dag nges par ma skyes pa de dag ni me
398b7(khri brgyad): tog ma yin no//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor ci me tog 'di dag nyi cho nges par ma skyes par zad dam/'on te gzugs kyang nges par ma skyes pa yin la/tshor ba dang /'du
399a1(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma skyes par ma zad kyi/
399a2(khri brgyad): kau shi ka gzugs kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no//kau shi ka tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
399a3(khri brgyad): shes pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka mig kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa
399a4(khri brgyad): de ni mig ma yin no//kau shi ka rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no//kau shi ka sa'i
399a5(khri brgyad): khams kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges pa ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin no//kau shi ka chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i
399a6(khri brgyad): khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang nges por ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no//kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
399a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha
399b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin
399b2(khri brgyad): pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid kyang nges par mo skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//kau sho ka dngos po med
399b3(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//kau shi ka dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
399b4(khri brgyad): rnams kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma smyos pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
399b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang
399b6(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni lam ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin du stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so skyo yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brjod kyang nges
399b7(khri brgyad): par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no//kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang
400a1(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no//kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas
400a2(khri brgyad): nyid kyang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas nyid ma yin no//kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam
400a3(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi bar yang nges par ma skyes pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan
400a4(khri brgyad): cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nges par ma skyes
400a5(khri brgyad): pa ste/nges par ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin no//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te//
400a6(khri brgyad): kye ma gnas brtan rabo 'byor 'di ni btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/chos nyid kyang ston pa ni shes rab zab pa yin no snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin
400a7(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kye ma rab 'byor 'di btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/chos nyid kyang ston pa ni shes rab zab pa yin no//de nas
400b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/chos nyid kyang ston par
400b2(khri brgyad): bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka gzugs ni btags pa tsam ste/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid yin pas/rab 'byor ni de dang
400b3(khri brgyad): mi 'gal bar ston to//kau shi ka tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam ste/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid
400b4(khri brgyad): yin pas/rab 'byor ni de dang mi 'gal bar ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gal ba med pa yin la/gang 'gal ba med pa de ni rab 'byor ston par byed cing /mi 'gal
400b5(khri brgyad): par byed pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol
400b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
400b7(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs
401a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig
401a2(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra
401a3(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'ang btags pa tsam mo//kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang
401a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang btags pa tsam ste/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid yin pas/rab 'byor ni
401a5(khri brgyad): de dang mi 'gal bar ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gal ba med pa yin la/'gal ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/rab 'byor ston par byed cing mi 'og la
401a6(khri brgyad): bar byed pa'i phyir te/kau shi ka de ltar na/rab 'byor ni btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/chos nyid kyang ston to//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin to/ji ltar bcom
401a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad btags pa tsam du bstan pa de ni de bzhin no//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar chos thams cad btags pa tsam du rig
401b1(khri brgyad): par byas la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//kau shi ka de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la mi slob bo//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
401b2(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la mi slob bo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /gang la bslab par bya ba'i tshor ba
401b3(khri brgyad): drang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//kau shi ka de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin
401b4(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob bo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//de bzhin du tshul khrims
401b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob bo//
401b6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//nang stong pa nyid la'ang mi slob bo//dngos po med pa'i ngo
401b7(khri brgyad): po nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang mi slob bo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i nang stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
402a1(khri brgyad): spyong nyid kyi bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba byor ro//dran pa nya bar bzhag pa rnams la 'ang mi slob bo//yang dag par spyong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
402a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
402a3(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la'ang mi slob bo//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lani cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
402a4(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid la'ang mi slob bo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang mi slob bo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
402a5(khri brgyad): lhor nges gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
402a6(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
402a7(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa
402b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang //
402b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /ci'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
402b3(khri brgyad): shi ka 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye
402b4(khri brgyad): mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
402b5(khri brgyad): kyis stong /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
402b6(khri brgyad): stong /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri ka gzugs stong pa nyid ni gzugs stong pa nyid
402b7(khri brgyad): la mi slob/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid ni rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bor gyi stong pa nyid la mi slob pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gang stong pa nyid la mi slob pa
403a1(khri brgyad): de ni gnyis su dbyer med par stong pa nyid la slob pa yin no//de ni gnyis su dbyer med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob pa yin no//de bzhin du de ni gnyis su dbyer med par
403a2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no//kau shi ka gang gnyis su dbyer med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob pa dang /gnyis su dbyer med par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
403a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa de ni gnyis su dbyer med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ong slob pa yin no//de bzhin du gnyis su dbyer med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
403a4(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang slob pa yin no//gnyis su dbyer med
403a5(khri brgyad): par nang stong pa nyid la'ang slob pa yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang slob pa yin no//de ni gnyis su dbyer med par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la slob pa yin
403a6(khri brgyad): no//gnyis su dbyer med par yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam
403a7(khri brgyad): rnams la slob pa yin no//de ni gnyis su dbyer med par stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
403b1(khri brgyad): la slob pa yin no//de ni gnyis su dbyer med par rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la skyob pa yin no//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom
403b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /sangs rgyas nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin no//gnyis su dbyer med par sangs rgyas nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
403b3(khri brgyad): nyid la slob pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la slob pa yin no//gang sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs mod dpag tu med pa rnams la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya
403b4(khri brgyad): ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//de
403b5(khri brgyad): bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob
403b6(khri brgyad): po//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
403b7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i
404a1(khri brgyad): phyir mi slob bo//de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
404a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /lam 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//nang stong pa nyid 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
404a3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//stabs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi
404a4(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob
404a5(khri brgyad): pa dang /gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'phel bar bya ba dang /'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//
404a6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi blar
404a7(khri brgyad): du yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po nyi shu po//shA ri'i
404b1(khri brgyad): bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
404b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob//
404b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs la yongs su gzung ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i
404b4(khri brgyad): phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la yongs su gzung ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam
404b5(khri brgyad): por shes pa la rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang yongs su gzung ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe
404b6(khri brgyad): na/'di ltar nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos thams
404b7(khri brgyad): cad yongs su gzung ba med pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
405a1(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/rnam
405a2(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad
405a3(khri brgyad): yongs su gzung ba med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shA ri'i dus smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
405a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na chos thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin zhing med par bya ba'i phyir ma yin par bslabs nas/rnam
405a5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/rab 'bor gyis sbas pa/tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
405a6(khri brgyad): byas/gzugs kyi skye ba dang /'gag pa dang /blang ba dang /dor ba dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /'grib pa dang /'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de
405a7(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
405b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /'gag pa dang /blang ba dang /dor ba dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /'grib pa dang /'tshal
405b2(khri brgyad): ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du
405b3(khri brgyad): khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /stobs rnams
405b4(khri brgyad): dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba dang /'gag pa dang /blang
405b5(khri brgyad): ba dang /dor ba dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /'grib pa dang /'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam
405b6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis med pa'i phyir te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /blang
405b7(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /'grib pa med pa dang /'phel ba med par slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
406a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni slob pa med pa dang /nges par 'byung ba med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
406a2(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya/shA
406a3(khri brgyad): ri'i bus smras pa/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
406a4(khri brgyad): smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad du/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o zhes zer na ci de 'phags
406a5(khri brgyad): pa khyod kyi byin gyi rlabs yin nam/de khyod kyi mthu yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka dau ni kho bo'i mthu ma yin no//de ni kho bo'i byin gyi rlabs ma yin no//brgya byin gyis smras pa/
406a6(khri brgyad): btsun pa rab 'byor 'o na de su'i mthu yin/nga su'i byin gyi rlabs yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
406a7(khri brgyad): byin gyi rlangs yin no//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni byin gyi rlabs med pa yin no/ci'i phyir 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no//'di
406b1(khri brgyad): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yin no zhes smra/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su
406b2(khri brgyad): med/byin gyi rlangs med pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos nyid dmigs su med/de bzhin
406b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa las gud na'ang byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos nyid dmigs su med do//de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang de bzhin nyid
406b4(khri brgyad): dmigs su med do//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do//gzugs kyi
406b5(khri brgyad): chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs kyi chos nyid dmigs su med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang //
406b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do//rnam par shes pa'i
406b7(khri brgyad): chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid dmigs su med do//de bzhin du khams rnams dang /skye mched
407a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
407a2(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang //
407a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de
407a4(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid dmigs su med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam pa thams
407a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid dmyigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin//
407a6(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin la/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni/tsho re ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
407a7(khri brgyad): shes pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma
407b1(khri brgyad): yin tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs
407b2(khri brgyad): kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'adra ma yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang
407b3(khri brgyad): ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mau ldan pa'ang ma yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
407b4(khri brgyad): dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin la/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam
407b5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/
407b6(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/myi ldan pa'ang ma yin/rnam pa thams cad
407b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gozhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang me yin pa'i phyir te/kau shi ka de ltar chos thams cad ldan pa'ang ma yin//
408a1(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin pas na byin gyi rlabs med pa'i tshul gyis de ni de'i mthu yin no//de ni de'i byin gyi rlabs yin no//kau shi ka gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems
408a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/kau shi ka gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o//gzugs las gzhan du'ang btsal
408a3(khri brgyad): bar mi bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o//rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o///
408a4(khri brgyad): deci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /gzugs gang yin pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
408a5(khri brgyad): shes pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing gzugs can ma yin pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan
408a6(khri brgyad): nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams rnams dang /skye mched
408a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o//rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dong /stong
408b1(khri brgyad): pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs
408b2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi
408b3(khri brgyad): bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chosra de dag thams
408b4(khri brgyad): cod ni ldan pa'ong ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing //gzugs can ma yin pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir
408b5(khri brgyad): ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/gzugs las gud na 'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/de bzhin du tshor po
408b6(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/
408b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/
409a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/tshor ba
409a2(khri brgyad): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
409a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
409a4(khri brgyad): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mo yin la/gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
409a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa med/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/rnam par shes pa'i chos
409a6(khri brgyad): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bur gyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/rnam pa thams cad
409a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar chos 'di dag thams cad ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs
409b1(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir te/de ltar chos thams cad yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med pas na/gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
409b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi chos nyid
409b3(khri brgyad): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes
409b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
409b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang
409b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang
409b7(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'od skad ces smras so//btsun pa rang 'byor 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin
410a1(khri brgyad): da'o//btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'don tshad med pa'o//btsun pa
410a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu med pa'o//btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/byang
410a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/de la bslabs nas rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du
410a4(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob
410a5(khri brgyad): do//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /rang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs
410a6(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas
410a7(khri brgyad): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab
410b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin to/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'dini che ba'o//
410b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ched med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha
410b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/de la
410b4(khri brgyad): bslangs nas rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom
410b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa thob bo//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
410b6(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
410b7(khri brgyad): par byas nas/bla na me dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
411a1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka gzugs che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang che ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar
411a2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
411a3(khri brgyad): che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang che ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
411a4(khri brgyad): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
411a5(khri brgyad): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang che ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi
411a6(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir te/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba yin no//
411a7(khri brgyad): kau shi ka gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang tshad med pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs
411b1(khri brgyad): kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do//nam mkha' tshad med pa'i
411b2(khri brgyad): phyir gzugs tshad med do//gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang tshad med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad
411b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chud med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang tshad myed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad
411b4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs
411b5(khri brgyad): su med do//nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
411b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang tshad med pa yin te/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa yin no//kau shi ka gzugs
411b7(khri brgyad): dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang dpag tu med pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro//kau
412a1(khri brgyad): shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni dpag tu med do//de bzhin du gzugs kyang dpag tu med do//nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir gzugs dpag tu med do///
412a2(khri brgyad): gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang dpag tu med do//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
412a3(khri brgyad): du dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'oda'ang dpag tu med pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad
412a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni dpag tu med do//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dpag tu med do//nam
412a5(khri brgyad): mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dpag tu med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
412a6(khri brgyad): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang dpag tu med pa yin te/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu
412a7(khri brgyad): med pa yin no//kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi
412b1(khri brgyad): ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang /dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
412b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang /dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//kau shi
412b3(khri brgyad): ka de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yos pa yin no//de
412b4(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang /dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/gzugs mtha' yas pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
412b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//kau shri ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i
412b6(khri brgyad): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//lho'i dbang pos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir
412b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir
413a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
413a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//lha'i dbang pos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir
413a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
413a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
413a5(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//lha'i dbang pos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
413a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/dmigs pa mtha'
413a7(khri brgyad): yas pa yin no//dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa yin te/kau shi ka de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'
413b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
413b2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin no//lha'i dbang pos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor ci ltar na/sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
413b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mtha' yas pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka 'dri ji snyam du sems/'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin snyam mam/
413b4(khri brgyad): lha'i dbang pos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te/'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de ni glo bur
413b5(khri brgyad): du ming du btags pa'o//da ni dngos po med par ming du btags pa'o//de ni dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/shes rab
413b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'ga' yang sems can du yongs su brjod pa yod snyam mam/lha'i dbang pos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka
413b7(khri brgyad): gang la 'ga' yang sems can du yongs su brjod pa med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa ci zhig yod/kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
414a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/de la sems can 'ag
414a2(khri brgyad): yang skyes pa 'am/'gags pa yod snyam mam/lha'i dbang pos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//
414a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
414a4(khri brgyad): khri brgyad stong pa las/mtha' yas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o////de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang //
414a5(khri brgyad): skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /skyes po dang /bud med rnams dang /drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /de bzhin gshegs
414a6(khri brgyad): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gang bshad pa dang /brjod pa dang /bstan pa dang /yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i chos 'di ni a la la legs par bshad pa'o///
414a7(khri brgyad): a lo la chos 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o//a la la chos kyi chos nyid 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod de/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
414b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral ba de dag ni bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o//gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/
414b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes sam/'du byed rnams sam/rnam par shes pa 'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyang /theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
414b3(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen po dag rnam par dgod pa'ang mdzad do zhes kyang gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/
414b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed rnams sam/rnam par shes pa 'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos
414b5(khri brgyad): gang yang dmigs su mod kyang theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen po dag rnam par dgod pa'ang mdzad do//lha'i bu dag byang chub sems
414b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya ba yin no//de ci'i phyir
414b7(khri brgyad): zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan pos kyi thog pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen po dag rgya tshar bstan cing /sbyin pa'i pha rol
415a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
415a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong/
415a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang //
415a4(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
415a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
415a6(khri brgyad): kyi bar las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chos de
415a7(khri brgyad): dag la slob cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la'ang slob par byed pa'i phyir te/lha'i bu dag de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes
415b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod par bya ba yin no//lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
415b2(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas mor me mdzad kyi thad na rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i tshong 'dus kyi dbus na 'dug cing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur//
415b3(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
415b4(khri brgyad): bral bar ma gyur/nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang bral bar ma gyur/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur yang dag par spong
415b5(khri brgyad): ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med
415b6(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par
415b7(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa de'i
416a1(khri brgyad): tshe/lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs
416a2(khri brgyad): med pa 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/
416a3(khri brgyad): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
416a4(khri brgyad): 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
416a5(khri brgyad): ci tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin/mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su mi
416a6(khri brgyad): 'dzin/mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin/mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
416a7(khri brgyad): kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen
416b1(khri brgyad): dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams/
416b2(khri brgyad): 'dus te/'dug par thugs su chud nas de dag thams cad dbang por bzhag ste/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
416b3(khri brgyad): chen po 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo 'am/lha'i bu 'am/lha'i bu mo gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol
416b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang pa dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /sgom pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
416b5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la ni bdud dam/bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs/
416b6(khri brgyad): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur zhing /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa
416b7(khri brgyad): nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis glags mi rnyed cing /mtshon ma med pa la'ang mtshan ma med pas glags
417a1(khri brgyad): mi rnyed la/smon pa med pa la'ang smon pa med pas glags myi rnyed pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
417a2(khri brgyad): du stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis glags mi rnyed cing /mtshan ma med pa la'ang mtshan ma med
417a3(khri brgyad): pas glags mi rnyed la/smon pa med pa la'ang smon pa med pas glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /gang du glags rnyed par
417a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba dang /gang la glegs rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la mi dang /mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed
417a5(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms shin
417a6(khri brgyad): tu bsgoms shing /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/gshes ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i
417a7(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i yongs su spyad pa dag gis bsnyen
417b1(khri brgyad): bkur byas pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams
417b2(khri brgyad): dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dpe rgyas rnams
417b3(khri brgyad): dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams dang /lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa
417b4(khri brgyad): dang /ma bzung ba dang /ma bcangs pa dang /kun chub par ma byas pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la mo byas pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral
417b5(khri brgyad): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya/gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/klag par bya/kun chub par bya/tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//kau shi kau gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am
417b6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /rnam pa thams cad
417b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung /bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung /lam gol
418a1(khri brgyad): ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/'jigs pa'am/bag cha bar 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo dag gis mi dmigs/
418a2(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shin tu bsgoms shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang shin tu bsgoms la/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
418a3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /
418a4(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag
418a5(khri brgyad): gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nub mo 'di nyid la mos pa dang /'dzin
418a6(khri brgyad): pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
418a7(khri brgyad): ba de dag rtag par rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /spa ngar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
418b1(khri brgyad): pol brten nas sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur/dud 'gro'i skyo gnas rnams dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams dang /lha dbul po rnams dang /mi dbul po rnams dang /
418b2(khri brgyad): yams kyi bro nad rnams dang /dro nad 'gro ba rnams dang /gnod pa dang /'tshe ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas dge ba bcu'i
418b3(khri brgyad): las kyi lam rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
418b4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
418b5(khri brgyad): dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
418b6(khri brgyad): ya dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /de
418b7(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /dngas rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
419a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/rgyal rigs
419a2(khri brgyad): shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis legs so//bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so//khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la
419a3(khri brgyad): chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lpags so//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs dag 'jig rten na mchis lags so//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis
419a4(khri brgyad): lags so//'og min gyi ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu dag 'jig rten na mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas rgyun
419a5(khri brgyad): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na mchis lags so//rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten na mchis lags so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi
419a6(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na mchis lags so//rang byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na mchis lags
419a7(khri brgyad): so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'jig rten na mchis lags so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'jig
419b1(khri brgyad): rten na mchis lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs lags so//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'jig rten na mchis
419b2(khri brgyad): lags so//sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'jig rten na bzhugs lags so//chos dkon mchog 'jig rten na mtshas lags so//dge 'dun dkon mchog 'jig rten na mchis lags so//
419b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsrung ba dang /bskyab dang /sba bar bgyi ba lags
419b4(khri brgyad): so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems
419b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po la brten nus sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten rgyan chad par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /chos
419b6(khri brgyad): dkon mchog dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bar du 'jig rten na yod pa yin no//kau shi ka de lta bas na/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems
419b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rgyun mi chad par bkur stir bya/bla mar bya/brjed par bya/mchod par bya zhing /bsrung ba dang /bskyob pa dang /sba bar bya'o//ko shi ka gong dag byang
420a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsti stang du bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /brjod par bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar sems pa de dag ni de la bsti stang du bya/
420a2(khri brgyad): ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /brjed par bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar sems pa yin te/kau shi ka de lta bas na/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub
420a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rgyun mi chad par bsti stang du bya/bla mar bya/brjed par bya/mchod par bya zhing /bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bya'o//kau shi ka stong gsum
420a4(khri brgyad): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas sha stag gis/'di lta ste dper na/bu ram shing gi tshal lam/'dam bu'i tshal lam/'od ma'i tshal lam/
420a5(khri brgyad): mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/'bras kyi zhing ngam/til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang bar gyur nas de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams
420a6(khri brgyad): cad kyis bsti stang du byas/bla mar byas/brjed par byas/mchod pa byas pa bas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug
420a7(khri brgyad): dang ma bral ba gcig cig la bsti stong du byas/bla mor byas/brjed par byas/mchod pa byas na/de nyid snga ma bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
420b1(khri brgyad): 'di ltar nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
420b2(khri brgyad): rnams 'jig rten na yod pa ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po la brten nas/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
420b3(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten nu yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka de lta bas na/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems
420b4(khri brgyad): da' sems dpa' chen po la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsti stang du bya/blo mar bya/brjed par bya/mchod par bya zhing bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu

420b6(khri brgyad): gogacig pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das lo/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
420b7(khri brgyad): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ngam/bcangs som/klags sam/kun chub par bgyis same/tshul bzhin du yod la bgyis na/tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yos
421a1(khri brgyad): su 'dzin par 'gyur te/sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
421a2(khri brgyad): la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /
421a3(khri brgyad): bla mar bgyi ba dang /brjed par bgyi ba dang /mchod par bgyid par 'tshal na'ang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
421a4(khri brgyad): gi spyan sngar mchis shing chos nyan par bgyid pa dang /de dag gi chos de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bskyad
421a5(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ba dang /rigs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /tshe rabs phun sum tshogs pa dang /'khor
421a6(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa dang /mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /'od phun sum tshogs pa dang /mig phun sum tshogs pa dang /dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa dang /ting nge 'dzin phun sum
421a7(khri brgyad): tshogs pa dang /gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul nas gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
421b1(khri brgyad): rnams mi 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su mchi zhing der mchis nas kyang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
421b2(khri brgyad): pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bgyid//
421b3(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/bsam gtan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/
421b4(khri brgyad): tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod par bgyid/yang dag par

421b6(khri brgyad): pa brjod par bgyid/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag paru rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi bsngags pa brjod par
421b7(khri brgyad): bgyid cing /thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen pos 'dul la/chos ston par bgyid
422a1(khri brgyad): pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dre skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du shes rab kyi pha
422a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung bas/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur zhing /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /ting nge

422b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur la/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba yin no//kau shri ka gzhan
422b2(khri brgyad): yang sheso rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngam/bcangs sam/klags sam/kun chub por byas sam/tshul bzhin du yid la byas na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mod
422b3(khri brgyad): dag gis tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gang dag thob par 'gyur ba de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /ngas khyod la bshad por bya'o//lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom
422b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shr-i ka gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu'am/
422b5(khri brgyad): bdud dam/bdud kyi ris kyi lha 'am/gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can gang la la dag/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag la

422b7(khri brgyad): bya bar 'dod pa de dag myur ba nyid du med par 'gyur zhing /'bab par 'dod pa dang /rtsod par 'dod pa dang /dbral bar 'dod pa dang /'gal bar bya bar 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de
423a1(khri brgyad): dgra yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yun ring por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

423a5(khri brgyad): sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can du gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su
423a6(khri brgyad): btang ste/sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang /gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas thab mo dang /'thab pa dang /rtsod par gyur pa'i phyi dang
423a7(khri brgyad): nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang /gang dag
423b1(khri brgyad): gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas le lo can du gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/sems can
423b2(khri brgyad): rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang /gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas rgyun du sems rnam par g.yengs par gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams
423b3(khri brgyad): cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/sems can rnams bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang /gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams
423b4(khri brgyad): yun ring po nas 'chal pa'i shes rab can du gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/sems can rnams
423b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod cing /yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang /ko shi ka gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams 'di lta ste/rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro ba dang /
423b6(khri brgyad): kun nas dkris pas yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi rjes su chags pa dang /khong khro ba dang kun nas dkris pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
423b7(khri brgyad): chen pos thabs la mkhas pas rnam par bsal nas bsam gtan bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang dag par
424a1(khri brgyad): 'dzin du bcug/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang //
