445a7(khri brgyad): ngasti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed/brjed par byed/gsol bar byed no/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
445b1(khri brgyad): gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyod snyam mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
445b2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang
445b3(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /tha na glegs bam du chud par byas te/
445b4(khri brgyad): me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bA dan dag gis bsti spyad du byed/bla mar
445b5(khri brgyad): byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed/brjed par byed/gsol bar byed pa de chos bsod nams mang du bskyed do//kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs
445b6(khri brgyad): pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lha'ang zhog gi/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
445b7(khri brgyad): papal mchod pa'i phyir/stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa sha stag gis yongs su bkang ste/bkang
446a1(khri brgyad): nas kyang de dag la lha'i me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dran
446a2(khri brgyad): dag gis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed/brjed par byed/gsol bar byed na/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
446a3(khri brgyad): bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom
446a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka do bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tha na yi ger bris shing glegs bam du byas
446a5(khri brgyad): ti/'dzin par byed/'chang bar byed/klog par byed/kun chub par byed/tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spros dang /me tog phreng dang /byug
446a6(khri brgyad): pa dang /phye ma dong /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mchen+da dang /bo dran dag gis bsti steng du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed pa de nyid gzhi de las bsad
446a7(khri brgyad): nams che so mang du bskyed do//kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta'ang zhog gi/kau shi ka gal te mi la la zhig
446b1(khri brgyad): gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir/stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad//
446b2(khri brgyad): tsam yod pa sha stag gis yongs su gong bar byed du bcug ste/byas nas kyang me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spros dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /glos dang /gledugs
446b3(khri brgyad): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed cing mchod na/kau shi ka 'ang ji snyam du so mos/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
446b4(khri brgyad): bu mo de gzhi de las bskyod nams mang du bskyed snyam ma mo/brgya byin gyis gsol po/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das
446b5(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dib na glags bam du chud par byas te/me tog dang /bdug pa
446b6(khri brgyad): dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dAn dag gis bsti sbyang du byud /bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod
446b7(khri brgyad): par byed cing mchod na/de nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//kau shi ka sdang gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po tshe sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyis yongs su ba
447a1(khri brgyad): ba lta'ang zhog gi/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir stong
447a2(khri brgyad): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa sha stag gis yongs su bkang ste/bkang nas kyang
447a3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan
447a4(khri brgyad): dag gis mchod rten de dag la bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed na/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las
447a5(khri brgyad): bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
447a6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'ami rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tha na yi ger bris te glegs bam du byas nas 'dzin par byed/'chang bar
447a7(khri brgyad): byed/klog par byed/kun chub par byed cing /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tigo phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
447b1(khri brgyad): dang /ba dAn dag gis dri lnga bsti snang du byed/bla mar byed/ri myor byed/mchod par byed cing /mchod na de rgyus bsod nams mang du bskyed do//kau shI ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
447b2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ste mchod pa lta'ang zhog gi/kau shi ka gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems
447b3(khri brgyad): can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag las sems can re res kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir/rin po che sna
447b4(khri brgyad): bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten dag byed du bcug ste/de dag la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
447b5(khri brgyad): mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stong du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang
447b6(khri brgyad): mu bral bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bom du chud par byas te/'dzin por byed/'chang bar byed/klog par byed/kun chub par byed/tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
447b7(khri brgyad): me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gosau dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis mchod par byed na/de nyid de
448a1(khri brgyad): bas chos bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de skad ces bka'astsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
448a2(khri brgyad): dade lta lags so//de de lta lags te/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsti stang bgyis pa dang /bla mar bgyis pa dang /ri mor bgyis pa dang /mchod pa
448a3(khri brgyad): bgyis pas ni/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bgyis pa dang /bla mar bgyis pa dang /ri mor bgyis pa
448a4(khri brgyad): dang /mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur logs so//bcom ldan 'das gang yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can de dag las sems
448a5(khri brgyad): can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i slad du/rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad cim mchis pa
448a6(khri brgyad): sha stag bgyid du stsal nas/de dag la bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par lha'i me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /
448a7(khri brgyad): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/bla mar bgyid/ri mor bgyid/mchod par bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
448b1(khri brgyad): mo de dag gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed lags sam/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du phyogs bcu re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can de dag
448b2(khri brgyad): las/sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phong du dpag tshad tsam mchis pa sha
448b3(khri brgyad): stag bgyid du stsal cing /de dag la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag par lha'i me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang //
448b4(khri brgyad): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/bla mar bgyid/ri mor bgyid/mchod par bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
448b5(khri brgyad): gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shI ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kau shi kra mang ngo //brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom
448b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'o ma rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te/glegs bam du bgyis nas/'dzin par bgyid/'chang bar bgyid/klog
448b7(khri brgyad): par bgyid//kun chub par dgyed/tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /de la'ong me tog dang /dadug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na
449a1(khri brgyad): bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/bla mar bgyid/ri mor bgyid/mchod par bgyid pa de ches bsod nams mang
449a2(khri brgyad): du bskyed lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i slad du ste/'di lta ste/dge ba bcu'i
449a3(khri brgyad): las kyi lam dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /rnam
449a4(khri brgyad): par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
449a5(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu/
449a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo
449a7(khri brgyad): thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
449b1(khri brgyad): dang /byams bya chen blo dang /snying rje chen po dang /thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad
449b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dres pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bston pa lags te/de la bslabs nas 'das pa
449b3(khri brgyad): dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /nyan thos rnams kyang nges par byung lags so//nges par 'byung lags
449b4(khri brgyad): so//nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyud stong pa las/mchod rten gyi le'u zhes bya ste/nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o///
449b5(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab
449b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris shing glegs bam du byas te/'dzin tam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/tshul bzhin du yid la byed kyi steng du/
449b7(khri brgyad): me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/bla mar
450a1(khri brgyad): byed/ri mor byed/mchod pa byed pa de dag ni gzhi de las bsod nams mang po tshad med/grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/gzhal du med/dpag tu med pa dag
450a2(khri brgyad): bskyed par 'gyur ro//da ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab
450a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung la/kau shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi
450a4(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /mig lnga dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /sems can yongs
450a5(khri brgyad): su smin par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung zhing /kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams
450a6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen po nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin/kau shi ka nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen po'ang shes rab kyi
450a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin zhing /kau shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro//kau
450b1(khri brgyad): shi ka de lta bas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo grang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris shing /glegs bam du chud par byas te/'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog
450b2(khri brgyad): pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /de la'ang me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs
450b3(khri brgyad): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya
450b4(khri brgyad): ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/stong gi cha dang /'bum gyi cha dang /bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs dang /cha dang /rgyu dang /dpe'i bar du'ang
450b5(khri brgyad): mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dzam+bu'i gling na gnas par 'gyur ba de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog med par mi 'gyur/chos
450b6(khri brgyad): dkon mchog dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog med par mi 'gyur zhing /de srong du dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i
450b7(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
451a1(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
451a2(khri brgyad): dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par reg pa zhi dang /sangs rgyas
451a3(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur la//rgyal
451a4(khri brgyad): rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
451a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /sum cu gsum pa dang /'bab dral dang /druga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang 'jig rten
451a6(khri brgyad): su 'byung bar 'gyur/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /la ni cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /
451a7(khri brgyad): chung sems dpa' rnams kying yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang /chos kyi 'khor la bskor ba dang /sems can yongs su smon po
451b1(khri brgyad): bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'ang yod pa'i phyir ro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
451b2(khri brgyad): lha'i bu dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/bklag par bya/kun chub par bya'o//grogs po
451b3(khri brgyad): dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gdon par bya/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ngam/
451b4(khri brgyad): bcangs sam/klags som/kun chub par byas sam/tshul bzhin du yid la byas na/mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur/dge ba'i chos thams cad ni mngon
451b5(khri brgyad): par 'phel bar 'gyur/lha ma yin gyi ris rnams ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur/lha'i ris rnams ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
451b6(khri brgyad): pa bzung ngam/bcangs sam/klags sam/kun chud par byas sam/tshul bzhin du yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/chos kyi tshul dang /dge 'dun gyi
451b7(khri brgyad): tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur zhing /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyud chad par mi 'gyur la/grogs po dag pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/byang chub
452a1(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar
452a2(khri brgyad): du'ang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba
452a3(khri brgyad): dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing yod pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan
452a4(khri brgyad): 'das kyis/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zungs shig/kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
452a5(khri brgyad): pa tshangs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka gang gi tshe/lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
452a6(khri brgyad): dang lhan cig tu g.yul sprad par bya'o snyam du sems shing shom pa de'i tshe/kau shi ka khyed kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid la soms la kha ton du gyis shig dang
452a7(khri brgyad): des lha ma yin de dag gi bsam pa de phyir nub par 'gyur zhing /phyis kyang g.yul spod po'i sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//kau shi ka lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo gang dga'
452b1(khri brgyad): 'pho ba'i tshe'ang de dag gi mdun du khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri kha ton gyis shig dang /gal te de dag gis bdag nyid ngan song du skye bar mthong na'ang /de dag gis shes rab kyi pha
452b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di zos pas/ngan seng du skye ba'i sems bskyed po de nub cing /lha'i gnas de nyid du phyir skye bar 'gyur te/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa ni de ltar mthu
452b3(khri brgyad): che ba yin no//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/lha'i bu 'am/lha'i bu mo gang yang rung ba'i rno lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag por gyur pa de dag thams cad ni
452b4(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba des rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin
452b5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
452b6(khri brgyad): bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/
452b7(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten no/da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha
453a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar
453a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /nyan thos kyi chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol
453a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
453a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na ma mchis pa lags so///
453a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lto ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe ni/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab
453a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i ched du yang dag par zhugs pa'i slad du'o//de skad ces
453a7(khri brgyad): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kau shi ka 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha
453b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo yin no//kau shi ka 'dri lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na med pa yin no//kau shi ka 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
453b2(khri brgyad): 'di ni reg sngags mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'das pa dang /
453b3(khri brgyad): ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/mngon par rdzogs par
453b4(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'jig rten na yod pa dang /
453b5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs
453b6(khri brgyad): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'jig rten na yod pa dang /
453b7(khri brgyad): rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang //
454a1(khri brgyad): chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid kyang 'jig rten na yod pa dang /mig lnga dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig/
454a2(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'jig
454a3(khri brgyad): rterton+da na yod pa dang /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag
454a4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten na yod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag 'jig rten na yod pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na//
454a5(khri brgyad): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas rtsi dang /skar ma'i tshigs thams cad yod pa yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas kyang
454a6(khri brgyad): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /dge ba'i spyod pa dang /yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
454a7(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshon ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rtso dag kyang yod pa yin la/slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams dang /nyan thos dang
454b1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu skar dang /skar ma dag kyang yod pa yin/thams cad shes pa nyid kyang yod pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang yod pa yin te/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom
454b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'jig rten du mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas shing /de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid sems can rnams
454b3(khri brgyad): le 'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams ston par byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar lha'i thog pa dang /mi'i theg pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas
454b4(khri brgyad): kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen po'ang byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug
454b5(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad la sgom pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang
454b6(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob par byed pa dang /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par byed pa
454b7(khri brgyad): dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du mi byed pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /byang
455a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de ni shes
455a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro//kau shi k+ki gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang
455a3(khri brgyad): ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
455a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
455a5(khri brgyad): dang /'chang ba dang /klog phywa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba logs/bcom ldan
455a6(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chung ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byeng
455a7(khri brgyad): pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/me dang mtshon dang /chus kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur zhing /nad gang yong
455b1(khri brgyad): rlung ba'i bar dag gos kyang 'tsho ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur te/las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so//kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyal ba'i
455b2(khri brgyad): nas 'tshe ba zhig byung bar gyur na'ang de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na de la glags lta ba de dag gis glags btsal kyang glags rnyed
455b3(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyuraro//deci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ky-i ga ze brjid yin pa'i phyiraro//kaushAk+ki gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes ra
455b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du 'don cing rgyal po'i pho brang der song no//dri la rgyal po'i bu 'am/rgyal po'i blon po sna tshan po la gtogs pa dag kyang gsong por smra bar bya'o snyam du
455b5(khri brgyad): sems ston par smra bar bya'o snyam du sems/dga' bar bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag glos sems can
455b6(khri brgyad): thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag cing snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar bzhag pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
455b7(khri brgyad): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang
456a1(khri brgyad): ldan par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun
456a2(khri brgyad): chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe phyi ma'i yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur te/'di lta ste/nam du'ang dag pa bcu'i las kyi lam dang 'bral bar
456a3(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur/nam du'ang bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams
456a4(khri brgyad): cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
456a5(khri brgyad): 'dres pa btso ngargyad dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par nam du'ang sems can dmyal ba dang /dud
456a6(khri brgyad): 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/num du 'ong dbang po mi cheng bar mi 'gyur/nam du'ang yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/nam du'ang
456a7(khri brgyad): dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/'od ma mkhan gyi khyim rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/g.yung po'i khyim rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/dmangs rigs rnams su
456b1(khri brgyad): skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /de do phyin chad kyang rtag par rgyun du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur la/'jig rten gyi khams gang na/sang+yas
456b2(khri brgyad): rgyorgyachos bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /nam du'ang mngon par shes pa nyams par mi
456b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//dri 'dod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos nyan pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
456b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba na'ang sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro//kau
456b5(khri brgyad): ka de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de dag thob par 'dod pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/klag par
456b6(khri brgyad): bya/kun chub par bya tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar bya ste/de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
456b7(khri brgyad): por rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe 'do'i yon tan dang /tshe phyi ma'i yon tan de dag dang nam du'ang 'bral bar po 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri borgyad stong pa/
457a1(khri brgyad): las/byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o///de nas gzhan mu stegs can kun tu/
457a2(khri brgyad): rgyu klan ka 'tshol ba'i bsam pa can rab tu mang po brgyu zhig klan ka btsal ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das go la bu der dong ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/
457a3(khri brgyad): gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la klan ka 'tshol ba'i bsam pa can rab tu mang po brgya po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das ga lo ba der dong gis/gzhan
457a4(khri brgyad): mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag ci nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mi 'dong zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar/bdag gis bcom
457a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji tsam zhig bzung ba de bdag gis nges par kha ton du bya'o snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das las
457a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji tsam zhog bzung ba de kha ton du byas so//de nas gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag gis rgyud ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba
457a7(khri brgyad): byas te/lam gang nas lhags pa'i lam de nyid nas phyir dong ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ci'i phyir gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu klan ka
457b1(khri brgyad): 'chol ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag rgyang ring po nas/bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas gang nas lhags pa'i lam de nyid nas phyir drong zhig gu snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das
457b2(khri brgyad): kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha
457b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di bsams te/des na gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag gis rgyang ring po nyid nas/nga la bskor ba byas te/lam gang nas lhags pa de nyid nas phyir dong ngo //
457b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag gi nang na gcig la'ang dkar po'i cha yod par ngas ma mthong ngo //gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag thams cad ni zhe 'gras
457b5(khri brgyad): pi'i sems dang /klanA ka 'chol ba'i bsam pas 'ong bar sems te/shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la klan ka btsal ba'i bsam pa 'am/zhe 'gras pa'i sems
457b6(khri brgyad): kyis 'ong bar nus pa de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na ngas ma mthong
457b7(khri brgyad): ste/de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /'og min man chad
458a1(khri brgyad): kyi lha rnams dang /nyan thos gang dag dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad
458a2(khri brgyad): kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i
458a3(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dang /phyogs bcu'i bar du phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi
458a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /lha dang klu
458a5(khri brgyad): dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
458a6(khri brgyad): 'di yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro//de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems
458a7(khri brgyad): te/de bzhin ga shegaso pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag spyan snga na 'khod cing /'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i
458b1(khri brgyad): lha'i bu 'di dag kyang spyan stan 'khod pa las na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur du nges
458b2(khri brgyad): kyis/mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo//de nas bdud sdig can gyis dpung go tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par
458b3(khri brgyad): sprul nas/bcom ldan 'das gol ba der 'gro bar bsams so//de nus lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma bdud sdig can 'di ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag
458b4(khri brgyad): bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'gro bar 'dod do/bdud sdig can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i bkod pa gang yin pa/dpung gi tshogs yan
458b5(khri brgyad): lhag bzhi pa'i bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i yang ma yin/dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i bkod pa 'di lta bu ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi'ang ma
458b6(khri brgyad): yin/shAkya rnams kyi'ang ma yin/li tsa b+hi rnams kyi'ang ma yin gyi/bdud sdig can ni yuni ring po nas/bcom ldan 'das la glags lta zhing /skabs 'tshal ba dang /
458b7(khri brgyad): sems can yang dag pa la zhugs pa rnams la/gtse ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin pas/dpung gi tshogs yan leg bzhi pa gang yin pa 'di ni bdud sdig can gyis mngon par
459a1(khri brgyad): sprul pa yin gyis/bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsdam par bya'o//dran nas kyang kha ton du bya'o snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
459a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsams so//dran nas kyang kha ton du byas te/lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji tsam du kha ton byed pa de tsam du/
459a3(khri brgyad): bdud sdig can lam de nyid dang /sgo de nyid nas phyir log go/de nas 'khor der rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag gis
459a4(khri brgyad): lha'i me tog rnams mngon par sprul nas/bar snang la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su 'dor zhing 'thor bar byed la/tshig 'di skad ces shes rab
459a5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du dzim+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la gnas pa de srid du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med par mi 'gyur
459a6(khri brgyad): zhing /dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur la/dge 'dun yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
459a7(khri brgyad): dang /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa'i khyad par yang grag par 'gyur la/phyogs gang
459b1(khri brgyad): logs na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te/glegs bam du byas nas 'chang ba'i phyogs de snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur la/gang na
459b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de'ang mgon yod cing mun pa dang bral bar 'gyur bas na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dzam+bu gling pa'i mi rnams yun ring du
459b3(khri brgyad): spyod par gyur cig ces smos so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lce'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bkra' stsal to//kau shi ka de de bzhin te/kau shI ka phyogs
459b4(khri brgyad): gang dang /gang gi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod cing glegs bam la bris pa yod pa'i sa phyogs de ni snang bar gyur pa yin te/sa phyogs de
459b5(khri brgyad): ni mgon yod cing /mun pa mun nag dang bral bar 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lho'i me tog rnams mngon par sprul nas/bcom ldan 'dis ga la ba der logs su gtor te/
459b6(khri brgyad): tshig 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par
459b7(khri brgyad): byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ni bdud dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs
460a1(khri brgyad): mi bu ma rigs kyi bu ma la rtag tu rgyun mo chud par bsrung ba dang /bsgrub pa dang /slu bar brgyu'o//bdag cag ni rigs kyi bu gang shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang
460a2(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /klog pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ston pa lags so snyam du 'dzin lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
460a3(khri brgyad): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/'chang ngam/klog gam
460a4(khri brgyad): kun chub par bgyid dam/tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rgyal ba thams cad la
460a5(khri brgyad): lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags so//rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gung drug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar dag tu
460a6(khri brgyad): bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa dang /dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
460a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba legs la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'di lta ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba la gos
460b1(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lpags pa'i slad du ste/de ltar na rnam
460b2(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis shing tha mi dad de/bcad du ma mchis pa lags so//de skad ces gsol
460b3(khri brgyad): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /shes
460b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha ma dad de bcad du med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gzhan mu stegs can gyi le'u
460b5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ste/nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa//bam po nyi shu gsum pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das
460b6(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa ltar/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
460b7(khri brgyad): pa'i bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad lags so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
461a1(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad lags so//de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi ming yongs su brjod
461a2(khri brgyad): pam mdzad lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
461a3(khri brgyad): pa ni 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin no//kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du
461a4(khri brgyad): sems/sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos par pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par 'gyur snyam mam/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/tshul khrims
461a5(khri brgyad): dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos par pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob par 'gyur snyam
461a6(khri brgyad): mam/kun dga' ngos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/bcom ldan 'das sbyin po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa dang /tshul khrims dang /
461a7(khri brgyad): bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas/ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba
461b1(khri brgyad): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo/sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brdzun 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/
461b2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo sta nA/pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ro//len pa med pa'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
461b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na/pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
461b4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du/yongs su bsngos pos ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam
461b5(khri brgyad): gtan dang /shes rab gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas/ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba lags/bcom
461b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo gzugs gnyis su med pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /byang chub kyi bar du gnyis
461b7(khri brgyad): su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul ji lta bu lags/tshor ba dang /'dra
462a1(khri brgyad): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul ji lta bu lags/byang chub kyi bar du gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul ji lta bu
462a2(khri brgyad): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo //tsher ba n+de tshor bas stong ngo //'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ngo //'du byed
462a3(khri brgyad): rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyis stong ngo //rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //
462a4(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub kyi bar de ni gnyis su
462a5(khri brgyad): med cing gnyis su dbyer myed pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo bas na 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams dang /byang chub dang /rnam pa
462a6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin no//kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/sa chen po la brten na tshogs pa'i dbang gis sa bon rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//
462a7(khri brgyad): kun dga' bo dang zhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten na/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /rnam pa thams
462b1(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye bar 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten na'ang /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu
462b2(khri brgyad): dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bas na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
462b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi yongs su 'dren pa yin no//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom
462b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
462b5(khri brgyad): pa de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
462b6(khri brgyad): kyis yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung zhing tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig
462b7(khri brgyad): rten du 'byung lags so//bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag
463a1(khri brgyad): 'jig rten du 'byung lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba nas/tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis pas ni rgyal
463a2(khri brgyad): rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa lags so//bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu
463a3(khri brgyad): rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa lags so//rgyal chenA bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab
463a4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba nas/tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis pas ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis pa lags so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba
463a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams mchis pa lags so//rang srings rgyas rnams mchis pa lags so//byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchis
463a6(khri brgyad): pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba nas/tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis pas ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
463a7(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na bzhugs pa lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka'
463b1(khri brgyad): stsal to//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba nas/tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pas de dag go yon tan ni de
463b2(khri brgyad): tsam du zad ces nga mi smra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa
463b3(khri brgyad): dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni/tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar
463b4(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro//gang dag shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun thub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung
463b5(khri brgyad): po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
463b6(khri brgyad): pA'i sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//kau shri ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar
463b7(khri brgyad): rig par bya ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//kau shi ka nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po
464a1(khri brgyad): dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po glang yin pa'i
464a2(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de ni kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
464a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po nas/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i bar gang yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung
464a4(khri brgyad): po nas/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i bar de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhing /skyong gi cha dang /'bum gyi cha dang /grangs dang cha dang /bgrang ba dang dpe dang /rgyur
464a5(khri brgyad): yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi sems ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sku las rnam par grol zhing /chos gang dang
464a6(khri brgyad): yang bral ba med la skyes po'ang med pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi grer bris nas 'chang zhing me tog dang bdug pa dang /
464a7(khri brgyad): spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phyi ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bkur sti byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed
464b1(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang tshe 'di dang /tshe phyi ma'i yon tan rnams 'thob par re bar bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la lha'i
464b2(khri brgyad): dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /
464b3(khri brgyad): kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /bdug pa dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang /phye ma dang
464b4(khri brgyad): gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bkur sti bgyid/bla mar bgyid/ri mor bgyid/mchod par bgyid pa gang lags pa de la bdag gis kyang rtag
464b5(khri brgyad): tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang //
464b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shri ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa de'i
464b7(khri brgyad): gan du lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po nyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/lha'i bu rnams rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i spobs pa nye bar
465a1(khri brgyad): sgrub par sems par 'gyur ro//bdag gi tshe chos smra ba de dag smra bar mi 'dod pa na'ang lha'i bu de dag nyid chos la gus pas spobs pa nye bar sgrub par sems par 'gyur
465a2(khri brgyad): ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du
465a3(khri brgyad): yid la byed cing de glegs bam du'ang bris nas/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
465a4(khri brgyad): dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed mchod par byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro//ko shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
465a5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu dran pa 'di ston pa de dag ni 'khor bzhi po dag gis mdun du bdag la la la zhig bkar gcog cing klan ka tshol du 'ong ngo snyam du sems zhum par
465a6(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di srung zhing skyob la sbed par byed pa'i phyir ro//'di ltar
465a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang /'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /zag pa med pa rnams dang /thun mong
465b1(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang /thun mong ma yin pa rnams dang /dge ba rnams dang /mi dge ba rnams dang /'dus byas rnams dang /'dus ma byas rnams dang /nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /rang sangs
465b2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /chos thams cad tha dad pa meng ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am
465b3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas pa des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la klan ka tshol ba yang dag par rjes
465b4(khri brgyad): su mi mthong zhing /klanaka/tshol bar byed pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zi
465b5(khri brgyad): pa de la ni klan ka tshol ba med do//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /tshul bzhin du yod la byed pa'i bar du byed
465b6(khri brgyad): pa ni/sems zhum par mi 'gyur/kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur/skrag par mi 'gyur/dngang bar mi 'gyur/kun tu dngang bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'odi ltar rigs kyi
465b7(khri brgyad): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni gang zhum pa 'am/kun tu zhum pa 'am/skrag pa 'am dngang ba'am/kun tu dngang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
466a1(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir rlo/kau shrI ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /
466a2(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba don dag gis
466a3(khri brgyad): bsti stang du byed/bla mor byed/ri mor byed/mchod pa byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//kau shi kA gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
466a4(khri brgyad): gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de glegs bam du'ang bris te/
466a5(khri brgyad): me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dog gis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed
466a6(khri brgyad): ri mo byed mchod pa byed pa de ni pha ma dang mdza' bo dang /phyi 'khor drang gnyen dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze rnams kyi snying du sdug par
466a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' de ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems
466b1(khri brgyad): dpa' rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang slob pa thams cad dang /mi slob pa de dag thams cad la sdug par 'gyur ro//'jig rten lha dang bcas
466b2(khri brgyad): pa/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu rnams dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur
466b3(khri brgyad): ro//spobs pa mchod pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma chod pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam
466b4(khri brgyad): gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi chad pa dang yod ldan par 'gyur ro//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi chod pa dang /dran pa nye bar
466b5(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam rnams
466b6(khri brgyad): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi chod pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi ched pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi
466b7(khri brgyad): chod pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi chod pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
467a1(khri brgyad): su dag par bya ba mi chod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi chod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//mu stegs can gyi rgol ba byung ngo cog la/chos dang ldan
467a2(khri brgyad): pas tshar gcod nus par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par
467a3(khri brgyad): byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de yi ger yang bris te/me tog dang bdug pa dang /spos dang me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang gos dang /gdugs dang
467a4(khri brgyad): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan drag gis bsti steng du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed mchod par byed pa ni tshe 'di dang /tshe phyi ma'i yon tan de dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/rnam
467a5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//kau shi kra gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du
467a6(khri brgyad): bris te/'chang bar byed pa dar/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na mod pa'i byang chub la yang dag
467a7(khri brgyad): par zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag der lhags nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed/'tshang bar byed/klog par byed/kun chub par byed cing /phyag byas
467b1(khri brgyad): te btud nas phyir 'dod par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
467b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dren rnams dang /tshangs chen rnams dang /tshangs 'khor rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /
467b3(khri brgyad): 'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /'bras bu che ba rnams dang /tshangs pa gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
467b4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa de dag kyang der lhags nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /klag pa dang /kun chub par byas nas phyir 'dod
467b5(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de la gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mi che ba dang /shin tu mthong dang /gya nom snang dang /mi gdung ba dang /'og min gyi lha'i bu gang yin po de dag
467b6(khri brgyad): kyang drer lhags nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /klag pa dang /kun chub par byas te/phyag byas nas phyir 'dong bar sems par 'gyur ro//
467b7(khri brgyad): kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des kyang 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khoms dgo na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris su
468a1(khri brgyad): gtogs pa nas 'bras bu che ba man chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
468a2(khri brgyad): lha'i bu gang yin pa rnams dang /gzhan yang lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa
468a3(khri brgyad): de dag 'dir lhags nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang klag pa dang /kun chub par byas shing phyag byas te/mchod pa byas pa rnams phyir dong
468a4(khri brgyad): zhing /chos kyi sbyin pa 'di'ang de dag la byin par gyur tsog snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu grang
468a5(khri brgyad): yin pa rnams dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu man chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gang yin pa rnams dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris
468a6(khri brgyad): kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag kyang der lhags nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri 'dzin par byed/'chang bar byed/klog par byed/kun chub par byed cing phyag byas te/btud
468a7(khri brgyad): nas phyir 'dong bar sems so//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu gang yin pa rnams dang /'og min gyi lha'i
468b1(khri brgyad): buman chad dang /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams drang /'og min gyi lha man chad gang yin pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
468b2(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo de la srung ba dang /skyob pa dang /sbed par byed cing /de la glags tshol ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed de/las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
468b3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/bla na med pa yang dag par
468b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/sems can thams cad kyi skyabs bya ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang //
468b5(khri brgyad): bde ba bya ba'i ched du yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
468b6(khri brgyad): pa 'di bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang klag pa dang /kun chub par bgyi ba dang /bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /bla mar bgyi ba dang /ri mor bgyi ba dang /mchod par bgyi ba dang /phyag bgyi ba
468b7(khri brgyad): dang /gdud par bgyi ba'i slad du/phyogs bcu'i khor yug dag nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams der mchi ba dang /'og min gyi lha'i bu man chad mchi bar rigs kyi bu 'am
469a1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi kra gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mi ma yin pa'i
469a2(khri brgyad): lha'i dri sngon ma myong bar tshor bar gyur na/des lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa dang /bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /klag pa
469a3(khri brgyad): dradang /kun chub par bya ba dang /bisti stang du bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /ri mor bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba'i phyir 'dir lcags so snyam du shes par bya'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang
469a4(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gtsang sbra byas na/gtsang sgro byas pa des lha de dag lhags nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /btsang ba dang /klag pa dang /kun
469a5(khri brgyad): chub par bya ba dang /bsti sbyang du bya ba dang /blo mar bya ba dang /ri mor bya ba dang /mchod pa byas nas yid rangs par 'gyur ro//phyogs de na lha gzi brjid chung ngu gang yin pa de dag
469a6(khri brgyad): ni/lha gzi brjid che ba gri zi brjid che ba de dag gis gzi brjid dang /byin mi bzod pas de nas gud du 'dong bar sems so//lha gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag ji tsam du der
469a7(khri brgyad): 'ong ba de tsam du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag rgya cher mos par 'gyur ro//sa phyogs der yang gtsang sbra mi byed pa'i bag spyad par mi bya ste/me tog dang bdug pa dang /spos
469b1(khri brgyad): dang me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis kyang sa phyogs dri brgyan cing spos kyis byugs la me tog sil mas gtor bar
469b2(khri brgyad): bya'o//dar gyi lnga ldi mang po sbyang zhing bla re bres la rnam pa du mas sa phyogs de brgyan par bya'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i lus ngal bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
469b3(khri brgyad): lus bde bar 'gyur ba dang /lus yang bar 'gyur ba dang /lus las su rung ba dang /sems yang ba dang /sems las su rung ba dang /sems bde bar nyams su tshor bar 'gyur te/de phyin chad
469b4(khri brgyad): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa thag pa nas/yongs su rtog cing sdig pa'i rmi lam rmi bar mi 'gyur ro//dri rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dog par
469b5(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis smras pa/sku gser gyi kha dog can/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i
469b6(khri brgyad): tshegs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa/chos ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i gtam nyid thos
469b7(khri brgyad): par 'gyur zhing /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ldan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang ldan pa'i gtam nyid thos par 'gyur te/pha rol
470a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa de dag ga don thos pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi don thos par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
470a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
470a3(khri brgyad): rgyorgyaba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bzung bar bya'o//sems
470a4(khri brgyad): can rnams ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su gzung bar bya zhes/choso bgro ba byed pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//shar phyogs
470a5(khri brgyad): nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po dag gi sgra'ang thos par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byung dang /'og dang /steng dang /phyogs mtshams
470a6(khri brgyad): dag nas/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams gri ge mo zhig na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
470a7(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig dang /nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di
470b1(khri brgyad): skyed cig gis mdun gyis bltas nas/yongs su bskor te chos ston cing bzhugs so zhes thos par 'gyur ro//shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phyug mang po
470b2(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong zhing phyogs bcu'i bar du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag dru ma yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur
470b3(khri brgyad): ro//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten skya gdung gi rteni rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bumo dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//mchod rten
470b4(khri brgyad): de dag la'ang me tog dang bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/
470b5(khri brgyad): bla mar byed/mchod par byed/ri mo byed pa dag mthong bar 'gyur te/kau shi ka de ltar/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rmi lam bzang po de lta bu de dag rmi bar 'gyur ro//bde bar
470b6(khri brgyad): gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur te/lus la gzi brjid 'jug par nyams su tshor zhing lus kyang lci ba med de/yang bar nyams su tshor bar 'gyur ro//de kha zas
470b7(khri brgyad): la'ang brkam pa'i shas che bar mi 'gyur ro//gos dang zas dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad la brkam par mi 'gyur te/kau shi ka 'di lta ste
471a1(khri brgyad): dper na/dge sbyong rnal 'byor spyod pa ting nge 'dzin las langs pa de ni yid la byed pas tshim par gyur pa'i sems kyis zas la brkam pa'i shas che bar mi 'gyur
471a2(khri brgyad): gyi chung bar 'gyur ba bzhin no//kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rags kyi bu mo de la mi ma yan pa rnams gzi brjed sgrub par 'gyur ro//phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom
471a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po de dag kyang lus
471a4(khri brgyad): la gzi brjid 'jug par byed do//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
471a5(khri brgyad): pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//kau
471a6(khri brgyad): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo grang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par mi byed/'chang bar mi byed/klog par mi byed/kun chub par mi byed//
471a7(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed par glegs bam du bris te 'chang la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /
471b1(khri brgyad): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bu dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa byed kyang /kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang
471b2(khri brgyad): du bskyed par 'gyur gyi/gang gis phyogs bcu khor yug gi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa nyan thos
471b3(khri brgyad): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams lo gos dang /zas dang mal cha dang /stan+da dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bAsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa
471b4(khri brgyad): byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang /nyan thos dang bcas pa'i dge
471b5(khri brgyad): 'dun la'ang gos dang /zas dang /mal che dang /stan dang nu ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed ri mo byed/mchod par byed pa ni de lta ma yin no//
471b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las 'dzin pa dang /ri mi byed pa'i phan yon gyi le'u zhes bya ste/sum cu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan
471b7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka gal te dzam+bu gling 'di de bzhi ni gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur byas te bkang la/de dag
472a1(khri brgyad): la'ang me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /gros dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti
472a2(khri brgyad): stang du byed/bla mar byed ri mo byed/mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di khyod la byin pa gang yin pa cha 'di gnyis las khyod gang 'dam/
472a3(khri brgyad): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te dzam+bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba bdag la stsal ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol
472a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris te skyel ba la/bdag ni tshe 'di gnyis bzhag pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshal lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan
472a5(khri brgyad): 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la ma gus pa'ang ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gus pa kho na lags te/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs
472a6(khri brgyad): pa'i sku gdung dag la bsti sbyang bgyid par mi 'tshal ba 'am/bla mar bgyid par mi 'tshal ba 'am/ri mo bgyid par mi 'chal ba 'am/mchod pa bgyid par mi 'tshal
472a7(khri brgyad): ba'ang ma lags mod kyi/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba lags te/de'i
472b1(khri brgyad): slad du de dag bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /bla mar bgyi ba dang /ri mo bgyi ba dang /mchod pa bgyi ba lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
472b2(khri brgyad): yongs su bsgos pa lags te/de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes pa lags so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin lnga
472b3(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na bzung du med pa/bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshani nyid med pa mtshan nyid gcig pa yin
472b4(khri brgyad): na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa bzung du med pa/baman du med pa/thogs pa med pa/'di 'altar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa de khod kyis ji ltar blang bar sems/
472b5(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzung ba 'am/mi gzung ba 'am 'grib pa'am/'phel ba 'am dbri ba 'am/bstan pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang
472b6(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir gnas pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa mi yin/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /
472b7(khri brgyad): rango sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /slob pa'i chos rnams dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/'dus ma byas/
473a1(khri brgyad): kyi khams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed
473a2(khri brgyad): pa ma yin/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi
473a3(khri brgyad): yan lag dang /lam dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//brgya byin
473a4(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa
473a5(khri brgyad): ma yin par bdag gis kyang shes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma
473a6(khri brgyad): yin no//de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
473a7(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la
473b1(khri brgyad): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te legs so legs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
473b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa ni gnyis su nyo bar gnas pa ma yin no//de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
473b3(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su madra ba'i phyir gnyis su nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//kau shi ka shos rab kyi pha rol tu
473b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa gang yon pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod par zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su
473b5(khri brgyad): med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du bsam gautan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
473b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /chos kyi dbyings kyang gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa
473b7(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod par zad do//de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi bar du gnyis su 'dod par zad do//brgya byin gyis
474a1(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslabs na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
474a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so//bcom ldan
474a3(khri brgyad): 'das gang gi tshe/lha'i mdun sa chos bzang na/lha'i dbang po'i stan la bdag mchis pa'i gnas la/bdag mchis pa na der lha'i bu dag bdag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i

474a5(khri brgyad): lha rnams la chos bstan to zhes bdag gi stan de la phyag bgyis nas slar mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris pa
