474b1(khri brgyad): so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung la/sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams kyang
474b2(khri brgyad): 'di las skyes te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o//de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
474b3(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rten du gyur cing /rkyen du gyur rgyur gyur/stongs par gyur pa lags so//bcom
474b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de lta lags pas bdag ni cha de gnyis las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid 'tshal lpags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs nas/dam pa'i chos
474b5(khri brgyad): la sems gdungs pas kha ton du bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe/'jigs par 'gyur ba'am/bag 'khums

474b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis/smos su ma mchis pa lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /brtson
475a1(khri brgyad): 'grus dang /bzod pa dang tshul khrims dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du smos su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom
475a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa zhig lags te/mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma logs na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
475a3(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud nas//
475a4(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du
475a5(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mchis par chos ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags
475a6(khri brgyad): ma mchis/brjod du mi mching/smos su ma mchis pa lags pa de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchos pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang //
475a7(khri brgyad): brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mchis pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab par thugs su chud nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
475b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas te/sems can rnams la mtshon mya ma mchis pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mtshos pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
475b2(khri brgyad): dang /tha snyad ma mchis pa'i chos ston lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog
475b3(khri brgyad): dang /bdug pa dang spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /bla mar
475b4(khri brgyad): bgyi ba dang /ri mo bgyi ba dang /mchod par bgyi ba dang /bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /klag pa dang /kun chub par bgyi ba lags te/de la ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud
475b5(khri brgyad): 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so//nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi ser ltung ba'ang mo mchis par
475b6(khri brgyad): 'tshal bar bgyi ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /sems can
475b7(khri brgyad): yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang me tog
476a1(khri brgyad): phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /bla mar bgyi ba dang /ri mo bgyi ba
476a2(khri brgyad): dang /mchod pa bgyi ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i
476a3(khri brgyad): sku gdung gis yongs su bkang ste/byur bur bgyis pa zhig kyang bdag la stsal la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang bdag la stsal na/bdag
476a4(khri brgyad): ni cha gnyis bzhag pa 'di las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'tshal lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni de las byung ste/bsti
476a5(khri brgyad): stang du bgyi ba dang /bla mar bgyi ba dang /ri mo bgyi bo dang /mchod pa bgyi ba la gus pas des na/rigs kyi bu gang dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/bla mar bgyid/ri mo
476a6(khri brgyad): bgyid/mchod pa bgyid na/de dag ngan 'gro dag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te/lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong nas/smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin du nyan thos kyi
476a7(khri brgyad): theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/theg pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba

476b2(khri brgyad): lags pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs

476b4(khri brgyad): dbab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar du yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos bstan pa gang lags pa dang /rigs kyi blo 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ste/
476b5(khri brgyad): kun chub par bgyis nas/gzhan dag la'ang bstan pa gang lags pa de ni mtshungs pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum dang /mdo'i sde
476b6(khri brgyad): dang /dbyangs kyis bskyed pa'i sde dang /lung bstan pa'i sde dang /gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar dag ni 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
476b7(khri brgyad): shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis mdo'i sde dang /dbyings kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /lung bstan pa'i sde dang /
477a1(khri brgyad): gtan la be bA par bstan pa'i sde'i bar gyi chos ston pa gang lags pa dang /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /steng dang 'og
477a2(khri brgyad): dang /phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das drag cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis mdo'i sde dang /dbyangs
477a3(khri brgyad): kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sngo'i bar du choso ston pa gang lags pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin
477a4(khri brgyad): pa nas/gzhan dag la ston pa'i bar du bgyid pa grang lags pa de ni mtshungs pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang 'od las byung ba

477b3(khri brgyad): so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
477b4(khri brgyad): 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang yang dag
477b5(khri brgyad): par ston pa gang lags pa de la ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten po 'gro ba ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so//nyan thos
477b6(khri brgyad): dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'ang ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar
477b7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas/'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la
478a1(khri brgyad): bgyid pa dang /de la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spyos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
478a2(khri brgyad): ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/bla mar bgyid/ri mo bgyid/mchod pa bgyid pa de la ni gang las kyang 'jigaso pa 'byung ba ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so//bcom
478a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das dper bgyi na/bu lon pas 'jigs pa'i mi rgyal po la brten na/de rgyal po la 'khor bas/de gang dag gis 'jigs par gyur pa de dag nyid kyis bsten par 'gyur
478a4(khri brgyad): te/de dag gis 'jigs par yang mi 'gyur lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das mthu dang ldan pa la brten pa ni de ltar 'gyur ba'i slad du ste rgyal po la brten
478a5(khri brgyad): pa ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis ni mchod pa brnyes lags so///
478a6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de la rgyal po de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa blta bar bgyi logs so//rgyal po la brtan pa'i mi mchod pa 'thob pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ni//
478a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pas mchod pa brnyes par blta bar bgyi legs so//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang
478b1(khri brgyad): lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos par rig par bgyi lags so//de lta lags pas bdag ni che 'dra gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
478b2(khri brgyad): 'tshal lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni 'di las byung ba lags/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni 'di las byung ba lags
478b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni 'di las byung ba lags
478b4(khri brgyad): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po ni 'di las byung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams ni 'di las byung bas/pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa lags/
478b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di las byung ba lags pa'i slad du'o////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad
478b6(khri brgyad): stong pa//bam po nyi shu bzhi pa//bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /
478b7(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa der sems can de dag la mi 'am/mi ma lags pa glags tshol bas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/sems can de dag
479a1(khri brgyad): thams cad ni rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du'adu 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar rin po/
479a2(khri brgyad): cha ltar don che ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can grong dag 'khod pa de dag la
479a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bgyid pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod pa'i 'jig
479a4(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams der ni/sangs rgyas byung bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang ma mchis pa zhog mchis la/nor bu rin
479a5(khri brgyad): po che de'ang yon tan 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/nor bu rin po che de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lags pas glegs rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing /gang dang gang na skyes pa
479a6(khri brgyad): 'am/bud med mi ma lags pas zin pa de dang der/nor bu rin po che de phyung na/nor bu rin po che der phyung ma thag tu mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjod mi
479a7(khri brgyad): bzod pas 'bros par 'gyur lags so//mkhris pa'i dbang gis che bar gyur pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na/mkhris pa de'ang sel bar 'gyur zhing /rnam par 'phel
479b1(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur la/zhi bar 'gyur lags so//bser ma'i bro nad kyis thebs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na'ang rlung de sel bar 'gyur lags so//bad kan gyi bro nad kyis
479b2(khri brgyad): thebs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po tsha de btags na'ang /bad kan de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur lags so//rigs kyi bu'i ma rigs kyi bu mi 'dus pa'i bro nad kyis thebs pa de'i lus
479b3(khri brgyad): la nor bu rin po che de btags na'ang de'i nad de zhi bar 'gyur lags so//nor bu rin po che de mtshan mo'ang snang bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so//tsha ba'i dus la bab pa'i chos phyogs
479b4(khri brgyad): gang du nor bu rin po che de bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de'ang bsil bar 'gyur lags so//grang ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/sa phyogs gang du nor bu rin po che de bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de'ang
479b5(khri brgyad): dro bar 'gyur lags so//nor bu rin po che de gang du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de grang yang mi grang /cha'ang mi tsha ste/dus tshogs bde bar 'gyur lags so//sra phyogs grang du nor
479b6(khri brgyad): du rin po che de gnas pa'i sa phyogs der sbrul gdug pa dang /sdig pa la sogs pa 'am/sdig sprul rnams kyang gnas par mi 'gyur lags so//rigs kyi bro 'am rigs kyi
479b7(khri brgyad): bu mo gang la la sbrul gdug pos zin par gyur pa de la nor bu rin po che de bstan na de la bstan ma thag tu dug de dag thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur lags so//nor bu rin po
480a1(khri brgyad): tshe de ni yon tan de dag la sogs pa dang ldan pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das skyes pa'am/bud med bro nad sna tshogs kyis thobs pa gang lcags pa de dag gis
480a2(khri brgyad): lus la gal te nor bu rin po ched btags na/de dag gi bro nad thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur la gos so//bcom ldan 'das che ba gang gi nang du nor bu rin po che de sprul ba'i tshab
480a3(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyi kha dog ji lta ba dang yan lag brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das gal te nor bu rin po che de ras sngon pos dkris te
480a4(khri brgyad): chabak+Shi nang du sAl ni 'ang chab dri sngon por 'gyur bar bgyi lags so//gal te ser po'am/gal te dmar po 'am/gal te btsod ka'am/bal te shel gyi kha dog lta bri'i
480a5(khri brgyad): ras kyis nor bu rin po che de dkris te chab kyi nang du skal na'ang chab de de dag gi kha dog tu 'gyur lags so//ras tshon sna tshogs su bsgral ba'i ras kyis nor bu rin po che de dkris
480a6(khri brgyad): nas chab kyi nang du stsal na'ang cheb de kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das/chab rnyog pa can gang gis nang du nor bu rin po che de stsal ba'i cha ba
480a7(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad kyang dang bar 'gyur te/nari bu rin po che de ni yon tan de dag la sogs pa dang ldan lags so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/lha'i dbang po brgya
480b1(khri brgyad): byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/nor bu rin po che de lha'i yin+da nam/'on te dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la'ang rin po ched lta bu yod snyam mam/brgya
480b2(khri brgyad): byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa kun dga' bo nor bu rin po che de ni lha'i yin no//dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che gang yin pa ni chung la lci'o//lha'i nor bu rin po che gang yin pa de
480b3(khri brgyad): dog ni che la yang ste/dzAm+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che rnams ni/lha'i rin po che de dag ltar yon tan gyi rnam pa shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te dzam+bu gleng pa'i nor bu rin po
480b4(khri brgyad): tsheche de dag ni lha'i rin po che rnams kyi grangs su'ang nye bar mi 'gro ste/cha dang bgrang ba dang dper yang mi bzod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces
480b5(khri brgyad): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de za ma tog gi nang du stsal ba las/gang gi tshe nor bu rin po che de za ma tog de'i nang nas phyung na'ang nor bu rin po tsho de'i nang na mchis
480b6(khri brgyad): mchis so zhes za ma tog de'ang yid du mchi bar 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sa phyogs gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod pa der/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
480b7(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo dag gi lus dang /sems kyi sdug bsngal dang /gnod pa mis bgyis pa 'am/mi ma la gos pas bgyis pa rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur la gos so//de la nor bu rin po che chen
481a1(khri brgyad): po zhes bgyi ba de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon
481a2(khri brgyad): tan ni dpag tu ma mchis pa lags na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ji snyed cig yongs su brjod par rngo thogs lags/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
481a3(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
481a4(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs
481a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /chos kyi dbyings dang //
481a6(khri brgyad): chos skyon med pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan yang de bzhin te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye
481a7(khri brgyad): shes kyi yon tan de dag ni gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'dos pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur ba lags so//bcom ldan
481b1(khri brgyad): 'das gzhan yang sku gdung de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /bag chags dang /nying mtshams sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang /rtag tu btung
481b2(khri brgyad): snyoms su gnas pa dang /bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi snod du gyur pa lags te/de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs po'i sku gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes pa lags so//bcom
481b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che rnams kyi snod du gyur pa lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par
481b4(khri brgyad): byung ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /blang ba ma mchis pa dang dor ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
481b5(khri brgyad): 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang /'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snong du gyur pa lags so//de bzhin goshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni chos nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod du gyur pa
481b6(khri brgyad): lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa lags te/de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams ni mchod pa brnyas pa
481b7(khri brgyad): lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis yongs su bkang ste/byur bur bgyis pa lta zhog/
482a1(khri brgyad): lags kyi/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis yongs su bkang ste/byung bur bgyis la/
482a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang glegs bam du bris te sbal na/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshe 'di gnyis bzhag pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i tshal lags
482a3(khri brgyad): so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgos pa de las byung ba'i slad du mchod pa brnyes pa lags so//bcom
482a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la bsti stang du bgyid/bla mar bgyid/ri mar bgyid/mchod pa bgyid pa gang lags pa de'i
482a5(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni mthar phyin nas/lha rnams dang /mi rnams kyi bde ba dag nyams su myong ste/rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su 'am/bram ze'i rigs shing
482a6(khri brgyad): sA la chen po lta bu rnams su 'am/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral
482a7(khri brgyad): dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dgo' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba nyams su myong ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal mthar bgyid par
482b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur+ya btsam du bas kyi/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang tshul bzhin du yod
482b2(khri brgyad): la bgyid pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin du'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang /brtson 'grus kyi phyi rol
482b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so//bzod pa'i pha rol
482b4(khri brgyad): tuphyin pas kyang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas kyang /sbyin du'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
482b5(khri brgyad): legs so//de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags te/nyan thos dang
482b6(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas/byang chub sems dpe'i skyon na mchis pa la 'jug par bgying lags so//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas/byung
482b7(khri brgyad): chung sems dpa' mngon par shes pa rnams thob par 'gyur lags so//byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa rnams thob nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi nong du
483a1(khri brgyad): mchi zhing lus gang dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i lus bsams bzhin du len par bgyid de/yang na 'khor los sgyur ba'i
483a2(khri brgyad): lus sam/rgyal rags shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i lus blangs nas
483a3(khri brgyad): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la gus par mi bgyid pa'ang
483a4(khri brgyad): ma lags la/len par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags mod kyi/'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsti stang bgyid pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang
483a5(khri brgyad): bsti stang bgyis par 'gyur/bla mar bgyis par 'gyur/ri mo bgyis par 'gyur/mchod par bgyis par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
483a6(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa de dag chos kyi sku dang /gzugs
483a7(khri brgyad): kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal ba gang lags pa des ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bzung bar gyi/bcang bar bgyi/klag par bgyi/kun chub par bgyi/gzhan dag
483b1(khri brgyad): la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi zhing tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
483b2(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni/chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o//
483b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das chos nyid ni 'dri gnyis lags te/gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/'dus byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das
483b4(khri brgyad): de la 'dus byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/nang stong pa nyid 'tshal ba dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'tshal ba gang lags pa'i bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
483b5(khri brgyad): chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /so so yang
483b6(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa bzhi 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'tshal ba gang lags pa
483b7(khri brgyad): dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa rnams dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa
484a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams 'tshal ba gang lags pa ste/'di ni 'dus byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o//de la 'dus
484a2(khri brgyad): ma byas kyi chos kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/chos gang la skye ba ma mchis 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /gnas pa ma mchis pa dang gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang /
484a3(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang 'grib pa ma mchis pa dang 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang /chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid kyi bar dag
484a4(khri brgyad): ljags so//chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid kyang gang lags she na/chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi chos
484a5(khri brgyad): nyid ces bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//ko shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
484a6(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba gang yin pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
484a7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi
484b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
484b2(khri brgyad): med dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
484b3(khri brgyad): 'di nyid la brten te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
484b4(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang /ma bon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos su 'gyur
484b5(khri brgyad): ba gang yin pa de dag dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos da ltar 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang shes
484b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo///
484b7(khri brgyad): thob par 'gyur ro 'thob bo//'das pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag dang /da ltar phyogs
485a1(khri brgyad): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/grangs med pa dag nA rang sangs rgyas gnas te/'tsho zhing sdod pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
485a2(khri brgyad): la brten nas/rang byang chub thob bo//thob par 'gyur ro//'thob bo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir te/de dag
485a3(khri brgyad): kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med
485a4(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul dang /blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa'i tshul dang /dbri ba med pa dang /bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang /gzung ba med pa dang /spong ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/de'ang
485a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi bya ba yin gyi/don dam par ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma yin/pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'ang ma
485a6(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol lam/tshu rol lam/zang ngam/gshong ngam/mnyam pa 'am/mi mnyam pa 'am/mtshan ma 'am/mtshan ma med pa
485a7(khri brgyad): 'am/'jig rten pa'am/'jig rten los 'das pa 'am/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas sam/dge ba 'am/mi dge ba 'am/'das pa 'am/ma 'ongs pa 'am/da ltar byung
485b1(khri brgyad): ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang sbyin par byed pa ma yin te/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang /so so'i skye bo'i chos
485b2(khri brgyad): rnams kyang sbyin par byed pa ma yin no//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das
485b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams kyang rab tu 'tshal la sems can yang mi
485b4(khri brgyad): dmigs/shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar yang mi dmigs/gzugs kyang mi dmigs/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/mig kyang
485b5(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/gzugs kyang mi dmigs/mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'adra mi dmigs/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba
485b6(khri brgyad): 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/bde ba'ang ma lags/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags pa gang lags pa de'ang mi dmigs lags so//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lci dang lus dang yid
485b7(khri brgyad): kyang mi dmigs/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am bde ba'ang ma lags//
486a1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags pa gang lags pa de'ang mi dmigs lags so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul
486a2(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam yang mi dmigs lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang /so so
486a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs lags so//byang chub dang sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi dmigs lags
486a4(khri brgyad): so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas po ma lags pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar gang gis dmigs pa
486a5(khri brgyad): dang /gang la dmigs pa rang bzhin gyis ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kau shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems
486a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos/byang chub
486a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i chos rnams lta'ang ci smos/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'ba'
486b1(khri brgyad): zhig la spyod par bgyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la spyod par mi bgyid lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shri ka byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
486b2(khri brgyad): pa 'ba' zhig la spyod pa ma yin gyi/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la'ang spyod do//de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/de sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/sbyin pa po'ang mi dmigs/lan
486b3(khri brgyad): pa po'ang mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/tshul khrims 'chal pa'ong mi dmigs so//bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/bzod par
486b4(khri brgyad): bya ba'ang mi dmigs/bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/bya ba'ang mi dmigs/lus dang sems kyang mi dmigs so//sems kyang mi
486b5(khri brgyad): dmigs/ting nge 'dzin kyang mi dmigs mnyam par bzhag pa'ang mi dmigs so//shes rab kyang mi dmigs shes par bya ba'ang mi dmigs/shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs
486b6(khri brgyad): so//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no//shes rab
486b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims srung ba dang /bzod bsgoms pa dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no//
487a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams rnam par 'byed pa'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no//de bzhin du phung po dang /khams dang skye mched rnams
487a2(khri brgyad): la'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la'ang mi de migs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o//stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa
487a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
487a4(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar du'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/dzam+bu'i gling gi shing ljon pa lo ma tha dad pa dang 'bras bu tha dad pa'i shing ljon pa ji snyed pa de
487a5(khri brgyad): dag gi grib ma ni grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grongs su 'gro ba ma gtogs par khyad par ram tha dad du dbye ba med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lha mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
487a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa rnams la ni khyad par ram/tha dad du dbye ba med do//brgya byin gyis
487a7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje tshon po dang ldan pa lags/yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/yon tan
487b1(khri brgyad): tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags/yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa lags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yon tan thug pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das
487b2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la'ang bris te 'chang la/me tog dang /spos dang /bdug pa dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa
487b3(khri brgyad): dang /phye ma dang na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/bla mar bgyid/ri mo bgyid/mchod pa bgyid de/ji ltar lung phog pa bzhin
487b4(khri brgyad): du'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris te/gzhan dag la
487b5(khri brgyad): stsal na/'di gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de'i phyir 'di khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de
487b6(khri brgyad): ltar lan thob cig/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos drang me
487b7(khri brgyad): tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/dri mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa byed pa dang /rigs kyi bu
488a1(khri brgyad): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam gzhan dag la byin te/bgo ba sha' byas nas/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'ang de bzhin
488a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam po de la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang gos dang /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan
488a3(khri brgyad): dag gis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa byed na/de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du bskyed snyam mam brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
488a4(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo gdung de dag la bdag nyid kyang me tog la sogs pas bsti/
488a5(khri brgyad): stang du bgyid/bla mar bgyid/ri mo bgyid/mchod pa bgyid pa bas/gzhan dag la'ang stsol bar bgyid pa de ni/de las bsod nams ches mang du bskyed lags so//de bzhin
488a6(khri brgyad): gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/sems can gyi tshogs kyi nang na/sems can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba rnams la thugs rje chen po
488a7(khri brgyad): bskyed de/de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdo rje lta bu'i sku ba shig ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams su byin gyis
488b1(khri brgyad): brlabs lags so//bcom ldan 'das tha na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa bgyid nga'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
488b2(khri brgyad): ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur gyi bar du de dag thams cad kyis de'i mtha' rtogs par rngo mi thogs lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no dang
488b3(khri brgyad): bzhin te/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spros dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /
488b4(khri brgyad): gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed pa dang /bla mor byed pa dang /ri mo byed pa dang /mchod pa byed pa bas gang gis yi ger bris nas gzhan dag
488b5(khri brgyad): la sbyin par byed na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de las ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'o ma rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
488b6(khri brgyad): pa 'di ji ltar lung phog pa bzhin du gzhan dag gi drung du song ste/'chang cing ston pa dang /brjod cing 'grel pa dang /gsal bar byed na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo da ni/rigos
488b7(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma pas/ches bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ston pa'am bla ma'i gnas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa gang yang rung ba zhig yin par shes
489a1(khri brgyad): par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di la ston pa'ang gzhan la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan pa ni ma yin gyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston
489a2(khri brgyad): pa yin la/ston pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin par blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'das pa dang /ma
489a3(khri brgyad): byon pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas byung ba
489a4(khri brgyad): yin la/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa gang yang rung ba dang /phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
489a5(khri brgyad): pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas//
489a6(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang byang chub thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' rnams
489a7(khri brgyad): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs so//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
489b1(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /gros dang gdugs
489b2(khri brgyad): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /ri mo bya ba dang /mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid glegs bam
489b3(khri brgyad): la bris te/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya/bla
489b4(khri brgyad): mar bya/ri mo bya/mchod pa bya'o//nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/dron gyi dbang 'di mthong nas/'di snyam du bsams te/
489b5(khri brgyad): ngas gang la brten te gnas par bya/gang zhig la ni bsti stang bya/bla mar bya/ri mo bya/mchod pa bya snyam pa las/kau shi ka de'i tshe ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas
489b6(khri brgyad): pa/dge sbyong dang /bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na/nga dang 'dra ba ma mthong ste/nga dang 'dra ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/yang 'di snyam du bsams te/'o na de ltar
489b7(khri brgyad): ngas chos gong mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de nyid la bdag gis bsti stang du bya/bla mar bya/ri mo bya/mchod pa bya zhing brten te/gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams
490a1(khri brgyad): de chos gang yin pa rdan/ shi ka shes rab rol tu phyin pa 'di cad yin te/ka shaMka/shrIs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ning nyid kyang bsti spyad du byed
490a2(khri brgyad): bla mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa byed de/bsti stang du byas/bla mar byas/ro mi byed/mchod pa byas nas brten cing gnas nA/kau tsosha ki rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo blun
490a3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spros dang /me tog
490a4(khri brgyad): phregleng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gis+t+ra dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /ri mo bya ba dang /mchod pa bye ba dang /
490a5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
490a6(khri brgyad): pa 'di la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang me tog phyed dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /glos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba den dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang /
490a7(khri brgyad): bla mar bya ba dang /ri mo bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung la/byang chub
490b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byung zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams byung
490b2(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir te/kau shi ka de lta bas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pa rnams dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis gang
490b3(khri brgyad): la bslabs na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par
490b4(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgya ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang
490b5(khri brgyad): phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bA dan dag gis bsti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o//mchod par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad
490b6(khri brgyad): stong pa las/sku gdung go le'u zhes bya ste/sumA cu rtsa gcig pa'o///kau shi ka sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhu gos pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag pa ni/bsod
490b7(khri brgyad): nams ches dpag tu med pa yin gyi/dzam+bu'i blang gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa ni de lta mi yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka sems can
491a1(khri brgyad): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa dag ni/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha ma yin gyi 'gro
491a2(khri brgyad): ba dag gis yongs su btang ba ma yin gyi/sems can rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag pa ni/ngan 'gro thams cad las thar pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sems can
491a3(khri brgyad): gcig cig rang byang chub la bzhag pa ni bsod nams ches mang ba yin gyi/dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa ni de lta ma yin no//ko
491a4(khri brgyad): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du
491a5(khri brgyad): bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi chad par bgyi ba'i ched du bzhag pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par
491a6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dzeg pa gang yin pa de ni/bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' las ni dkon mchog gsum byung la//
491a7(khri brgyad): dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir te/kau shi ka de bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni 'jig rten lha dang
491b1(khri brgyad): bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/dge sbyong dang /bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang me tog phreng dang /byug pA dang phye ma dang /
491b2(khri brgyad): gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o//mchod pa bya'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
491b3(khri brgyad): las dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod na/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ci gzhi de las rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams
491b4(khri brgyad): mang du bskyed snyam mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka
491b5(khri brgyad): de bas ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glags bam la bris nas tha na dpe dri ba dang /klag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa de
491b6(khri brgyad): ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi gang la bslabs na/yang dag pa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa dang /'jug pa dang
491b7(khri brgyad): 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur pa dang /'thob pa dang /thob par 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skyon med pa
492a1(khri brgyad): la zhugs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /mngon par rdzogs
492a2(khri brgyad): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/'di
492a3(khri brgyad): lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /bden pa bzhi dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang //
492a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/
492a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan pa dag yin no//kau shri ka de bas na rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
492a6(khri brgyad): byin pa glegs bamA li bris te/tha na dpe 'dri ba dang /klog pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa de/chus bsod nams mang du bskyed par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir
492a7(khri brgyad): zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar chos gang dag gis rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lto bu rnams yod po dang /khyim po dag
492b1(khri brgyad): gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar
492b2(khri brgyad): 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams yod pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du yod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
492b3(khri brgyad): bar du yod pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod pa'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha
492b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi/kau shI ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
492b5(khri brgyad): sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod na/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ci rigs
492b6(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so///
492b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/tha na dpe bri ba dang /
493a1(khri brgyad): klag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa de/ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar nyan thos dang /rang sangs
493a2(khri brgyad): rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/kau shi ka gling chen po
493a3(khri brgyad): bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can 'khod pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /dgra bcom pa'i bar dang /rlung sangs rgyas kyi bar du bkod pa lta zhog gi/rigs
493a4(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa dang /dgra bcom
493a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du bkod pa bas/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/tha na dpe bri
493a6(khri brgyad): ba dang /klag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can
493a7(khri brgyad): 'khod pa lta zhog gi/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs
493b1(khri brgyad): rgyas nyid kyi bar du bkod pa bas/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/tha na dpe bri ba dang /klag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan
493b2(khri brgyad): dag la sbyin par byed pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can 'khod pa rnams dge ba bcu'i
493b3(khri brgyad): las kyi lam dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du bkod pa lta zhog gi/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems
493b4(khri brgyad): can ji snyed gnas pa de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du bkod pa bas/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu
493b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/tha na dpe 'dri ba dang /klag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du
493b6(khri brgyad): bskyed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams lha zhog gi/kau shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya
493b7(khri brgyad): ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs
494a1(khri brgyad): rgyas nyid kyi bar du bkod pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/tha na dpe 'dri ba dang /klag pa
494a2(khri brgyad): tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed na/ko shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can
494a3(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bsam gtan bzhi la bkod cing /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon
494a4(khri brgyad): par shes pa lnga la bkod na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//
494a5(khri brgyad): bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas ni rigros kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs
494a6(khri brgyad): bam la bris nas/tha na dpe 'dri ba dang /klag pa tsam gyi phyir yang gzhan la sbyin par byed na/de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha
494a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba
494b1(khri brgyad): dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ches mang du bskyed kyi/dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams
494b2(khri brgyad): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /bsam gtan dang /tshod med pa dang /gzugs med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la bkod pa ni de lta ma yin no//de la tshul bzhin
494b3(khri brgyad): du yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te gnyis su spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du
494b4(khri brgyad): yid la byed pa dang /gnyis su spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims
494b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /gnyis su spyod pa ma
494b6(khri brgyad): yin pa'i blos nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yod la byed pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /gnyis su spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos
494b7(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
495a1(khri brgyad): gnyis su spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa yin no//
495a2(khri brgyad): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la rnam grangs des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la rgya cher ston cing 'chad la rab tu 'byed pa dang /'grel
495a3(khri brgyad): cing gsal bar byed pa dang /don kyang ston par byed la/de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su mi lta gnyis su med par
495a4(khri brgyad): mi lta zhing /mtshan mar ma yin/mtshan mo med par ma yin/blang bar ma yin/dor bar ma yin/dbri bar ma yin/bsnun par ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/rnam
495a5(khri brgyad): par byang bar ma yin/sra bar ma yin/'gag par ma yin/gzung bar ma yin/spang bar ma yin/gnas su ma no/de/gnas ma yin par ma yin/yang dag par ma yin/
495a6(khri brgyad): log par ma yin/rig por ma yin/mi rig par ma yin/bag tsam du ma yin/bag tsam ma yin par ma yin/cha shas su ma yin/cha shas su med par ma yin/chos su
495a7(khri brgyad): ma yin/chos ma yin par ma yin/de bzhin nyid du ma yin/de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin zhing /yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang mi
495b1(khri brgyad): lta bso/'di ni gnyis su med pa'i don to//rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la rgya cher ston cing 'chang la/rab tu 'byed pa dang /'gro cing gsapa
495b2(khri brgyad): bar byed pa dang /don kyang ston par byed pa de ni gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed kyi/gang bdag 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul
495b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la byed pa ni de lta ma yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /'chang po dang /klog pa
495b4(khri brgyad): dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa bas gang zhig gzhan dag la rgya cher ston cing 'doms par byed pa dang /de la 'god par byed pa dang mi rnam par 'byed
495b5(khri brgyad): cing gsal bar byed la don kyang ston par byed na/de ni de bos ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags te/de de ltar logs
495b6(khri brgyad): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par bstan par
495b7(khri brgyad): bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de ltar bstan na/bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med/grangs med tshad med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gal te rigs kyi bu 'am
496a1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo la las phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med/dpag tu med pa dag
496a2(khri brgyad): la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du me to ga dang /bdog pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bden dang /bde ba'i
496a3(khri brgyad): yo byad thams cad kyis bsti stang du byed/bla mar byed/ri mo byed/mchod pa byed pa bas/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bla me gang+gA zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
496a4(khri brgyad): 'di rnam grangs du mer gzhan dag lnga rgya cher ston cing /don go bar byed la nom par 'byed cing 'grel te gsal bar byed na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo da ni ngo bos ches
496a5(khri brgyad): bsod nams mang du bskyed de//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegaso pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
496a6(khri brgyad): de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /mngon par rdzogs
496a7(khri brgyad): par 'chang bya ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bskal pa grangs med pa/
496b1(khri brgyad): dadab tu med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa bas/gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la rgya cher ston cing brjod pa dang /mchod/
496b2(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du byed la/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed na/de ni de bas chos bsod nams mang du bskyed do//kau sho ka de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'
496b3(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa sbyin pa gang yin pa ste/'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no//'di ni sbyin pa yin te/gzhan la sbyin no snyam du sems na/de ni sbyin pa nyid la gnas
496b4(khri brgyad): pa yin gyi/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin no//'di ni tshul khrims so//blo dag ni tshul khrims can yin gyis/sems can 'di dag gi don du srung ngo //snyom du sems na/
496b5(khri brgyad): ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//bdag ni bzod pa can no//'di ni bzod pa'o//'dri la bzod par bya ste/bzod pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/de ni bzod
496b6(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam mo//'di ni brtson 'grus so//'di dag gi don du brtson 'grus 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du sems nA/de ni brtson 'grus
496b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//bdag bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/'di ni bsam gtan no//'di dag gi don du snyoms par zhugs te/bsam gtan 'di la gnas par
497a1(khri brgyad): bya snyam du sems na/de ni bas mya gtan gyipha rol tu phyin pam sbyin s+ho//bdag gos shos rab sgom mo//'ang myi shes rab po//'di dag ga don du shes ra 'dil/
497a2(khri brgyad): gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shI ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i phyi rol tu phyin
497a3(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no//rgyul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
497a4(khri brgyad): pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyud stong pa//bam po nyi shu lnga pa/
497a5(khri brgyad): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar spyad na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba legs/tshul
497a6(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
497a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ko 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/sbyin pa
497b1(khri brgyad): dang /sbyin pa dang /len pa po mi dmigs na/de ni de'i sbyin pa'i phyi rol tu phyin pa yin no//rdul khrims dang /tshul khrims can dang /sems can mi dmigs na/dA ni de rgyal khrims/
497b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//bzod pa dang bzod par bya ba dang /bzod pa can mi dmigs na/de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//brtson 'grus dang /bya ba'i dngos po dang /
497b3(khri brgyad): sems mi dmags na de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//bsam gtan dang /bsam gtan pa dang /bas ma gotan du bya ba mi dmig stan/ ni de'i bsam gtan gyis
497b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yin no//shes rab dang /shes rab can dang /shes par bya ba'i don mi dmigs na/de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/kau shi ka byang chub sems
497b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brjon/
497b6(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo re
497b7(khri brgyad): de ltar mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par bstan par bya'o//de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
498a1(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang bstan par bya'o//de ci'i
498a2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mau shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/der rigs kyi bu'am
498a3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa thos par byas pas/phung bar byed de/
498a4(khri brgyad): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang btsos/tshig 'bru dang bcas par smyon par mi byed pa'i phyir ro//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
498a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ni
498a6(khri brgyad): 'di lta bur ston to//de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ni 'di yin te/gzugs mi rtag go zhes gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin
498a7(khri brgyad): /do zhes ston to//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag la bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs mi rtag go zhes dpyod cing /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang //
498b1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa mi rtag gro zhes dpyod par byed do//gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa de dag kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa la spyod par
498b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/de dag mig mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//gzugs mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//
498b3(khri brgyad): sgra dang dri dang /ro dang reg bya dang /chos rnams mi rtag gro zhes ston par byed do//sa'i khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /
498b4(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//mig gi khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//rna ba'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /lce'i
498b5(khri brgyad): khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /yid kyi khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//gzugs kyi khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /reg bya'i khams
498b6(khri brgyad): dang /chos kyi khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//rna ba dang sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid kyi rnam par shes
498b7(khri brgyad): pa'i khams mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes ston par byed do//rna ba dang sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes
499a1(khri brgyad): ston par byed do//gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
499a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//de bzhin du mig dang /gzugs dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i//
499a3(khri brgyad): khams sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal
499a4(khri brgyad): ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
499a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston par byed do//gzugs mi rtag pa dang /sdug
499a6(khri brgyad): bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes po mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag
499a7(khri brgyad): med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//de bzhin du mig dang gzugs dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang //
499b1(khri brgyad): misdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//de bzhin du na pa dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /blang ga med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston
499b2(khri brgyad): par byed do//de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi
499b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//de bzhin du tshod med pa rnams dang /gzugs
499b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba
499b5(khri brgyad): dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam mi rtag
499b6(khri brgyad): pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /
499b7(khri brgyad): mi sdug pa'o zhes ston par byed de/'di skad du de ltar spyod pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa yin no zhes kyang zer te/kau shi ka 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
500a1(khri brgyad): ltar bcos pa yin no//kau shri ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na/'di skad du ston te rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi ba
500a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms na/sa dang po dngas bcu pa'i bar la gnas por 'gyur ro//de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
500a3(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms na/sa dang po la gnas par
500a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing /sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes ston te/de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul dang /dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dus kyi 'du shes kyis de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
500a5(khri brgyad): sgom par byed do//kau shi ka 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di skad du/rigs kyi bu khyod
500a6(khri brgyad): chutshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms na/nyan thos kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur zhing /rang sangs
500a7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bor 'gyur ro zhes ston por byed de/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
500b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de dag theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston pa na/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/de ltar
500b2(khri brgyad): bsgoms na/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes ston par byed de/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur bcos pa yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
500b3(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
500b4(khri brgyad): pa sgoms shig/khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms na/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro//khyod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa na/byang chub sems dpa'i
500b5(khri brgyad): mngon par shes pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba
500b6(khri brgyad): dang /ri mo bya ba dang /mchod pa bya ba dang /brjod pa bya ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes ston te/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
500b7(khri brgyad): de dag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston par byed do//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
501a1(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di skad du/rigs kyi bu dag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub
501a2(khri brgyad): par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni bsod nams kyi phung po grangs med dpag tu med/tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes ston na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
501a3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
501a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la 'di skad du/rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
501a5(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/dge ba'i rtsa ba ci
501a6(khri brgyad): mnga' ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar byas nas/gcig tu bsdus la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos shig ces skyon na/kau shi ka
501a7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa yin no//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
501b1(khri brgyad): bu mo de dag gis ji skad du bstan na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa mi ston pa lags/
501b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar ston na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
501b3(khri brgyad): pa rnams la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa ma yin te/rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms la gzugs mi rtag par yang
501b4(khri brgyad): ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med la/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
501b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar brjod du med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de la ni
501b6(khri brgyad): gzugs nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag par lta ga la 'gyur zhes de skad du ston na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos
501b7(khri brgyad): pa ston pa ma yin no//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi rtag par yang ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par shes pa ni rnam
502a1(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med la/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
502a2(khri brgyad): pa yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mI rtag ces bya bar brjod du med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de la
502a3(khri brgyad): ni rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na rtog pa 'am mi rtag par lta ga la 'gyur zhes de skad du ston no/kau shI ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
502a4(khri brgyad): pa ltar bcos pa ston pa ma yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di skad du ston te/rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/
502a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms la/rigs kyi bu khyod chos ci la'ang ma lta zhig/chos gang la'ang gnas par ma byed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
502a6(khri brgyad): byin pa la ni chos gang los 'da' bar bya ba 'am/gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de med pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri kra 'di lta ro chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
502a7(khri brgyad): stong ste/chos gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de ni dngos po med la/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
502b1(khri brgyad): de la ni chos gang blang ba'am/dor ba'am skye ba 'am 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes de ltar ston na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar
502b2(khri brgyad): bcos pa ston pa ma yin no//phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
502b3(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
502b4(khri brgyad): brgyad la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi rtag par yang ma lta zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
502b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med la/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni
502b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar brjod du med pa'i phyir ro//
502b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am/mi rtag par 'gyur zhes de skad du ston na/kau sho ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes
503a1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa ston pa ma yin no//kau shi ka de bas na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don de ltar
503a2(khri brgyad): bstan par bya'o//kau shrI ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar ston na/bsod nams ches myang du bskyed do//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi sems sngon ji snyed yod pa de
503a3(khri brgyad): dag/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma de gzhi de las
503a4(khri brgyad): bsod nams mang du skyang snyam mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
503a5(khri brgyad): pa/kau shi ka de bas no/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang bcas tshig 'bru dang bcas par gzhan dag la rnam grangs du mar brjod
503a6(khri brgyad): cing 'chang la/rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing yang dag par ston la/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/tshangs shig/
503a7(khri brgyad): lhogs shig/kun chub por gyis shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang zer na/de ches
503b1(khri brgyad): bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro//kau shi ka dzam+bu'i gling
503b2(khri brgyad): gi sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul ba lta'ang zhog/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul ba lta'ang zhog/stong
503b3(khri brgyad): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul ba lta'ang zhog/kau shi kra stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
503b4(khri brgyad): thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul ba lta'ang zhig go//kau shi ka shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag rigs
503b5(khri brgyad): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod la/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /phyogs mtshams rnams dang /steng dang 'og
503b6(khri brgyad): tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mA~M la la zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na
503b7(khri brgyad): kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//
504a1(khri brgyad): bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
504a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di don dang bcas tshig 'bru dang bcas par gzhan dag la rgya cher 'chad cing yang dag par ston la/rnam par 'byed cing 'grel te/gsal bar byed la 'di skad du rigs kyi
504a3(khri brgyad): bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji skad bstan pa'i
