504a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang zer na/de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
504a5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dzam+b+hi'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
504a6(khri brgyad): 'bras bu la bkod phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bkod na/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod
504a7(khri brgyad): nams mang du skyed snyom mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
504b1(khri brgyad): kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas//tshig 'bru dang bcas par sems can gzhan dag la rgya cher 'chad pa nas/yang
504b2(khri brgyad): dag par rab tu ston pa'i bar du byed la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig tshul
504b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang zer na/de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri
504b4(khri brgyad): kwa dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro//kau shi ka dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa'i bar du btul ba lta zhog gi
504b5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byung la las gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bkod la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dang /stong
504b6(khri brgyad): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bkod de/kau shi ka shwar
504b7(khri brgyad): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bkod na/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs
505a1(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mAm/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//blang bar
505a2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan
505a3(khri brgyad): dag la yang dag par ston cing 'chad la/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/kun chub par bya ba'i bar du gyos shig/ji skad
505a4(khri brgyad): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces zer na/de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir
505a5(khri brgyad): mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
505a6(khri brgyad): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can ji snyed 'khod pa dri dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod na/kau shi ka 'di ji
505a7(khri brgyad): snyam du soms/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar
505b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dod pa dag la
505b2(khri brgyad): don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par ston cing yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/kun chub
505b3(khri brgyad): par gyis shig/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig ces kyang zer na/de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/kau shi ka rang sangs
505b4(khri brgyad): rgyas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can gang yin pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/bla
505b5(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa bas gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par gzhan dag la rgya cher 'chad cing yang
505b6(khri brgyad): dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob pa de lta de ltar khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
505b7(khri brgyad): rnams thob par 'gyur ro//ji lta ji ltar khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher bsgom pa
506a1(khri brgyad): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro ji lta ji ltar khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya tshor ba sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyod than
506a2(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs da'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer na/de ches bsod nams mong du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems
506a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa rnams ni de las byung la phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' grang su
506a4(khri brgyad): dadrug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro//
506a5(khri brgyad): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lA la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gong+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can ji stod 'khrud
506a6(khri brgyad): pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod na/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du semaso//rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag nyi de las bsod nams mAng du skyed snyam mA ma/bAr+g+ha byin
506a7(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bos na/rigs kyi bu'am
506b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par gzhan dag la 'chad cing yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod
506b2(khri brgyad): tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung zhig ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan bya ba'i bar du gyis shig dang /rigs kyi bu khyod ji lta ji ltar ji skad
506b3(khri brgyad): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/bla
506b4(khri brgyad): na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad kyang zer na/kau shi ka de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//de ci'i phyir
506b5(khri brgyad): zhe na/kau shi ka phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba'i phyir ro//kr-i shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
506b6(khri brgyad): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa pos ni/de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
506b7(khri brgyad): pa 'di don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par 'chad cing yang dag par ston pa'i bar du byed la/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhig/
507a1(khri brgyad): ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan bya ba'i bar du gyis shig dang /rigs kyi bu khyod ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji lta
507a2(khri brgyad): ji ltar nan tan byed pa de lta de ltar khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pas/phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
507a3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyu ro ro zhes kyang zer na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo do ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//kau shi ka gzhan
507a4(khri brgyad): yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can 'khod pa rnams dang /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen
507a5(khri brgyad): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can 'khod pa rnams dang /phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de
507a6(khri brgyad): dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
507a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par sems can de dag la bshad cing yang dag par bstan la/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/shes rab kyi pha
507b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhig/ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nan tan bya ba'i bar du gyis shig dang /khyod 'di la nan tan byas pas/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas
507b2(khri brgyad): par 'gyur te/rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer na/de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//
507b3(khri brgyad): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubo las
507b4(khri brgyad): phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod de/de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par bshad pa nas/yang dag par bstan pa'i bar du byed pa bas//
507b5(khri brgyad): de dag gi nang nas gcig cig 'di skad du/bdag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod do zhes zer ba de la/rigs kyi bu lam
507b6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par ston na/de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do//phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang
507b7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa dang stsol la zhig gis de dag lo shes rab kyi pha
508a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa bas ni/de dag gi nang nas 'ga' zhig 'di skad du bdag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
508a2(khri brgyad): rgya bar bya'o zhes zer ba de lo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang bcas/tshig 'bru dang bcas par ston na/de ches bsod nams mong du bskyed do//brgya byin gyis
508a3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta da ltar byang chub
508a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags te/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha
508a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so//stong
508a6(khri brgyad): pa nyid thams cad la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so//dran pa nye bor bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang
508a7(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par
508b1(khri brgyad): rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan 'tshal lags so//gos dang /zas dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo
508b2(khri brgyad): byang rnams kyis sman gdags 'tshal lags so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni chos dang /zang zing gri bsdu ba gnyis kyis sman gdags 'tshal te/chos dang /zad
508b3(khri brgyad): zing gis sman 'dogs pa de ni snga ma gnyis pas ches bsod nams mang du skyed lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la pha rol tu
508b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa rnams kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang //
508b5(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston pa'i slad du'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/lha'i dbang
508b6(khri brgyad): po brgya byin lnga 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka gang khyod kyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi spro ba bskyed pa ni legos so legs so//
508b7(khri brgyad): khyod kyi los ni de yin no//'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag
509a1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spro ba bskyed par bya'o//chos dang /zang zing gi bsgru bas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags par bya zhing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o//de
509a2(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni de las byung ste/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang de las byung la/theg pa chen po'ang de las byung ba'i phyir ro//gal te byang chub sems
509a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur la/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma
509a4(khri brgyad): bslabs te/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
509a5(khri brgyad): bco brgyad la ma bslabs na/chos de dag la ma bslabs pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro//mngon par rdzogs
509a6(khri brgyad): par sangs ma rgyas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /nyan thos kyi byang chub yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/kau shi ka gang gi phyir
509a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag la slob pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag por
509b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
509b2(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun gcod par 'gyur zhing /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /yi dwags kyi yul thams cad rgyun gcod par 'gyur ro//rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu
509b3(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'byung por 'gyur ro//khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
509b4(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /
509b5(khri brgyad): tshangs 'khor dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che ba dang /gnas gtsang ma mi che ba dang /gya nom snang
509b6(khri brgyad): dang /shin tu mthong dang /mi gdung ba dang /'og min dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /ci'ang med
509b7(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //tshul
510a1(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /btson+da 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /busam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol
510a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'jig
510a3(khri brgyad): rten du 'byung ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen po 'jig rten du
510a4(khri brgyad): 'byung ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las bsod nams kyi khyad par gyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
510a5(khri brgyad): po byams pas/gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams
510a6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i dngos po gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos te/dri'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su
510a7(khri brgyad): bsngos na/sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang //
510b1(khri brgyad): sa sa sa m-ig pa la drung dgu byangasas padums kyi spyod pa las byung ba'i bdun pas 'ong sa bya ga/tshul mas las byung ba'i sa nams bya jas pa dang /thom pa la
510b2(khri brgyad): byu ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang sbyin pa de bas mau/byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mad sa myos pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i ma po sems can thams cad dang thun mong
510b3(khri brgyad): druM byas te/blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bcos pa de mchog ces bya rdul du byung ba zhes bya/gcib zhis bya/rab ces bya/rab mchog ces bya/gya rnam pa
510b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya/rgyun med pa zhes bya/gang na med pa zhes phyog ci'i phyir zhen/'od ltar nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las spyong ba dang /tshul khrims las byung
510b5(khri brgyad): ba /smyos du lces byung po'i bas durnams 'o ngas po de dag thams cad ni bdag nyid dul bar bya ba dang /bdag nyid zhi bar bya bA /bdag nyid sangs su mya ngan las 'du
510b6(khri brgyad): nyid zhibang byo ba dang /bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'di'i phyir yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mad las skyes pam thos de rnams byi ba'i /
511a1(khri brgyad): de ni sems can thams cad dul bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad zhi bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang //
511a2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
511a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med
511a4(khri brgyad): dpag tu med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
511a5(khri brgyad): pa'i bar dag dang /phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dag dang /ji srid du dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar de'i pha
511a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grong yin pa dang de dag gi nyan thos kyi theg pa po dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /tshul khrims las byung ba
511a7(khri brgyad): dang /sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /slob pa dang /mi slob pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dag dang /de bzhi ni gshegs pa
511b1(khri brgyad): de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dag
511b2(khri brgyad): dang /phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dag dang /thugs rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa/grangs med pa gang yin pa de dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos
511b3(khri brgyad): bstan pa gang yin pa dag dang /chos bstan pa de dag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang /rang byang chub thob pa'i bar dang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
511b4(khri brgyad): med pa la zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa bo
511b5(khri brgyad): bskyed pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang zhing /rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang /khyad par du 'phags pa dang /rab dang /rab mchog dang /
511b6(khri brgyad): gya nom pa dang /bla ma dang /bla na med pa dang /gong na med pa dang /mnyam pa med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i rjes su yi rang nas/rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las
511b7(khri brgyad): skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur cig ces/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
512a1(khri brgyad): tu yongs su bsngos la/theg pa chen po pa gang yin pa des de skad du smras te/sems kyis de ltar yongs su bsngo bar byed na/dmigs pa gang dang /dngos po gang dag gis sems
512a2(khri brgyad): de bskyed pa'i dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar bzung ba de bzhin du yod cing dmigs pa zhig yin nam/byams pas smras pa/btsun pa rab
512a3(khri brgyad): 'byor dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag ni theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar bzung nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos
512a4(khri brgyad): pa bzhin du yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med do//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/gal te dngos po med pa la dmigs pa med pa dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
512a5(khri brgyad): cad na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag mtshan mar bzung nas/de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa
512a6(khri brgyad): bgang yin pa dag dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa slob pa dang /mi slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
512a7(khri brgyad): byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /sems phyin ci log pa dang /lta ba phyin ci log pa dang /sdug bsngal ba la bde zhes bya ba dang /bdag
512b1(khri brgyad): med pa la bdag ces bya ba dang /mi sdug pa la sdug ces bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang /sems phyin ci ldog pa dang /lta ba phyin ci ldog pa ji lta ba bzhin du de'ang phyin ci log par mi 'gyur grung //
512b2(khri brgyad): ji ste dngos po ji lta ba dang /dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/byang chub kyang de lta bu yin la sems kyang de bzhin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
512b3(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
512b4(khri brgyad): bdun yang de bzhi ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin
512b5(khri brgyad): pa zhig yin la/de ltar gal te dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa'ang de bzhin te/byang chub kyang de lta bu yin la/sems kyang de bzhin/gzugs kyang de bzhin/tshor ba dang /'du shes
512b6(khri brgyad): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin/mig kyang de bzhin/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang de bzhin/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
512b7(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam yang de
513a1(khri brgyad): bzhin/stobs bcu'ang de bzhin/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang de bzhin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang de bzhin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de
513a2(khri brgyad): bzhin pa zhig yin na/de la dngos po ni gang yin/dmigs pa ni gang yin/ting nge 'dzin ni gang yin/sems ni gang yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang yin/rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las
513a3(khri brgyad): skyes pa'i sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni gang yin/byams pas smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
513a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa'ang yin la/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed pa'ang yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed bskyed pa'ang yin/dge ba'i bshes gnyen
513a5(khri brgyad): gyis yongs su zin pa'ang yin/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la slob slob pa'ang yin na ni/de dag gis dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom
513a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
513a7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar mi byed kyi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul ji lto ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo bar byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dmigs
513b1(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i tshul dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul dang /rnam par byang ba'i tshul dang /skye ba'i tshul dang /'gag pa'i tshul gyis ni ma yin no//gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
513b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la'ang ma bslabs/sangs rgyas mang po la 'ong bsnyen bkur ma byas/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang ma bskyed/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su ma zin//
513b3(khri brgyad): rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la'ang ma bslabs na/de dag gis ni dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /rjes su yi rang ba'i mod
513b4(khri brgyad): las skyes pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag mtshan mar bzung nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro//btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
513b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa 'di ni theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du brjod par mi bya'o//de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
513b6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
513b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bstan par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i dad pa tsam dang /dong ba tsam dang /dga' ba tsam dang /gus pa tsam yod pa gang yin pa de'ang
514a1(khri brgyad): med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du ni brjod par bya/bstan par bya ste/rang gi mtshan
514a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa 'ams ma da sto kyis ma sbyin da dang mi rgyu m+bu/ dag pa'i shes rten gyis
514a3(khri brgyad): sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge bo'i rna ba bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa zhig yin na ni/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub
514a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rjes su yi rang ba'i modado los skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de lhor yongs
